Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Enneracts resurface every now and then. Those lucky enough to find them, not knowing any better, usually sell them on to be siphoned into energy crystals which fuel weapons or industry. Scholars have theorized that they may contain a small fragment of a divine entity's power, stored in an ancient but definitely manmade device. While mages may spend their life studying a few Enneracts to replicate their signature essence and cast spells, a select few are drawn to them and are able to absorb the energy within, making it theirs in an instant."
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "从古至今，超维之石都有现世。那些运气足够好发现它们的人往往没有更好的处理方法，通常将之作为给用于工业或武器的魔晶充能的燃料变卖。 按照学者们的理论，它们可能包含着某个神圣存在的一枚力量碎片，曾被储存在一个古老但绝对是人造的装置之中。 当法师们穷尽一生去钻研一些超维之石的奥秘，以图复刻它们所象征的本质并施展对应的法术；被选中的一小部分人在命运的牵引下与它们相遇，他们能够吸收蕴含其中的能量，瞬间掌握相应的技能。"

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Perform a basic attack with your equipped weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用你装备的武器施展基础攻击。\n\n标签：普攻。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Punch your foes like your life depends on it!\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 就像职业拳手一样痛揍你的敌人！\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A Republican Instructor once told you: "So you're good at throwing punches eh? Great. Now pick up a weapon or go home". Which was a little ironic, given that the military academy was your home.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一位共和国教官曾经跟你讲：“所以说你擅长拳击，嗯？很好，要么现在拿把武器，要么滚回家。这有点讽刺，因为军事学院就是你的家。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Perform a powerful Melee combo with your shield and equipped weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用你的盾牌和装备的武器进行一次完美的近战连击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Slice, hack or smash foes with your main hand weapon.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用你的主手武器切割、肢解或粉碎敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Human creativity knows no bounds when it comes to inventing tools of slaughter. The only thing that matches that inspiration is their desire to do it in a stylish and effective way.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在发明屠宰工具方面，人类的创造力无与伦比。 唯一配得上这种创造力的就是人们试图用优雅而高效的方式做到这一点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Unleash a flurry of blows with both of your weapons.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用你的两种武器释放一连串的打击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Traditional fighters tend to consider the shield as the superior option. Clearly they have never fought the Screaming Furies of Laibon: a regiment of women dual wielding kopeshes while shouting fear away.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 传统的斗士往往只把盾牌视为最佳选择。显然他们从来没有与莱邦的狂啸女斗士战斗过——那是一支由女性组成的军团，她们一边用吼叫驱赶恐惧一边挥舞着双手中的弯刀。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Swing your two handed sword to cleave your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 挥动你的双手剑来劈砍你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: At the military academy your strategy teacher rambled time and time again about the battle of Samatras. The Kuei Empire's light cavalry spotted a regiment of Republican footmen isolated from the rest of the battle. A swift sweep should have been enough to break the poor infantry... except they were greatsword wielders. That day, the Republican army had horsemeat for dinner.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在军事学院，你的战术老师在闲聊中时不时就会提到萨马特拉斯战役。库埃帝国的轻骑兵发现了一支落单的共和国步兵团。一次迅猛的冲锋就足以击溃这些可怜的步兵…除非他们用的是双手大剑。那一天，共和国的军队晚饭吃了马肉。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Maul your enemies with your two handed mace.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用双手锤猛击你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A jest only truly appreciated by battlehammer users: "Before a tournament, a knight spends two hours turtling behind three layers of thick fullplate armor. Scared of being late, he hurries in the arena and asks his unarmoured challenger "What time is it?" The lowborn picks up his maul and answers: "It's hammer time!".
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这是一个只有铁锤使用者才真正欣赏的笑话：在比赛之前，一个骑士要花两个小时的让自己好缩在三层厚的全钢板装甲后面。由于害怕迟到，他匆匆赶到竞技场，询问他没穿铠甲的对手："现在是什么时间？"出身低微的挑战者拿起他的锤子回答："是打铁时间！"

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Swing your two handed axe to cut down your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 挥动你的双手斧来砍倒你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Some see fighting as a dance, an art, a poetic display of murder. Meanwhile, others wield a big fat greataxe and chop people in half as casually as a butcher cuts meat. To each their own.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有些人认为战斗是一种舞蹈，一种艺术，一种对谋杀的诗意想象。同时，另外一些人挥舞着又粗又大的巨斧，像屠夫切肉一样随意地把人砍成两半。萝卜青菜，各有所爱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Unleash a flurry of blows with two daggers.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用两把匕首释放一连串的打击。\n\n标签：普攻，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Murderers, sociopaths and assassins all seem to share an unhealthy fetish for knives. Some researchers tried to understand this phenomenon. Their endeavour did not yield any conclusive results, given that half of them gave up after the first half got slaughtered, all with the same cause of death: multiple stabbings.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 凶手，杀人犯，反社会人士和刺客似乎都对小刀有着病态的迷恋。 一些研究人员试图理解这种现象。 他们的努力没有产生任何确切的结论，因为他们中的一半在另一半的人被屠杀后放弃了，死者都有类似的死因：多次刺伤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fire at your foes with a crystal pistol.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用魔晶手枪射击你的敌人。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: There's an old saying in the explorer's guild of Stormfall: "Do not bring a sword to a gunfight".
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在暴风港的探险家公会中有一句老话："不要把剑带到枪战中"。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fire at your foes with two crystal pistols.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用两把魔晶手枪向敌人开火。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In the independent city of Archion there used to be an academy that taught sophisticated fighting techniques with two pistols. The training was so intense that people could be gone for years without being seen again. The world later learned that the academy had been shut down. Apparently the instructors were hiding the bodies of an absurd amount of students, dead to self-inflicted injuries.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在独立的城邦阿奇恩，曾经有一个学院传授用两把手枪战斗的复杂技巧。 训练强度高到参加训练的人很可能因此死亡，因为直到很多年后都没人再见过他们。世人后来才知道学院已被关停。 显然，导师们隐藏了数量大到荒谬的死于自残的学生尸体。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Execute a deadly barrage of blows and shots.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进行一系列致命的打击和射击。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After several drinks of liquor, Captain James, a skypirate known for his infamous heist in the flying city of Archion, will often share his wisdom with the newbloods in his crew: "Alrigh' gather 'round ya silly skyvirgins! Everyone listen! Like oi always say, victory ain't 'bout the size of yar canons, nah it ain't, but its all 'bout...", and that's generally when he passes out.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 詹姆斯船长，一个因在飞翔之城阿奇恩劫掠而凶名远扬的空中海盗，喝了几杯酒之后，就会和他的新手船员分享他的智慧："好嗝…你们这些愚蠢的空中小处男们，给窝围过来！所有楞，听着！就像老子经常说的那样，胜利与底线无关，嗯，跟那个没关系，而是完全取决驴..."，通常这之后他就醉倒了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fire at your foes with a crystal pistol while protecting yourself with a shield.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile, Melee.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用魔晶手枪向敌人开火，同时用盾牌保护自己。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物，近战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Pistol and Shield is the trademark style of the Protectors' infantry: the army of the Republic in charge of homeland security and population control. A line of Protectors handling a local riot can be a dreadful sight: the shieldwall blocks basic projectiles like paving stones, bottles and sharp sticks, and anyone getting close takes a bullet to the knee. With an order from their superior, they do not hesitate to shoot to kill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 手枪和盾牌是保护者步兵的标志，他们是共和国负责国土安全和人口控制的军队。一队保护者镇压一场本地骚乱的可能会是一副可怕的景象：盾墙挡住了一些基本的投掷物，如石砖、瓶子和削尖的棍子，任何接近的人都会被射击膝盖。在上级的命令下，他们开枪杀人毫不犹豫。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shoot arrows at your foes.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向你的敌人射箭。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The noble arrow, the great equalizer. A lord on his high horse, a knight with a castleforged sword, or a pitchfork-wielding peasant will all share the same fate once showered with arrows.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在高贵的箭矢面前，众生平等。骑着高头大马的领主，一个拿着制式宝剑的骑士，或者一个挥舞着草叉的农夫，一旦被箭雨覆盖，他们的命运没什么不同。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Tap into the staff's power to cast projectiles.\n\nTags: Basic Attack, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 通过挖掘法杖中的力量来施放飞弹。\n\n标签：普攻，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charging into battle? Muddy skirmishes? Gory eviscerations? These are peasant practices at best. Exterminating your foes from afar with magic is just more stylish... and more sanitary.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冲锋陷阵？ 焦灼的缠斗？ 血刺呼啦的肉搏？ 这些充其量只是农夫的做法。 用魔法从远处消灭你敌人更加优雅… 也更加卫生。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Let loose a volley of arrows in a circular area that damages enemies over time. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在一个圆形区域释放箭雨，持续对其中的敌人造成伤害。 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Krearion, The First Bow" so that men could master the art of raining death.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"科瑞里昂，第一弓"，于是人们可以掌握死亡之雨的艺术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Throw a spinning dualblade in a line in front of you that damages enemies caught in its path. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向前投掷一把旋转的双刃，攻击路径上的敌人。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, forged Omeagram, The First Double Bladed Sword, to push humans to their limits in terms of grace and agility. Manipulating this weapon can be as deadly for its wielder as it is for their foes.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"奥米格拉姆，第一双刃剑"，将人类优雅和敏捷的方式推到极限。对于它的使用者来说，操纵它的危险不下于它对敌人的威胁。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Target an area and launch an exploding device, dealing fire damage in an area of effect. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Device.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 瞄准一个区域，用一种爆破装置开火，造成AOE火焰伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，装置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, is an inventor with a brilliant mind. Ironically he uses that technology to appeal to humans' most primal desire; their lust for power. To leverage that to his advantage, he created countless death-bringing machines and devices. The "Empyrean Mortar Mark IV" is just another one of them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，是个有着聪明头脑的发明家。具有讽刺意味的是，他利用自己的技术让人类最原始的欲望：对权力的欲望得以通过武力实现。通过利用这一优势，他创造了无数能带来死亡的机器和设备。“天堂巨炮 IV号”只是其中之一。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a colossal hammer and bring it down on your foes, dealing area damage. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一把巨大的锤子并砸在你的敌人身上，造成范围伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, Primordial of Industry, forged "Gaavanir ,The First Hammer" to shatter bones and will alike. Only dust and despair remain in its wake.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"盖文尼尔，第一锤"，用它来击碎骨头和意志。它挥舞的轨迹之下，留下的只有肉沫和绝望。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Channel multiple shots and select targets by hovering over or clicking them. Shots are released when chaneling stops or maximum number of shots is reached. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Device.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 安排好一系列射击，然后准确无误地向多个敌人开火。 （攻击技能） 需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，装置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ezaneal, the Fallen Lord of Trickery, created incredible gun-slinging techniques while developing the first pistol, the Handheld Iosonic Cannon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，在研制“第一枪，耶索尼克手持炮”的时候创造了令人难以置信的押枪技术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Electrocute your foes with bouncing lightning. Each bounce is weaker than the last. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用弹跳的闪电电亟你的敌人。会随着每一次弹跳衰弱。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Beelmalik, the Fallen Lord of Punishment, used to rule over the primal element of Lightning. He kept a distinct taste for chaining attacks, representative of his desire to capture and imprison his brethren Abanazaar, Lord of Envy, and Etheliel, Lady of Vanity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 比马利克，堕落的惩罚之王，曾经掌管原始的闪电元素。他对连锁攻击情有独钟，这象征着他想要俘获和囚禁他的胞亲：嫉妒之王-阿巴那扎和虚荣女神-耶特利尔的野望。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a mighty shield and charge through your enemies, breaking their ranks. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一面强大的盾牌，穿过敌人，破坏他们的阵型。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, as the Primordial of Ambition, used the mighty shield Gleidhir, the First Shield, forged by Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, to charge recklessly into the heart of the battle.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 野心之源，拜费特，曾经使用由制造之主赫法耶博铸造的强大盾牌“格莱提尔，第一盾”莽进战场中央。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Curses a target, increasing the damage it receives. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 诅咒一个目标，增加其受到的伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, hunts all beings that are not part of Creation's original intent. His targets are tagged, meaning they are ready for purification.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔，纯净之源，狩猎所有不符合造物主初衷的生物。被他标记，就意味着离被净化不远了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon two blades and dash forward to the target, dealing single target damage. Does not dash if used in melee range. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤两把尖刀冲向目标，对单一目标造成伤害。如果在近战范围内使用，则不会冲刺。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Sazanek, The First Twinblades" by colliding two moons and transferring that power into its blade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 制造之主，赫法耶博通过碰撞双月并将产生的能量转移到它的刀刃上，从而铸造了“第一双子刃，萨扎内克”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a fireball and launch it in a straight line in front of you. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一个火球，在你面前直线发射。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Abanazaar, the Fallen Lord of Envy, consumes all that he covets. His cravings are bottomless, absolute and destructive. Those who know how to tap into their most insane passions will understand the fiery power that the feeling contains. Shaping it into a burning ball comes with practice.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 堕落的嫉妒之主，阿巴纳扎，烧毁了他所觊觎的一切。他的渴望是永无止境的、绝对的和毁灭性的。那些知道如何开发自己最疯狂的情绪的人会了解这种感觉所包含的炽热力量。练习着把这种力量塑造成燃烧的火球吧。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A mass of ice forms above your enemies. After a short delay, it falls from the sky for huge damage. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一大团寒冰在你的敌人上方凝聚。经过短暂的延迟后，从空中落下，造成巨大的伤害。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, sheds deadly frozen tears whenever she is confronted with the world's decay. Ruthless sorcerers learned to leverage her sorrow into chilling death.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，每当她面对这个世界的腐朽，就会落下致命的冰冷之泪。无情的巫师学会了利用她的悲伤来制造凌冽的死亡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a delay, hurl an ice shard in a line. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一段延迟之后，沿直线投射出一根冰锥。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, despises the use of ice as vulgar projectiles. The victims get impaled in atrocious ways which she cannot condone: they should be frozen instantly. Unfortunately, few sorcerers take these considerations into account.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，鄙视把寒冰当作粗俗的子弹。受害者被以暴力血腥的方式刺穿是她所不能饶恕的事情：他们应当被立即冻结。不幸的是，很少有巫师会考虑这些。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: An ice nova emanates around you and freezes your enemies. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冰霜新星在你身边迸发，冻结你的敌人。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel, the Fallen Lady of Vanity, wants to cover the world in ice to preserve it. Freezing friend and foe alike to trap their beauty, forever.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔，堕落的虚荣女神，想要用冰雪的覆盖来保护这个世界。将所有人冰封，让美丽永远定格。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Throw a chained hook forward and pull back all the foes it went through. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向前抛出钩链，并把沿途的所有敌人都拖拽回来。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Kirenas, The First Grappling Hook" when Sarisel asked him for a tool to hunt down the evil creatures of the world.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当萨利塞尔请求赫法耶博给他提供一件追捕世间邪恶生物的工具时，这位制造之主铸造了“基勒纳斯，第一钩爪”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Release a current of electricity through your sword and cut through your enemies. Can hold 2 charges. Attack: Only usable with this weapon. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 通过你的剑释放电流，切割你的敌人。能充能两次。 （攻击技能）限定当前武器。 技能标签：法术，位移。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Lightning weapons are used by veteran Purifiers to protect the world from witchcraft. The flow of electricity is controlled by a small button on the hilt of the sword.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经验丰富的净化者用闪电武器来保护世界免受巫术的侵害。电流由剑柄上的一个小按钮控制。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Throw a spinning axe in a circle around you that deals damage. Base Physical damage converts into Rend damage. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 丢出一把围绕着你造成伤害的回旋飞斧。基础物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Ashkadi, The First Axe" to demonstrate that the greatest momentum is birthed from imbalance. The will to right what is wrong and recreate a pristine harmony is a basic concept that organizes the great powers of the universe, and which is captured through the spin of Ashkadi.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“阿什卡迪，第一斧”用它来证明最大的动力是由不平衡产生的。纠正错误和重归和谐的意愿是一种组织宇宙伟力的基本概念，阿什卡迪的旋转所俘获的也正是那种力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Channel a beam of Aether in front of you, damaging your foes. Turn speed while casting is increased proportionally to cast speed. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在你面前引导一束以太射线，伤害你的敌人。引导时的转向速度由施放速度决定。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anulai-Tai, the Fallen Duke of Infinity, is not nicknamed "The Last Morrow" for no reason. channelling so much of his pure Aether energy always constitutes a danger to the fabric of time, and even moreso to those standing in front of it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿努莱-泰，堕落的无限公爵，他得到“最后的明天”这一绰号并不是没有原因的。大量引导他那纯粹的以太能量甚至能对时间的结构造成威胁，更别提挡在其路径上的人了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a giant spear and leap onto your enemies, damaging them. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Movement.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一支巨大的长矛并跳向敌人，从天而降消灭他们。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Ishmir, The First Spear" to teach men to work together on the battlefield. True warriors, however, will use this versatile weapon with lethal efficiency.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了"伊什米尔，第一矛"，以教导人们在战场上合作。真正的战士无论什么情况都能让这把万金油武器发挥出极其致命的效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a pair of unbreakable chains and unleash a flurry of reckless lashes. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一对不可破坏的钩链，并释放出一阵狂乱的鞭笞。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, the Fallen Archduke of War, used the chains that once bound him to wreak havoc upon the Army of Genesis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特，堕落的战争大公，曾使用束缚他的锁链重创了天启军团。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bless an area around you with the light of dawn. It heals those who stand in it over time. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 用黎明之光祝福你周围的区域，在其中会得到持续的治疗。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa, Lady of Dawn, can bring her light to even the darkest depths, warming the heart of those fighting the perils of the night. The Brothers of Dawn are ever thankful for her protection.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 安娜蒂亚，黎明女神，她的光芒能到达最黑暗的深渊，给那些与长夜中的艰险抗争的人们带去温暖。黎明兄弟会永远感恩她的庇护。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon an imposing bow and launch several piercing arrows at once. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一把强大的弓，同时发射几支穿透箭。 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Krearion, The First Bow" by merging the power of a tidal wave and the accuracy of a lightning strike.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，通过融合潮汐的力量和雷击的精准铸造了"科瑞里昂，第一弓"。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Jump through the Aether to teleport to another position. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Movement.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 通过以太跳跃来传送到另一个位置。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，位移。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anulai-Tai, Fallen Duke of Infinity, is the master of the aether, the fabric that binds time and space. Its mastery redefines the understanding of the world, starting with the linearity of its flow.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿努莱-泰，堕落的无限公爵，主宰着以太和约束时空的结构。掌握这项技能将重构对于世界的理解，从时空连续性开始。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a turret to provide covering fire. Can be detached and wielded by holding the skill. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Device.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一个炮台提供火力掩护。可以通过按住技能将其拆下来拎在手里。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，装置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ezaneal, the Fallen Lord of Trickery, invented the 'Avenger' Autoturret that fires at enemies on sight to protect his followers from raiders.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，发明了会向视野内敌人开火的“复仇者”自动炮台，用它来保护他的追随者们免受袭击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Unleash a powerful warcry which buffs attack speed and cast speed for yourself and nearby allies. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 发出一声强大的战吼，提高自己和附近盟友的攻击、施法速度。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, Fallen Archduke of War and one of the nine shadows of the world, is the father of all warriors. Channeling his power grants the ferocity needed to survive a battle.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 作为堕落战争大公和世界九影之一的拜费特乃是战士之祖。引导他的力量会获得在战场上生存所必须的勇猛。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon an enormous greatsword and cut a path through hordes of enemies, spinning to maintain momentum. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一柄巨剑，通过不断旋转维持冲击力，从成群的敌人中杀出一条血路。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged Voknafein, the First Greatsword, to push himself and humanity to the limits of their strength and creativity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“沃克纳芬，第一巨剑”，来将他自己和人类的力量与创造力推向极限。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a shield that absorbs damage. The shield breaks at a damage threshold, damaging nearby enemies. If shield is re-cast, it explodes, dealing increased damage. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一组能吸收伤害的盾牌，吸收的伤害达到阈值时爆炸，伤害附近的敌人。如果在盾牌存在期间再次施放，会直接引爆，造成更高的伤害。 （攻击技能） 只能使用近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, is lord of the Armory of Creation. Every weapon he places within that hall spreads through the minds of men and the halls of Wolcen, and the shield Gleidhir is no exception, casting a shadow which stands hardy before those who know to call it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法隆，工业大师，是创造兵工厂的主人。他在那大厅里放置的每一件武器都在人们和沃尔森大厅里传播开来，格莱德希尔的盾牌也不例外，在那些知道如何称呼它的人面前投下了一个顽强的阴影。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge a Sacred spell that deals damage in an area of effect and teleports your character. At each new charging step, the area of effect and the damage are increased. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Movement.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 蓄力造成aoe伤害的神圣法术并进行传送。每达到一个充能阶段，aoe的范围和伤害都会增加。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa, Primordial of Dawn, descended on the defeated Army of Alia's first king and gave them the Helion. She healed their wounded and weary, and taught them that mankind's strongest weapon was hope.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 安娜蒂亚，黎明之源，降临在阿利亚第一任国王战败的军队面前，赐予他们氦闪。她治愈了他们的伤痛和疲倦，并教导他们人类最强大的武器是希望。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cast an area of effect on the ground that gives you a Rend damage bonus if you are not at full Health. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在地面上施放一个AOE，如果你的生命值不满，它会给予你一份额外撕裂伤害。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, Fallen Archduke of War, proved himself against Moros and the Army of Genesis by catalyzing the last strength of Bezeriel, Mortality Itself.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 巴哈菲斯，倒下的战争大公爵，通过催化贝塞尔的最后力量证明了自己对抗摩洛斯和创世纪军队.

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cast a flying hammer in the direction of the cursor, damaging enemies along its path. Hammer returns when cast again. Attack: Only usable with melee weapons. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Warrior.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向光标方向掷出一柄飞锤，伤害沿途的敌人。再次施放时飞锤会返回。 （攻击技能）需要近战武器。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron, Maestre of Industry, forged the first warhammer Gaavanir. When challenged on its ownership by the Primordial of Ambition, Baäpheth, he proved himself its rightful wielder when the hammer flew back to his open hand.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博，制造之主，铸造了“盖文尼尔，第一战锤”。野心之源拜费特为了此锤的归属权向他发起了挑战，当战锤飞回他张开的手掌中，赫法耶博证明了自己才是它正当的持有者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge a sniper shot. As it is charged, its area of effect narrows and damage of the shot increases. Base Physical damage converts into Lightning damage. Attack: Only usable with bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Device.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 打出一发威力强大的蓄力狙击，造成AOE伤害。蓄力时间越长，范围越窄，狙击造成的伤害越高。基础物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。 （攻击技能）需要弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，装置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, challenged Hephaäron with the claim that his Bio-Optical Targeting Interface could match any of his master’s bows in a hunt. Taking the place of his First Man champion, Ezaneal demonstrated the superiority of his construct.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以萨内尔，堕落的诡计之王，挑战赫帕罗恩时他声称他的生物光学瞄准接口可以匹配任何猎人的弓。以萨内尔取得了他的第一个男子冠军，展示了他的结构的优越性。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Drop a shadow cloud on the ground that grants invisibility and reduces Threat. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Rogue.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在地面丢下一片暗影烟云，提供隐身并减少仇恨。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，游侠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Moros, Primordial of Dusk, was attacked by a jealous Abanazaar, he turned the dishonorable ambush into a pitch dark hunt between the two rivals, leveraging the forces of dusk.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当黄昏之源摩洛斯被妒火中烧的阿巴那扎袭击时，他利用黄昏的力量，把这场不光彩的伏击变成了一场针锋相对的漆黑狩猎。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dash in the opposite direction of the cursor and drop a projectile where skill was activated that slows enemies. Base Physical damage converts into Shadow damage. Attack: Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols. Skill Tags: Attack, Projectile, Rogue, Movement.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 朝光标反方向冲刺并在起点丢下一枚造成范围减速的投射物。基础物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。 （攻击技能）需要匕首、弓或手枪。 技能标签：攻击，投射物，游侠，位移。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Moros, Primordial of Dusk, encouraged the Primordial of Brilliance, Ezaneal, to construct new and innovative weapons to protect mankind. In return, Ezaneal gave Moros black shells to slow his enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暮色之源的摩洛斯鼓励光明之源以萨内尔建造新的和创新的武器来保护人类。作为回报，以萨内尔给了摩洛斯黑色的炮弹来减缓他的敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Channel a damaging area of effect from the sky that follows the cursor. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 通过引导，从天空落下一片跟随光标移动的伤害AOE。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa, Primordial Lady of Dawn, was a kind guardian to all of Creation. But when Abanazaar took chase after her as an unwanted suitor, she proved to him that the sun didn’t merely warm; it scorched.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿纳蒂亚，黎明的原始女神，是所有造物的守护者。但当阿巴那扎尔以一个不受欢迎的追求者的身份追上她时，她向他证明了太阳不仅温暖，而且炙热。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cast an area of effect that causes enemies or summons to explode upon death, dealing Poison damage in an area of effect. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放一个aoe，敌人或召唤物在其中死亡后会爆炸，留下一片造成毒素伤害的aoe。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, once used the bodies of the dead to explore obscene new perspectives of violence. His cult follows in his footsteps, the process of decomposition in warfare.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝泽里尔，堕落的末日大公，曾经用死者的尸体来探索淫秽的暴力新视角。他的邪教跟随他的脚步，在战争中分解的过程。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cast a vortex that has two area of effects. The first, smaller areas deal damage over time, and after a short time the larger one pulls enemies into the center. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放一个具有两重范围的漩涡。范围较小的区域会持续造成伤害，短时间后，范围较大的区域会将敌人拉到中心。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Anulai-Tai, Fallen Duke of Infinity, exiled himself out of time, his exit created a vortex which drained all life around it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当阿努莱泰，堕落的无限公爵，在流放的时间里，他在出口创造了一个漩涡，耗尽了它周围的所有生命。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a zombie that deals damage with melee attacks. If the number of zombies is at a maximum, they charge toward the location of the cursor. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一个通过近战攻击造成伤害的僵尸。如果僵尸的数量达到最大，施放技能就会让它们向光标位置冲锋。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, returns a generous boost of necrotic energy to his worshippers in exchange for sacrifices of pain, agony, and above all, plague. For this reason, his cults keep a supply of half dead hordes.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 堕落的毁灭公爵贝泽瑞尔，用死灵能量慷慨地回馈他的崇拜者，作为他们献祭疼痛、苦楚尤其是灾难的交换。因此，他的教派能维持海量的活尸供应。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a zombie that deals damage with ranged attacks. If the number of zombies is at a maximum, they focus fire on the target underneath the cursor. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一个通过远程攻击造成伤害的僵尸。如果僵尸的数量达到最大，施放技能会让它们朝光标下的目标集火。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, asked Anathëa for a dead sun to overlook the dead. When she refused, he corrupted her with a burst of cadaveric energy that reached from the crust of the earth to the clouds, and produced the first living dead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 倒下的末日大公贝泽里尔向安纳特请求一个枯萎的太阳来俯瞰死者。当她拒绝时，他用一股从地壳到云层的尸体能量腐蚀了她，产生了第一个活着的死人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a large Poison golem that cleaves enemies. If skill is cast again, golem shouts a warcry that generates Threat. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一具会对敌人进行横扫攻击的巨型毒素傀儡。再次施放技能，傀儡会发动战吼吸引仇恨。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, is described as a sprawling body of rotting flesh. For this reason, his most valued worshippers modify their frames into similar shape, ever hungering for growth.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝泽里尔，倒下的末日大公，被描述为一个腐烂的肉身蔓延。因为这个原因，他最有价值的崇拜者把他们的框架修改成类似的形状，永远渴望成长。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Channel a ray on a target that leeches their health until they become possessed. Once possessed, the target's health is restored. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell, Summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 朝一个目标引导吸血射线直至其被你控制。目标被你控制后生命会立即回满。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术，召唤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom, is worshipped through a variety of cruel strange means. One of these is The Sweet Tooth Worm gorges itself on decaying flesh and produces necrotic effects.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝泽里尔，堕落的末日大公，是有着各种残忍的奇怪手段。其中一种是甜食蠕虫在腐烂的肉上自残并产生坏死的效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attack enemies multiple times in a combo, giving Willpower with each enemy hit. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用一串连击多次攻击敌人，每次击中敌人都会获得魔力。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anulai-Tai, Fallen Archduke of Infinity, wove the fabric of time when called into existence by the First Movement of Creation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿努莱-泰乃是堕落的无限大公，他在造物启元中应运而生时编织了时间之纱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cast a cone of Shadow force that knocks back enemies and destroys projectiles. Spell: Only usable with staves or catalysts. Skill Tags: Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放一道锥形的暗影力量，它将击退敌人并摧毁投射物。 （法术技能）需要法杖或法器。 技能标签：法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Moros, Primordial of Dusk, wielded great clouds of darkness to turn the tide of battle when his forces seemed surrounded.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 莫洛斯，最初的黄昏，挥舞着巨大的黑暗乌云，当他的部队似乎被包围时，扭转了战斗的潮流。

Sheet1.KEY: SKILLS VARIANTS  <font color="#cb5316"> Rage  <font color="#948ec6"> Willpower

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Adds a slowing effect to the arrows' area of effect.
All damage is now dealt instantly after skill activation, but damage is reduced.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一次性直接造成所有伤害，但总伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Abanazaar, once Primordial of Fire, ravaged a continent pursuing his unrequited love, his envy consuming and melting everything, the ground itself turning to lava in his wake.\n\nWhile Hephaäron was his enemy, he remained a keen opportunist. He got to work, installing a forge near the melting continent and shaping its burning metals into superdense flaming arrowheads meant to feed the mouth of Krearion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿巴纳扎，曾是火之源，为了追求他的单恋对象曾毁灭了一片大陆，他的妒火烧熔一切，所到之处大地化作岩浆。\n\n当时赫法耶博是他的敌人，他便自力更生，在那片可怜的大陆旁安置了一座熔炉，将燃烧着的金属塑造成超高密度的燃焰箭头，用来喂进科瑞里昂的嘴巴里。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态的几率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Arrows become a vertical barrage that creeps forward slowly.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 箭雨变成一个缓慢向前移动的垂直弹幕。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Krearion was forged with the ability to soak up the surrounding static energy and release it as sheer force whenever unleashing volleys of arrows. The energy generated by the projectiles creates a virtuous loop that allows attacks to advance across the battlefield with minimal effort from the archer.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 来自科瑞里昂能力的锻造使得每次发射箭雨时都会吸收周围的静态能量，并将之化作纯粹的力量释放出去。而由箭矢投射产生的能量又构造了一个良性循环，使得射手花费最少的努力就能让他的攻击推进，穿越战场。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to charge this skill to increase its damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许你蓄力以提高伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance for self and allies around you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加自身和周围盟友的暴击几率

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Cooldown is reduced upon killing an enemy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能每击杀一个敌人都会减少其冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Scholars and logisticians have theorized that the impact of sustained fire on a specific battlefield area has heavily disminishing returns in terms of efficiency. Accuracy and restraint allow for a more strategic approach that saves a considerable amount of resources for roughly similar results.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 学者和后勤学家认为，持续火力对特定战场区域的影响在效率方面严重削弱了回报。准确和克制使我们能够采取更具战略性的方法，为大致相似的结果节省大量资源

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Damage multiplier applied per enemy within the skill's area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能aoe范围内每多一个敌人，造成的伤害就会增加一倍。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summons a ghost ally that creates two smaller damaging areas of effect around yours.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 射击时召唤幽灵盟友，在你造成的aoe两侧制造两个较小的伤害区域。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The projectile circles around the cursor's location.

When Abanazaar, once Primordial of Fire, crossed an ocean to meet his unrequited love, it created a tempestuous cyclone made of scorching steam. It is said that to tame the cyclone, Hephaäron started forging Omeagram in the eye of the storm to redirect its power into the legendary blade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿巴纳扎，曾经的火之源，当他穿过一片大洋去见他的单恋对象时，创造出一道由灼热的蒸汽构成的狂暴飓风。据说为了驯服飓风，赫法耶博在飓风风眼中铸造奥米格拉姆，从而将飓风的力量导入这把传奇之刃。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Toxic damage.\n\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Poison.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n\n造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While cleansing a village captured by Bezeriel’s followers, Sarisel encountered an Immortal Maw, one of the Fallen Archduke of Doom's gluttonous minions. These high-ranking cultists serve Bezeriel through mirroring his behaviour, consuming all dead flesh they encounter. The Immortal Maw swallowed Omeagram, its reinforced gullet enduring the internal damage, so Sarisel was forced to tear apart its immense, obese carcass with his bare hands. Omeagram became tainted with the necrotic poison of Bezeriel, rendering it impure, and thus Sarisel banished it to Hephaäron's Armoury of Creation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当清理一个被贝泽瑞尔的追随者攻占的村庄时，萨利塞尔遭遇了一只不朽巨口，那是堕落的末日公爵手下的饕餮仆从之一。这些高阶邪教徒通过映射贝泽瑞尔的行为，吞噬所有遇到尸体血肉来侍奉他。这只不朽巨口吞下了奥米格拉姆，它强韧的食道能承受来自内部的伤害，因此萨利塞尔被迫徒手撕开它庞大而肥胖的尸体。贝泽瑞尔的腐败毒素污染了奥米格拉姆，使它不再纯净。因此萨利塞尔将它放逐到了赫法耶博的造物武库中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Teleport to the projectile's location on re-cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 再次施放传送到投射物所在位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a trail for a few seconds that deals damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 留下一道持续几秒的伤害轨迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Transmits Ailment stacks from one target to the next.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将异常状态层数从一个目标传播到下一个目标。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The taint carried by Omeagram after its encounter with the Immortal Maw was such that it transmitted a pestilence to all surrounding things. Hephaäron built a case for it, forged from Primordial Steel, where the blade stewed in its own fumes only gaining in toxicity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 奥米格拉姆与不朽巨口相遇后携带的污染是如此可怕，以至于它会将瘟疫传染给周围的一切。赫法耶博为了存放它，用原初钢铁铸造了一个箱子。箱子里的飞刀浸染在自身毒素的熏陶中，毒性愈加猛烈。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Projectile causes the first enemy it hits to explode after a few seconds, dealing damage in an area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物附着在击中的第一个敌人身上，几秒后发生爆炸，造成AOE伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Frost damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化冰霜伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The edges of Omeagram were keened with such precision that Hephaäron boasted its ability to cut through anything if thrown with enough might, even time and space. No volunteer dared to test the claim with their own body, thus no-one questioned the terrifying sharpness of the blades, which were as cold as his heart.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 奥米格拉姆的刀刃被如此精心地打磨锋锐，以至于赫法耶博夸下海口，如果用足够强的力量掷出，奥米格拉姆能切开任何东西，甚至包括时间和空间。由于没有志愿者敢于用自己的身体检验这种说法，所以没人质疑它那如赫法耶博之心般冷冽的锋锐。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Adds a slow effect to the area of effect.
Adds one projectile, but deals reduced damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加一枚投射物，但每枚投射物的伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts Physical damage to Rend damage.\n\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Bleed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n\n在造成流血时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anything can be infused with power through faith and rituals. Explosive powder is no different. The Empyrean Mortar's ammunitions use powder steeped in viscera which is consecrated by fanatics of Ezaneal's cult in gory rituals.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 任何事物都可以通过信仰和仪式注入力量。炸药也不例外。天堂巨炮的弹药使用的是浸在内脏里的粉末，而这些内脏是由伊查内亚教团的狂热成员在血腥仪式中奉献的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The projectile stays where it lands for a while and detonates if there's an enemy nearby.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物停留在落点一段时间，如果有敌人接近就会爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deep beneath the treacherous sands of the Laibonite desert can be found an underground laboratory used by the brightest followers of Ezaneal. These twisted cultists are experimenters that would sacrifice anything to further their research. They despise disturbances so much that they mined an absurdly large perimeter around the facility, making the whole region a deadzone in the process.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在莱邦尼特沙漠，险恶戈壁的地下深处，有一处地下实验室。它的使用者是伊查内亚最活跃的追随者们。这些心理扭曲的邪教徒是为了推进研究进度可以牺牲一切的实验者。他们是如此厌恶打扰，以至于用埋设地雷的方式让实验室周围大得夸张的一片区域成为死亡禁区。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each explosion casts a cluster of smaller grenades around it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每次爆炸都会在其周围施放一簇较小的榴弹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Empyrean Mortar was designed to have schematics understandable by humans. Unsatisfied with the lack of elegance that these constraints placed upon his creation, he iterated up to the Mark IV. This version requires primordial metal and uses an incredible amount of energy which lifts it up to Ezaneal's standards while making it totally unreproducible by mortals. In doing so, this unique model failed in its primary purpose: accessibility.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 天堂巨炮需要有人类可以理解的设计图。由于创造受到这一约束，伊查内亚对天堂巨炮的缺乏优雅感到不满，于是他将其更新到第四代。这一版本需要原初金属，并且消耗难以想象的巨大能量，虽然达到了伊查内亚的标准，却完全无法被凡人仿造。做成这样，考虑到设计它的初衷：可用性，这种独特的原型炮已经失败了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fires multiple bombs in quick succession with reduced damage. Adds a cooldown to the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 短时间内多次发射伤害较低的榴弹。技能冷却时间增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fires rockets in a straight line that have a reduced explosion radius but increased damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 沿直线发射火箭弹。减少爆炸半径但给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。
增加一枚投射物。\n\n每枚投射物的伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance on enemies inflicted with Stun.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对眩晕敌人的暴击率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Lightning damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化闪电伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When battlehammers were revealed to humans, mortal war became a much more tempestuous affair. The sharpening of swords gave way to the forging of maces, the rumbling thunder of a building storm. Battles became cacophonies of dull clangs as plate mail caved under the pressure of maul strikes and bones cracked sharply, a thundering hurricane littered with strikes of Lightning. Gaavanir is the embodiment of such a storm.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战锤被展示给人类之后，凡人的战争变得更加狂暴。磨砺刀剑被锻造铁锤所取代，寒光交织变作滚滚雷鸣。在锤击的压力下，钢板凹陷，骨骼粉碎，战斗被低沉的铿锵之声所主宰，宛如一场银蛇乱舞的雷鸣飓风。而盖文尼尔便是这场飓风的化身。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态的几率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows the skill to be charged in order to deal more damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许该技能通过蓄力来获得伤害增幅。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gaavanir slumbers in the Armory of Creation. Its very existence inspired the concept of battlehammers to craftsmen and blacksmiths around the world. Ever since, battlefields have been littered with broken skulls and crushed rib cages.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 盖文尼尔被安放在造物武库中。它的存在给了全世界工匠战锤概念的启发。从那以后，战场上到处散落着破碎的头骨和断裂的肋骨。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Creates a chain of explosions in front of you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在你面前造成一连串的爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every battlehammer in Wolcen is a mere shadow of Gaavanir. The destruction they have wrought is nothing compared to what Hephaäron’s hammer would unleash upon mortal existence. In those few moments where Baäpheth tried Gaavanir, the Earth shook and brought on a chain reaction that caused every volcano to spit fire. Since then, it has slept.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 沃尔森的每一个战锤都只是伽凡尼的影子。他们所造成的破坏与HeavaSuron的锤子将释放到人类生存上的东西相比是没有任何意义的。在巴菲尝试伽凡尼的那几分钟里，地球震动并引发连锁反应，导致每一座火山喷火。从那以后，它一直在睡觉。
增加攻击速度。降低伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能击中敌人时会生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical hits inflict Stun on enemies. Effect has a cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击会眩晕敌人。此效果存在冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical hits have a chance to smite enemies with a bouncing attack based on your weapon damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击有几率造成基于武器伤害的额外弹跳攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each shot of Gunslinger's Brand that hits an enemy deals damage in an area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 神枪手标靶的每次射击在击中每个敌人时都会造成AOE伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: During his banishment to the Abyss, Ezaneal became more and more obsessed with proving his worth as an inventor. His explosive projectile design was so readily rejected by Hephaäron... What if it could be faster, more direct, more complex, more chaotic? He repeatedly swore to himself that he would overshadow his former master, render his elitist conventions obsolete and fill the world with his chaotic creations; weapons that equalize the playing field, giving anyone the chance to succeed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在被放逐到深渊的期间，伊查内亚越来越痴迷于证明自己作为一个发明家的价值。他的爆炸投射物设计曾被赫法耶博轻率地否决...但如果它能更快，更直接，更复杂，更混乱呢？他反复向自己发誓，他总有一天要创造出令赫法耶博也黯然失色的作品，淘汰他昔日主人的那些精致古董，并让他混乱的造物充满整个世界；这些武器能让战场上不再有贵贱之分，给任何人成功的机会。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Aether damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n\n增加造成停滞的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After much experimentation and a handful of explosive accidents, Ezaneal created the Handheld Iosonic Cannon, the First Pistol. Its pinpoint accuracy, light weight and ability to shift its traversal of aether to high speeds made it extremely deadly. Giving humanity weapons of this nature, so accessible and deadly, would no doubt cause chaos, but Hephaäron had sealed the Armory of Creation permanently. This was the only way to share his invention with humanity; it would take a genius to get inside…
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过多次试验和几次爆炸事故后，埃扎内尔发明了第一支手枪——手持式Iosonic加农炮。它的精确定位，重量轻，能够将它穿越以太的速度转换到高速，使它极其致命。给予人类这种如此容易获得和致命的武器，无疑会引起混乱，但赫帕罗恩已经永久性地密封了创造的武器库。这是与人类分享他的发明的唯一方法；要进入这个世界需要天才.…

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every shot of Gunslinger's Brand that hits an enemy increases the damage of the next shot incrementally. This buff is reset when a shot misses.

Ezaneal tracked down a Time Seal, a tool used by Anulai-Tai’s Time Devourers to pass through the Aether. Through rigorous experimentation and iteration, Ezaneal built a functional teleportation device. Activating the device tore a small rift in the Aether, allowing Ezaneal to simultaneously be inside the Armory and outside it, which threatened to separate the Fallen from his position in space and time. Despite the existential danger, Ezaneal was able to deposit his weapon into the Armory safely.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伊查内亚曾追踪一个时间之印，那是阿努莱-泰的时间吞噬者用来穿越以太的工具。通过严格的实验和迭代，伊查内亚建造了一个可用的心灵传输装置。装置激活后，在以太中撕开了一个裂隙，让伊查内亚能够同时存在于造物武库内外，这险些使他被时空割裂。尽管冒着巨大的风险，伊查内亚还是成功地将他的武器存放到造物武库中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Targets with under 10% health are automatically targeted, but damage is reduced.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 自动瞄准生命值低于10%的目标，但伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies are automatically targeted in a cone in fornt of you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 自动瞄准你前方的扇形范围内的敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance and damage for each Ailment stack an enemy has.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人身上每有一层异常状态，暴击率和暴击伤害都会提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical damage increases with aiming time. Resets after maximum aiming time is reached.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击伤害随着瞄准时间的增加而增加。在达到最大时间后重置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies that hit you while aiming are automatically targeted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 瞄准过程中，击中你的敌人会被自动瞄准。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fires all shots whenever this skill used.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 按下技能，立即射出全部子弹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: If an enemy suffers a critical hit, damage is bounced back to the first enemy targeted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如果一个敌人遭受暴击，伤害会弹跳回瞄准的第一个敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to a random Element.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为随机元素伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces damage lost on each bounce.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 减少每次弹跳损失的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Lightning damage to Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础闪电伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In order to bring transgressors to justice, Beelmalik often has to search shadowy corners of the world, the domain of Moros, the Primordial of Dusk. As Beelmalik sought his redemption, the followers of Moros established a ceasefire with the Fallen Lord in their master’s absence. Criminals that threaten the weakened Cult of Shadows are removed and Beelmalik is free to deliver his righteous punishment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 为了将有罪者绳之以法，比马利克经常不得不在这方世界的阴暗角落——黄昏之源摩洛斯的领土上搜索。当比马利克寻求救赎时，摩洛斯的追随者在主人不在的情况下与堕落领主达成了停火协议。于是威胁虚弱暗影教派的罪犯遭到清除，比马利克也可以肆意实施他的正义惩罚。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. This ability can target allies, and if they are affected by it, the ally will also receive this buff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提供一个buff，让你获得类型取决于该技能基础元素的额外伤害。该技能可以以盟友为目标，如果盟友受到其影响，也会获得该buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Beelmalik used to form the same entity with Abanazaar and Etheliel. They were the Primordial of Change, ruling over the Upheaval-Tribunal. Ever since they separated, Beelmalik has been obssessed with chasing and assimilating his brethren to be whole again.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 比马利克曾、阿巴纳扎、耶特利尔都曾属于同一个存在。他们是变革之源，统治着剧变法庭。自从他们分离以来，比马利克一直痴迷于追逐和同化他的胞亲们以重新成为一个整体。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance for lightning to strike from the sky on damaged targets.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有机会对被伤害的目标发动落雷。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Lightning prioritizes enemies that are being damaged over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 闪电优先打击受到持续伤害的敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical hits have a chance to inflict Stun on enemies. Adds a cooldown to the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击有几率造成敌人晕眩。给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance against shocked enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对感电敌人的暴击率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical hits cause lightning to fork between other enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击时闪电会出现分叉打击其他目标。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As twisted and obsessive as Beelmalik can be, he still counts as a "Conciliator": a Fallen trying to repair his past deeds against Creation. Should he succeed in redeeming himself, he has the potential to embody Justice rather than Punishment. An absolute, bloody and unforgiving Justice.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 扭曲而顽固如比马利克，依然算作一位“调解者”：一个试图修复他过去行为的堕落者。如果他成功地救赎了自己，他就有可能体现正义而不是惩罚。一种绝对、血腥和无情的正义。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Inflicts Stun on enemies at the end of the charge. Increases the cooldown of the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在冲锋结束时击晕敌人。冷却时间增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge the skill to channel for longer.

Baäpheth commissioned Hephaäron to make something to protect himself, which manifested as Gleidhir, the First Shield. It was forged on a continent melted by Abanazaar’s rage, but it was hardened deep in the ocean by the immense pressure. Gleidhir was created to be an immovable object, to challenge Abanazaar’s unstoppable force.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特委托赫法耶博制作物品来保护自己，成品即为第一盾，格莱提尔。它是在被阿巴那扎怒火融化的大陆上铸造的，又在海洋深处被巨大的压力硬化。格莱提尔被铸造成一个不可撼动的存在，用以挑战阿巴那扎不可阻挡的力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Armed with Gleidhir, Baäpheth steeled his resolve and charged directly at Abanazaar. Both Primordials were rushing towards each other across the ravaged land, no fear to be seen. They collided with an almighty crash, the impact sending shockwaves of debris reverberating across the plain. As the dust cleared, only one figure remained standing, shield held aloft.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 装备着格莱提尔，拜费特坚定信念，直接冲向阿巴那扎。两位原初神在这片被蹂躏的土地上冲向对方，毫无畏惧。他们猛烈地相撞，撞击发出的冲击波裹挟着碎片在平原上回荡。尘埃散去，站着的只有一个，他高举着盾牌。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control effects.\n\nReduces damage from projectiles while charging.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冲锋不会被控制效果打断。\n\n冲锋时受到的投射物伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Creates a damage-dealing shockwave at the end of the charge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在冲锋结束时制造一个伤害冲击波。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves damaging areas of effect on the ground behind you, each one lasting for a few seconds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在身后留下一串伤害性aoe，每个都会持续几秒。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能击中敌人时会生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage based on block chance.
Grants buff to all resistances for yourself and allies when charging.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冲锋时授予自己和盟友一个BUFF。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Inflicts Stun on enemies caught in the charge. Adds a cooldown to the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 击晕冲锋路径上波及的敌人。\n\n给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Victorious Baäpheth approached his fallen foe. He raised his shield, and slammed it repeatedly into the face of the Primordial of Fire, flames bursting from the injured entity and turning to smoke. Under the weight of Gleidhir, all flames in the world went out, choked by Ambition and Industry’s combined forces.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 得胜的拜费特接近他倒地的敌人。他举起盾牌，一次次地砸在这位原初火神的脸上，烈焰从伤痕累累的神体中涌出，而后徒劳地化作青烟。格莱提尔的重压下，世间所有的火焰在野心之神与制造之主的联手下无奈地熄灭。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Marked enemies are more vulnerable to damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被标记的敌人面对伤害时更加脆弱。
被标记的目标会被减速。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies killed while under the effect of Mark of Impurity explode and deal damage based on the target's max Health in an area around them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人在不洁标记的效果下被击杀，会在周围造成基于其最大生命值的AOE伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The embodiment of purity is considered to be many things depending on perspective: one of the last Primordials is a lethal purifier, or the apex of all demonhunters. He is a relentless killer of all that he deems unworthy of Creation's prime vision. Some see him as an insane being, a murdering absolute, others as one of the last reasons the Fallen haven't taken over the world and still secretly fear his name: Sarisel.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 纯净的化身是怎样一种存在，有许多种观点，它们取决于不同视角：最后的原初神之一是致命的净化者，或是无上的恶魔猎手。他是个无情的杀手，击杀所有他认为不符合造物主初衷的存在。有些人把他视作疯子、杀人狂，其他人则认为他是堕落者没有占领这个世界的最后原因之一，并仍然暗自恐惧他的名字：萨利塞尔。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical damage on marked enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高对被标记敌人的暴击伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on marked enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提升对被标记敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases Ailment damage on marked enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对被标记敌人的异常状态伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Mark of Impurity spreads to surrounding enemies on the death of the target.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 标记在目标死亡时传播到周围的单位身上。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sarisel isn't known for his tolerance or empathy. He is a killer, a punisher, a purifier. He destroys all those that he associates with the evils of the world and the abominations they create. Once Marked by Impurity, there is no explanation, no second chance and no justice, just blind purification for all involved.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔并不以宽容或同情著称。他是一个杀手，一个惩罚者，一个净化者。他毁灭一切与世上的恶魔及它们的可憎造物有关的存在。一旦被标记为不洁，就没有解释，没有第二次机会，也没有正义，他就这样盲目地净化相关的一切。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Marked enemies are inflicted with numerous stacks of Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被标记的敌人会被施加多层诅咒。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sarisel buries his weapons in the ground when they have soaked up too much blood, justifying that no thing tainted with evil in its essence could possibly do good. They remain in the ground, seeming like the bones of the world. These relics of Primordial sins have a power, emanating a curse on the towns built above. Not only do they draw the life from all things above that once thrived, but they invite hate and gratuitous violence among the people on the surface.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔会把吸收了太多鲜血的武器掩埋在地下，证明被邪恶玷污本质的东西就不可能保持纯洁。它们被丢在大地上，看起来就像世界的骸骨。这些原初罪恶的遗迹有一种力量，对建造在它们上面的城镇施加诅咒。它们不仅从上面曾经繁荣的一切事物中汲取生命，还在让仇恨和无端的暴力降临到生活在上方的人类中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Marked enemies under 10% health die instantly when hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被标记的敌人生命值低于10%时被击中立即死亡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to spawn a ghost ally when a marked enemy is hit that will hit the enemy again.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当击中一个被标记的敌人时，有几率生成一个幽灵盟友，它将再次攻击该敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Marked enemies are more vulnerable to damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被标记的敌人面对伤害时更加脆弱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Marked enemies are more vulnerable to damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被标记的敌人面对伤害时更加脆弱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Part of the overall damage dealt to the target is dealt in an area around it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对目标周围的区域造成总伤害的一部分。
传送到目标身后。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Merging two moons inside something as tiny as a blade is a dangerous endeavor even for a Primordial. Without proper mastery the resulting object could become so dense that it would crumble and become an all-devouring black hole. This intense power can manipulate time and space itself.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 让双月汇于像刀刃这样微小的东西中，即使对原初神来说，也是个危险的尝试。如果驾驭不当，产生的物体密度可能会高到使它自身崩溃为为一个吞噬一切的黑洞。这种强大的力量可以操纵时间和空间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n提高造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sazanek was gifted to Moros to thank him for his assistance. The Primordial of Dusk had little use for such a weapon, but carried it with him as a sign of Hephaäron’s gratitude. Over time, the blades absorbed his crepuscular energy and changed color from a gleaming silver to a deep dark blue. It was returned to the Armory of Creation before long, Moros was concerned that a weapon of such quality would never be used.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨扎内克被赠予摩洛斯，以感激他的帮助。黄昏之源几乎用不上这样一把武器，但仍然把它带在身边，作为赫法耶博感谢的标志。随着时间的推移，这对双子刃吸收了他的黄昏能量，从闪闪发光的银色变成了深蓝色。它很快就被归还到造物武库，摩洛斯担心这样上乘的一把武器永远不会被使用。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every time the skill is re-cast within a short period of time, its damage is increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当技能在短时间内被再次释放，它的伤害就会增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies killed by this skill transmit Ailments to other enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被此技能杀死的敌人将异常状态传播给其他敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After completing a dash, enemies in 360 degrees are knocked back.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 完成一次冲刺后，360度击退敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to spawn a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能击中敌人时会生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: All enemies in the path of the dash are hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 所有冲刺路径上的敌人都会被击中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hitting an enemy spawns two damaging projectiles behind them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 击中一名敌人时会在其身后生成两枚伤害投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The two moons were hurled toward Hephaäron's forges to destroy them, a parting gift from his disciple Ezaneal. The Primordial Craftsman was out of time to save himself as well as his hard work. But Moros, the Primordial of Dusk intervened to shroud the enormous projectiles in his shadows, changing their course to collide against one another. Hephaäron seized the momentum to heat, fuse and concentrate the metal they contained into a blade that he would call Sazanek.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 双月被扔向赫法耶博的锻造炉以摧毁它们，这是来自他的徒弟伊查内亚的临别赠礼。这位原初工匠来不及拯救他自己和他的劳动成果。但是黄昏之源摩洛斯介入了，他将投来的双月遮罩在他的阴影之中，改变了它们相互碰撞的路线。赫法耶博则抓住机会，利用双月蕴含的势能将它们加热、熔化，并将所含的金属集中到一把刀刃上，它后来被命名为萨扎内克。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Projectiles no longer collide or explode. Instead, they gain an increased area of effect and Pierce enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物不再碰撞或爆炸。取而代之的是，它们的AOE范围得到提升，穿透并点燃沿途的敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Jealousy goes hand in hand with envy. Abanazaar's obsessive desire to own Anathëa created in him a raging madness when he discovered her heart already belonged to Moros, Primordial of Dusk. Ever since, Abanazaar has tried to smother all the darkness and twilights of the world, illuminating them with his fiery lights, turning landscapes to smoldering pile of embers if he has to, as long as no shadows remain, eradicating all traces of his rival's legacy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 羡慕与嫉妒齐头并进。阿巴纳扎痴迷于对安娜蒂亚的占有欲，当他得知对方的心已经属于黄昏之源，摩洛斯的时候，陷入了狂暴的疯狂。从那时起，阿巴纳扎就一直试图扼杀世界上所有的黑暗和暮色，用炽热的光照耀它们，如果有必要，他会将风景化作闷烧的余烬，只要没有阴影，就消灭了他情敌遗产的所有痕迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Adds one projectile at an increased cost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以更高的消耗增加一枚投射物

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Fire damage to Lightning damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础火焰伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As much as Abanazaar and his cult represent a powerful and destructive force, they remain both predator and prey. Beelmalik, Fallen Lord of Punishment, aims to destroy the cult of Envy to reunite with his brother. His Entropic Judges are always on the hunt to reveal and obliterate secret organizations devoted to Abanazaar.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管阿巴纳扎和他的教团代表着强大的毁灭性力量，他们仍然既是猎食者也是猎物。比马利克，堕落的惩罚之王，把摧毁嫉妒的教团，与他的胞亲重新结合作为目标。他的熵之法官总是在不停地追猎，以揭露和抹杀服务于阿巴纳扎的秘密组织。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态的几率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. Allies affected by the skill’s area of effect will also receive this buff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提供一个buff，让你获得类型取决于该技能基础元素的额外伤害。被该技能aoe波及的盟友也会获得该buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In his maddening desire for Anathëa, the Lord of Envy and his cult would abduct high ranking members of the Brotherhood of Dawn and perform unfathomable, twisted rituals on them until they become Sunslayers: dreadful fiery humans vaguely evocative of the way he sees her. In a way, by absorbing her followers into his own cult, she becomes his symbolically.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在他对安娜蒂亚的疯狂欲望中，嫉妒之王和他的教团会绑架黎明兄弟会的高阶成员，并在他们身上进行难以理解的扭曲仪式，直到他们变成太阳杀手：痛苦的火人模糊地唤起了他看到她的样子。他通过吸收她的追随者加入自己的教团，从象征意义上占有她。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases number of projectiles, but each projectile's damage is reduced.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加投射物数量，但每枚投射物的伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When re-cast, projectiles explode in a larger area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 重新施放时，投射物发生大范围爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: One of the first things that Abanazaar saw when he came to be, was the sunrise on the horizon. The moment he saw it, he knew he wanted to reach and own it. It quickly turned to passion and love for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. It finally devolved into obsessive and destructive madness when he realized that someone else owned her affections.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿巴纳扎睁开眼看到的第一幕，便是太阳从地平线上升起。只这一眼，他就明白自己想要追求和拥有它。这很快就转化为了对黎明女神，安娜蒂亚的强烈爱意。当他意识到她钟情于他人时，这份爱最终变成了偏执和毁灭性的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage. Adds a cooldown to the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 给予伤害加成。给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces the delay before the mass of ice falls.
Converts base Frost damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础冰霜伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel chased Abanazaar as he rampaged through the plains, begging him to rejoin her and Beelmalik as the Primordial of Change. The constant pleading ignited his temper and Abanazaar threw a huge boulder at her for interrupting his quest for love. It flew with such rage that it caught aflame. It landed a glancing blow on Etheliel and she fled, wracked with guilt for their separation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当阿巴纳扎狂暴地冲向平原，耶特利尔追在后面恳求他重新加入她和比马利克，成为变革之源。一遍又一遍的恳求反而引爆了他的脾气，他朝耶特利尔丢出一块巨石，因为她打扰了他对爱情的追寻。飞行中的巨石蕴含着的怒意使得它被点燃。它落地时险些擦中耶特利尔，耶特利尔疲惫地带着对当初分离的负罪感逃离了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态的几率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases the delay before the mass of ice falls and increases its damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 更长的落地延迟，但给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While no-one knows precisely where to find Etheliel, myths tell the story of a freezing wail that echoes throughout the tall mountains that link the three continents of Wolcen. A cry so mournful that it seems to lament Creation itself.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虽然没有人确切知道在哪里可以找到耶特利尔，但神话讲述了一个故事，关于回荡在连接wolcen世界三大洲的高山上的冰寒恸哭。那悲伤的哭声，似乎在哀叹造物本身。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Alters the skill so that it deals damage over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 改变技能，从而使其造成持续伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Many a scar lies carved into Wolcen’s soil: the Rift dug by the conflict of Genesis, the craters blasted by Hephaäron’s creations, and the vortices created by Anulai-Tai’s comings and goings are only a few examples. But as Etheliel laments these blemishes on the beauty of Wolcen, she cannot help but make it worse, drilling into the land with disproportionately large hail as she weeps.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 沃尔森的土壤上刻着许多伤疤：创世之战所挖的裂痕，赫帕罗恩创造的火山口，以及阿努莱泰来来往往所造成的漩涡，都只是少数几个例子。但是，当埃塞尔为沃尔森的美丽而惋惜这些污点时，她忍不住让它变得更糟，一边哭一边用不成比例的巨大冰雹钻入大地。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to charge Tear of Etheliel by maintaining its cast. Each level of charge it reaches increases its damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许你通过维持施法来为耶特里尔之泪蓄力。每达到一个蓄力级别它的伤害都会增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel was enamored of the city of Arborrel, and sought to protect it from the vagaries of time by encases it into an ice cage. The First Men inside hesitated, fearing blasphemy, but soon enough shot their arrows into the ice to free themselves. Etheliel’s love rained down on them, piercing roofs and crushing civilian and soldier without distinction.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 埃塞尔对阿博雷尔城情有独钟，为了保护它不受时间变幻莫测的影响，他把它装进了一个冰笼子里。里面的第一批人害怕亵渎神明，犹豫了一下，但很快他们就把箭射入冰里释放了自己。埃塞尔的爱如雨点般落在他们身上，刺穿屋顶，毫无区别地压碎平民和士兵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage and increases Willpower cost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 给予伤害加成并增加魔法消耗。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Longer creation delay but Increases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 更长的成型延迟，但给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies killed while they are frozen have a chance to cast ice shards around them in an explosion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人在冻结状态下被击杀有几率在周围爆发出冰片。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel is not just hateful against the usurpers of her freezing powers, she becomes absolutely frenzied when she confronts sorcerers that dare to summon her powers to tear apart the beauty of Creation. Ironically, dreadful destructive blizzards spread around her when she loses control and exacts her vengeance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 埃塞利尔不仅憎恨她冰霜力量的篡夺者，而且当她面对那些敢于召唤她的力量去撕裂造物之美的巫师时，她变得疯狂起来。具有讽刺意味的是，当她失去控制并寻求复仇时，可怕的破坏性暴风雪在她周围蔓延开来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Frost damage to Sacred damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础冰霜伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n\n增加造成虚弱状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The beauty that Etheliel seeks is one of objectivity and superficiality. When she freezes beautiful individuals, they are preserved with a neutral facial expression. On the contrary, Anathëa’s beauty comes from hope, and her radiant smile made the Fallen Lady of Vanity momentarily question the legitimacy of her plight. But Etheliel was not to be convinced by such folly.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔追求的美是客观而肤浅的美。当她冰封美丽的个体时，他们会保持着没有倾向性的面部表情。相反，安娜蒂亚的美来自希望，她灿烂的微笑使堕落的虚荣女神短暂地质疑起自己所崇尚的美丽的正统性。但耶特利尔不会被这种愚蠢的想法动摇。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态的几率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every Arctic Spear that hits an enemy increases the damage of the next Arctic Spear incrementally. This buff is reset when an Arctic Spear misses.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每有一支极地之矛击中敌人，下一支极地之矛的伤害就会增加。一旦有一支打空，此增益就会重置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Spears created are delayed while re-casting, allowing you cast multiple spears at once.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 再次施放会使冰矛会延迟成型，让你可以一次性施放多支冰矛。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Tricking the Fallen of Vanity into making her believe that you are a gateway for her will is a dangerous endeavour: a group of her cultists known as the Diamond Legion hunts down and captures usurpers, afflicting them with a frozen eternal torment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 欺骗虚荣心使她相信自己是通向意志的门户，这是危险的举动：她的一群信徒被称为“钻石军团”狩猎倒下并俘获篡夺者，使他们遭受冻住的永恒折磨。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While travelling, the spear releases smaller spears.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冰矛行进过程中会散射出较小的冰锥。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage. Adds a cooldown to the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 给予伤害加成。给技能添加一段冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Winter's Grasp is cast in a circle around the cursor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 寒冬之握在光标附近以环形施放

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hidden temples of Etheliel are haunting sights: their chilling halls display all types of frozen creatures that were brought there for 'immortality' by cultists. In order to curry her favor, the cultists have unholy rituals at the heart of the temple where they freeze young, beautiful prisoners as sacrifice.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔被隐藏的神庙中是令人难以忘怀的景象：冰冷的大厅里陈列着各种各样的被冰封的生物，它们被邪教徒带到这里来获得“永生”。为了讨好她，邪教者在神庙的中心举行不洁的仪式，他们把年轻漂亮的囚犯冷冻起来作为祭品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Frost damage to Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础冰霜伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The ice of the Lady of Vanity has lost its natural purity since she became a Fallen. Now it is filled with a lethal determination to spread over the world, a desire to fill each shadow with ice as shadow fills her heart. Through her unholy touch, Moros channels his remaining power, spreading his tainted shadow across the mortal plain.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 自从虚荣女神成为堕落者，她的寒冰也失去了其与生俱来的纯净。如今它充满了要蔓延全世界的致命决意，那是要让冰霜填满每处阴影的欲望，一如填满她内心的阴影。摩洛斯引导他剩余的力量，通过耶特利尔的不洁之触，将他那被污染的阴影撒向凡间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a damaging area on the ground for a few seconds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在地面上留下几秒钟的伤害区域。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gives a buff that allows you to deal additional damage based on the base element of this skill. Allies affected by the skill’s area of effect will also receive this buff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提供一个buff，让你获得类型取决于该技能基础元素的额外伤害。被该技能aoe波及的盟友也会获得该buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Etheliel knows generosity when it comes to sharing her power with mortals: she sees sorcerers and cultists as mere pawns serving her great ambition whenever they summon her cold embrace. Every time her Frost touches the world, she moves one step closer to her ultimate victory. In a way, ignorant sorcerers are just as dangerous as malignant cultists.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔在与凡人分享力量方面十分慷慨：当巫师和邪教徒召唤她的冰冷拥抱时，她只不过将他们视作为她的野心服务的傀儡。每次她的霜冻触动世界，她都离她最终的胜利更近一步。在某种程度上，无知的巫师和邪恶的巫师一样危险。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies killed while frozen by this skill trigger another ice nova.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冻结中的敌人被此技能击杀会再触发一次新星。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies hit by the hook are inflicted with Stun.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被钩链击中的敌人会被击晕。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grant Rage for each enemy hit by this ability.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能每击中一个敌人都会获得怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Pulls you toward the final target of the hook.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将你拉向钩子的最终目标。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Equipped with Kirenas, Sarisel was fighting a powerful demon lord. He used the grappling hook to pull it to him, but the demon was too strong and stood firm. The two gauged each other for a moment, holding the chain. That's when Sarisel chose to revert the mechanism of Kirenas, pulling himself towards his target. Caught off-guard, the demon lord was put down in a single blow to the head.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔曾带着基勒纳斯与一位强大的恶魔领主战斗。他试图用抓钩把对方拽到自己身边，但这位恶魔领主太强壮了，巍然不动。就在双方拽着链子僵持不下时，萨里塞尔当机立断，重新激活了基勒纳斯的机括，把自己拉向他的目标。恶魔领主措手不及，被一击爆头，当场毙命。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deals Rend damage.\n\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Bleed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成撕裂伤害。\n\n在造成流血时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sarisel did not sharpen Kirenas - the nicks and scratches that it picked up were like war trophies to him. This decay would never destroy the hook, for it was crafted by Hephaaron, but the imperfections added a new level of lethality. The notches dug into the hook’s target, lacerating the flesh of Sarisel’s quarry.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔并未磨砺过基勒纳斯-它上面的刮痕对他来说就像战利品一样。这些小刮小蹭永远也不会造成抓钩的损坏，因为它是赫法耶博的作品。但这些瑕疵却让抓钩的致命程度额外提高一层，刮痕嵌入了抓钩目标的身体，撕裂萨利塞尔猎物的血肉。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies hit by the hook are more likely to drop Health Globes.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被钩子命中的敌人更有可能掉落生命球。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, is known for his obsessive hunts of all that he deems tainted. While he was in the possession of Kirenas, it quickly became the extension of his will, searching and reaching evil in the most obscure corners of the world.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔，纯净之源，因痴迷于狩猎那些他认定被污染的存在而闻名。当基勒纳斯被他所拥有，很快就变成了他意志的延伸，帮助他搜寻和够到躲在世界最阴暗角落的邪恶。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Bleed on enemies.
Axe continues to spin after being thrown.

Ashkadi is designed to upset the natural order, which in return reacts the only way it knows: by trying to adjust itself. The energy deployed by natural laws to fix the unbalance is what fuels the spin. With sufficient expertise, the axe-thrower can keep it spinning in a way that defies gravity itself.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿什卡迪被设计用来扰乱自然秩序，而自然秩序唯一做出回应的方式便是：试图自我调整。被自然法则调动来修复失衡的能量是推动旋转的动力。如果有足够的专业知识，掷斧者可以使它以一种不受重力影响的方式旋转。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage instead of Rend damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害不再转化为撕裂伤害，而是转化为火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, has always been Hephaäron's rival in terms of craftmanship and creativity. That rivalry led him to break into the Armory of Creation and steal Ashkadi to understand and further the design. He convinced Abanazaar, the fallen Lord of Envy, to imbue the blade with ethereal fire. Ashkadi was later recovered but the design was tainted forever.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，在工艺和创造力方面总是能与赫法耶博一较高下。而这种较量促使他闯入造物武库，偷走阿什卡迪以了解它并进一步进行设计。他说服了堕落的嫉妒之王，阿巴纳扎，让他将超凡之火灌注到斧刃之中。后来阿什卡迪被找到了，但是已被永久地污染。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leech life from enemies when dealing damage with Bleeding Edge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 血斧造成伤害时会吸取敌人的生命。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The axe now follows you as you move.

Hephaäron did not only observe the trajectory of celestial bodies, he tailed one for an unreasonable amount of time, learning and mastering every aspect of its elliptic journey. Only then, did he start imagining Ashkadi's design, aiming to reproduce its graceful trajectory in a small object.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博不仅观察天体的轨迹，而且花费了超乎想象的时间尾随一个天体，学习和掌握其椭圆旅程的方方面面。直到那时，他才开始构思阿什卡迪的设计，以期使在微小的物体上再现那优美的轨迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The reach of the spinning axe increases over time.
Casts to the location of the cursor.

Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每层异常状态都会提高技能伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In his madness, Anulai-Tai feels all the movements in the world and their destructive nature, like a fuzzy haze of blasphemy toward Creation. His gaze punctures through that haze, piercing space and flesh, seeking for targets to single out and lay to rest.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在疯狂中，阿努莱-泰感受到了世界上所有的运动和它们的破坏本质，仿佛看到了一片亵渎造物的朦胧阴霾。他的目光穿透了那片阴霾，刺穿了空间和血肉，寻找着需要剔除的目标。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Aether damage to Toxic damage.\n\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Poison.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础以太伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n\n在造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Unlike Anulai-Tai, Bezeriel is not unnerved by the passage of time. The Fallen Archduke of Doom is only conscious of his hunger. Everything around him; his cultists, the other Abbathus, even the decomposing flesh he consumes, suffers over time, but not him. He thrives off of the decay, a scavenger of life and a timeless acquaintance of the Fallen Duke of Infinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 与阿努莱-泰不同的是，贝泽瑞尔并不会因为时间的流逝而感到恐慌。这位堕落的毁灭大公只在意他的饥饿。他周围的一切；他的崇拜者，其余阿巴图斯领主，甚至他吞食的腐烂血肉，无不受到时间的侵蚀；而他除外。他从腐坏中茁壮成长，是生命的清道夫，是堕落的无限公爵永恒的朋友。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases turn speed while the beam is being cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高引导光束时的转向速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Damage increases over time as the beam is being cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伤害随引导时间逐渐提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The skill fires an additional beam.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能会额外发射一道光束。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The cult of Infinity is a very dangerous one, their deadliest agents known as "Time Devourers", have specialized into isolating a foe from its normal bond to time, before discharging a tremendous amount of Aether unto the target. It accelerates its biorhythm so much that a mortal will grow old and die by the end of the channeling.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 无限邪教极其危险，他们的最致命的特工被称为“时间吞食者”，专攻如何将敌人与时间的正常联系隔断，而后才是朝目标释放大量的以太。由于会大大加速生物节律，以至于凡人在引导结束时衰老乃至死去。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases Toxic and Aether damage for yourself and allies caught within the beam.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 给自己和被光束扫中的盟友增加毒素和以太伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The skill fires an additional laser beam but the damage of the skill is reduced.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能额外发射一道光束，但伤害降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Inflicts Stun on enemies on impact.
Creates a damage-dealing shockwave upon landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时产生一个造成伤害的冲击波。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, former Primordial of Ambition, had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he threw it with such power that it fended an entire mountain. Since then, the earth itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear touches the ground.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特，曾经的野心之源，曾用伊什米尔进行过一个阶段的训练。在那次战斗中，他掷出伊什米尔的力量是如此之大，以至于轰平了一整座山。从那是起，每当第一枪触地，大地本身就会有强烈的反应。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Sacred damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n\n增加造成虚弱状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron forged magical neck rings for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. With them, her voice of pure light was imbued and became the Searing Song, allowing her to pierce the darkest nights. In return she gave him a single bright smile, which he immortalized by infusing its sacred shimmer into the blade of Ishmir.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博为黎明女神，安娜蒂亚铸造了神奇的颈圈。有了他们，她那注入纯净之光的声音变成了灼热之歌，能够穿透最深沉的黑夜。作为回报，她给了他一个灿烂的微笑，他将这微笑中神圣的微光注入了伊什米尔的刀锋，使之得以不朽。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Skill loses its cooldown and costs one Stamina Point to use instead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 不再有冷却时间。改为消耗一个耐力点使用。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The sight of the spear's head piercing the flesh, the painful deathrattle of the skewered foe, its warm blood splattering the face of the impaler: madmen and berserkers thirst for these grim sights to create an unstoppable momentum of destruction.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 矛头刺穿了血肉，被串起的敌人的痛不欲生，温热的鲜血溅到了持矛者的脸上：疯子和狂战士渴望这幅可怕的景象所创造的不可阻挡的毁灭之势。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces cooldown for each hit that kills an enemy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每一次击杀了敌人的跃击都会降低冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Creates a vortex before landing that pulls in enemies within an area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地前制造一个牵引一定范围内敌人的漩涡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth, former Primordial of Ambition, had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he swung it through the air with such power that a cyclone gathered from his movement, and in the moment he released the spear in a mighty throw, lightning made a deep scar in the earth in the shape of a seemingly bottomless gulf. Since then, the air itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear flies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特，曾经的野心之源，有一场使用伊什米尔的演习。酣战之中，他圆舞长矛，磅礴的力量带起一道旋风，就在他用力投掷长矛的一刹那，一道闪电在地上留下了一道深深的伤疤，就像一个深不见底的深渊。从那以后，每当第一矛飞起，空气都会随之战栗。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Regnerate Force Shield per enemy hit on landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时击中的每个敌人都会为你回复护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a buff for each enemy hit on landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时每击中一个敌人都会提供一个BUFF。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage dealt by yourself and allies in the area of effect on landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时授予自己和盟友一个BUFF。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain life leech on the damage dealt by this ability.\n\nThe lower your health, the more life leech you gain.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能造成的伤害获得吸血。\n\n你的生命值越低，获得的吸血越多。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a close battle with Anathëa, Baäpheth was bound in chains made by Hephaäron and imprisoned in the camp of the Army of Genesis. The War of the Primordials raged in the distance as Baäpheth tried to regain his strength. While the chains were unbreakable, the wall was not, and Baäpheth saw that there was a chance to escape. With every struggle freedom felt slightly closer, reviving his strength with every exertion, until the wall collapsed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在与安娜蒂亚近距离的战斗之后，拜费特被用赫法耶博打造的锁链绑住，囚禁在天启军团的营地里。当拜费特试图回复自己力量的时候，原初神战在远处激烈地进行。虽然锁链牢不可破，但墙却不是，拜费特看到了逃脱的希望。每挣扎一次，自由就近上一点，他的力量随着他的每次努力焕发出来，直到束缚他的那堵墙倒塌。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Sacred damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.
