Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础冰霜伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n\n增加造成虚弱状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Baäpheth was captured by Anathëa and her Army of Genesis, the guards could not hold him long. A regiment of them rushed to his captivity chamber after hearing a commotion. Baäpheth swung wildly with his shackled arm and the chain cut clean through the first soldier’s armored torso. An arrogant smirk spread across Baäpheth’s face as he wrapped the chains around his hands.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特终于挣脱了束缚，他虚弱无力、伤痕累累、手无寸铁。一队卫兵听到异动，冲进囚禁他的房间。拜费特疯狂地挥舞他带着镣铐的手臂，带头的士兵覆盖着装甲的躯干被锁链直接削成两截。当拜费特把锁链裹在手上，一个傲慢的微笑在他的脸上蔓延。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Add an additional attack to the combo.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在连击中额外增加一次攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a life leech buff to yourself and allies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 授予自身和盟友一个吸血buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Rage generated when killing an enemy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能击杀敌人时生成怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage based on the amount of missing health you have.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基于已损失生命的量提升伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A whirlwind of death, Baäpheth struck fear into the hearts of the Army of Genesis. Every shriek and deathrattle transferred sacred energy gifted by Lady of Dawn to the enraged Primordial of Ambition. He feasted on this power, using it to eviscerate every obstacle between him and his adversary. He stood in the face of Anathëa, coated in gore and with madness in his eyes, ready to tear her to shreds with the chains she used to imprison him and the Sacred strength of her own army.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在死亡的旋风中，巴菲斯将恐惧带入了创世纪军的心中。每一次尖叫和死亡的响声，都将黎明夫人所赐予的神圣能量转移到了激怒的野心原始组织中。他大饱眼福，用它来消除他和对手之间的每一个障碍。他站在Anathëa的脸上，脸上充满了血腥和疯狂，准备用她过去囚禁他的锁链和她自己军队的神圣力量将她撕成碎片。
降低暴击几率。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants buff to all resistances while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在技能效果范围内授予全抗性加成buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attacks deal sacred damage while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能效果范围内为攻击附加神圣伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Healing area of effect becomes centered at cursor location.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 治疗效果范围现在以光标位置为中心。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Lady of Dawn is a benevolent Primordial who defends Creation against the Fallen. She rules over the concepts of Dawn, Hope, Truth and Rebirth. She tries to shepherd mankind into her humbling light while giving it the powers to survive against supernatural invasions.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明女神是一位仁慈的原初神，她保护造物对抗堕落者。她掌管着黎明、希望、真理和重生的概念。她试图引领人类进入她的谦卑之光，同时赋予它抵抗超凡侵害的生存能力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows the healing area of effect to be moved by re-casting the ability.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 治疗区域可以通过重新施放技能移动。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Facing the injustice and perils of the world, some have lost faith in Anathëa's existence on the claim that through recorded history, she never intervened herself to help Creation. Some Brothers chose to fight off this faithlessness by becoming "Hierophants of the Searing Song", battlepriests that preach her prayers and blessings to shield mankind from evil.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 面对世界上的不公和危险，一些人对安娜蒂亚的存在失去了信心，声称根据历史记载，她从未出手帮助人类。一些兄弟会成员选择通过成为“灼热之歌的圣者”来战胜这种不忠，他们是宣讲她的祷言和福音来保护人类免于邪恶侵袭的战地牧师。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases stamina regeneration while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 站在治疗区域内增加耐力回复。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The healing area of effect follows the player that it was cast on.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 治疗区域跟随被作为目标施放的玩家。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Brotherhood of Dawn worships Anathëa. Even after being chased from the Kingdom of Alia once the United Republic of Mankind took over, they stayed true to their oaths and remained powerful knights, shielding innocents from the terrors of the night.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明的兄弟会崇拜安娜蒂亚。即使在人类联邦共和国接替了阿里亚王国之后，他们遭到驱逐，但他们依旧忠于誓言，并且仍然是将无辜之人从黑夜的恐惧中解救出来的强大骑士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 站在技能效果范围内时，增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Area of effect regenerates Force Shield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能效果范围内持续恢复护盾。
提高每跳恢复的生命值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces number of projectiles but increases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 减少投射物数量，但给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Arrows explode on enemy contact. Cannot pierce enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 箭矢在敌人接触时爆炸。不再能穿透敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While Hephaäron built Krearion, his apprentice was in charge of creating its arrows. He experimented with the design, and decided on an explosive arrowhead as standard. Hephaäron was furious and claimed that the apprentice was unable to understand the purity of his design. Such crass, mindless violence contrasts with Hephaäron’s finely crafted weapons that carried out their function efficiently and with simplicity. This disagreement was the first step towards eccentricity that led Ezaneal to be the devious inventor he is today.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博打造科瑞里昂时，他的徒弟负责制造它的箭。他对设计进行了试验，并决定采用一种爆炸箭头作为标准配备。赫法耶博大发雷霆，声称徒弟无法理解他设计的纯洁性。这种粗暴的、无意识的暴力与赫法耶博精心制作的武器相比，它们简单有效地实现了它们的功能。这种分歧是导致伊查内亚脾气变得古怪，以至于成为如今的欺诈发明家的第一步。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Toxic damage.\n\nApplies an additional stack when inflicting Poison.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n\n造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The bow is the most common weapon for hunters in the cult of Bezeriel. As they collect flesh for him to consume, yanking out the arrows from the corpses, the arrowheads become more and more putrid as the gory residue builds up between each kill. It rots over time, making each shot ever more lethal.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 弓是贝泽瑞尔邪教中的猎人们最常用的武器。当他们收集血肉供贝泽瑞尔食用前，会从尸体上拔出箭，随着每一次杀戮间血迹的积累，箭头变得越来越腐臭。它持续的腐烂，让每次射击都更加致命。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon ghosts to shoot arrows alongside you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一列鬼魂与你并肩射箭。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to spawn a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by your arrows.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能的箭矢击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage for each remaining Pierce.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每次剩余的穿透数都会提供伤害增幅。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge the shot, firing a volley for each charge level reached.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 蓄力射击，每达到一个蓄力等级释放时就会多进行一次散射。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The creation of Krearion served as inspiration for all humans to create their own bows. As archery became more widespread, Krearion gathered power within itself, which cried out in great volleys. For every bow strung, Krearion’s shadow is cast wider and longer than ever.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 克里欧人的创造为所有人类创造自己的弓提供了灵感。随着射箭运动越来越广泛，克里奥人在自己的身体里聚集了力量，在巨大的截击声中呼喊。因为每一个弓箭，克里奥里奥的影子都比以往更广更久。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Frost damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化冰霜伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Those wanderers from the most hostile regions of Varg speak of a legend. A lone wandering figure in furs, whose arrows turn their target into statues of ice. Some believe him an envoy of a higher power. Others still believe that his arrows are the product of some advanced craft, and that his technique might be uncovered if one adventures far enough into his territory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 那些来自瓦格最敌对地区的流浪者讲述了一个传说。一个穿着毛皮的孤独的流浪者，他的箭把他们的目标变成了冰雕。有人认为他是更高权力的使者。其他人仍然相信他的箭是一些先进工艺的产物，如果一个人冒险进入他的领地，他的技术可能会被发现。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies near the beginning and end of the teleport are inflicted with Stasis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 靠近传送的起点和终点的敌人会陷入停滞。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain Willpower for each enemy passed through with Aether Jump.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以太穿越从穿过的每个敌人身上获得魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Swap position with enemies around the target location of the teleport.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 与目标位置周围的敌人交换位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a certain threshold, mastering the Aether drifts in focus. The temptation to use it to reshape the world becomes irresistible, regardless of the risks of butterfly effect. Manipulating it from afar and remoulding the thread that connects every being to it becomes a nefarious call that eventually leads to a failing moral system and a predatory behaviour to toy with one's prey in the pursuit of selfish desires.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 超过一定的阈值之后，对以太的掌握会趋于聚焦。利用它重塑世界的诱惑会变得不可抵挡，到那时将会枉顾蝴蝶效应的风险。从远方操纵以太和重塑万物与它相连的时间线，变成了一场罪恶的呼唤，最终导致的是在追求私欲的过程中玩弄猎物的失败道德体系和掠夺行为。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a decoy behind when a teleport is activated.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在传送时留下一个诱饵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deals Aether damage to enemies between the beginning and end of the teleport. \n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对传送起始点之间的敌人造成以太伤害。\n\n增加造成停滞的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Casting this skill removes all crowd control effects.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放此技能将移除所有控制效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces cooldown\n\nAllows skill to be cast mutiple times. Each re-cast has an increased Willpower cost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 缩短冷却时间。\n\n允许连续多次施放技能，每次魔力消耗都会提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The most powerful sorcerers of the cult of Infinity aim to mimic their Fallen overlord. They have partially severed their link to time itself, allowing them to move through the Aether motionlessly at an uncanny speed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 无限教团中最强大的巫师们力求模仿他们的堕落主宰。他们已经切断了自身与时间的部分联系，这允许他们在静止状态下以不可思议的速度穿越以太。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases attack speed and spell casting speed after using this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能后攻击、施法速度提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Return to original location when Aether Jump is re-cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 重复施放以太穿越时返回初始位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deconstructing time allows the possibility to create minor anomalies. To shape things in a way that should not be possible. Something even Primordials have trouble achieving is the teleportation recoil effect. The act of teleporting does not only consume energy: it condenses it in an unstable cluster, which may on implosion cause teleportation to recur a number of times, occasionally trapping the subject in an infinite loop.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 解构时间允许产生微小的异常。以不可能的方式塑造事物。即使是原始生物也难以实现的是心灵传送的后坐效应。传送的动作不仅消耗能量：它将能量凝聚在一个不稳定的团簇中，这可能在内爆时导致传送重复多次，偶尔将被摄体困在一个无限循环中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed after completing a teleport.
Gain Willpower for each enemy passed through with Aether Jump.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 从每个以太穿越穿过的敌人身上获得魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Turret stays active for a longer duration.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炮台能保持激活更长时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Turret gains an additional cannon, increasing its damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炮台获得一个额外炮口，并提升其伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Turret shots now deal damage in an area of effect.

For a while there was harmony between the two groups, despite their differences. The agreement provided mutual security and allowed the city to prosper. However, discontent started brewing when The Cult of Beelmalik sabotaged some of the turrets, blaming shoddy craftsmanship and turning public opinion against the refugees. But the turrets remained, defending the city with complete neutrality.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一段时间以来，尽管两组之间存在差异，但两者之间还是很和谐的。该协议提供了共同的安全，使这座城市得以繁荣发展。然而，当“别尔玛利克教派”破坏了一些炮塔，指责伪劣手工艺以及将公众舆论转向难民时，不满情绪开始激化。但是炮塔仍然存在，以完全中立的方式保卫了这座城市。 上下文请求

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Lightning damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化闪电伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Long ago, there was an underground city of scholars and craftsmen. However, it was constantly threatened by their fellow subterranean settlers, the Svriir. A group of refugees, followers of Ezaneal, offered to build defences for the city in exchange for shelter and tributes to the Fallen Lord of Trickery. A deal was struck, and the cultists constructed automatic turrets to protect the city.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 很久以前，这里是一个地下的学者和手工业者的城市。然而，它一直受到他们的地下定居者Svriir的威胁。一群难民，是埃扎纳尔（Ezaneal）的追随者，他们提出为这座城市建造防御工事，以换取住房，并向堕落的诡计大王致敬。达成了协议，信徒们建造了自动炮塔以保护这座城市。 上下文请求

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Turret explodes when destroyed, dealing damage in an area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炮台被摧毁时自爆，造成AOE物理伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Turret can now rotate and auto-target enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炮台能够转向并自动瞄准敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Long ago, there was an underground city of scholars and craftsmen. It was constantly threatened by the Svriir who dominated their subterranean domains. A group of refugees, followers of Ezaneal, offered to build defences for the city in exchange for shelter and tributes to the Fallen Lord of Trickery. A deal was struck, and the cultists constructed automatic turrets to protect the city.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 很久以前，这里是一个地下的学者和手工业者的城市。它一直受到统治其地下领地的Svriir的不断威胁。一群难民，是埃扎纳尔（Ezaneal）的追随者，他们提出为这座城市建造防御工事，以换取住房，并向堕落的诡计大王致敬。达成了协议，信徒们建造了自动炮塔以保护这座城市。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to summon a second turret.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许你额外召唤一个炮台。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed for allies in an area of effect around the turret.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在炮台周围一定范围内提高盟友的移动速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Creates a shield that rotates with the turret, blocking incoming projectiles.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 生成一个随炮台旋转的护盾，阻挡来袭的投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The tributes to Ezaneal slowed and soon stopped all together. The furious cultists precipitated a schism with the Cultists of Beelmalik. Each turned their faulty cannons towards each other and swore that their weapons would strike down the city’s enemies. Yet, there was no shot. The town remained paralyzed, each fearing that they would be the one struck down if fire broke out. Centuries after, the inhabitants still suspect that tomorrow will sound the crack of their mutual destruction.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向Ezaneal致敬的步伐变慢，很快就全部停止了。愤怒的邪教徒与贝尔玛利克的信徒们产生了分裂。每个人都将他们有缺陷的大炮转向彼此，并发誓他们的武器会击落这座城市的敌人。但是，没有开枪。这座城镇仍然瘫痪了，每个人都担心如果大火爆发，他们将成为被摧毁的人。几个世纪以来，居民们仍然怀疑明天将听起来他们相互破坏的裂痕。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases turret damage, but turret stays active for a reduced duration.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炮台伤害提高，激活时间缩短。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases Rage generation per enemy hit by the shout.\n\nIncreases Rage generation per hit while skill is active.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战吼击中每个敌人都会给予怒气。\n\n在技能的持续时间内增加每一击生成的怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance of health globes spawning while this skill is active.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战吼持续时间内增加生命球的产生几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants buff to all resistances per enemy hit by the shout.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战吼每击中一个敌人都会获得授予你全抗性buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shout inflicts Stun on enemies in a small area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战吼在小范围内的造成敌人眩晕。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth is a born conqueror. But far from being a mindless battlebeast, he turned out to be a patient strategist. He understands that battles are won long before soldiers ever set foot on the field. The successful belligerent breaks the will of his foes long before breaking their bones.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 拜费特是天生的征服者。但他非但不是一个没有头脑的战斗野兽，反而是一个有耐心的战略家。他明白，战争取胜的关键往往在于士兵踏足战场之前。成功的交战者在打碎敌人的骨头之前很久就已经粉碎了他们的意志。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies hit by the shout are inflicted with Weakness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对战吼命中的敌人造成虚弱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases duration of the buffs granted by this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加此技能所赋予的增益持续时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases the effectiveness of all buffs granted by this skill and other skills.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增强此技能和其他技能所授予的所有增益效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You and your allies are cleansed of crowd control effects when this skill is activated.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能激活时清除你和你的盟友受到的控制效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Before becoming the Fallen of War, Baäpheth used to be the Primordial of Ambition. Part of his hubris came from his willingness to embody the perfect warrior. To be a figure that others could look up to in their darkest times. When others would consider breaking the line, he would not relent and would command them to stand with him. Most would mistake his quest for glory for a heroism that never was.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在成为堕落战争大公之前，拜费特曾是野心之源。他傲慢的部分原因是他想表现成完美战士的意愿。做一个别人在最黑暗的时候都能仰望的人物。当别人考虑越过前线时，他不会允许，而是会命令他们和他站在一起。大多数人会把他追求荣誉的行为误认为是一种英雄主义，但其实那从来不是。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a temporary life leech buff.
Grants a temporary block chance buff.
Grants a temporary critical chance buff.
Restores stamina points when the skill is cast.
Chance for the shout to Frenzy enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战吼有几率使敌人狂乱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: During the great War of the Primordials, Baäpheth engaged and fought against Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. While The First Warrior's prowess could not be matched in battle, Anathëa's resisted his frenzying shouts and her raw power was still enough to rival him for a while. \n\nIn the end, Baäpheth had the upper hand and wounded Anathëa, some of her lights escaped her body uncontrollably, engulfing and searing Baäpheth inside and out. Both were considerably weakened by the experience and unable to land the final blow.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在原初神的大战之中，拜费特与黎明女神安娜蒂亚交战。虽然第一战士的高超战斗技艺无人能及，但安娜蒂亚的英勇令他的狂吼毫无建树，而且她的根源之力仍然足以与他匹敌片刻。 \n\n最后，拜费特占了上风，击伤了安娜蒂亚，她的一些光芒无法控制地从她身上逸出，淹没了拜费特，从内到外灼烧着他。两败俱伤的他们都无法对对方施以最后一击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Can be held to prolong the duration of the skill.

Hephaäron learned of a rare material, Shiganite, that was as strong as Primordial metal, less brittle but more dense. He collected some of this unique ore from the high mountains of Wolcen and started work in his cliffside workshop. In his forge, Hephaäron soon discovered the metal was extremely unstable; to maintain its integrity, he created a long blade with a Shiganite core and a thick Primordial metal outer layer, which came to be known as Voknafein, The First Greatsword.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫法耶博了解到了一种稀有材料——石贡岩，它和原初金属一样坚固，不像原初金属那么脆，但密度更大。他从Wolcen世界的高山上收集到了一些这种独特的矿石，并开始在他位于峭壁的工作间工作。在锻造过程中，赫法耶博很快发现这种金属极不稳定；为了保持它的完整性，他制造了一把长剑，石贡岩为芯，外层包裹上一层厚厚的原始金属，后来这把长剑被称为沃克纳芬，第一巨剑。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Frost damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化冰霜伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As Hephaäron continued to improve his swordsmanship, he heard a mournful shriek echo through the mountains, accompanied by an icy chill. As Etheliel’s lament passed through the mountain range, it disturbed a large mass of snow. It slowly began to slide down the mountain, picking up speed until it became a full-blown avalanche barrelling towards the workshop. With no time to react, Hephaäron planted his sword into the earth and gripped it tightly to endure the cascade of ice.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赫菲隆（Hephaäron）继续提高剑术时，他听到山上传来悲惨的尖叫声，伴随着冰冷的寒意。当以太利的哀叹穿过山脉时，它打乱了大雪。它慢慢开始滑下山，加快速度，直到它变成向车间席卷的雪崩。没时间做出反应，赫法隆将剑插在了大地上，紧紧地握住了它，以忍受一连串雪崩。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases area of effect.\n\nDamage ticks are applied less often.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加AOE范围。\n\n造成伤害的频率降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases attack speed for yourself and allies inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提升自己和AOE范围内盟友的攻速。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies hit by this skill spawn health globes.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被该技能击中的敌人生成生命球。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases Rage generation from enemies killed by this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能击杀敌人生成的怒气增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Critical hits have a chance to smite enemies with a bouncing attack based on your weapon damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴击有几率造成基于武器伤害的额外弹跳攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases tick rate upon inflicting a critical hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成暴击后伤害频率提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance when an enemy is killed with Bladestorm.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 剑刃风暴击杀敌人后，增加暴击几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Releases a directional wave after casting that damages enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放后会释放一道定向伤害波。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemy projectiles are deflected when this skill is active.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能持续期间可以偏转来袭的投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron was frustrated; he could barely carry the weapon, let alone use it. Despite his best efforts, the sword refused to stay upright. He asked Baäpheth, the First Warrior to test the weapon. Baäpheth held the sword high, feeling its crushing weight, then switched stance so that the weapon fell behind him. He launched into a sequence of spinning strikes, sending shockwaves of air bursting in all directions. Baäpheth’s only comment: the sword needed a heavier pommel, to balance out the dense blade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Hephaäron感到沮丧；他几乎不能携带武器，更不用说使用它了。尽管尽了最大的努力，这把剑还是拒绝直立。他请第一战士巴菲斯测试武器。巴菲斯高举着剑，感到剑身沉重，然后改变了姿势，使武器落在了身后。他发动了一系列旋转打击，向四面八方发出了冲击波。巴菲特唯一的评论：剑需要较重的鞍，以平衡密集的剑刃。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage per each Ailment an enemy has.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人身上每有一个异常状态，就提升一定的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Adds an additional attack to the melee combo that deals damage in 360 degrees.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在近战连击中额外增加一次360度造成伤害的攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Adds an additional attack to the melee combo.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在近战连击中额外增加一次攻击。
提高从暴击中获得的魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain Willpower each time an enemy is killed with Infinity Blades.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每次用无限之刃击杀敌人时获得魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Applies a debuff that increases damage taken by spells.
Increases damage on the next attack after using the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能会提高下一次攻击的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to cast Warrior skills for a few seconds after hitting an enemy with this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用该技能击中敌人后的几秒内允许你施放战士技能。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anulai-Tai, who would once become the Fallen Archduke of Infinity, was invested with a great kindness in his early days. Slipping through the non-linear chaos, he wove pins into the aether and constructed the fabric of time. At its center, the many threads in the needles found their anchor point in Anulai-Tai himself. His sacrifice meant that life flourished for mortal beings.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Anulai-Tai曾一度成为无尽堕落大公，但在他的早期就受到了极大的厚爱。他滑过非线性的混乱，将别针编织进以太并构造了时间结构。在其中心，许多针头的线在阿努拉伊泰自己身上找到了锚点。他的牺牲意味着生命将为凡人而繁荣。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a Shadow or Aether damage bonus to nearby allies. The bonus granted depends on the base damage type of the skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 授予附近的盟友一份暗影或以太额外伤害。额外伤害类型取决于该技能的基础伤害类型。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to spawn a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by Infinity Blades.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用无限之刃击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hitting an enemy regenerates Force Shield.
Increases damage dealt while Force Shield is not empty.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 护盾未空时造成的伤害提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases block chance while casting, inflicts Stasis on attacker if blocked.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 释放时提升格挡率，格挡成功则使攻击者停滞。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Over the course of history, the threads bound to Anulai-Tai began to torture him, pulling him every which way. He soon came to despise time’s movements and desired them to stop. Moros tried to relieve his burden. While he could never understand the design of the aethereal weave, he held the tapestry together for a time. This legendary era was called the Boundless Dusk, as Moros’ darkness stretched through time while he replaced Anulai-Tai.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在历史的过程中，绑在Anulai-Tai上的螺纹开始折磨他，四处拉扯他。他很快就开始鄙视时间的运动，希望他们停止运动。莫罗斯试图减轻他的负担。尽管他永远无法理解金属编织的设计，但他还是将挂毯放了一段时间。这个传奇时代被称为无尽黄昏，因为莫罗斯（Moros）接替阿努赖泰（Anulai-Tai）时的黑暗弥漫着时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage of the skill for each Ailment stack inflicted on a target.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 目标身上每有一层异常状态都会提高该技能的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Aether damage into Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础以太伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Anathëa and Moros danced in the First Movement of Creation, the world was naked before the chaotic movements of the universe. If there were to be men, there needed to be a realm governed by rules which they could live in. Anulai-Tai was commanded into existence by this cosmic lack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在安娜蒂亚与摩洛斯在“造物启元”中翩翩起舞之时，世界尚是一片荒芜，宇宙的混沌运动刚刚开始。诞生人类的前提，是要有一套适宜人类生存的时空规则。宇宙的这一缺憾令阿努莱·泰应运而生。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases tick-rate of leech for each Ailment stack an enemy has.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人身上的每一层异常状态都会使汲取的每跳间隔缩短。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Sweet Tooth Worm causes a deep craving for sugar in order to provoke diabetic necrosis in the host body. The worm feasts on this rotting flesh storing it external skin sacks.  If put into contact with freezing temperatures, the Sweet Tooth will immediately enter hibernation and survive off of its supplies. This is the best time to collect them as spellcasting components. Some, such as the faithful of Bezeriel, raise them in warm pools in order to use them sustainably.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 爱吃甜食的蠕虫引起对糖的强烈渴望，以引起宿主体内糖尿病性坏死。蠕虫在这种腐烂的肉上饱餐一顿，将其储存在外皮袋中。 如果将其置于冰冻温度下，甜牙将立即进入冬眠状态，并且可以从其供应中幸存下来。这是收集它们作为施法的组件的最佳时间。有些人，例如忠实的Bezeriel，将它们放在温暖的水池中以可持续地使用它们。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance for health globes to drop.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加掉落生命球的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leeches Force Shield instead of health.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 吸血回复护盾而不是生命值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leeches health from yourself and heals a targeted ally.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 吸取自身生命值治疗一名指定盟友。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Sweet Tooth Worm strongly prefers rotting meat due to the small insects it attracts, and the heat generated by putrefaction. But if starved, they can be persuaded to partake in living meat, carrying the vital energy from one subject to another. Peasants are quick to stack them into their baskets to sell them to the nearest doctor, exposing themselves to the Sweet Worm’s deadly contagion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 由于蛀牙吸引的小虫子以及腐烂产生的热量，因此它们极喜欢腐烂的肉。但是，如果饿了，他们可以被说服吃活的肉，将重要的能量从一个对象带到另一个对象。农民很快将它们堆放在篮子里，卖给最近的医生，使自己暴露于甜蠕虫的致命传染之下。
操纵的怪物变得比原本更强。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Possessed monsters leave globes upon death.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 操纵的怪物死后会留下生命球。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Toxic damage to Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础毒素伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Underneath each Temple of Bezeriel lies a broad green pool. The priests will open the gates to that underground refuge once per season, allowing filth encrusted beggars to rush in for a bath. There’s a tacit understanding between the priests and the beggars. Everyone has heard the rumours after all: the shadows have allowed something to proliferate in the water. Those who enter them will take something away, hidden underneath their skin.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Bezeriel的每座神殿下都有一个宽阔的绿色泳池。牧师每个季节都会打开通往该地下避难所的大门，让污秽的乞丐赶来洗澡。牧师和乞丐之间有默契。毕竟，每个人都听到了谣言：阴影使水中有些东西扩散了。那些进入它们的人会带走一些隐藏在皮肤下的东西。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage.\n\nReduces tick-rate for leeching effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加伤害。\n\n降低汲取效果的频率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summons become bigger, increasing their health and damage.\n\nReduces the number of summons by one.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物体型增大，生命值和伤害提高。\n\n召唤数-1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the Primordial of Mortality, Bezeriel concerned himself with Death as a separation of soul and body. As a Fallen, his presence on Wolcen is more akin to an open gullet siphoning faith. One worshipper in agony has prayers worth five healthy parishioners, and one class of victim produces more necrotic power than any other: the sick.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 作为死亡的本源，贝泽里尔将死亡与灵魂和身体的分离联系在一起。作为堕落者，他在沃尔森（Wolcen）的存在更类似于一个开放的食道虹吸信仰。一位痛苦的礼拜者的祷告值得五个健康的教区居民，一类受害者产生的坏死能力比其他任何人都大：病人。 上下文请求

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces health for summons.\n\nIncreases damage for summons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 减少召唤物的生命值。\n\n提高召唤物伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summons explode when they are killed.\n\nThey also explode when they reach the target you order them to charge or collide with another target while charging.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物被击杀时爆炸。\n\n被指挥冲刺，触碰到敌人也会爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Plague acts as an effective recruitment tool. The cult creates an underclass of lepers, then offer them shelter where no one else will grant it. This results in a steady supply of cannon fodder, all too eager to release themselves into death during the battle.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 瘟疫是一种有效的招募工具。邪教创造了一个下层的麻风病人，然后在没有其他人会给予他们庇护的地方为其提供庇护。这导致了稳定的大炮饲料供应，他们都渴望在战斗中将自己杀死。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage explosions caused by the Cadaverine skill modifier.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高技能修正“尸胺”造成的爆炸伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage to Fire damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Hierarch of Infestation once declared outright war upon the worshippers of Anathëa. Targeting a temple north of Varg, where the days are longest, the Shepherds of Plague gathered the sickly beggars put under their protection into a ditch. They doused the wretches with oil and cast a fire into the pit. Desperate for aid and relief, the flaming forces ran amok, devastating the Temple of Dawn.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 侵扰等级曾经向Anathëa的信徒宣战。瘟疫的牧羊人瞄准瓦格以北的一座寺庙，那里一天的日子最长，瘟疫的牧羊人将病态的乞g放在他们的保护下放到沟里。他们用油浇灌了ret子，并向火坑里扔了火。迫切需要援助和救济，燃烧的力量横行，摧毁了黎明神殿。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage to Aether damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为以太伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Cult of Doom draws its mystical power from prolonged suffering, and is ever searching for new means to cause pain. For this purpose, they invited representatives of the Cult of Infinity. The wards of the Hierarch of Infestation were subjected to the agonies of time condensed into seconds, their flesh morphing and withering faster than they should possibly be allowed to. From this torment, the Shepherds of Plague found a new sub-variety of energy available to them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 毁灭邪教从长期的折磨中汲取神秘力量，并且一直在寻找引起痛苦的新方法。为此，他们邀请了无限邪教的代表。瘟疫主教的守卫遭受了浓缩为几秒的时间折磨，他们血肉变形和枯萎的速度超过了承受极限。从这种折磨中，瘟疫的掌控者们发现了一种可供他们使用的全新类别的能量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage to Toxic damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The creation of a servile workforce involves the deliberate contamination of food and water resources within a given community. Nearby collectivities are quick to quarantine the area and cease all trade, thus leaving the sick in a needy position. The cult of Doom appears almost as a hero, willing to entreat with the lepers where no one else would.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 建立奴役型劳动力涉及对给定社区内食品和水资源的故意污染。附近的社区迅速隔离该地区并停止所有贸易，从而使病人处于有需要的位置。毁灭战士的崇拜几乎像英雄一样，愿意与麻风病人一起娱乐，这是其他人所无法企及的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases the number of summons by one.
Increases health for summons.\n\nReduces the number of summons by one.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加召唤物的生命值。\n\n召唤数-1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed for summons.\n\nIncreases health for summons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高召唤物的移动速度。\n\n增加召唤物的生命值。
召唤物射出箭矢会爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel devised a plan to elevate the bodies of the dead up into the sky, to touch Anathëa who had never known mortality. He rejoiced as Death’s rot began to spread inside Anathëa’s belly, the sparks of light and plasma in her body collapsing into smoke and ashes. She vomited this tainted matter onto Wolcen, barely saving herself. The regurgitated dead stood up from the waste, when they ought never to stand again. The power of the sun had granted them a semblance of new life.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Bezeriel制定了一项计划，将死者的尸体抬高到空中，以抚慰从未知道死亡的阿纳瑟亚。当死亡的腐烂开始在Anathëa的肚子中蔓延时，他欣喜若狂，她体内的光和等离子的火花坍塌成烟雾和灰烬。她把这个污染的东西吐给了沃尔森，勉强得救了自己。反流的死者从废物中站了起来，那时他们再也不能站起来了。太阳的力量使他们有了新生命的外表。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Arrows shot by summons can pierce enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物射出箭矢能穿透敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon's attack speed is increased after using this skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使用此技能后，召唤物的攻击速度提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage for summons.\n\nReduces health for summons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高召唤物伤害。\n\n降低召唤物的生命值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Though Bezeriel couldn’t obtain a dead sun from Anathëa, his curiosity was peaked by the new form of unlife produced by her brush with death. He shepherded the revenants and taught them to spread their state of being to the First Men. This conflict had allowed consciousness to triumph over the body’s limits.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管Bezeriel无法从Anathëa那里获得死太阳，但他的好奇心因她死后被刷产生的新形式的无生命而达到顶峰。他牧养了这些叛徒，并教他们向第一批人传播他们的存在状态。这种冲突使意识战胜了身体的极限。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage to Toxic damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The hunters of Bezeriel were mistakenly thought to be clumsy shooters, always missing the vital spots in their prey. Little did those gossiping witnesses know that the archers of Doom didn’t desire to kill. The tips of their arrows were covered in hazardous contaminants. Those beasts and men who were struck by them would carry infection wherever they went, spreading the Hierarch of Infestation’s design around the world.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Bezeriel的猎人被误认为是笨拙的射手，总是错过了猎物中的重要部位。那些闲聊的目击者几乎不知道厄运的弓箭手不想杀人。他们箭头的尖端被有害污染物覆盖。那些被它们殴打的野兽和男人无论去到哪里都将受到感染，从而在全球范围内传播了“侵染”的等级制度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage into Frost damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The northmost cults of Bezeriel infringed upon Etheliel’s territory, thereby spreading their own power. Their sacrifices would be buried up to the neck in snow, left to die a slow death of cold. From there, the body would naturally mummify in the ice, mutating into a new form. The Diamond Legion protects these mummies, as their peaceful expressions and smooth skins reflect Etheliel’s ideals.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝塞里尔（Bezeriel）最北端的邪教侵犯了以太利（Etheliel）的领土，从而传播了自己的力量。他们的牺牲将被埋葬在雪地的脖子上，让其死于缓慢的感冒死亡。从那里，身体自然会在冰中木乃伊变身，变成新的形态。钻石军团保护着这些木乃伊，因为它们的平静表情和光滑的皮肤反映了以太坊的理想。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Physical damage into Shadow damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the first generations of the First Men died out, Bezeriel frowned. It seemed unfair that the dead should have no sun of their own though they far outnumbered the living. He went to Anathëa and asked her to give him a dead sun which would oversee the Ailing Marshes where lie those who die of sickness. Anathëa rejected Bezeriel’s request: creating a new sun would be akin to abandoning a child to Bezeriel. The then-lord of mortality resolved that if Anathëa wouldn’t help him, he would corrupt her himself with a great burst of necrotic energy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当第一代第一批人灭绝后，贝泽里尔皱了皱眉。尽管死者人数远远超过活人，似乎死者不应该拥有自己的太阳似乎是不公平的。他去了Anathëa，请她给他一个死太阳，它将监督那些死于疾病的人的艾琳沼泽。Anathëa拒绝了Bezeriel的要求：制造新的太阳就像将孩子遗弃给Bezeriel。当时的死亡领主决定，如果阿纳瑟亚（Anathëa）不帮他，他将以极大的坏死能量使她自己腐败。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases the number of summons by one.
Reduces the number of summons by one.\n\nIncreases damage for summons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤数-1。\n\n提高召唤物伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed for summons.\n\nIncreases health for summons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高召唤物的移动速度。\n\n增加召唤物的生命值。
提高召唤物的移动速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon drops health globes upon death.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物死亡时掉落生命球。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The candidates are invited into a room half-mortuary, half-theater. There, they consume the rotten flesh of the dead, take brown blood into their veins, sew pieces of the cadavers onto themselves. That is the first week. Should the candidate survive it, the transformation into an Immortal Maw takes place over a month. The subject’s body turns bloated and purple and emits a putrid sheen. Gums recede to show oversized fangs. A hunger buries itself in the pit of their stomachs, which must be sated by flesh yet will go on hungering. They walk behind the Shepherds of Plague, ready to take any attacks thrown at them. This is what it means to embrace Bezeriel.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 邀请候选人进入半-半剧院的房间。在那儿，他们吞噬了腐烂的尸体，将褐色的血液带入静脉，将尸体缝在身上。那是第一周。如果候选人能幸存下来，那么要变成一个不朽的花胶需要一个月的时间。对象的身体变得肿，发紫，并发出腐烂的光泽。牙龈后退，露出大号的尖牙。饥饿将自己埋在他们的肚子里，必须用肉来满足，但会继续饥饿。他们走在瘟疫的牧羊人后面，准备对他们进行任何攻击。这就是拥抱Bezeriel的意思。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A portion of the damage received by you is transmitted to the summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你所受的一部分伤害会转移给该召唤物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Like all religious cloisters, the Cult of Bezeriel invites competition between its believers, but they may hold the most perverse incarnation of this phenomenon. The Shepherds speak in demeaning terms to their parish, comparing them unfavorably to those who make the ultimate sacrifice: the Immortal Maws. They used to be men, believers who once aspired to the priesthood. The process to change into an Immortal Maw kills most who attempt it, and yet they are honoured as their death brings vigor to the cult.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 像所有宗教修道院一样， “贝济瑞尔教派”也吸引了信徒之间的竞争，但他们可能持有这种现象的最不正常的化身。牧羊人对他们的教区用贬义的话语，将它们与做出最终牺牲的人：不朽的ws子进行比较。他们曾经是男人，曾经渴望成为圣职的信徒。变身为不朽花胶的过程会杀死大多数尝试这样做的人，但由于他们的死给邪教带来了生机，因此他们感到荣幸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Toxic damage to Shadow damage.\n\nSummon becomes a melee warrior that has a leaping attack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础毒素伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n召唤物变为一个拥有跳斩的近战战士。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Moros attempted to lull Bezeriel into an eternal sleep, he and all his faithful were condemned to act as the Primordial of Doom's warden. Moros' devotees march, corraling the Immortal Maws into place.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当摩洛斯试图使贝泽瑞尔陷入永恒的睡眠时，他和他所有的信徒被判处充当毁灭之源的看守人。摩洛斯的奉献者们行进着，将不朽巨口驱赶到位。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts summons' base Toxic damage to Lightning damage.\n\nSummon becomes a mage that can cast a protective shield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物的基础毒素伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n\n召唤物变为一个可以施放防护罩的法师。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The flair of justice still runs through Beelmalik, even in his Fallen state. His faithful Punishers hunt the cultists of Bezeriel, paying special attention to the Immortal Maws who stand as the cult’s greatest achievement, and its most repugnant crime. They lash at their backs with lightning. For those that fall, it is a mercy. Those that live will become an everlasting example in their hands.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 正义的天分仍然贯穿着Beelmalik，即使他处于堕落状态。他忠实地追捕Bezeriel的信徒，他特别注意不朽的花ws，他们是信徒的最大成就和最令人反感的罪行。他们用闪电向后猛冲。对于那些跌倒的人，这是一种怜悯。对于那些过着某种外表生活的人来说，这是他们能力的根本改变。
召唤物会造成更多仇恨。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon gains an increased chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提升召唤物对敌人施加异常状态的几率。
提高召唤物的攻击速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to Frenzy enemies in an area of effect around the summon when they are summoned.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物被召唤时有几率使身边一定范围内的敌人狂乱。
提高召唤物的移动速度。
提高召唤物的攻击速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon generates more Threat.\n\nIncreases health for summon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤物会造成更多仇恨。\n\n增加召唤物的生命值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The skill's vortex pulls in enemies multiple times.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 漩涡可以多次牵引敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The vortex left behind by Anulai-Tai’s exit was so strong that those who resisted its pull saw the blood drain out through their skin, helplessly inhaled by the eye of the storm. The raw magic contained in the water and soil crystallized towards the surface before being ripped from the earth. In abandoning time, Anulai-Tai had forced those left behind to confront it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Anulai-Tai出口留下的涡流是如此之强，以至于那些抵制拉动的人看到血液从皮肤流失，无助地被眼睛吸入。风暴。水和土壤中所含的原始魔物在被从地球上撕下之前，先向表面结晶。在废弃的时间里，阿努拉伊·泰（Anulai-Tai）迫使留守者与之抗衡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases the area of effect of the damaging vortex.
Increases movement speed while you are inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 为AOE范围内的玩家提供移速增幅。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Projectiles are destroyed by the area of effect.\n\nIncreases skill cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 摧毁进入AOE范围内的投射物。\n\n延长技能冷却。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies are damaged when they are pulled in by the vortex.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人被漩涡牵引时会受到伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Skill allows the casting of two vortexes.
Increases Ailment damage to enemies inside the vortex.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高对漩涡内敌人的异常状态伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Globes pulled into the damaging vortex explode.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 被拉入漩涡伤害区的生命球会爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The hole in the Aether's weave has to this day peculiar effects on the weather, with the movements of time causing sudden shifts in the atmosphere and tidal alterations. Vorticial thunderstorms spell certain death for sailors, and have contributed to the Sea of Torment’s reputation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 直到今天，以太织法中的孔对天气都有特殊的影响，时间的移动会引起大气的突然变化和潮汐变化。 狂风雷暴意味着水手必死，并为折磨之海的声誉做出了贡献。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Vortex explodes if the skill is re-cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 再次施放技能会引爆漩涡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Aether damage to Lightning damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础以太伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anulai-Tai emerged from the First Movement of Creation. He weaved an intricate tapestry from the aether, organising it into time. As the threads of that weave tied into his body, Anulai-Tai suffered from its inexorable motion. Warped by his suffering, he came to tear himself from the strings, digging and digging until at last, he had found his way out. The opening he left behind pulsed like a beating heart, dragging all things into itself like a hungry maw.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿努莱-泰在造物启元中应运而生。他用以太编织出繁复的纱幔，形成了时间。但由于那些嵌入他的身体时间之弦不可阻挡的运动，阿努莱-泰每一刻都在遭受折磨。在这等痛苦的扭曲之下，他开始任由自己被弦线撕裂，在时间之纱上不断深挖直至穷尽，而后他找到了解脱的方法。他留下的破口像跳动的心脏一般脉动，像一张饥渴的血盆大口，将一切拖入其中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage inflicted by Ailments to enemies inside the vortex.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高异常状态对漩涡内敌人造成的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows skill to be cast to the location of the cursor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许技能被施放到光标位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to summon monsters as allies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 几率召唤一只怪物作为盟友。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Cult of Doom holds thousands of prisoners agonizing in pestilence within their dungeons. They’re technically alive, but their flesh can be coaxed into the transformations of death. Within minutes, the human body can double in size as its tissues collapse and release toxins. The flesh swells, releasing a burst of necrotic energy at breaking point. The resulting creatures are at the cult's disposal, ready to be unleashed for their dark purposes.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 毁灭邪教的地牢中关押着成千上万饱受瘟疫摧残的囚犯。严格来说，他们还活着，但他们的肉体可能会被诱导成死亡的化身。他们的人体组织可以在几分钟内崩溃并释放毒素，从而使其体积膨胀一倍。肿胀肉体的破裂点释放出一股坏死的能量。这些由邪教支配的可怕生物，随时可以为了他们黑暗的目的被释放。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a poisonous cloud when an enemy or friendly summon dies, dealing damage over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人或召唤物死亡时会留下一片毒云，造成持续伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies for allies inside explosion's area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能范围内的盟友增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance for explosion to Frenzy enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能有几率使敌人狂乱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summoned allies explode upon cast if they are inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放技能会使aoe范围内的召唤物爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases explosion damage for each Ailment stack a monster has.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 怪物身上的每层异常状态都会提高爆炸的伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage done by summoned allies when they explode.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加被召唤的盟友在爆炸时造成的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance for explosions to drop a health globe.\n\nReduces damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 爆炸有几率掉落生命球。\n\n降低伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While the practices of the Cult of Doom are horrifying, they are not usually bombastic. The Hierarch of Infestation is an enthusiast of all protracted suffering and slow decay. He feeds and feeds and feeds the beast-Fallen Bezeriel, who exudes energies both poisonous and healing in return.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管《厄运》的习俗令人恐惧，但通常并不夸张。侵扰等级是所有持久痛苦和缓慢衰落的狂热者。他喂食和喂食并喂食野兽法伦·贝泽里尔（Fallen Bezeriel），后者散发出能量，既有毒又有治愈作用。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Toxic damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础毒素伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While Bezeriel has direct control over the process of decomposition, his cults have to contend with worshipping a dead god and the limits of his reach. There are more prosaic ways of weaponizing the human body. If one places a mine underneath the bodies of the dead, some dutiful comrade or bereaved relative is certain to come collecting.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管Bezeriel对分解过程具有直接控制权，但他的邪教必须与敬拜死神和他的能力极限作斗争。还有更多平淡无奇的武器化人体方法。如果有人在死者的尸体下面放一枚地雷，肯定会有一些尽职的战友或丧亲的亲戚来收集。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Area of effect increases over time.
Increases movement speed for the area of effect.
Area of effect leaves a trail that damages enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 会在AOE经过的路径上留下一道伤害性尾迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Area of effect becomes static when cast. Can be re-cast to change its location.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 技能AOE不再能移动，但可以重新施放在其他位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Abanazaar caught up to Anathëa and tried to plead his case. After all, had fire not spread where her light had dried the land? Was she not able of scorching, burning, and destroying as he was? She recognized the inclination towards fire within her yet turned him away, for she regretted such destructive impulses within herself. In such things did Moros balance her, in a way that Abanazaar could not
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Abanazaar赶上了Anathëa，并试图为他的案件辩护。毕竟，火没有散布在她干燥土地的地方吗？她难道不像他以前那样焦灼，燃烧和破坏吗？她意识到自己内心对火的倾向，但拒绝了他，因为她对自己内心的这种破坏性冲动感到遗憾。这样，莫罗斯就平衡了她，使阿巴娜萨尔（Abanazaar）无法做到

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a buff to all resistances for yourself and allies inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 授予自己和技能效果范围内的盟友全抗性buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Damage dealt by the area of effect increases over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该技能aoe造成的伤害持续增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Creates a nova when dealing critical damage. Effect has a cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成暴击时产生一个新星。此效果存在冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Area of effect deals damage instantly when the player is hit by an enemy. Effect has a cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你被敌人击中时，技能AOE立即造成伤害。此效果存在冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After impressing Abanazaar with the full power of the sun, Anathëa walked away from him, a beam emanating from her in all directions. As he followed, their march was reflected on the earth below: wheat rising green and plentiful before it ran dry, then catching fire in the dry winds of summer.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿纳莎（Anathëa）在太阳的全力下给阿巴扎扎尔留下了深刻的印象，然后从他走开，四面八方的光束从她身上散发出来。当他跟随时，他们的行进被反射在下面的地球上：小麦在变干之前变得绿色且丰满，然后在夏天的干燥风中着火。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Sacred damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础神圣伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: From the first moments of his existence, Abanazaar was enraptured with the sun and knew he had to possess it. For this purpose, he approached Anathëa as the sun was setting, when she was closest to Earth. The Primordial of Dawn rebutted his vows of love kindly, but no gentle manner could dissuade him from approaching. Refusing to be cornered, she unleashed the full power of the sun on him.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 从阿巴纳扎尔（Abanazaar）诞生的第一刻起，他就被太阳迷住了，并且知道他必须拥有它。为此，当太阳落山时，他走近了Anathëa，当时她离地球最近。黎明的原始报复了他的爱的誓言，但是任何柔和的态度都不能阻止他接近。她拒绝陷入困境，向他释放了阳光的全部力量。 上下文请求

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The projectile inflicts Stun on enemies. Increases cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物眩晕敌人。增加冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While Ezaneal had many ideas for explosive weapons, his master blacksmith Hephaäron urged him to follow more conventional alleys. Moros, Primordial of Dusk, saw Ezaneal’s frustration. Believing Ezaneal wanted to protect creation with his designs, he privately expressed his support to him. He encouraged him to build new contraptions to protect Wolcen. This was the kindest word Ezaneal had heard in all his apprenticeship, so he came back to Moros with a gift: a bomb that would smother Moros’ opponents in darkness, neutralizing them without harm.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虽然Ezaneal对爆炸性武器有许多想法，但他的铁匠铁匠Hephaäron敦促他遵循更常规的巷道。黄昏原始人莫罗斯（Moros）看到了Ezaneal的沮丧。相信Ezaneal希望用自己的设计保护创作，他私下表示支持。他鼓励他建立新的装置来保护Wolcen。这是Ezaneal在所有学徒生涯中听到的最仁慈的话，所以他带着礼物回到了莫洛斯：炸弹会在黑暗中窒息莫洛斯的对手，并消灭他们而不会造成伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a decoy that generates Threat.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 留下一个产生仇恨的诱饵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Spawns a ghost ally that hits an enemy after they are hit by the projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物击中敌人后会生成一个幽灵，它会攻击一名敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dropped projectiles become mines that explode when enemies go near them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物变为地雷，敌人靠近时爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Rage for each enemy hit by the projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物每击中一个敌人都会给予你怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Begins Force Shield regeneration if an enemy is hit by a projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一旦有敌人被投射物击中，护盾立即开始回复。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Realizing that Moros had protected his master, Ezaneal lost all good will towards him. The gift he had given, he decided to twist and deform. The smoke that came from within the two shells would act as a poison wherever Moros cast it, showing him to be a cruel murderer to all of mortal men.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 意识到莫罗斯（Moros）保护了他的主人，埃扎纳（Ezaneal）失去了对他的一切善意。他送给他的礼物决定扭曲和变形。无论莫罗斯把它放到哪里，从两层炮弹中冒出的烟雾都会充当毒药，向所有凡人展示他是一个残酷的杀人犯。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bomb leaves a damaging area of effect instead of inflicting a slowing effect
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 炸弹会留下一个伤害AOE，而不再减速。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As Ezaneal flourished from this new encouragement, he built crueller and crueller machines. Moros feared that Ezaneal took pleasure in building the machines of war and tried to bolster him down more peaceful lanes, yet day after day, Ezaneal’s spite towards his master grew. It came to a breaking point: Ezaneal cast two moons towards Hephaäron’s workshop, aiming to supplant his master. Moros knew he must intervene. He threw the black shells to confuse the satellites’ trajectory, causing them to collide and saving Hephaäron from Ezaneal.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 随着Ezaneal在这项新的鼓励措施中蓬勃发展，他制造了油轮机和油轮机。莫罗斯（Moros）担心埃扎纳尔（Ezaneal）乐于建造战争机器，并试图使他走上更加和平的道路，然而，日复一日，埃扎纳尔（Ezaneal）对他的主人的恶心在增加。事情到了断点：埃扎纳尔向赫法隆的工作室投掷了两个卫星，目的是取代他的主人。莫罗斯知道他必须干预。他投掷了黑色的炮弹，以混淆卫星的轨迹，使它们发生碰撞，并从Ezaneal拯救了赫法隆。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed if an enemy is hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有敌人被击中则提高你的移动速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Knocks back enemies in the opposite direction to the dash.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将敌人向冲刺的反方向击退。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Toxic damage instead of Shadow damage.\n\nInflicts an additional stack when inflicting Poison.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害不再转化为暗影伤害，而是转化为毒素伤害。\n\n造成中毒时额外叠加一层。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When the friendship between Ezaneal and Moros fell apart, the Primordial of Brilliance chose to twist the gift he'd given his former confidante. The bombshells he'd given him, to evade danger with smoke without causing harm, would now be a crueller instrument. The smoke that came from within the two shells would act as a poison wherever Moros cast it, showing him to be a cruel murderer to all of mortal men.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当Ezaneal和Moros之间的友谊破裂时，“华晨原始人”选择扭曲他送给前红颜知己的礼物。他给他的重磅炸弹在不造成伤害的情况下逃脱了烟雾的危险，现在将成为一种打击手段。无论莫罗斯把它放到哪里，从两层炮弹中冒出的烟雾都会充当毒药，向所有凡人展示他是一个残酷的杀人犯。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage if shot is released immediately after reaching a charge level.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如果狙击在达到一个蓄力等级的瞬间释放，则给予伤害加成。
授予一个额外蓄力等级。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Greatly increases damage, but can only fire when charged to maximum level.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得巨额伤害加成，但只能蓄满力才能开火。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hephaäron’s temper was already roused by Ezaneal’s past behaviour, and his victory in the hunt was the final insult. He attempted to destroy the Bio-Optical Targeting Interface, Ezaneal just barely escaping with it. He sought the help of Etheliel, Lady of Vanity. She saw the beauty in his construction, how precise and quiet its shots were, how the bodies left behind were peaceful and hardly altered at all. She granted Ezaneal’s request and preserved the "Deathgazer" within her eternal ice.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Ezaneal过去的举动已经激怒了Hephaäron的脾气，他在狩猎中的胜利是最后的侮辱。他试图摧毁生物光学瞄准界面，而Ezaneal几乎没有逃脱。他寻求虚荣夫人埃瑟利尔的帮助。她看到了他建筑中的美丽，镜头的精确度和安静度，留下的身体如何平和，几乎没有变化。她同意了Ezaneal的要求，并将“亡灵者”保存在她永恒的冰中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Rage if fired at first charge level.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如果在第一蓄力等级开火会获得怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves a trail in the path of the sniper shot if shot at the smallest shape.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如果在范围最窄时开火，则会在狙击的弹道上留下一道能造成伤害的轨迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases stamina regeneration while charging shot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 蓄力狙击时提高耐力回复。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The area of effect of each charge level expands outward rather than inward.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: AOE范围随每个蓄力等级扩张而不再是收缩。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Ezaneal presented his Bio-Optical Targeting Interface to Hephaäron, he was furious. If Ezaneal wished to continue peacocking, so be it: they would confront his rifle to Hephaäron’s bows, using two champions of equal might from the First Men’s civilizations. The protohumans weren’t able to handle the B-OTI, and so Ezaneal tricked his master by taking the form of his own champion, taking each shot with flawless precision. Hephaäron’s champion was a mere First Man and unable to match Ezaneal even with the first bow, Krearion, on his side.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当Ezaneal向Hephaäron展示他的生物光学靶向界面时，他感到非常愤怒。如果Ezaneal希望继续孔雀开战，那就顺其自然：他们将使用两名来自第一人类文明的同等力量的冠军，将他的步枪对向Hephaäron的弓箭。原始人无法处理B-OTI，因此Ezaneal以自己的冠军的形式欺骗了他的主人，以无懈可击的精确度进行了射击。赫法隆的冠军只不过是“第一人”，即使有第一把弓箭Krearion站在他身旁，也无法与Ezaneal匹敌。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical damage against enemies slowed or in Stasis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对被减速或陷入停滞的敌人，暴击伤害提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance per charge level.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每个蓄力等级提高暴击率。
降低伤害。\n\n提高暴击伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base base Physical damage to Frost damage instead of Lightning damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害不再转化为闪电伤害，而是转化为冰霜伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While Hephaäron ran from one end of Wolcen to the other to distil eruptions, cyclones, and landslides into his works, Ezaneal had all he needed inside his head. While his master was away, he toiled at the creation of a rifle with a barrel of omnistar that allowed the reception of extreme energy levels, and a maintainable trigger that would allow the user to charge its fire into a laser precise beam.  The targeting system was commanded directly through the eye using an interfacing lense.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当赫法隆从沃尔森（Wolcen）的一端跑到另一端，将喷发，旋风和滑坡散布到他的作品中时，埃扎纳（Ezaneal）拥有了脑海中所需的一切。当他的主人不在时，他辛辛苦苦地创造了一支带有全能桶的步枪，可以接收极高的能量水平，并且有一个可维护的扳机，可以使用户将其火力充入激光精确的光束中。 使用接口镜片直接通过眼睛指挥瞄准系统。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: There is an explosion in an area of effect around yourself when the hammer's is recalled.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召回飞锤时在自身周围产生AOE爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When recalled, the hammer creates a damaging area of effect at the point where it was recalled.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召回时飞锤在其被召回处产生一片伤害性AOE。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth and Hephaäron sought to measure their ability in throwing Gaavanir, examined by a jury of other Primordials. Hephaäron made a shorter yet stronger throw, the warhammer crashing into the ground, revealing a chasm full of pure water below the earth. Baäpheth made the longer but weaker throw, creating the winds that ran alongside Gaavanir. The wielders and blacksmiths of the world had an equal claim to Gaavanir.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Baäpheth和Hephaäron试图衡量他们投掷Gaavanir的能力，并由其他原初陪审团进行了审查。赫法隆投掷了一个短而强的箭，战锤撞到了地面，露出了地下纯净水的裂口。拜弗斯（Baäpheth）进行了更长但更弱的投掷，产生了与加瓦尼尔（Gaavanir）并驾齐驱的风。世界的铁匠和铁匠对加万尼尔拥有同等的主张。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hammer pulls enemies toward you along its recall trajectory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 飞锤沿着它被召回的路径将敌人拖向玩家。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Hephaäron denied Baäpheth as Gaavanir's true wielder, the Primordial of Ambition raised a flaming sword over Gaavanir, aiming to break its handle. Hephaäron did not move, or jump to save his creation. The hammer was of Primordial make, and absorbed not only the strength of the blow but the flames of the blade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当赫法隆否认巴菲斯为加万尼尔的真正威武者时，野心原始号在加万尼尔上高举了一把明剑，目的是要打破它的柄。赫法隆没有动弹，也没有跳来保存他的创造物。锤子是原始制造的，不仅吸收了打击的力量，而且吸收了叶片的火焰。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Launch two hammers instead of one.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 发射的飞锤数量从1变为2。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allies along hammer's recall trajectory receive a large boost to a random damage type.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 飞锤召回路径上的盟友获得随机类型的大量额外伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage to enemies along the hammer's recall trajectory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高召回时飞锤造成的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Stun on enemies along hammer's recall trajectory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加飞锤对召回路径上敌人的眩晕几率。
授予一个移动速度增益。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Generates Rage for each enemy hit along hammer's recall trajectory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 飞锤召回路径上每击中一个敌人都会生成怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases critical chance based on block chance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基于格挡率提高暴击率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Force Shield for every enemy hit along the hammer's recall trajectory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 飞锤召回路径上击中每个敌人都会给予你护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical damage to Fire damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n给予伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Once, as Baäpheth returned the warhammer Gaavanir to the Armory of Creation, he noted that the weapons inside responded far better to his hand than to Hephaäron’s. By this logic, he began debating with The Maestre of Industry, forger of all the first weapons, that it was the fighter and not the smith who ought to be called the true wielder of a weapon. Hephaäron opened his palm and Gaavanir flew to it. The debate over the first warhammer began in earnest.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有一次，当Baäpheth将战锤Gaavanir交还给造物厂时，他指出里面的武器对他的手的反应比对Hephaäron的反应要好得多。按照这种逻辑，他开始与工业大师（所有第一款武器都是伪造的）进行辩论，应该将战斗机而不是铁匠当作真正的武器。赫法隆张开手掌，加瓦尼尔飞到了手掌上。关于第一把战锤的辩论开始认真进行。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Casts to the location of the cursor.
The damaging area of effect follows the target.
Allows the ring to be re-cast.
Leeches health from enemies, but increases damage received.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 从敌人身上吸血，增加受到的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases area of effect depending on the number of players inside it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 依据处于其中的玩家数量扩大AOE范围。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance that enemies will explode if they are damaged with less than 10% health.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 伤害生命值低于10%的敌人时，有几率使之爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases attack and spell speed each time an enemy dies within the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当有敌人在AOE范围内死亡，增加攻击、施法速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Moros’ dark power ran through Bezeriel as their grip on each other tightened. Bezeriel sensed that the energy released by his own undoing would turn the tide of the battle, and allowed Moros’ knife to slice his throat. Primordials were not meant to die, and Bezeriel warped into an expanding system of rotting flesh, the strength of this transformation reverberating through his ally Baäpheth.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Moros的黑暗力量贯穿了Bezeriel，因为他们彼此之间的抓紧力越来越强。Bezeriel感觉到，他自己的撤消所释放出的能量将扭转这场战斗的潮流，并允许Moros的刀切开他的喉咙。原始人注定不会死，贝泽里尔（Bezeriel）变成了一个不断扩大的腐烂的肉体体系，这种转变的力量在他的盟友巴菲斯（Baäpheth）的回荡中回荡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases resource generation while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 处于aoe范围内时，资源生成提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to Frenzy enemies in the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有几率使aoe范围内的敌人狂乱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies while inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 站在技能效果范围内时，增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reduces movement speed for enemies inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使处于aoe范围内的敌人移动速度降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When cast, inflicts your missing health as damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放时，造成等同于玩家当前已损失生命值的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When the Primordials waged war against each other, there came a time where Baäpheth and Bezeriel stood between the Armies of Genesis on one flank, and the Primordial of Dusk on the other. The First Men feared Bezeriel’s power over mortality and unleashed all they had on him first. Baäpheth felt a surge of majesty as Bezeriel’s pain echoed through him. Standing tall, he drew his weapon.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当原始人相互之间发动战争时，有一段时期，巴菲特和贝塞列尔站在旁边的创世纪军之间，而黄昏的原始则在后面。另一个。最初的人担心贝泽里尔（Bezeriel）对死亡的控制权，并首先释放了他们对他的一切。当贝塞里尔的痛苦在他身上回荡时，巴菲斯感到ma下。他站着高大，拔出了武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases damage on enemies suffering from damage over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对受持续性伤害影响的敌人造成更多伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases health regeneration for yourself based on how many enemies are damaged inside the area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基于在AOE范围内受到伤害的敌人数量，提高你的生命回复。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Rend damage to Shadow damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Cursed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础撕裂伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n增加造成诅咒的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As Baäpheth marched towards the armies of First Men, radiating pain in his wake, Bezeriel stood alone before Moros. The Primordial of Dusk embedded a dagger into Bezeriel’s body, the two locked into a grapple as Bezeriel began pushing the aches of mortality into Moros’s veins. The suffering emanating from the encounter sent a death ripple through the First Men, causing many to fall dead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当Baäpheth朝着First Men的军队迈进时，他的身后散发着痛苦，贝泽里尔独自站在莫罗斯面前。黄昏的原始军团在匕首的尸体中嵌入了一把匕首，两人陷入了僵局，正当伯哲尼尔开始将死亡之痛推向莫罗斯的血管时。遭遇带来的痛苦在第一人中造成了死亡涟漪，导致许多人丧生。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leaves an area of effect that damages enemies upon landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时留下一片伤害性AOE区域。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Heals self and any allies caught within its area of effect upon landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时治疗其AOE范围内的盟友及自身。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa showed the First Army of Alia how she commanded the dawn’s power, absorbing its rays such that the energy would be cast off during attacks, causing great damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Anathëa向Alia的第一军团展示了她如何掌控黎明的力量，吸收曙光的射线，以使能量在攻击过程中被抛弃，从而造成巨大破坏。
授予一个额外蓄力等级。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The soldiers of Alia were bloody from battling the Urhans when Anathëa descended upon them. Her presence was a balm, animating them with a new life when they had known only horror and combat since their infancy. Her light coaxed wounds into closing, bruises into dissolving, aches into abating.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当Anathëa降落在他们身上时，Alia的士兵们与Urhans作战时是流血的。她的存在是一种香脂，当他们从婴儿期起就只知道恐怖和战斗时，就赋予了他们新的生命。她轻柔地哄着伤口逐渐闭合，瘀伤逐渐融化，疼痛逐渐减弱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Causes an explosion at starting position.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在起始点造成一次爆炸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Inflicts Stun on enemies upon landing.
Inflicts Weakness and Shock on enemies.
Increase to all resistances while charging.
Grants a resistance for each enemy hit upon landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时每击中一个敌人都会给予你一定抗性。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants a temporary Force Shield for each enemy hit upon landing.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 落地时每击中一个敌人都会给予你一个临时护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Willpower for each enemy hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 击中的每个敌人都会给予你魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Sacred damage to Aether damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Stasis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础神圣伤害转化为以太伤害。\n\n增加造成停滞的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa, Dawn Incarnate, moves through the fabric of the universe as all living things do. The difference between her and humankind is that her power is immense enough to deform the weave of aether for a brief moment. As she dived down and landed amongst her enemies with all the force of Dawn, time held its breath.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Anathëa，黎明的化身，就像所有生物一样在宇宙中移动。她和人类之间的区别是，她的力量足够强大，可以在短时间内使以太的编织变形。当她俯冲而下，带着黎明的一切力量降落在敌人之间时，时间屏息了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Skill can knock back enemies, inflicting Stun on them.
Can be cast onto allies, or yourself if no ally is targeted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 可以对盟友施放，如果没有选定盟友则对自身施放。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to inflict Stun on enemies that are attacking.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有几率眩晕攻击你的敌人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants immunity to crowd control.\n\nReduces shield duration.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 授予控制免疫。\n\n缩短持续时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summons a decoy that will generate Threat.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一个能造成仇恨的诱饵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Within the Armory of Creation lives the ideal of each weapon. Each warhammer is one of an infinite number of shadows cast by Gaavanir, each spear a shadow of Ishmir. These arms are placed in the lifeless hands of armours, but those armours too cast a shadow. A pale image of them can be seem at times on old battlefields.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在创造军械库中，每一种武器都是理想之选。每把战锤都是加瓦尼尔所投出的无数阴影中的一种，每把矛都是伊什米尔的阴影。这些手臂放在没有生命的盔甲手中，但是这些盔甲也投下了阴影。在古老的战场上，它们有时显得苍白。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Inflicts a portion of your weapon damage on enemies attacking the shield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对攻击你的敌人造成一定比例的武器伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Generates more Threat on yourself, or an ally if targeted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 让被作为施放目标的盟友或自身产生更多仇恨。
减少受到的来自投射物的伤害。
增加能够吸收的伤害量。\n\n降低移动速度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Maximum absorption is increased by a percentage of your block chance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 最大伤害吸收量提升格挡率的一定百分比。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When cast, Force Shield is emptied and added to maximum absorption.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 施放时，护盾被清空并附加到最大伤害吸收量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The primary method to summon a weapon from the Armory of Creation is smithing. But for those accomplished in the arcane arts, there’s an alternative. If one calls upon the idea of the Shield Itself cast by Gleidhir, a shade of it may appear to temporarily protect the summoner, eventually dispelled by its lack of Physicality.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 从造物库召唤武器的主要方法是锻造。但是对于那些在奥术领域成就卓著的人，还有另一种选择。如果有人呼吁格莱希尔的盾牌本身的盾牌，那么它的阴影似乎可以暂时保护召唤者，最终由于缺乏物理性而被驱散。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\n\nIncreases damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础物理伤害转化火焰伤害。\n\n增加伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Baäpheth bore Gleidhir as he pursued Abanazaar. He raised his shield, and slammed it repeatedly into the face of the Primordial of Fire, flames bursting from the injured entity. Part of Abanazaar’s essence was absorbed by the mighty shield; as blows landed, Gleidhir took the Primordial’s pride and manifested it into a burning aura.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 巴菲斯（Baäpheth）在追求阿巴那扎（Abanazaar）时生了格莱希尔（Gleidhir）。他举起盾牌，反复将其猛撞到火焰之初，受伤的实体上燃起了火焰。Abanazaar的一部分精髓被强大的盾牌吸收；当打击降落时，格莱希尔（Gleidhir）接受了原始的骄傲，并将其表现为燃烧的光环。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Throw shadow cloud to location of the cursor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将暗影烟云扔到光标所在的位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shadow cloud that increases dodge chance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暗影烟云能提高闪避率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shadow cloud area of effect that inflicts Cursed on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暗影烟云的aoe会对敌人造成诅咒。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shadow cloud area of effect, granting invisibility to allies and lowering their Threat generation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 遮罩黑云的效果区域，使盟友隐身并降低他们的仇恨生成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As Moros and Anathëa lead the Army of Genesis through the crags and canyons, Abanazaar fell upon them. As his first flames rained down, Moros dressed the area in darkness so Anathëa could take their command away from the ambush.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当Moros和Anathëa带领创世纪军穿越峭壁和峡谷时，Abanazaar倒在了他们身上。莫洛斯（Moros）的第一缕火焰降下时，他在昏暗的环境中穿衣，使阿纳莎（Anathëa）可以从伏击中夺走指挥权。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases movement speed after dropping a shadow cloud.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 丢出暗影烟云后移动速度提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Shadow cloud breaks any crowd control effects.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暗影烟云能破坏一切控制效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases Shadow damage after dropping a smoke cloud.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 丢出暗影烟云后增加暗影伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Begins Force Shield regeneration when a shadow cloud is dropped.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 丢出暗影烟云时，立即开始恢复护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dropping a shadow cloud clears Ailments.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 丢出暗影烟云能清除身上的异常状态。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dropping a shadow cloud regenerates stamina points.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每次丢出暗影烟云都会回复耐力点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to attack enemies while invisible for a short period.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 允许你攻击敌人时短暂不显形。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Moros and Abanazaar stalked each other through the awful mix of darkness and smoke, neither daring to make a sound. Moros knew the moment he tried to land a hit on the soon-to-become Fallen of Envy, he would lose the focus necessary to stay invisible. Digging into his lifeforce, he gripped onto his cover while rushing toward Abanazaar hoping to end the fight before it even began.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Moros和Abanazaar在黑暗和烟雾的可怕混合中互相跟踪，都不敢发出声音。莫罗斯知道，当他试图在即将成为流行的《堕落的嫉妒》上取得成功时，他将失去保持隐形状态所必需的注意力。挖掘自己的生命力，他紧紧抓住掩护，冲向Abanazaar，希望在战斗开始之前就结束战斗。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Abanazaar, slower but stronger, surrounded Moros with flames hoping to flood the area with such light that his rival would have nowhere to cling to. The Primordial of Dusk seemed at peace, and only asked Abanazaar to forgive him for having Anathëa's love . With a roar, Abanazaar projected a blast of fire onto Moros, maintained for hours. It took him that long to realize that the fire had gone right through Moros, who had flown away into the smoke cause by his rage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿巴那扎，迟钝但强大，他用烈焰包围了摩洛斯，希望用火光淹没那里让他的对手无处可藏。黄昏之源似乎不为所动，还叫阿巴那扎原谅他拥有了安娜蒂亚的爱。伴随着一声巨响，阿巴纳扎向摩洛斯射出一片烈焰，持续了几个小时。他花了很长时间才意识自己没烧到摩洛斯一根毫毛，摩洛斯早已借助他愤怒产生的烟雾遁离。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Eclipse now has a 360 degrees area of effect around yourself.

Though Moros urged Anathëa to run, she remained at his side. As he turned the arrows of the Primordial traitors' Army back against them, she charged those weapons with a smiting glow, and as they lay dying all the sins they had committed were carried to the light and laid bare.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管摩洛斯曾怂恿安娜蒂亚临阵脱逃，她仍然陪伴在他身边。当摩洛斯让叛神军队射来的箭矢调转方向，攻击他们自己，安娜蒂亚则让那些武器发出刺眼的光芒。当他们奄奄一息时，犯下的所有罪行都在这光芒中暴露无遗。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Willpower for each enemy hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 击中的每个敌人都会给予你魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Reflects projectiles instead of destroying them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 反弹本该摧毁的投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The enemy dared at first not to shoot, certain that some trickery of the Primordial of Dusk would do them in. The Army of Genesis was unprepared for battle, and requested their freedom in exchange for the darkness being lifted. Their enemies feigned acceptance, but shot their bows towards the Army of Genesis while they exited a bottleneck exit at the end of the canyon. Moros breathed another wave of shadow: before they knew to stop, their arrows had pierced their own throats.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 敌人起初不敢开枪，确信黄昏的原始骗局会把他们射进去。创世纪军不准备战斗，并且要求他们自由以换取被解除的黑暗。他们的敌人假装接受，但在峡谷尽头退出瓶颈出口时向创世纪军鞠躬。莫罗斯呼吸了另一波阴影：在他们知道要停止之前，他们的箭已经刺入了自己的喉咙。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Health globes caught within the blast will explode.
Increases chance to inflict Ailments on enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加对敌人施加异常状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Grants Force Shield per the number of enemies hit by the blast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每击中一个敌人都会获得护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance to Frenzy enemies hit by the blast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 蔽日击中的敌人有几率狂乱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Converts base Shadow Damage to Sacred Damage.\n\nIncreases chance of inflicting Weakness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 基础暗影伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n\n增加造成虚弱状态的几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The forces of Genesis were trapped in a canyon that hugged the Red Mountain, the forces of Ashtaroth converging on them. Moros pushed the surrounding army back with a guff of black ink, warning the enemy not to advance further if they valued their lives. But as more and more forces appeared, overlooking the nearby cliffs, he could only plunge more and more of the landscape into darkness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 天启大军被困在环绕红山的峡谷中，阿什塔罗斯的军队向他们汇聚。摩洛斯用遮天蔽日的漆黑墨水把周围的军队击退，警告敌人如果他们重视自己的生命就不要再向前推进。但随着越来越多的部队出现，他眺望附近的悬崖，只能用黑暗笼罩更多地方。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Fire damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外火焰伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Lightning damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外闪电伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Lightning damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外闪电伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Shadow damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外暗影伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Frost damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外冰霜伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain an additional %1 of your damage as Shadow damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 获得你伤害 %1 的额外暗影伤害

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increase your Rage Generation on Attacks
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你攻击生成的怒气

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increase your Resistance to all forms of damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你对所有类型伤害的抗性

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increase the likelihood of Health Globes spawning
Increase your Resistance to all forms of damage
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你对所有类型伤害的抗性

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Add %1 Sacred damage to your Attacks

Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 攻击造成额外神圣伤害Buff

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Commanding the battlefield as a beacon of blinding light, the Primordial of Dawn carries the hopes of humanity as she charges into the fallen hordes. With her essence infused into the First Movement of Creation, her believers stand steadfast, smiting all traces of corruption under her holy rays.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明之源像耀眼的灯塔一般指挥着战场，带着人类的希望冲向堕落的众神。随着她的精华被注入造物启元，她的信徒们坚定不移，在她的圣光下清除一切腐朽的痕迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Powerful, purposeful attacks that deal Sacred damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成神圣伤害的强力指向性攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anathëa's power purges the impurity of the Abyss from the mortal plain.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 安娜蒂亚的力量会净化来自凡间的深渊污垢。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Launch yourself into the air and land at your cursor location, dealing Sacred damage around you. This ability consumes Essence of Sanctity to deal increased damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 让自己弹射到空中，而后于光标位置降落，在你周围造成神圣伤害。该技能会消耗神圣精华来提高伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When the sky opens to reveal a radiant dawn, hope returns to the realm of the living.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当灿烂的曙光刺破乌云，希望重回人间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Invoke a wave of holy energy that pulls enemies towards you and deal a vicious hammer blow. Deals Sacred damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一道圣洁的能量波，将敌人拉向你，并给予一记猛烈的锤击。造成神圣伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As followers of the Lady of Dawn congregate in times of strife, so do her enemies. As such they may be smited efficiently and with impunity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明女神的追随者在战乱时期聚集在一起，她的敌人也聚集在一起。于是完全可以有效打击一方而不会误伤另一方。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Launch your hammer into the fray, dealing damage on landing and creating an vortex of purifying light that pulls enemies into its centre. Can be reactivated to create a powerful explosion. This ability deals Sacred damage and generates Essence of Sanctity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将你的战锤抛入战场，在落地时造成伤害，并制造一个会将敌人拉进其中心的净光漩涡。可以重新激活，以制造一次强力爆炸。该技能造成神圣伤害并生成神圣精华。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Searing Song defends humanity in its darkest hour; however divine protection may manifest as a destructive pre-emptive strike.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 灼热之歌在最黑暗的时刻保卫着人类；然而，神圣的守护也可以表现为先发制人的毁灭性打击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a blessed aura around you, damaging enemies and giving allies additional Sacred damage for a short period of time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在你周围召唤一个神圣光环，伤害敌人并在短时间内给予盟友附加神圣伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the last protector of mortal life, Anathëa uses the power of purifying light to preserve humanity and deter otherworldly corruption.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 作为凡人生命最后的保护者，安娜蒂亚用净光之力来保护人类、阻止异界的腐化。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The fabric of the world bends under his will, warping his enemies into cracks in space and time. The divine powers of Anulai-Tai were born from a need to organize chaos, and from that day he was the one to force chaos upon others, contorting the bodies of his opponents with gravitational shifts.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 世界的结构在他的意志下弯曲，扭曲他的敌人使之坠入时空裂隙。阿努莱-泰的神力诞生于组织混沌的需要，从那时起，他就以将混乱强加于其他存在、用引力的转移扭曲对手的身体为乐。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Auto-targeting projectiles that deal Aether damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 自动瞄准的飞弹，造成以太伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Fallen Duke of Infinity uses his Aether to prematurely age and wither those who oppose him.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 堕落的无限公爵阿努莱-泰通过以太使他的反对者衰老乃至枯萎。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Teleport to the location of the cursor, creating a decoy at your original location. Re-casting this skill causes the decoy to explode, dealing Aether damage. If the decoy collides with the projectile of Calamitous Paradox, the projectile will explode.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在光标位置制造一个你的克隆体，它会复制你的技能。重新激活技能你将可以和克隆体交换位置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Through manipulation of the passages of the Aether, Anulai-Tai can enforce his will with a motionless omnipresence.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 通过对以太通道的控制，阿努莱-泰可以一种无所不在的静止执行他的意志。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Launch a projectile of unstable existential energy that pierces enemies, dealing Aether damage. If the skill is reactivated or the projectile collides with your clone, the projectile explodes. This ability consumes Points of Entropy to deal increased damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 发射一枚由不稳定的存在能量构成的的穿透飞弹，造成以太伤害。如果技能被重新激活或投射物与你的克隆体碰撞，则会爆炸。此能力会消耗熵点来造成更多伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The instability of time and space allows for the Aether to be manipulated to wreak havoc by Anulai-Tai and his followers.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 时间和空间的不稳定性允许阿努莱-泰和他的追随者操纵以太来制造浩劫。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While channeling the skill, select targets to eradicate. After selecting a sufficient number of targets, fire out beams made from the fabric of time, dealing Aether damage and generating Points of Entropy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 引导技能时选择要抹杀的目标。选择了足够数量的目标后，发射出由时间线构成的光束，造成以太伤害并产生熵点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As time passes, the world ages and decays. Yet Anulai-Tai waits, anticipating the world's inevitable demise as it shuffles closer.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 随着时间的流逝，世界也在衰老和腐朽。而阿努莱-泰却一直在期待着世界向它不可避免的灭亡一步步靠近。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Tear a hole in time and space and obliterate all enemies in front of you with a huge beam of Aether damage. This skill increases in power and size over time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在时间和空间上撕开一个洞，用一道巨大的以太伤害光束将你面前的所有敌人消灭。技能强度和尺寸随时间增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The ultimate goal of Anulai-Tai is to cease the passage of time, by tearing the Aether to its breaking point, finally granting him respite.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿努莱-泰的终极目标是停止时间的流逝，把以太撕成碎片，最终使他得以休息。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Aberrant burgeons over all available earth, tendrils of skin and flesh blooming to assuage an all-consuming desire. His followers are endless, for in accepting Ashtaroth, their bodies become limitless weapons of bone and tendon. They lie in wait, preparing to assimilate the world in their image.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 畸变者蔓延到地球上的每一个角落，筋皮血肉构成的卷须争奇斗艳，想要满足吞噬一切的欲望。他的追随者无穷无尽，因为在接受阿什塔罗特的那一刻，他们的身体就会变成筋与骨的无限武器。他们埋伏着，准备以他们的形象同化世界。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Quick, wide boneblade slashes that deal Rend damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成撕裂伤害的宽刃骨刀快斩。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Mutation in the name of strength is one of Ashtaroth's primary visions.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以力量为名的突变是阿什塔罗特的主要异象之一。
