Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dash through the bodies of your enemies, dealing Rend damage to those you pass through.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冲刺穿过敌人的身体，对你穿透的敌人造成撕裂伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ashtaroth dreams of a world covered in flesh; a pulsing, integrated legion of all life, respiring in harmony.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿什塔罗特梦想着一个由血肉覆盖的世界；一个搏动着的，由所有生命有机统一而成的军团，同步地呼吸。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Leap backwards and launch a projectile in a cone in front of you, dealing Rend damage. Each kill made with this Aspect generates Aspects of Blood. Each Aspect of Blood consumed increases the damage of the skill and the number of projectiles launched by 1, up to a maximum of 5.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向后跳跃并向前方的锥形区域发射一枚投射物，造成撕裂伤害。此法相造成的每一次击杀都会产生血之相。消耗的每个血之相都会提高技能的伤害并使发射的投射物数量+1，最多+5。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Those killed by Ashtaroth and his followers do not truly die. Their flesh is assimilated and repurposed, souls trapped in corpulent amalgamation.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 那些被阿什塔罗特和他的追随者杀害的人并没有真正死亡。他们的肉体被吸收和改造，灵魂被困在肿胀的混合体中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Launch into a series of extremely high-speed attacks in an area around your character, dealing Rend damage to all enemies inside it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向你周围的区域发起一系列超高速攻击，对身处其中的所有敌人造成撕裂伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Red Mountain of Ashtaroth was the seat of his reign over organic matter, an oozing, pulsating example of the power of flesh.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿什塔罗特的红山是他统治有机物质的宝座，不断地渗血、搏动，是血肉之力的典范。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attack a single target by temporarily separating your being into 3 parts, ravaging them with Rend damage from all sides. This ability can be charged for increased damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将自己临时分裂成3部分，从四面八方攻击单一目标，用撕裂伤害将其毁灭。此技能可以蓄力来提高伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Individual strength is not a concern to Ashtaroth; the power of an organism lies in cooperation, not the unique merits of its components.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 个体的力量与阿什塔罗特无关；有机体的力量在于合作，而不是其组成部分的独特优点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Many of the Fallen indulge in the joys of destruction, but Baäpheth aims for something higher: strategy combined with skill in the service of absolute conquest. He splits the battlefield in twain with the flames of war, dispatching enemies in large swaths. All who stand in the way must fall before his violent ambitions.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 许多堕落者沉迷于毁灭的喜悦中，但拜费特有着更高的目标：结合战术和技巧进行绝对的征服。他用战争之火分割战场，让敌人支离破碎。在他的野心面前，挡者披靡。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attacks with increased range that deal Fire damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 射程加长的火焰伤害攻击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As a war effort gains momentum, so too does Baäpheth's cruel ambition.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 随着战争越演越烈，拜费特的残酷野心也越来越大。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Charge furiously towards the cursor location, dealing Fire damage in your wake. On arrival, deal damage around you in an explosion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 向光标的位置狂暴冲锋，沿路造成火焰伤害。到达时造成一场爆炸，对你周围造成伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Existence is a war unto itself; the spirit of Baäpheth can possess even the most feeble creature as their life hangs in the balance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 生存本身就是一场战争；拜费特的灵魂甚至可以在最虚弱的生物生命危在旦夕的时候附身。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Slam the ground in a cone in front of you, dealing Fire damage. Each use of this skill generates a stack of Frenzy. The casting time of this skill is reduced with stacks of Frenzy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 猛击你前面的地面，在锥形区域内造成火焰伤害。每次使用此技能都会产生一层狂暴。狂暴层数可以缩短此技能的吟唱时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In his quest for conquest, Baäpheth will stop at nothing to succeed, eradicating anything that gets in his way.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在对征服的追求中，拜费特为了成功不择手段，不惜消灭妨碍他的一切。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summon a powerful pillar of flame that deals Fire damage over time. This skill consumes all current stacks of Frenzy to deal increased damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 召唤一道强大的火焰柱，持续造成火焰伤害。此技能会消耗掉全部当前狂怒层数来造成更高的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: War inevitably brings destruction. For Baäpheth, there is no collateral damage, only reinforced dominance.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 战争会不可避免地带来破坏。但拜费特眼里，没有殃及无辜，只有稳固统治。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Unleash a blade of flame, dealing Fire damage in a long line. This skill can be charged; each stage increases damage and area of effect.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 释放一把火焰之刃，在一条长线上造成火焰伤害。此技能可以蓄力；每个蓄力级别都会给予伤害加成和作用范围。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the First Warrior, Baäpheth understands the true value of patience; strength is worthless if one knows not when to strike.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 作为第一战士，拜费特理解耐心的真正价值。如果不知道攻击的时机，力量将一文不值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Damage dealt after the delay is increased by %3

Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每个“尘世悖论”点数%1攻击速度值

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Stormfall Palace has long been the home of Stormfall’s leaders. It is where the city’s council meet in order to table their concerns regarding Stormfall’s current state of affairs and to debate the merits of new initiatives before they are authorised by the head of state.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">暴风港宫殿一直以来是暴风港领袖的居所。城邦议会在此召开，议员们就暴风港现状相关事务发起探讨，并就新举措的价值进行辩论，而后交予城邦元首批准。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">The Seekers have been around since Stormfall’s inception. As an organisation, they are devoted to exploring Wolcen’s wilderness and uncovering its hidden treasures. The garrison ensures that Seekers are at the peak of their physical conditioning, and trains them in the traversal of dangerous terrain.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">探索者从暴风港建立之初就驻扎在附近。他们作为一支成建制的军队，致力于探索Wolcen世界的荒野，并揭露其中隐藏的珍宝。守备军会确保探索者处于身体状态的巅峰，并训练他们穿越危险的地形。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">The Trade Assembly serves as the main hub for distributing Stormfall’s exports and handling any diplomacy on the city's behalf. The Assembly’s caravans once traveled to the farthest corners of the continent, and if they could so again, they would help usher in a new age of prosperity for Stormfall.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">商贸协会是负责暴风港出口分销和代表城邦利益处理外交事务的核心机构。协会的商队曾经穿越到大陆最遥远的角落，如果他们能重现当年的辉煌，将有助于引领暴风港进入繁荣的新时代。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">The Dark Market is the perfect place for finding the most sought after equipment and materials in Wolcen, things that are not usually sold by the usual stock of merchants. Mohabi has cultivated relationships with the market’s members and is willing to curate equipment and materials on your behalf.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">在黑市，你能寻找到整个Wolcen世界最受追捧的装备和材料，那都是些普通商人通常不可能贩卖的东西。莫哈比与黑市成员建立了良好的关系，并愿意从你的利益出发为你代购装备和材料。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Demetra has perfected a technique that allows her to alter the shape and properties of any items or equipment. She has designed a forge tailored specifically to this task. She welcomes you to throw any unused equipment in the forge in the hopes that it may return something more attuned to your skill-set.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">迭梅塔完善的这项技术可以让她改变任何物品或装备的外形和属性。她为此还设计定制了一个专用熔炉。她很欢迎你把任何用不上的装备扔进熔炉，以期它能出炉一些更符合你路数的东西。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">The Diamond Bank serves as a replacement to Stormfall’s Central Bank, destroyed during the undead rising. A vault within has been designed for your own personal use.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">暴风港的中央银行在亡灵复生事件期间遭到摧毁后，钻石银行暂代其责。其中一个保险库就专门用来保护你装备的安全，这样你冒险时就可以轻装上阵了。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">After the discovery of Anankis, an ill-fated team was established to explore the Primordial megastructure. They returned a number of weeks later, survivors carrying a shrouded artifact. The nobles decided to bury it, afraid of the power humming from its surface...</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">阿南基斯被发现之后，一支不成熟的团队被派去探索这座原初奇观。几周后，幸存者们带回来一件报废的遗物。由于害怕那股令它表面发出蜂鸣声的力量，贵族们决定埋葬它...</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Demetra’s research into enneracts has led her to understand them on a microscopic level. With the equipment in her new laboratory, Demetra now has the tools at her disposal to duplicate enneracts.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">迭梅塔对超维之石的研究已经进入微观层面。有了新实验室的这些设备，迭梅塔现在就有了复制超维之石的趁手工具了。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Demetra has a keen interest in the magical energies of Wolcen. Since meeting you, she has looked into ways of siphoning these energies from their sources. She has now mastered the process with her Siphon Chamber, and she is willing to trade gold for any surplus energy you may have.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color =“＃E5D8B6”>迭梅塔对Wolcen世界具有魔力的能量有着浓厚的兴趣。自从认识你以来，她一直在研究如何从能量源中吸取这些能量。现在有了虹吸室的她已经能掌控这一过程，只要你有盈余的能量，她就愿意用金钱交换。 </font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Demetra’s Energy Instillator serves the opposite purpose of her Siphon Chamber. Rather than extract magical energy, this device allows her to transfer energy from her stores into the body of a host. She is not incredibly keen on parting with it, but given your status, she is willing to trade it for gold.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">迭梅塔的充能舱与她的虹吸室作用相反。这个座舱不需要提取魔法能量，而是允许她将储存的能量转移到对象体内。她对此并不热心，但看在你的面子上，她还是愿意用能量换取金钱。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">In the past, the Cartographical Archives have been a symbol of Stormfall’s exploratory spirit. A vast library of maps, explorer’s journals, and tall tales, the Archives were the first port of call for anyone trying to decipher a treasure map or solve a mystery. In its prime, merchants from all over fought over its contents in auctions.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">在过去，制图档案馆是暴风港探索的精神象征，海量的地图馆藏、探险家日记以及一些奇闻异事，这里是任何人破译藏宝图或解开谜团的第一站。在它的黄金时期，各地的商人在拍卖会上为它的馆藏争夺不休。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6"> The Primordial Institute was once home to the best and brightest minds that Stormfall had to offer. With the recent discovery of the Primordial technology in Anankis, the work usually conducted by the Institute seems more pressing than ever. The West Wing has always focused on research into ancient power sources. </font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">暴风港研究所曾是暴风港最优秀、最聪明人才的家园。随着原初科技最近在阿南基斯被发现，研究所承担的工作似乎比以往任何时候都更为紧迫。其中西区一直致力于研究古代能源。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">The Main Exhibition was the Institute’s pride and joy, attracting scientists and researchers from all over the continent. When it was destroyed, many of the prized artifacts on display were ruined beyond recovery. However, with the discovery of Anankis, the Institute should have no shortage of curiosities to display to the public.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">主展区是研究所的心血和骄傲，吸引着全大陆的科学家和研究人员。当它被摧毁的时候，展出的许多珍贵成果都被毁坏得无法复原，然而，随着阿南基斯的发现，该研究所应该不乏向公众展示的珍品。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6"> The Primordial Institute was once home to the best and brightest minds that Stormfall had to offer. With the recent discovery of the Primordial technology in Anankis, the work usually conducted by the Institute seems more pressing than ever. The East Wing has always been devoted to finding and researching ancient mechanisms from all over Wolcen. </font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">暴风港研究所曾是暴风港最优秀、最聪明人才的家园。随着原初科技最近在阿南基斯被发现，研究所承担的工作似乎比以往任何时候都更为紧迫。其中东区一直致力于研究来自全世界的古代机械。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Before it was buried, the Salt Baths were embedded in a rock face looking out to sea. The water for the baths was drawn from the sea, and many citizens believed that its waters held magical, re-vitalizing energy - they still do. </font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">在它被掩埋之前，海盐浴场是在一块面向大海的岩石上掏出来的。浴场中的水抽自海洋，以前有许多市民相信——这水中蕴藏着神奇的、能重振活力的能量——他们至今仍然相信。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">A vast, ornate temple, the Refuge of the Blind once served as a spiritual link between Stormfall and the Blind Monks of Morkaї. A small order of monks used to reside there, providing blessings to the people, blessings said to give the receiver the ability to find more wealth in all of their endeavors.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">盲圣庇护所是一座巨大而华丽的寺庙，它曾是暴风港与摩卡盲僧们的精神纽带。一小批僧侣曾居住在里面，向人们提供祝福，据说这种祝福能使受赐者的每一分努力都能寻得更多的财富。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">Stormfall’s Shipyard has been the birthplace of some of the greatest ships to ever have graced the open seas. Before it ran into a state of disrepair, foreign dignitaries would visit and watch the shipwrights, marveling at the focus and precision of their work.</font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: <font color="#E5D8B6">不少在公海上赫赫有名的船只都诞生于暴风港船坞。在它陷入废弃状态之前，外国政要会来到这里拜访船舶建造者，对他们工作的专注和工序的精密惊叹不已。</font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Renovations on the Cartographical Archives are ready to begin. What is left of the documents in the Archive’s wreckage will need to be recovered and handled delicately if they are to be restored to their places in the Archives. Should the restoration efforts be successful, Stormfall’s merchants are sure to clamor for some arrangement that allows them some level of access to its resources. Outcomes:

Buying prices at merchants will be permanently decreased. Selling prices at merchants will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
制图档案馆的重建工作已准备就绪。如果想要档案馆残骸中剩下的文件被恢复到档案馆中原本的位置，就需要重新找到它们并妥善处理。如果修复工作取得成功，暴风港的商人们肯定会嚷嚷着想要获得一定等级的访问许可。 效果：

在商家购买物品的价格将永久降低。 在商家出售物品的价格将永久提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovation efforts were a success, and the Cartographical Archives have been restored to their former glory. Hearing news of its renovations, merchants from across the continent have been begging for access, even lowering the prices of their goods in the hopes that Stormfall will grant them access.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 重建工作取得了成功，制图档案馆重现了当年的辉煌。打听到制图档案馆已经重建的消息，来自大陆各地的商人纷纷乞求获得准入许可，甚至愿意为此降低商品价格。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Archives have been restored, decreasing buying prices and increasing selling prices.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 档案馆已被修复，在商人处购买物品的价格降低、出售物品的价格提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Renovations are ready to be carried out on the West Wing of the Institute. Aside from the rebuilding efforts, a number of Stormfall’s scientists are eager to begin studying anything found in the depths of Anankis. To this end, they implore you to send another expedition into Anankis to provide them with new ancient power sources to study. After all, what use are a bunch of scientists with nothing to look at? Outcomes:

A 5th Skill Slot will be unlocked.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
对研究所西区的重建工作已经准备就绪。除了重建工作外，一批暴风港科学家迫不及待地想开始研究在阿南基斯深处发现的一切。为此，他们恳求你派再派一支探险队进入阿南基斯，为他们提供新的古代能源来研究。毕竟，什么都不研究，还要科学家干嘛？ 效果：

解锁第五个技能槽。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovations have been completed on the West Wing of the Primordial Institute. The expedition into Anankis was able to find plenty of Primordial power sources for the scientists to pour their minds over. There was something else as well, a metal tablet, symbols inscribed over its surface. No one knew what those symbols meant, or had the means of deciphering them... But you, did you remember seeing such a thing before? When you looked at it for yourself, you felt the tablet's meaning reach out to you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴风港研究所西区已重建完成。前往阿南基斯的探险队找到了大量可以让科学家们倾注心血的原初能源。以及别的东西：一块刻有符号的金属板。没人知道这些符号的含义，也没有办法破译它们... 但是你却... 你是不是以前见过类似的东西？当你独自看着它的时候，你感觉金属板上符号的含义不言自明。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The right piece of the Tablet makes your Primordial connection stronger (5th Skill Slot unlocked)
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 金属板的右半部分使你的原初之链更加牢固（第五技能槽已解锁）

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Renovations are ready to be carried out on the Institute’s main building, the old home for its largest exhibition. For your scientists, it is really important that the main building be a testament to the Institute's prestige as a research institution. To that end, they recommend a prolonged expedition into Anankis, with the goal of uncovering the most beautiful and mesmerising examples of Primordial technology for the Insitute's Exhibition Hall. Outcomes:

Your Primordial Essence meter will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
对研究所主馆区的重建已经准备就绪，这里曾是研究所最大展览馆的旧址。对你的科学家们来说，主馆区是研究所作为研究机构声望的证明。为此，他们建议以阿南基斯为主题开办长期展览，让研究所的展厅揭示原初科技最美丽迷人的样本。 效果：

永久增加你的原初精华容量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovations on the Institute’s Main Exhibition have been completed. The expedition into Anankis was able to find plenty of interesting Primordial artifacts to display in the Main Exhibition Hall. There found something else: a metal tablet, symbols inscribed over its surface. No one knew what they meant, or had the means of deciphering them... But you, did you remember seeing such a thing before? It was a marvel to behold, and when your eyes dwelt on its symbols, a wave of energy swelled in your mind and body, and you had the sense that your Ascended ancestors were by your side, imbuing you with their strength.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 研究所主馆区已重建完成。前往阿南基斯的探险队找到了大量可以让科学家们倾注心血的原初能源。以及别的东西：一块刻有符号的金属板。没人知道这些符号的含义，也没有办法破译它们... 但是你却，你记得自己以前见过这样的东西吗？这简直是个奇迹，当你的双眼注视这些符号时，一股能量之潮从你的心灵和肉体中涌起，你产生了一种你的升格者先祖们围在你身边向你灌输力量的感觉。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The completed Tablet strengthens your Ascended powers. (Permanent increase to Primordial Essence)
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 完整的金属板强化了你的升格之力。（原初精华永久增加）

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Renovations are ready to be carried out on the East Wing of the Institute. Aside from the rebuilding efforts, a number of Stormfall’s scientists are eager to begin studying anything found in the depths of Anankis. To this end, they implore you to send another expedition into Anankis to provide them with new ancient machinery to study. Without this influx of new artifacts to study, the scientists fear that the new Institute will lose all credibility. Outcomes:

You will receive +1 Passive Skill Point.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
对研究所东区的重建工作已经准备就绪。除了重建工作外，一批暴风港科学家迫不及待地想开始研究在阿南基斯深处发现的一切。为此，他们恳求你派再派一支探险队进入阿南基斯，为他们提供新的古代机械来研究。科学家们担心，如果没有这些新遗物的涌入，新研究所将完全失去公信力。 效果：

天赋点 +1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovation work on the East Wing of the Primordial Institute has been completed. The expedition into Anankis was able to find all manner of Primordial mechanisms to examine in their laboratories. The expedition also returned with a metal tablet with symbols carved onto its surface. No one knew what they meant, or had the means of deciphering them... But you seemed to remember seeing something similar before. When your eyes first looked over the new tablet, you felt the symbols on its surface reverberate through your being, filling you with a newfound sense of strength.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴风港研究所东区已重建完成。前往阿南基斯的探险队找到了大量可以让科学家们倾注心血的原初能源。以及别的东西：一块刻有符号的金属板。没人知道这些符号的含义，也没有办法破译它们... 但是你却，你记得自己以前见过这样的东西吗？当你的眼睛第一次看到这块新金属板，你感觉镌刻在它表面上的文字在你的身体里回荡，让你感觉浑身都迸发出新的力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The left piece of the Tablet has given you renewed strength (+1 Passive Skill Slot)
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 金属板的左半部分赋予你新的力量（天赋点 +1）

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Excavation work is ready to begin on the Salt Baths. Debris will need to be removed from the various cave-ins that have buried the interior. Once complete, the baths themselves will be renovated, allowing the waters of Stromfall’s coast to re-vitalize you and your citizens once more .Renovate The Salt Baths of Stormfall. Outcomes:

You will receive a permanent Magic-Find boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
海盐浴场的挖掘工作已经准备就绪。这项工作需要从掩埋浴场的各种塌方中清理出碎片。一旦完成，浴场就能重新投入使用，让暴风港沿岸的海水能再次使你和你的市民充满活力。 重建暴风港海盐浴场。 效果：

你将获得永久的掉宝率提升。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Water from the sea flows once more into the Salt Baths of Stormfall, enticing thousands of citizens to visit on any given day. You went yourself, and after bathing in its waters for a few hours, you left feeling inspired, more sensitive to the magic of the world.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 海水又一次流入暴风港的海盐浴场，每一个开放日都吸引能成千上万市民造访。你自己也去了，在它的水里沐浴了几个小时，离开时感觉受到了启发，对魔法物品的感应更加敏锐。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Salt Baths have been renovated, giving you a permanent Magic-Find boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 海盐浴场已经翻新，永久地提升了你的掉宝率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Preparations have been made for the renovation of the Refuge for the Blind. Once it has been rebuilt, the link between Stormfall and the Blind Monks of Morkaї will be restored, giving the public, and you, access to their blessings. Renovate the Refuge for the Blind. Outcomes:

You will receive a permanent Gold-Find boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
盲圣庇护所的修缮工作已经准备就绪。一旦重建完成，暴风雪和摩卡盲僧之间的联系将会恢复，让你和公众都能获得他们的祝福。 为盲僧重建庇护所。 效果：

永久提升掉金率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Refuge For The Blind has been successfully renovated. Representatives from the Blind Monks of Morkaї have been welcomed back to the city of Stormfall, strengthening the bond between the order and the people who benefit the most from their sacrifice. Thankful for the restoration of their refuge, the monks bestow you with a powerful blessing. When you left the Refuge, gold seemed to just fall into your lap. As you walked the streets, gold would appear on the floor as if from thin air…
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 盲圣庇护所已成功重建。摩卡盲僧的代表们被迎回暴风城，加强了教团与从他们的牺牲中受益最多的人民之间的联系。为了感谢他们庇护所的恢复，僧侣们授予你一个强大的祝福。当你走出庇护所的时候，步步生金。当你走在街上时，金子仿佛从空气中凭空产生一样出现在地面上...

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Refuge has been renovated, giving you a permanent Gold-Find boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 庇护所已重建，赋予你永久性的掉金率加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Having discussed the Seekers with Eugene and the council, plans have been drawn up to facilitate the renovation of the old garrison. Outcomes:

Seekers Expeditions will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在与尤金和议会成员们讨论了一番探索者之后，你们拟定了促进旧守备军整编的计划。 效果：

开放探索者冒险。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As you wished, the Seekers Garrison has now been renovated. Scores of new Seekers have been trained and are now awaiting your instruction, eager to explore the continent.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如你所愿，探索者守备军已经整编完毕。数十位新探索者已经完成培训并等待你的指示，他们渴望探索Wolcen的世界。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Seekers Garrison has been renovated, allowing you to send Seekers on expeditions.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 探索者守备军整编完毕，允许你派遣探索者进行探险。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Plans have been developed to direct the renovation of the Trade Assembly. At your word, resources will be committed to its completion. Outcomes:

Diplomatic Missions will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
指导贸易协会整顿的计划已经制定。各种资源都会按照你的吩咐来构筑建成它。 效果：

开放出使任务。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Trade Assembly has now been renovated. Stormfall’s diplomats have been preparing caravans and planning numerous missions to foreign states, many of which are ready and awaiting your authorization.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贸易协会现已重整完毕。暴风港的外交人员已备齐车马并组建了很多支外交使团，其中许多已经整装待发，等候你的批准。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Trade Assembly has been renovated, allowing you to send diplomats on trade missions.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贸易协会现已重整完毕，你可以派出外交人员执行外贸任务了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
After doing some research into the Dark Market, Mohabi has discovered an entity called ‘The Curator’, someone who mediates the disputes between the various service providers and their customers. They are also said to have access to certain Ethereal Reagents that can alter the ways items interact with the world. Outcomes:

The Project "Procure Ethereal Reagents" will become available. The Project "Establish Contact: 'Dark Smith' will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
经过深入黑市调查，莫哈比发现了被称作“监市”的存在，他们负责调解各种服务提供商与其客户之间的纠纷。他们还说能搞到某些可以从根本上改变物品与世界相互作用方式的灵气。 效果：

开放“采购飘渺灵气”项目。 开放项目“培植联系人：'黑匠'”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After much deliberation and clandestine discussion (and the substantial offering of coin made), the Curator agreed to welcome you as a patron of the Dark Market. They will be willing to curate Ethereal Reagents for you; they can also put you in touch with other contacts and their corresponding services should you wish.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过深思熟虑和秘密讨论（以及大量的铸币供应），监市同意接受你成为黑市的赞助人。他们会愿意为你代购灵气；如果你想要，他们还可以帮你与其他联系人接触并提供相应的服务。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You can now procure Ethereal Reagents and establish new contacts through the Curator.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你现在可以通过监市采购灵气和培植新的联系人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Demetra’s plans for her ‘Transmutation Forge’ have been finalised and are now awaiting authorisation. Outcomes:

The Project "Transmute Item" will become available. The Project "Upgrade Forge" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
迭梅塔为她的“转变熔炉”所作的计划已经完成，就等着你审批了。 效果：

开放项目“转变物品”。 开放项目“升级熔炉”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Transmutation Forge has finished construction. Now that it is ready, Demetra invites you to throw your unwanted gear into the forge. She is anxious to see the results.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 转变熔炉已建造完毕。由于熔炉已经可以投入使用，迭梅塔邀请你把不想要的装备丢进去。她迫不及待想瞧瞧结果了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Transmutation Forge has been constructed, allowing you transmute items and equipment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 转变熔炉已建造，它允许你转变物品和装备。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Demetra has been experimenting with ways to make the transmutation process more powerful. She believes that if she can find a more efficient way of channeling the energy that catalyzes the transmutation process, there may be a possibility that the transmuted item will be of a higher rarity. Outcomes:

Creates the chance that transmuted items will have a higher rarity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
迭梅塔一直在实践中探索令转变过程更加激烈的方法。她相信，如果她能找到一种更有效的方法来引导催化转变过程的能量，就可能转变出更具稀有性的物品。 效果：

使转变产物有可能比原物稀有度更高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After some tinkering, Demetra has managed to alter the capabilities of the Transmutation Forge. She says the chance of it happening is not incredibly high, but any items you place in the forge have a chance to emerge as something entirely new, and now in a higher rarity to its predecessor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过一番小修小补，迭梅塔已经设法改变了转变熔炉的属性。她说，你放进熔炉的任何物品出炉时都有几率变成全新的东西且会比它的前身更加稀有，尽管几率并不高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Transmutation Forge upgraded, transmuted items can now be in a higher rarity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 转变熔炉升级完毕，转变的成品现在可能具有更高的稀有度。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Plans have been drawn up for the Diamond Bank. Once the necessary resources are diverted, construction can begin immediately. Outcomes:

Unlocks an additional Stash tab. The "Upgrade Vault" Projects will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
建设钻石银行的计划已经拟定。必要的资源一到位，就可以立即动工。 效果：

解锁一个额外的仓库页。 开放“升级保险库”项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Construction has been completed and the Diamond Bank is now open for business. Should you need to store any of your unused items, your vault is now ready to be used as storage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 钻石银行已建造完毕并投入商用。如果你有暂时用不上的东西，就可以存进你的保险库里。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Diamond Bank has been constructed, allowing you to store items and equipment in its vault.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 钻石银行已建造完毕，你可以在其保险库中存放物品和装备。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The nobles have buried the 'Ark of Anankis' in a cave, fearful of the terror it had inflicted on the team that had uncovered it. If ordered to do so, they will send a team of Thunderblades by sea to recover the artifact, bring it back to the palace and into your possession. They believe that you, being no stranger to Primordial phenomenons, may be able to unlock its secrets and harness its power, whatever that may be. Outcomes:

An additional Aspect of Apocalypse Token will be unlocked.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
因为被阿南基斯神器出土时给发现它的团队带来的恐惧所震慑，贵族们将其掩埋在一个洞穴中。如果你命令他们取回神器，他们会派出一队雷霆之刃进行挖掘，并将其带回宫殿交给你。他们相信，你经常跟原初异象打交道，也许能够解开它的秘密，利用它的力量，无论那会是什么力量。 效果：

解锁一个额外天启法相点数。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Anankis artifact was recovered successfully. After the thunderblades transferred it into your possession, you took it to your chamber in the palace before removing the shroud. When you removed it, you realized it was a small container, and inside you found a smooth, metal tablet inscribed with symbols. Despite being unable to recognize them, you seemed to understand them intuitively. You felt its knowledge swell within you, implanting the image of a new Aspect upon your mind. You could sense that there were other artifacts like this. Perhaps they too could strengthen your attunement to the magical forces in the world...
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿南基斯遗物已被成功复原。雷霆之刃将它转交给你之后，你把它带到了你在宫殿里的房间而后拆除了它的护罩，就在那时，你意识到这是一个小容器，在里面你发现了一块光滑的金属板，上面刻着一些符号，尽管你以前从未见过，但你似乎凭直觉就能理解。你感到有关它的知识逐渐在你的脑内浮现，在你的脑内勾勒出一个全新的法相。你能感觉到还有其他类似的遗物存在。也许它们也能增强你与这个世界魔法力量的亲和力…

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The ‘Ark of Anankis’ has been recovered, giving you access to another Aspect of Apocalypse.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “阿南基斯的方舟”已被复原，让你能使用一种新的天启形态。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Demetra has created plans for her new laboratory, and a list of all the tools she will need for the enneract duplication process. Should you give the word, she will be able to to begin setting up everything she needs. Outcomes:

Unlocks the Skill Duplication feature at Demetra's stall. The Project "Upgrade Lab: Diamond Tools" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
迭梅塔已经为她的新实验室拟定了一系列计划，并且列出来复制超维之石的过程所需要的工具。只要你一声许可，她就能去办置她需要的一切资源。 效果：

解锁迭梅塔商店的技能复制功能。 开放“升级实验室：钻石工具”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Construction has finished on the Enneract Lab. Demetra has all the tools she needs for the duplication process and is now awaiting your instruction.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 超维实验室已建造完毕。迭梅塔进行复制操作所需的所有工具都齐全了，正静候你的吩咐。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Enneract Lab has been constructed, allowing you to duplicate Enneracts.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 超维实验室已建成，它让你可以复制各种超维技能。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Plans have been drawn up for Demetra’s Siphon Chamber. She seems a bit too eager to extract the magical energy inside of you, but the gold you would receive in return should be more than enough to compensate.Whenever you are ready, she will begin making the necessary arrangements for its construction. Outcomes:

The Projects that convert Primordial Affinity into Gold will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
为迭梅塔建造虹吸室的计划已经拟定。她好像过于饥渴难耐地想要研究你体内的魔法力量，虽然有点不安但是他们提供的报酬实在是太高了。只要你准备完成，她就去着手置办必要的设施。 效果：

开放将原初亲和转化为金币的项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Work has been completed on Demetra’s Siphon Chamber. Needless to say, she is eager to try it out at the earliest opportunity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 建造虹吸室的工作已完成。不用问，迭梅塔正急着想尽早试试它呢。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Siphon Chamber has been constructed, allowing you to convert Primordial Affinity into Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虹吸室已建造完毕，它允许你将原初亲和转化为金钱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Demetra has drawn up plans for her Energy Instillator. She seems far less eager to part with her stores of magical energy, but it only seems fair that she give you the opportunity to get the energy you need. She is ready to begin setting it up whenever you are. Outcomes:

The Projects that convert Gold into Primordial Affinity will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
迭梅塔为她的充能舱所作的计划已经完成。她好像有点舍不得她的魔法能量储备，但是只有给你必要的能量才能算公平。只要你需要，她都准备好设置建造充能舱了。 效果：

开放将金币转化为原初亲和的项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Demetra has finished putting together her Injector Seat. She’s not in a rush for you to try it out, but it’s ready for you if you need it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 迭梅塔已经完成了充能舱的组装。她并不急着让你试试它，但是如果你需要，也随时可用。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Injector Seat has been constructed, allowing you to convert Gold into Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 充能舱已建造完毕，它允许你将金钱转化为原初亲和。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall’s Shipyard has been out of action for far too long. Its shipwrights are known throughout the continent for the deftness of their hands in the pursuit of their craft, and the sheer magnificence of the ships they have birthed. Throughout the city, many citizens have eagerly awaited Stormfall’s return to the sea, for their curious and exploratory spirits to be unleashed upon the waves. Perhaps it is time that you indulged them. Outcomes:

Projects that require ships will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港船坞已经停工太久了。这里的造船师们因其精益求精的手艺以及从他们手中诞生的船只雄伟壮观而闻名全大陆。市民们无不热切期盼着暴风港能够重征大海，好让他们在波涛中释放的好奇心和探索精神。也许是时候满足他们了。 效果：

开放需要船只的项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Stormfall’s Shipyard is once again open for business, and Stormfall’s old shipwrights, hearing that their hands were needed once again, returned to provide their services. Before long, the Shipyard began birthing new ships, providing Stormfall with the means of returning to the seas in pursuit of its goals.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 船坞再一次开放营业，暴风港的老造船师们听说他们的手艺又有了用武之地，纷纷回来效劳。很快，船坞便开始生产新的船只。暴风港终于得以重返大海，开始追求她的目标。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Shipyard has been renovated, allowing you to undertake Projects that require ships.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 船坞已重建，允许你进行需要船只的项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Should you wish, Mohabi believes there is plenty of scope for expanding your personal vault within the Diamond Bank. After all, you can never have enough loot, and it would be a shame if you had to wantonly discard your treasures. Outcomes:

A new stash tab will be unlocked.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
如果你愿意的话，莫哈比相信在钻石银行有很大的空间可以扩大你的个人仓库。毕竟，战利品永远不嫌多，如果你不得不丢弃你的财宝，那将是一种耻辱。 效果：

解锁一个新仓库页。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Although some architects advising the project were afraid of how digging further beneath the Bank would affect its integrity, the vault’s expansion went off without any serious drawbacks. With the new space, you should be able to store more of the treasures you have found throughout your adventures.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管一些为该项目提议的建筑师担心进一步挖掘银行下方会影响其完整性，但仓库的扩建并未出现任何严重缺陷。有了新的空间，你应该能够储存更多的在你的冒险途中发现的财宝。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your personal vault was upgraded, unlocking a new stash tab.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的个人仓库已升级，解锁一个新的仓库页。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
According to Demetra, each time an Enneract is duplicated, the structure of each duplicate changes, becoming more complex and harder to analyze. Without new, more precise tools with which to carry out the delicate procedure, she will be unable to create more duplicates beyond the one she can already create. Diamond tools should provide the precision she needs to duplicate Enneracts up to a second duplicate. Outcomes:

Demetra will be able to create two duplicates of every skill at her stall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
根据迭梅塔的说法，每复制一个超维之石，其结构都会发生变化，变得更加复杂和难以分析。如果没有新的、更精确的工具来执行这个微妙的过程，她将无法创造出比现有更多的复制品。钻石工具应该能达到她所需的精度，那样她就能为一块超维之石创造两个副本。 效果：

允许在迭梅塔的商店对每种技能进行第二次复制。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Forging Diamond tools was an ordeal in itself, requiring an extreme amount of heat to bond it to metal. However, with Demetra’s supervision, new tools have been manufactured; she should now be able to undertake the delicate procedure of duplicating an enneract for a second time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 锻造钻石工具本身就有够麻烦了，需要极高的热量才能将其与金属结合。然而，在迭梅塔的监督下，新的工具已经被制造出来了；她现在应该能够进行二次复制超维之石的精密程序。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Enneract Lab has been upgraded, allowing her to copy Enneracts for a second time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 超维实验室已经升级，允许她第二次复制超维之石。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Mohabi has heard tell of someone in the Dark Market capable of creating higher quality versions of the items they are given. With the appropriate investment behind him, Mohabi should be able this contact, known as ‘The Dark Smith’, and persuade them into providing their services. Have Mohabi establish contact with ‘The Dark Smith’. Outcomes:

The Project "Increase Item Quality" will become available. The Project "Establish Contact: 'GoldenChild'" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
莫哈比打听到一些传闻，据说有一些人能够将物品改造成更优质的版本。依靠充足的资金支持，莫哈比应该能与这些被称作“黑匠”的人建立联系，并说服他们提供服务。 让莫哈比与“黑匠”建立联系。 效果：

开放项目“提高物品品质”。 开放项目“培植联系人'金童'”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: At the behest of the Curator, the Dark Smith was brought into a meeting with Mohabi. After some discussion, the Dark Smith agreed to provide his smithing services to you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在“监市”的邀请下，“黑匠”与莫哈比会面。经过一番磋商，“黑匠”同意为你提供他的打造服务。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You can now have the Dark Smith create higher quality versions of your items.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你现在可以让黑市铁匠将你的物品升为更高质量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Mohabi believes he has found someone in the Dark Market that is able to take any item and curate a rarer version of it. All he knows at the moment is the contact’s alias: GoldenChild. If Mohabi had the necessary resources, he believes he will be able to find this ‘GoldenChild’ and convince them to offer their services. Have Mohabi establish a contact with the ‘GoldenChild. Outcomes:

The Project "Increase Item Rarity" will become available. The Project "Establish Contact: 'Dark Smith'" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
莫哈比确信，他已经找到了可以将收取任何物品并返还其更稀有版本的人。他目前只知道联系人的化名：“金童”。如果给予他必要的资源，他就能找到这个“金童”，并说服对方提供服务。 让莫哈比与“金童”建立联系。 效果：

开放项目“提高物品稀有度”。 开放项目“培植联系人：'黑匠'”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The GoldenChild was not easy to find, but with the help of the Curator, Mohabi was able to establish contact. After the appropriate formalities were conducted (they insisted that Mohabi swallow a small nugget of gold as a sign of good faith), the GoldenChild agreed to provide their services.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这位“金童”并不好找，多亏了“监市”鼎力相助，莫哈比才得以与之建立联系。经过了必要的手续（对方坚持要莫哈比吞下一小块黄金以示诚意）之后，“金童”同意提供服务。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You can now have the GoldenChild procure your items in a higher rarity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你现在可以通过“金童”获取你物品稀有度更高的版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Mohabi has heard whispers of the one they call the ‘The Etherean’, someone in the Dark market who straddles the worlds of the living and the dead. Apparently, they can increase the potency of Ethereal Reagents through aritual, the details of which are speculated upon wildly. No ordinary merchant would dare lay their eyes upon these Ethereal Reagents, never mind improve them through some accursed ritual. But, if it is what you desire, and provided you invest the appropriate resources, Mohabi will secure a line of communication with this ‘The Etherean’. Have Mohabi establish contact with the ‘The Etherean’. Outcomes:

The Project "Increase Reagent Rarity" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
莫哈比在黑市上听到了一个被称之为“飘渺者”的人的呢喃，他横跨生者和死者的世界。显然，他们可以通过一种神秘技术来提高飘渺灵气的效力，其中的技术细节被许多人关注推敲。普通的商人甚至看都不敢看一眼这些飘渺灵气上，更不用说通过某种邪恶的仪式来改良它们了。但是，如果这正是你想要的，并且肯为之投资，莫哈比会为你与这个牵线搭桥。 莫哈比已经与“飘渺者”建立了联系。 效果：

开放项目“提高灵气稀有度”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: According to the Curator, the The Etherean is somewhat of an outcast, their practices frightening even to the questionable people that make their living through the Dark Market. However, at Mohabi’s request, the Curator pointed him in the direction of the The Etherean. A meeting ensued, concluding with an agreement between the two parties.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 据“监市”说，“飘渺者”某种程度上很不受待见，因为他们的手段甚至让那些常年混迹黑市的“老鼠”们都感到不安。然而，在莫哈比的要求下，“监市”把他引荐给了“飘渺者”。在随后的一次会面中，双方达成了共识。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You can now convert Ethereal Reagents to their legendary version through the The Etherean.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 现在你可以通过飘渺者将飘渺灵气升级成传奇版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Rumor has reached the Dark Market of a special incense newly concocted by an alchemist living in the wilderness around Three-Peaks. The incense is being called "Memory's Echo", and according to the rumors, it transports those that consume it to past experiences, their drugged imaginations conjuring up all sorts of embellishments to their original memory. Bizarrely, those who have survived the experience have kept the objects they became attached to during the memory, leading many to speculate that the incense is more than merely mind-altering… If you would like to try it for yourself, perhaps Mohabi could locate this mysterious alchemist from Three Peaks. Outcomes:

You will receive an Uber Boss Expedition Consumable.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在黑市上流传说有一种由隐居在三峰城外山林里的炼金术士调制的特种熏香。这种香被称为“记忆回响”，根据传闻，它能将使用者转移到过去的经历中，他们被麻醉的想象会给他们原来的记忆添油加醋。奇怪的是，那些在经历中幸存下来的人保留了他们在记忆中所依附的物品，导致许多人猜测香不仅仅能改变思想……如果你想亲自尝试，也许莫哈比可以从三峰城找到这位神秘的炼金术士。 效果：

获得一个超级BOSS远征消耗品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a long and arduous search, Mohabi was able to make contact with this alchemist from Three-Peaks. He has little recollection of the meeting, and was unable to recall the alchemist's features in any detail. Whatever happened during that meeting, it ended with some sort of incense enclosed in Mohabi's palm. He can only assume it is, in fact, "Memory's Echo". There's only one way to find out...
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过长时间艰苦的搜寻，莫哈比得以从三峰城与这位炼金术士取得联系。他几乎完全忘记了那次会议，也记不起炼金术士的任何细节。无论在那次会议上发生了什么，最后莫哈比的手掌里都攥着某种薰香。他只能假设这实际上是“记忆回响”。只有一种方法可以确认…

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Mohabi has procured a mind-altering drug.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 莫哈比买了一种改变思想的药

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Dark-Smith possesses the means to increase any item’s quality through a smithing process known only to them. With an investment of your resources, they will be willing to complete this procedure for one of your items. Outcomes:

Your chosen item will become a higher quality version.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
黑匠可以通过一个只有他们知道的锻造过程来提高任何物品品质。投入资源，他们会愿意为你的一个物品完成这个程序。 效果：

你选择的物品将变成更高品质的版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After handing over your item to the Dark Smith, Mohabi was ushered from their working quarters to wait in the street. The sounds Mohabi heard made little sense, not the usual hissing a clanging you might expect from the process of forging a weapon. It almost sounded like there was something alive in there, squealing in ecstasy as the Dark Smith went about their work.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 把你的东西交给黑市铁匠后，莫哈比被从他们的工作区领到街上等候。莫哈比听到的声音没有什么意义，不像你在锻造武器过程中所期望的那样发出嘶嘶声和叮当声。听起来好像里面有什么活物，当黑市铁匠开始工作时，里面传出的是欣喜若狂的尖叫。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Dark Smith created a higher quality version of your item
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黑暗的铁匠为你的物品创造了一个更高质量的版本

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Golden-Child and their affiliates have access to a vast collection of items and equipment from all over the world of Wolcen. Given the necessary funds, the Golden-Child is willing to take any item of your choosing and procure a higher rarity version of it from his hoard. It will take a while, of course, such a collection can take days to sift through... Outcomes:

Your chosen item will become a higher rarity version.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
“金童”及其附庸有机会接触来自整个Wolcen世界的海量物品和装备。只要给予必要的资金，“金童”愿意从他的秘藏里取出你提供的物品的稀有版本。当然，这需要一段时间，毕竟从这种量级的藏品中筛选出一件物品难免要花个几天… 效果：

你选择的物品将变为稀有度更高的版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After handing over your item to the GoldenChild, Mohabi was refused entrance into their collection and was told to return at a later date. After returning, Mohabi was given the item that had been requested, and it was clearly a marked improvement on what you had owned before.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在把你的物品交给“金童”后，莫哈比未得到进入对方秘藏的允许，并被告知过几天再回来。再次造访时，莫哈比拿到了指定的物品，很显然，东西远远强于原来交上去的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The GoldenChild procured a version of your item in a higher rarity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “金童”交还了你物品的稀有版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
If provided with the necessary resources, The Etherean will take any reagent you own and alter it in order to enhance its effects. Not much is known about their process for completing such a procedure, but given the connection of such items to the Eriebe and the Abyss, perhaps it is better not knowing… Having said that, Mohabi is standing by to go to The Etherean for their services. Outcomes:

Your Reagent will be transformed into its legendary counterpart.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
如果有必要的资源，飘渺者可以将你拥有的各种灵气拿去进行改造，增强其效果。至于他们是如何完成这一过程的，我们知之甚少，但考虑到这些物品与幽冥和深渊之间的联系，也许还是不知道为好... 说了这么一大通，莫哈比的意思是，他已经准备好去找飘渺者，让他们为你效劳了。 效果：

你的灵气将被升级为对应的传奇版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a long and difficult process (the details of which Mohabi is insistent on not divulging), The Etherean was able to convert your reagent into its legendary counterpart.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过一个漫长而艰难的过程（莫哈比坚持不透露其中的细节），以太人能够将你的灵气转换成它对应的传奇版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Etherean converted your reagent into its legendary version.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以太人把你的灵气变成了传奇版本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Little is known of the islands of Baktoraï, and what is known is a hazardous mix of reports and old wives’ tales. Abductions in the dead of night, sorceresses tearing babes from their mothers’ wombs, ivory traders building strange machines from the teeth of men. As a result of their wealth and their sadistic occult practices, many artifacts are left behind there, as are the volatile effects of their magic. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Accesories.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
人们对巴克托赖群岛知之甚少，仅有的信息是一系列危险的报道和老太太口中的童话故事。死寂深夜的绑架失踪案，在母亲的子宫里分尸婴儿的女巫，用人类牙齿制造神秘机器的象牙商人。 由于他们的财富和他们施虐的神秘做法，许多圣遗物被留在那里，同样留下的还有他们魔法的未知影响。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：配饰。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Navigating the Baktoraï Archipelago proved a troublesome endeavor for the Seekers. While searching for treasure, a number of skirmishes broke out with occultists roaming the islands. The Seekers were up to the challenge, and managed to overcome occultist forces, eventually stumbling upon an underground structure beneath one of the islands. There they found plenty of artifacts worth looting, and have brought them back to Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对探索者来说，在巴克托赖群岛间航行麻烦重重。他们在寻找宝藏的过程中与岛屿间游荡的术士爆发了一系列冲突。探索者们接受挑战，并设法战胜了神秘力量，终于在其中一座岛屿下面邂逅了一片地下建筑。他们在那儿发现了大量值得掠夺的宝物，并把它们带回了暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Baktoraï Archipelago with Accessories.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从巴克托赖群岛返回，带回来一些佩饰。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The city of C’tul is carried around by two gigantic beasts, as many know. But most are unaware of the many other strange animals that lurk within their territory. Legendary quarries hide themselves in the thickets, their skeletons an inexplicable craggy design, their hides incomparably thick. It will take the strongest arms and the canniest hunters to bring a trophy back. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Rogue Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
很多人都知道，克图城是由两个巨大的野兽环抱的。但大多数人都不知道还有许多其他奇怪的动物潜伏在他们的领地里。传说中的猎物藏在灌木丛中，它们的骨架崎岖嶙峋，它们的兽皮无比厚实。 只有最强大的武器和最精明的猎人才能带回一些战利品。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：游侠护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While in C’tul, the Seekers had to have their wits about them. They walked in the steps of huge creatures, saw twisted silhouettes flit through their vision and the grotesque croaking of monsters echo through the forest. They were lucky enough to come upon a C’tulian hunter, head cleaved cleanly from his body, but armour still intact.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在克'图的时候，探索者必须浑身机灵劲儿。他们在庞然巨物的步伐中前进，看到扭曲的轮廓掠过他们的视线，听到怪兽的嚎叫声在森林中回荡。他们运气不错，遇到了一具克'图猎人的尸体，他的脑袋被干净利落地削去，但盔甲仍然完好无损。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the C’tulian Hunting Grounds with Rogue Armour(s).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从克'图的猎场返回，带回来一些游侠护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The blood of thousands of soldiers could not quench the Red Wastes. Before Stormfall was Stormfall, before the Republic was the Republic, battles already raged upon these sands. Now, only bones of ancient heroes and their empty plate armours remain where warring souls once stood. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Heavy Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
成千上万士兵的鲜血也未能浸透红色废土。在暴风港还没建成，共和国尚未成立的年代，战火就已经在这片沙漠上肆虐。现在，只有骸骨和空壳般的铠甲遗留在这片战魂熄灭之地。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：重型护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Red Wastes were hard on the Seekers, draining the moisture from their bodies and dragging their legs into the dry mire of the desert sand. Luckily for them, it was not long before they stumbled upon the site of an old battle. They dislodged the armors that were not rusted beyond recovery and were able to leave the Wastes unharmed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 红色废土的环境对于探索者来说非常艰苦，脱水和陷入流沙的情况比比皆是。好在他们没过多久就遇到了一片古战场。他们把那些尚未生锈到无法修复的盔甲从泥沙中取出，安然无恙地离开了废土。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Red Wastes with Heavy Armor(s).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从红色废土返回，带回来一些重型护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The fleshy corruption of Cordanon is in decay. Yards upon yards of rotten meat remain, with no survivors left to clear them and no lord willing to claim them. A wealth of abandoned family treasures and fortunes lie beneath the viscera, and the dead have no more use for any of it. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
科代诺的血肉腐烂已然衰败。没有幸存者清理那一堆堆腐肉。这也意味着村民遗留的任何财富都埋在那里，那些脏腑之下。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：金币

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers spent days sifting through the mountains of melted corpses left at Cordanon. In amongst the flesh, they were able to collect a veritable hoard of gold. The expedition did not sit well with a number of your Seekers; looting the bodies of those who have died in such a grotesque manner, with no burial or any such minor recourse for their suffering. But then, their gold was going to go to waste, and far more unsavory types would have looted their corpses if Stormfall did not.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的探索者花了好几天的时间在科代诺的熔尸山上搜寻。在那些血肉中，他们收集到了一批货真价实的黄金。相当一部分探索者感到难以接受；他们以这种野蛮的方式掠夺死者的尸体，却不加以安葬，甚至不因为同情他们的遭遇耗费一丝资源。话说回来，这些黄金放在那里也是浪费，即使暴风港不去动，也会有宵小之辈来搜刮这些尸体。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Ruins of Cordanon with Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从科代诺废墟返回，带回来一批黄金。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Halls of Anankis have grown quiet since their power core was extinguished. Some demonic activity remains, but our scholars have been able to scour the grand passages. They contain well-preserved traces of the First Men. More interesting yet, it seemed they lived in service of all-powerful beings able to practice magic far greater than any sorcerers’ of our time. Further study may reveal more about our ancestors. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Mage Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
阿南基斯中心带在她的权力中心被灭绝殆尽之后便再无人问津。一些恶魔的活动仍然存在，但我们的学者已经能够搜索这片区域。它们包含了保存完好的先行者踪迹。 更有趣的是，它们似乎在服务于某种极为强大的生物，这些生物的法术水平足以碾压我们这个时代的任何巫师。进一步的研究可能会揭示更多关于我们祖先的信息。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：法师护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers roamed the halls of Anankis, fighting their way through Smuggler’s Path and the Necropolis. The going was tough, and a few casualties were suffered, but they reached Anankis relatively unscathed. It did not take them long before they discovered abandoned armors left behind by the First Men; some of them in tombs, others scattered on the platforms, slain in some ancient conflict.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者闯过走私者小道和乌尔汗陵墓，摸遍了阿南基斯大厅。过程很艰辛，也有一些人员受伤，但好在他们到达阿南基斯时无人阵亡。没过多久，他们就发现了一批由古代冲突中身亡的初代人类遗留的盔甲。它们有的在坟墓里，有的散落在浮台上。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from Anankis with Mage Armor(s).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从阿南基斯返回，带回来一些法师护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Yudaï’s forces still haunt the Necropolis in feeble waves. Efforts to sort out the bones and artifacts within have been arduous, but they reveal that many were entombed during the Necropolis’ completion. The design doesn’t match any architecture developed by humans, and yet one can’t dismiss it as a similar build to the Halls of Anankis. The construction is clearly thousands of years younger. Who then might’ve overseen its construction? Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Catalysts.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
尤太的力量仍然像微弱的波涛般萦绕在墓地。对里面的骨头和文物进行分类是个十分艰巨的任务，但是从结果能看出其中有很多是在墓地完工时埋葬的。这种设计与人类开发的任何建筑都不匹配，但人们不能将其视为与阿南基斯中心带相似的建筑。这座建筑显然其他的建筑晚建成了几千年。 那么，到底是谁设计建造了它呢？ 潜在效果：

获得战利品：法器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Finding a way into the Necropolis was not an easy problem to solve, but certainly a challenge worthy of the Seekers’ skills. After a number of days searching for a way inside, they stumbled upon a hidden entrance - a crack in one of its walls, formed by the shifting of the earth. Once inside, they found a mausoleum containing the sarcophagi of long-dead Urhans, the old safe-guarders of creation, and inside one of them, a catalyst resonating with a strong magical aura.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 找到一条进入陵墓的路并不是个容易解决的问题，但肯定是一个配得上探索者拥有的技能的挑战。经过几天的寻找，他们偶然发现了一个隐藏的入口，那是一面墙壁上的裂缝，由地壳运动形成。一进去，他们就发现了一座陵寝，里面放着死去已久的乌尔汗人的石棺，这些人是保卫造物的古老卫士，在其中一间墓室里，一件法器正荡漾着强大的魔法光晕。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Necropolis with a Catalyst(s).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从乌尔汗陵墓返回，带回来一些法器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
When Laibon’s military was still coordinated by the state, a strict hierarchy was in place. Warriors engaged in dishonorable or secret operations weren’t granted a traditional funeral. This held true even if they were following orders. When they felt the final decline of sickness or old age, the warriors would carry their heraldric shields out into the desert and seek a final adversary to die fighting, who would grant them honour. The locals may consider it sacrilegious to disturb the dead. One can't blame them. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Shields.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
当莱邦的军队仍然由国家协调时，它们遵循着一个严格的等级制度。从事不光彩或秘密行动的战士不会被授予传统的葬礼。即使他们服从命令，这一点也不会改变。当他们感觉到病入膏肓或天数已尽时，战士们会把他们的纹章盾牌带到沙漠中，寻找最后一个敌人，然后再最后一场荣耀的战斗中死去。 当地人可能会认为打扰死者是亵渎神明的。不能怪他们。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：盾牌。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Seekers’ expedition to the Laïbonite desert proved a fruitful endeavor. After scrutinizing every dip and rise in the sand, they came across the mangled skeletons of old warriors; those who had died honorably, but ultimately alone, to the monsters in the desert. The warriors were armed only with shields, as though they had not allowed themselves the opportunity of killing their adversaries, and avoiding the fate they had come to greet.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 探索者对红尘沙漠的勘探卓有成效。仔细检查了每一座沙丘和沙谷，他们偶然发现了老战士残缺不全的遗骸；这些战士生前光荣地死战，到头来却无人知晓地在沙漠中死去。战士们只带着盾牌，好像他们没有想过要杀死敌人，也没想过逃出生天似的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Laibonite Desert with a Shield(s).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从红尘沙漠返回，带回来一些盾牌。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Republican Purifiers guard their keeps with jealous fervour, and none more than Carrion Keep, which was marked with a distinguishing victory. Grand Inquisitor Heimlock himself reconquered Carrion Keep as a young man, turning it into a symbol more than a fortress. That shining insignia is marred. The Republican Forces come in greater numbers everyday, trying to choke some emergence from within the fortress. If only one could find out what that emergence was. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Staffs.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
共和国的净化者用近乎神经过敏般的热情守护着他们的堡垒，其中以腐肉堡最为敏感，毕竟这是一个辉煌胜利的标志。大检察官海姆洛克在年轻时征服了腐肉堡，把它变成了一个象征，而不仅仅是一个普通的堡垒。 但是那份熠熠生辉的荣光现在已然损坏。共和军每天都会派遣更多的人来，试图阻止堡垒内部任何紧急状况的发生。如果有人能知道那所谓的紧急状况是什么的话。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：法杖

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Infiltrating Carrion Keep was difficult, but your Seekers managed it without alerting the Republic soldiers stationed there. Deep within the labyrinthian keep, in a secret chamber, the Seekers uncovered a small archive, the old lodging of a sorcerer that was once living there, and a staff with a powerful aura.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 渗透腐肉煲非常困难，但你的探索者在没有被驻扎在那里的共和国士兵发现他们与暴风港关系的情况下成功做到了。在迷宫般的密室深处，探索者们发现了一个小档案室，一个属于曾经驻扎在那里的法师的旧住处，以及一根弥漫着强烈光晕的法杖。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from Carrion Keep with a Staff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从腐肉堡返回，带回来一支法杖。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Radiant Fleet sails proud and haughty in its diamond coats, piercing through the waves of the Sea of Torment. Another fate awaits those with enough hubris to follow their lead but without the coin to ask for the Fleet’s help. They become part of the landscape. The sea washes dregs of old stories, ancient tragedies onto its shores. For those uninterested in tales, the yards of debris have more practical uses. Potential Outcomes:

Temporary Productivity Boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
光芒舰队披着钻石般的外壳，傲然驶于海面之上，穿梭于痛苦之海的波浪间大海。但是等待那些盲目跟随领导者但又没有钱寻求舰队帮助的人的，又是另一种命运了。 它们变成了大自然风光的一部分。 大海将古老故事和悲剧的残渣冲刷到海岸上。对于那些对残骸所蕴含的故事不感兴趣的人来说，沉船海岸上堆积的材料有着更实际的用途。 潜在效果：

临时生产力加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Although the coast was treacherous, your Seekers were able to navigate the ship carcasses along the coast of wrecks. They picked them apart as they went, collecting anything that could be of use to Stormfall. They did not dare stay for too long, for fear of their own ships being dashed against the jagged shore.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虽然海岸险恶，但对你的探索者们来说，在残骸中穿行并不成问题。他们一边航行一边挑拣，收集任何可能对暴风港有用的东西。由于担心乘坐的船只与参差的海岸发生碰撞，他们也未敢久留。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Coast of Wrecks with materials, boosting Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从沉船海岸返回，带回来一些材料，提高了生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
It is one thing to travel the endless sea to the eastern continent, another entirely to land on its shores. Few have successfully navigated the turbulent waves on their coasts. Fewer still have set foot on the beaches. Archion harbors the few returning rangers from that continent, and they’re keen to hold onto those rare charts drawn by the voyagers. One of Stormfall’s finest vessels, the Tempest, was dispatched to the eastern continent, never to return. We’ve sent its successor, the Tempest II, on the same road, hoping to recoup our investment. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Random.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
穿越无边无际的海洋到东部大陆是一回事，在其海岸登陆又是另一回事。很少有人能成功地度过海岸便汹涌的海浪。能踏上海滩的更是少之又少。阿奇恩庇护着从那片大陆回来的少数游骑兵，而且他们热切地想得到那些航海家绘制的稀有海图。 暴风港最好的船只之一，飓风号，被派往东部大陆之后，再也没有回来过。我们已经把它的继任者，飓风二号，送上了同一条航线，希望能收回我们的资源。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：随机物品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After setting off for unknown shores, the Seekers discovered a small island. There was a settlement there, everything in perfect condition. It seemed as though whoever had lived there had left only moments ago: fires still smoldered, animal corpses turned on their spits; furnaces burned, and molten metal waited to be poured into a mold. No matter how hard they looked, the Seekers could not find the island’s inhabitants. All they found was a note on a chest in the settlement’s center. It read: ‘A gift’.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 出发前往未知海岸后，探索者发现了一个小岛。那里有一个定居点，一切都完好无损。火堆还在阴燃，动物尸体嘴边的涎液尚未干涸；钢炉熊熊燃烧，熔化的金属等着被倒入模具。好像住在那里的人不久前才离开似的。但无论他们多么努力地寻找，探索者都找不到岛上的居民。他们只在定居点中心的一个箱子里找到一张纸条。上面写着：“一份礼物”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from an Unknown Shore with Random Loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从未知海岸返回，带回了随机战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
What little intel was gleaned from this facility indicates a weapons’ research center near the Republic’s borders. The place seems to front as a traveller’s lodge, but large convoys of republican soldiers make frequent trips to and from the facility, often heavier as they leave compared to when they arrived. Whatever they have inside must be valuable military supplies, though likely well protected. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Pistols.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
从这个设施收集到的少量情报表明这是一个武器研究中心。它的外表看上去就像一个旅社，但是共和国士兵来往频繁，每当他们离去时，身上的负重都在增加。 那里面的东西一定是有价值的军事物资，尽管可能会受到严密的保护。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：手枪。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers made landfall at the Regicide Research Facility during the early hours of the morning. They were able to sneak in, unseen by the guards stationed on the island. Once inside, they made their way swiftly, disposing of any guards in their path with swift and silent precision. After finding their way to one of the facility’s laboratories, they discovered a prototype weapon encased in a magical barrier. They brute-forced their way through it, setting off an alarm. Luckily, they were able to make good their escape, and have returned the weapon to Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者在清晨登陆了弑君研究所。他们在没有被驻岛卫兵发现的情况下完成潜入。一进去，他们就迅速展开了行动，迅捷、无声、缜密地干掉了沿途的卫兵。他们找到通往一间实验室的路，而后发现了一个装在魔法屏障里的武器原型。他们暴力破解，强行通过，触发了警报。幸运的是，他们成功地逃走了，并把武器带回了暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Regicide Facility with a Legendary Gun.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从弑君研究所返回，带回来一把传奇手枪。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Blood Tear Clan are a set of nomadic warriors cast out of Varg into a life of warfare and mercenary work. Their graveyard sites are found off the beaten path. Heads of families often reach a violent end and are buried with all their earthly wealth, their spouse, and personal attendants lying by their side. But not all sleep quietly. Occasionally, servants of the Blood Tear Clan would plant a bundle of hair and teeth on the graves to avenge their entombed fellows. Some speak of three-mouthed beasts who sprout from the soil like trees, and latch their small teeth onto the necks of passersby. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Warrior Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
血泪族是一批从法吉流放出来的游牧勇士，他们的生活是战争和雇佣兵的工作。他们的墓地是在偏僻的小路上发现的。家族的首领往往不得善终，而他们的所有财产、配偶和随从都被埋葬在他们身边。但并不是所有人都能安心长眠。 令人痛心的是，血泪族的仆人会在坟墓上种上一束头发和牙齿来为他们死去的同伴报仇。有人说三口兽会像树一样从土里长出来，用小牙齿咬住路人的脖子。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：战士护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Seekers arrived at the Burial Site without too much trouble. There were graves, their headstones arranged to be facing each other. Each stone had the same epitaph: “Do not shed a tear over us, for we died crying the blood of our ancestors”. Most of the armors on the bodies were punctured, but there was one whose armor was relatively unscathed. It was a fine work of craftsmanship too.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 探索者们毫不费力地到达了埋骨地。坟头林立，墓碑对向而列。每一块墓碑上都有相同的墓志铭：“不要为我们流泪，因为死时流着祖先的血”。尸体身上的盔甲大都被刺穿了，但有一件盔甲相对来说没有受损。而且它是一件杰出的工艺制品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from a Burial Site with Legendary Bruiser Armor(s)
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从埋骨地返回，带回来一些传奇战士护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The earth convulsed in Stormfall when Gernese stood against Grand Inquisitor Heimlock, but that shake was only an echo of what was happening up north. Contacts in Varg have spread the word; the crevasse tearing the north apart has grown larger. This is no ordinary scar of the land. The fault distorts light, sound, and emits a steady flow of demons running the people of Varg out of their homes. This threat should be investigated before it’s out of control. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Legendary Ethereal Reagents.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
当格瑞斯站在大审判官海姆洛克面前时，大地在暴风雨中震动，但那震动只是北方发生地震的余波。法吉的线人已经传回了这个消息；撕裂北方的裂缝越来越大。这不是普通的地震裂痕。这个断层扭曲了光和声音，并持续不断地涌出恶魔，把法吉人赶出他们的家园。这个威胁应该在失控前调查清楚。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：传奇级飘渺灵气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Seekers’ expedition to the Abyssal Rift was fraught with danger. Getting there was difficult enough, but once there, the energies of the Abyss were enough to overwhelm even the strongest of wills. Some Seekers succumbed to its maddening energy, losing all sense of self. Those who remained pushed onward, fortifying themselves against the darkness coiling around their hearts. Their efforts were rewarded: they returned to Stormfall with powerful Ethereal Reagents.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 探索者远征深渊充满了危险。光是抵达那里就够困难了，一旦到达，深渊的能量更是足以压倒最坚强的意志。一些探索者屈服于它令人发狂的能量，失去了所有的自我意识。那些留下来的人奋力向前，在缠绕着他们内心的黑暗中坚守自我。他们的努力得到了回报：他们带着强大的灵气返回了暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Abyssal rift with Legendary Ethereal Reagents.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从深渊裂隙返回，带回来一些传奇灵气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Ezaneal’s faithful don’t express devotion by prayer, but by becoming innovators, engineers, and experts in the most vanguard technology. His temples are hidden below oceans, in desert sands, behind waterfalls, where none can interfere with what they’d consider ‘irresponsible’ inventions. Those drawn to Ezaneal either seek power, or seek to defend their power. They create firearms to soothe that anxiety a little while, until someone produces a more powerful weapon. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Random Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
对伊查内亚的崇拜与对安娜蒂亚的那种截然不同。对他表达虔诚的方式是成为最前沿科技的创新者、工程师和专家。他的神庙隐藏在海底、沙漠中、瀑布后，没有人可以乱动他们认定为“不可靠”的发明。那些被伊查内亚吸引的人要么是为了寻求权力，要么为了保障自己的权力。他们通过创造火器来暂时缓解这种焦虑，直到有人制造出更强大的武器。. 潜在效果：

获得战利品：随机武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The cultists worshipping Ezaneal did not take kindly to the Seekers encroaching on their shrines. A fight ensued, and while the Seekers were not able to best their opponents, they were able to loot a number of the cultists’ finest weaponry before making their escape.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 崇拜伊查内亚的邪教徒对侵犯他们祭坛的探索者并不友好。一场战斗接踵而至，虽然搜索者们没能打败对手，但他们在逃跑之前却抢走了一批邪教分子最好的武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from a Shrine of Ezaneal with assorted Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从伊查内亚的祭坛返回，带回来各种武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Spikes pierce through mummified skulls. Bridges hang from ropes of dried gut. Prisoners are buried up to their necks and left to die of thirst. The Flayers are a slow and steady predator under the weight of their claymore swords. They may not trade weapons with Stormfall willingly, as they are stateless, and Stormfall is the state. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Two-Handed Melee Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
钉在防御工事周围的硝化头骨，晒干的肠子做成的绳子，被埋到脖子活活渴死的囚犯。剥皮者背负着沉重的双刃大砍刀行动缓慢。他们也许不会愿意和暴风港交易武器。毕竟他们并无国籍，而暴风港是个货真价实的国家。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：双手近战武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Seekers’ incursion into Flayers’ territory was a hard-fought and bloody one. After a number of skirmishes, the Seekers carved out a small section of the territory and looted the best equipment they could find. The only things of worth were the weapons, huge things forged to crush those unfortunate enough to come face to face with a Flayer.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 突袭剥皮者的领地是一场血腥的苦战。经过多次遭遇战，探索者在他们的领地上开辟出一小块区域，并掠夺了他们能找到最好的装备。唯一有价值的东西是一批武器，这些庞大的家伙被锻造出来就是为了叫那些不幸面对剥皮者的人粉身碎骨。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers have returned from the Flayers’ Homeland with Two-Handed Melee Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从剥皮者的老巢返回，带回来一些双手近战武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The expedition proved to be too difficult for the Seekers. Part-way to their destination, they were ambushed by a band of highwaymen, suffering numerous casualties.  However, they were able to defeat their leader, and have brought back some of the valuables in their possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这次探险对探索者来说太难了。在前往目的地的途中，他们遭到一伙车匪路霸的伏击，伤亡惨重。然而，他们打败了他们的领袖，从他们手里夺得了一些贵重物品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Part-way through their expedition, your Seekers were forced to make the return to Stormfall. The weather was far worse than they could have anticipated, and numerous Seekers began to suffer and die from exposure. Unwilling to risk the loss of any more lives at the hands of the elements, those remaining made their way back, searching the odd abandoned building to make sure they had something to show.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在探险的途中，你的探索者被迫返回暴风港。天气比他们预想的要糟糕得多，大量的探索者因为承受不住暴晒倒下。由于不愿意冒着损失更多人命的风险，剩下的人设法返回，沿途搜刮遇到的废弃建筑，以确保他们有东西可以交差。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After arriving at their destination, the Seekers set about exploring. They found a few things here and there, but not in the quantities or qualities that they had been expecting. Despite that, they still consider the expedition to have been a moderate success.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 到达目的地后，探索者们开始探险。东找到一点，西找到一些，但没有达到他们所期望的数量或质量。尽管如此，他们仍然认为这次探险取得了一定的成功。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers reached their destination, but did not find the loot they had hoped for.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者抵达了目的地，但没能寻得预期的战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While traveling to their destination, something glinting on the horizon caught the attention of your Seekers. Curiosity, being their most valued trait, drove them to investigate. They came upon an abandoned house and found the source of the glinting to be a plated chest simply left discarded on the porch. Seeing what was inside, they decided that this treasure itself was enough to justify their trip and made their way back to Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在前往目的地的途中，地平线上闪烁的东西引起了你的探索者的注意。好奇心是他们最看重的特质，也驱使他们前去调查。他们来到一处废弃房屋，发现闪光的源头是一个被丢弃在门廊上的镀金箱子。看到里面的东西，他们认为这些宝藏就已经足以证明他们这一趟不虚此行，于是他们返回了暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but stumbled upon a treasure hoard instead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但偶遇了一处宝藏。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers, despite their best efforts, were unable to resist the stormy temperament of the seas. However, after being sent off course, they came across another ship, torn apart by some force of nature. They were able to salvage something from the wreckage, making the trip a not-so-complete failure.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的探索者，尽管尽了最大的努力，还是无法抵挡大海的狂风暴雨。然而，他们偏离航道后，意外遇到了一艘被某种自然力量撕碎的船只。他们从残骸中打捞了些东西，让这趟探险并非一无所获。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While out on the oceans, your Seekers were intercepted a small band of pirates. However, with some expert maneuvering, they were able to outsmart their assailants and sink their ships. Due to heavy losses, your Seekers considered it prudent to head for home. They were, however, able to retrieve some loot from the sunken ships.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你的探索者出海时被一小群海盗截获了。然而，专业的训练发挥出作用，他们智取袭击者并击沉他们的船只。由于损失惨重，你的探索者认为折返才是明智的选择。起码他们能够从击沉的船只上取回一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: For your Seekers, the sea proved a difficult beast to tame. After being blown off course, they landed on an island. While exploring the island for the means to repair their ship, they stumbled upon an ancient mausoleum. Inside, they found a number of sarcophagi, some of the dead inside buried with their valuables. Not known for passing up such opportunities, they looted the burial site and returned to Stormfall with their findings.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对你的探索者来说，大海就像一头难以驯服的野兽。他们被吹离航线后，在一个小岛登录。他们在岛上寻找修船的方法时，偶然发现了一座古墓。在古墓里，他们发现了一些石棺，其中除了尸骨还有贵重的陪葬品。反正也没人知晓，可谓天赐机会，他们一番洗劫之后将发现的东西带回了暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While on their way to their destination, your Seekers seemed to lose their way, sailing into waters they had no knowledge of in their records. Confused - they had taken the usual route to their destination - they were suddenly becalmed in the middle of nowhere. One night, while one of your Seekers was looking out to sea, she noticed something protruding from the still surface. It happened to be a small settlement - flooded only the Primordials know when - and after diving down there, they found more than enough to compensate for their troubles.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在前往目的地的途中，你的探索者似乎迷失了方向，驶入了未曾记录过的水域。他们感到迷茫——明明按照通向目的地的航线行驶——突然就到了一个四面皆海的未知所在。一天晚上，当你的一个探索者在眺望大海时，她注意到有东西从静止的海面上浮现。它碰巧是一个小型定居点——不知被洪水淹没了多少年代——经过一番潜水作业，他们发现了一大批东西，补偿他们麻烦绰绰有余。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not reach their destination, but still managed to bring back some loot.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者没能抵达目的地，但还是成功带回来一些战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: It seems that your Seekers must have run into some trouble, for, had they been successful and stuck to their plan, they should have returned to Stormfall long ago. It is very unlikely that they will never return.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 看来你们的探索者一定遇到了一些麻烦，因为，如果他们成功并坚持他们的计划，他们早就应该回到暴风港了。而他们叛逃的几率微乎其微。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers did not return from their expedition.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者尚未从探险中返回。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Once your Seekers had arrived at their destination, they scoured it for days, looking for any sign of loot or treasure that may have served to enrich you and the city of Stormfall. Alas, after looking everywhere they could, their efforts turned up absolutely nothing. Tired and dejected, they returned to Stormfall empty-handed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一旦你的探索者到达目的地，就会搜寻好几天，寻找任何可能对你或暴风港而言有价值的战利品或财宝。唉，他们到处找了找，结果一无所获。他们又疲惫又沮丧，空手而归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Seekers arrived at their destination,  their muscles burning with the effort of their journey. They were energized by the promise of treasure but were forced to return prematurely when assailed by monsters from a nearby nest.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者抵达了他们的目的地，旅途中热血沸腾。他们受到宝藏的激励兴奋不已，但因为被附近巢穴中的怪物袭击，只能被迫提前返回。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After hitting landfall, you Seekers disembarked and combed over the landscape. Despite following every lead they could, nothing of value ever crossed their paths. Low on supplies and on their last legs, your Seekers decided it best to return to Stormfall, even if it was with nothing to show.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 登陆后，你们这些探索者下了船，在陆地上搜寻。尽管他们竭尽全力，但没有什么有价值的东西与他们有缘。由于缺乏补给、穷途末路，你的探索者决定最好回到暴风城，即使没东西可以交差。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Despite reaching their destination, it seems that the lead your Seekers were pursuing seemed to be somewhat false, or at least the potential treasure they were seeking had been pilfered long before their arrival. Or perhaps they had not looked hard enough. Either way, they have returned with nothing to show.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管他们到达了目的地，但你的探索者所追寻的线索似乎有些错误，或者他们所追寻的潜在宝藏在他们到达之前很久就被人捷足先登了。也或许是他们搜刮得不够认真。不管怎样，他们都回来了，没东西可以交差。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall citizens discuss Laibon with a flair of exoticism: they’ll talk overlong about the disappeared god-king who abandoned the kingdom to anarchy and his famed praetorian guard. The truth is that Laibon is a nation like any other, exhausted by the Republican Liberators bringing war to their door. Their civilian militias have done well in protecting trade, but it would be best to make a short journey across the Sea of Torment to avoid crossing the frontier battlelines. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gold and Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港的市民对于莱邦的印象就是：他们说什么都绕不开一件事，让王国置于无政府状态失踪国王和他著名的禁卫军。的确是有点单调。 非但预想中的动乱没有发生，莱邦人民还转向了自治。他们的民兵守卫着商队的道路。干旱的气候令人苦恼，但这也意味着在这里商业活动对维持生命至关重要。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：金币

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your representatives were welcomed with open arms by the people of Laibon. Although there is no government to conduct trade with, there were plenty of merchants and citizens willing to take what Stormfall had to offer. After a number of transactions with the local populace, the wagons were full of gold and energy crystals ready to be returned to Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 莱邦人民热烈欢迎你们的代表。尽管没有政府可以与之进行贸易，但有很多商人和市民愿意接受暴风港提供的服务。在与当地民众进行了多次交易后，货车上装满了黄金和能量晶体，准备返回暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Laibon with Gold and Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着黄金和原初亲和从莱邦回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
This town is not on any map yet undergoes paradoxical growth. New neighborhoods accumulate in serpentine patterns with little regard for city planning. Despite this, all Tissarinians work and seem well paid by the mysterious owner. It was difficult enough verifying Tissarine’s existence, it’ll be harder to find it. That said, the owner pays for their visitors’ discretion with unique armor pieces out of their own collection, and perhaps far more should we bring the right bouquet... Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Random Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
这个城镇至今没有任何地图，却经历了自相矛盾的增长。新的聚居蜿蜒发展，从不考虑城市规划。尽管如此，所有的提萨林人都在工作，而且似乎从神秘城主那里取得了的丰厚报酬。 提萨林很难找，甚至要验证它的存在都非常困难的。据说，城主会让访客自行选择他们所没有的独特护具。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：随机护具

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The diplomatic mission to Tissarine was a success. After welcoming your diplomats into their home, the ruler of Tissarine accepted Stormfall’s tribute, and in return, had one of their most prized armor pieces brought from their personal armory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对提萨林的外交任务取得了成功。提萨林的统治者在邀请你的外交人员进入她家，接受了暴风港的献礼，作为回礼，从他们的私人军械库拿出了一块价值最高的护具。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Tisserine with Armor Pieces.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着一批护具从提萨林回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Jewel of Steel’s existence is a challenge to fate itself: it lies nestled in an active volcano. While hazardous, this locale allowed the development of their unique lava forging technique, which creates nigh unbreakable gear when performed correctly. Vulkaïn is an ally to Stormfall as fellow members of the Jeweled Concordat. The road is craggy but the city remains a precious resource in the arms trade. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: One-Handed Melee Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
钢铁明珠的存在本身就是在挑战命运：它坐落在活火山中。虽然危险，但这个地方让他们独特的岩浆锻造技术得以发展，如果操作得当就可以打造出坚不可摧的装备。 火神城作为明珠协约的成员，是暴风港的盟友。虽然商路崎岖，但这座城市在武器贸易中总能提供宝贵的战略资源。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：单手近战武器。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Vulkain, the city’s expertly crafted weapons in tow. As a city of the Jeweled Concordat, Vulkain was more than happy to trade with Stormfall, although your diplomats have returned a little flustered by the entire ordeal.  Perhaps it goes without saying, but the smoldering depths of Vulkain are not the most pleasant of places to conduct business.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交人员已经从火神城返回，那里几乎是精良武器的代名词。尽管你们的外交官们在经历了这场磨难后有些慌乱，但作为明珠协约的成员，火神城非常乐意与暴风港进行贸易。也许不言而喻，但火神城深处的闷热让那里的经商环境并不怎么舒适。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Vulkain with One-Handed Melee Weapons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着一批单手近战武器从火神城回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Far to the north, Greyharbour is an eerie little town shouldered by a forest of twisting trees on one side, and misty waters on the other. They make their trade from logging and fishing. Shipbuilding is a costly activity. To acquire wood at a decent price, it would be best to turn to Greyharbour, though legends surrounding the town frighten the tradesmen. Potential Outcomes:

Temporary Productivity Boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在遥远的北方，有一个叫做灰港的古怪小镇，小镇一边是一片扭曲的森林，另一边是迷雾笼罩的海域。他们以伐木为生，并且把木材运到海上贩卖。 船舶建造是一项耗资巨大的活动。尽管小镇周围的一些传说令很多商人望而却步，但为了以一个合理的价格获得木材，求诸灰港是最好的选择。 潜在效果：

临时生产力加成

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats were able to navigate the forests of Greyharbour without too much difficulty. They were welcomed by the townsfolk, who were delighted that Stormfall had taken such an interest in their modest little town. A feast was held, and afterward, Greyharbour was more than happy to supply Stormfall with wood.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交人员能够轻松地在灰港的森林中确定方向。他们受到了镇上居民的欢迎，他们很高兴暴风港对他们这座朴素的小镇产生了如此大的兴趣。举行了一场宴会之后，灰港表示非常乐意为暴风港提供木材。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Greyharbour with materials, boosting Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的探索者已经从灰港返回，带回来一些材料，提高了生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The strange floating island you glimpse in the sky has a name. Archion, jewel of the clouds, was mounted with a unique antigravity technology. From their seat in the sky, the inhabitants have become avid slavers. Archion passes on its lowest anchorpoint over land, though one should time their trip astutely if they hope to get on for purposes of trade. The Departed, explorers from Archion, craft magnificent bows if one’s willing to risk the journey for them. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Bows.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
那个你偶尔能在天空中看到的奇怪浮岛名叫阿奇恩，被誉为云端明珠，它依靠一种独特的反重力技术飞行。或许是因为久居天空，他们变得热衷于奴隶贸易。 阿奇恩将它最低的锚点设立在痛苦之海上，那里诡谲云涌，贩卖奴隶的黑帮横行。无间行者是来自阿奇恩的探险家，会为为愿意替他们冒险的的人打造精美绝伦的弓。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：弓。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The caravan has returned safely from Archion. They reached the floating city just in time; in fact, it was mere hours before it was due to take flight again. They met with some of the Departed’s rangers and managed to trade for some exceptional bows.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 商队已经安全地从阿奇恩返回。他们及时抵达了这座漂浮的城市；事实上，几小时后它就要再次起飞了。他们会见了一些无间游侠，并设法交易到了一批特殊的弓。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Archion with Bows.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着一批好弓从阿奇恩回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Two titanic beasts walk side by side in the Jeweled Concordat, with a bridge hanging between them and a city resting on their backs: C’tul. Its people are hunters, spiritually bound to the jungle. Strange creatures roam the woodlands. They may be a danger to those unfamiliar with C’tul. One might still want to venture there, as the city produces peerlessly sharp hunting knives and daggers meant to avoid as much suffering in their prey as possible. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Daggers.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
两只巨兽在契约的作用下并肩行走，一座城市坐落在他们脊背之上，两半边由天桥相连，这就是：克'图。克'图人个个都是是猎手，与森林有着深邃的精神羁绊。 森林里到处游荡的古怪生物，对那些不熟悉克'图的人来说可能会非常危险。人们会想冒险去那里，是因为这座城市产出无与伦比的锋利猎刀。这是因为克'图人想尽可能避免猎物遭受痛苦。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：匕首。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The mission to C’tul was a success. After being welcomed aboard the hulking beasts of C’tul, your diplomats were invited on a hunt. When they returned, the hunters gave their daggers as gifts to your diplomats, the blood from their kills dried upon the blades: a reminder of the life given to strengthen the bond between Stormfall and C’tul.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对克'图的外交任务取得了成功。在克'图巨兽背上受到的迎接之后，你的外交人员受邀参加狩猎。返程中，猎人们将自己的匕首作为礼物赠予你的外交人员，他们击杀猎物留下的血迹在匕首上干涸。这样一批生命的纪念品被用来强化暴风港和克'图的关系。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from C’tul with Daggers.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着一批匕首从克'图回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Salander is the last vestige of an underground network. It houses an academy for the purpose of Enneract study, directed by the Augur. One mustn’t lose their way in the winding tunnels to Salander: the nearby ruins are cursed, and none come back from them. Still, many are tempted: various abnormalities in Salander indicate a large cache of Enneracts somewhere nearby. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gold and Primordial Affinity (Large Quantity).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
萨兰德是一个地下网络的最后遗迹。这里有一所学院，由占卜师指导进行对超维之石的研究。 在通往萨兰德的蜿蜒隧道中，绝对不能迷失方向：附近的废墟都是被诅咒的，陷入其中没人能活着回来。尽管如此，还是有很多人被吸引过来，因为各种迹象表明，萨兰德附近有着大量超维之石。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：金币和原初亲和（大量）。
