Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The mission to Salander was a success. Your representatives visited the Cabal of Illumination, meeting the Augur who resides over its operations. They talked at length about the Cabal’s experiments with magic, and, happy with the conduct of your representatives, the Augur gave them gold and energy crystals for the return journey.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 前往萨兰德的任务很成功。你们的代表参观了启示结社，会见了运作它的占卜者们。他们详细地谈论了结社的魔法实验，并且，对你们代表的表现感到欣慰，占卜者给了他们黄金和能量晶体作回程之用。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Salander with Gold and Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着黄金和原初亲和从萨兰德回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The city of Three-Peaks lies precariously balanced on three mountaintops, holding on only by a wish and a dream. Dreams are in large supply: the slopes below grow the strongest opiates in the four realms. The waters between Stormfall and Three-Peaks are well-charted territory, but they’re assailed by the navies of both Kuei and the Republic, with scavengers not far behind to pick up the pieces. A sample of the local narcotics may reward any pains taken. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Endgame Consumable.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这座三峰城就坐落在三座山顶上，摇摇欲坠，只是由一个愿望和一个梦想支撑着它。梦想来自海量利润：山下的山坡生长着Wolcen最带劲的鸦片。\n\n暴风港与三峰城之间的水域有着测绘完善的海图，尽管还有登山的困难。但当地的毒品货样足以告慰所做的努力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats were successful on their trip to Three-Peaks. The ascent was difficult, but at the summit, they were invited to enjoy the pleasures that the city had to offer. After indulging in the various opiates provided by the city’s leaders, so pleased were they by the antics of your diplomats, the leaders of Three-Peaks insisted that some be taken back to Stormfall’s regent.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官成功地登上了三峰城。攀登上山困难重重，但在山顶上，他们被邀请去享受这座城市所提供的乐趣。在沉迷于城市领导人提供的各种鸦片制剂后，他们对你们外交官的滑稽动作感到非常高兴，而后他们检查坚持要让外交官把一些商品带回暴风港的摄政王那里。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Three-Peaks with Spices.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的使团已经带着一批香料从三峰城回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Of all the city states in the Concordat, Gomora has the greatest reason for desiring independence from the Republic. They don’t criminalize the practice of magic as others do, and an occult commerce has developed there. The journey from Stormfall to Gomora takes one across the deathly Sea of Torment. The island is lost in the middle of nowhere, almost impossible to find, but no other place practices Primordial magic so freely. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Primordial Affinity (Large Quantity).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在宝石协约的所有城邦中，哥摩拉最有理由抵触共和国的统治。他们不像其他城邦那样将魔法行为定为犯罪，而且那里已经发展出了基于神秘学的商业体系。 从暴风港到哥摩拉的旅程需要穿越致命的痛苦之海。这座岛屿隐藏在茫茫大海之中，几乎不可能找到，但没有其他地方能如此自由地施展原初魔法。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：原初亲和（大量）。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: It was close, but your diplomats have returned safely from Gomora. The Sea of Torment was not their only obstacle: unsavoury individuals of all kinds lurked on every corner. However, once inside the city, the Arbiters of Gomora escorted the diplomats to a safe location so that they could conduct their business. After a while, they were able to procure energy crystals. How or where from, they are not quite willing to say.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有惊无险，但好在你的外交官们已经安全地从哥摩拉返回了。痛苦之海并不是他们路上唯一的阻碍：各种各样棘手的家伙潜伏在各个角落虎视眈眈。然而只要你进入了城区，哥摩拉的仲裁者就会护送他们到一个安全的地方以便于他们继续工作。用不了多久，他们就能够得到能量水晶了。如何或是从何取得，他们好像不太愿意透露。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Gomora with Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交官们从哥摩拉带着原初亲和回来了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
It’s best to ponder affairs before attempting to trade with the United Republic of Mankind. After all, the Jeweled Concordat only crystallized as an alliance when we saw the Republic invade our neighbours. There’s no opportunity they won’t employ to spread their ideology. Enter their territory as a magic user, and your life is forfeit. But anyone willing to submit to the regime for a trip might sell basic supplies with ease. The Republicans invest too little into agricultural infrastructure, preferring the business of war. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gold (Medium Quantity).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在试图与人类联合共和国进行贸易之前，最好先考虑一下交易的内容。毕竟，当我们看到共和国入侵我们的邻国时，明珠协约才刚刚结为联盟。他们没有理由不传播他们的意识形态。 如果以魔法使用者的身份进入他们的领地，你将被抹杀。但是，任何愿意服从政府出访规定的人都可以轻松地出售基本物资。共和国人对农业基础设施的投资太少，因为更喜欢战争事业。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：金币（中量）。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Although they did not receive the warmest of welcomes, your diplomats’ mission to the Republic was a success. The transaction was curt. They went in, said some words, traded what they had, and returned with gold on the wagons. The Republic did not seem very eager to prolong the interaction.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管没有收到最热烈的欢迎，但前往共和国的使团仍然取得了成功。交易很简单。他们走进去，说了几句话，完成了所有商品交换，然后就把黄金放在马车上回来了。共和国似乎并不渴望延续这种交流。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from the URM with Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交官带着黄金从人类联邦共和国返回。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The dense jungle of the Kuei Empire hardly seems inviting to caravans, and yet, a network of roads splits the land into manageable portions. The nation produces dye, wood, and many more materials, while still providing bread to its citizens. It’s best to take care on the imperial highways, however. Kuei merchants warn of a bandit group known as the Jade Legion, who’ve emptied many a caravan clean of goods. What’s more, the Republican Liberator forces stick to the roads, knowing better than to try themselves against the jungle. Potential Outcomes:

Temporary Productivity Boost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
库埃帝国茂密的丛林似乎很难吸引商队，然而，道路网将土地分割成可管理的部分。这个国家生产染料、木材和更多的材料，同时仍然向其公民提供面包。 然而在帝国公路最好还是小心为妙，库埃的商人警告称，有一个名为“翡翠军”的土匪组织，已经洗劫了许多商队的货物。犹有过之的是，共和党解放军知道不能与我们在丛林中对抗，于是他们便坚守在道路上。 潜在效果：

临时生产力加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats reached Kuei safe and sound, their ships managing to navigate the seas and reach Kuei’s shores. After meeting with the Empire’s dignitaries, an agreement was made and materials were exchanged for Stormfall’s gold. Kuei’s dignitaries seemed a little surprised that your diplomats had managed to reach there in one piece; the Jade Legion is an ever-looming threat, after all.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官平安抵达奎伊，他们的船成功穿过大海并抵达了库埃的海岸。在与帝国要员会面后，双方达成了协议，并用材料交换了暴风城的黄金。库埃的政要们似乎有点惊讶，你们的外交团竟然毫发无损地抵达了；毕竟，翡翠军的威胁从未消退。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Kuei with materials, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官带着材料从奎伊回来，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The tundras of Varg are being ripped at the seams by a dozen clans, like children fighting over a toy. The royal meadhall’s last attempt at unity came in the shape of a boy, unceremoniously pushed onto the throne. The clans suspect outside intervention in this succession, particularly from the Republic. Entering through battlelines with the Republican Liberators is inadvisable, though the ship ride to Varg’s coast will be long. Any expedition risks being met with hostility, but show the food in your palm and the litigants ought to heel. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gold (Large Quantity).
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
法吉的苔原被十几个氏族瓜分着，就像孩子们为了玩具打架一样。皇室派最后一次团结的尝试是以一个男孩的形象出现的，他毫不客气地被推上了王位。 氏族怀疑外界干预了这一继承，其中尤其怀疑共和国的干预。虽然前往法吉海岸的航程会很长，但通过共和国解放军的战线进入是不可能的。任何远征都有遭到敌视的危险，但如果略施小计贿赂，他们就不会管你。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：黄金（大量）。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The journey through Varg was tense, but in the end, your diplomats managed to make the trip a profitable one. In the ancestral homes of each clan, they were met with hostility, but after seeing the supplies that Stormfall had on offer, the Vargians could not refuse the opportunity to trade. As a result, the wagons were laden with gold upon the diplomats' return.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过法吉的旅程很紧张，但最后，你们的外交官成功不虚此行。在每个氏族的祖居中，他们都遭到敌视，但在看到暴风港提供的补给后，法吉人无法拒绝交易的机会。结果，外交官们一回来，马车上就装满了黄金。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Varg with Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交官带着金币从法吉回来了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Brotherhood of Dawn may assemble warriors, but it also assembles the faithful. The creed of Anathëa preaches an openness to newcomers, which while not evangelical, allows many to gain power from the Lady of Dawn. The Brotherhood of Dawn has had precious few allies since the United Republic of Mankind came into power. Given a show of good will, we should arrive in one piece. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
黎明兄弟会可以召集战士，但也可以召集信徒。安娜蒂亚的信条宣扬对那些虽然不是福音派的新来者开放，允许许多人从黎明女神那里获得力量。 自从人类联合共和国上台以来，黎明兄弟会几乎没有什么盟友。如果我们表示善意，那样应该能安全抵达。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：原初亲和。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Brotherhood of Dawn was happy to receive your diplomats, making them feel right at home amongst the devotees of Anathëa. Knowing of your abilities and the magical energy required for you to continue serving the people of the continent as you have, the Brotherhood provided your diplomats with numerous energy crystals to bring back to Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明兄弟会很高兴接待你的外交官，让他们在安娜蒂亚的信徒中感到宾至如归。知道你的能力和你为全大陆人民服务所需的神奇能量，兄弟会为你的外交官们提供了无数的能量水晶，让他们带回暴风港。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from the Brotherhood of Dawn with Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官已经从黎明兄弟会带着原初亲和回来了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Nothing should be able to live in the Salt Deserts of Morkaï, and yet something does. Below the Tower of Salt, a circle of blind monks toils in the mines. The diamonds that they collect are the very same that fortify the Radiant Fleet. The monks warn merchant caravans from entering the caves, claiming they are home to an evil that only they are shielded from. Figures of women and men in anguish stand inside, sculpted in sand. Any enterprise taken towards the diamond mines should be carefully considered. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Gems and Genesis Stones.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
任何东西都不应该有能力生活在莫尔凯的盐碱沙漠里，然而总有些东西可以。盐塔下，一圈盲人僧侣在矿井里劳作。他们收集的钻石和加固光芒舰队的钻石是一样的。 僧侣警告商队不要进入洞穴，他们声称那里是一个恶魔的家园，而只有他们才能躲开那些恶魔。其中有着痛苦中的女男塑像，是用沙子雕刻的。任何走向钻石矿的集团都应仔细权衡斟酌。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：宝石和创世宝石。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats were met by a group of Monks on the edge of the Salt Desert. They provided escort, using their walking sticks to check for any unusual vibrations. A number of detours had to be taken, to avoid the legendary creature worming below the surface. When questioned, they would not utter its name, for doing so is akin to summoning a demon, they said. They reached the Diamond Mines without further incident and brought back a wealth of gems.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官在盐漠的边缘被一群僧侣接见。他们提供护送，用手杖检查是否有异常振动。为了避免传说中的生物在地面下蠕动，有很多地方必须绕道而行。当被问起时，他们不会说出它的名字，因为这样做跟召唤一个恶魔是一样的，他们说。他们顺利到达钻石矿，带回了大量宝石。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats returned from the Diamond Mines with Gems.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交官带着宝石从钻石矿回来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Rumour tells of an inn where strange folk go. Depending on who tells the story, you’ll find it at the edge of the world, or at the corner of your street when the wind changes on a new moon. In either case, it’s no place for a mortal. The Landlady opens her door to fey types and grants them shelter around a dim candlelight. One shudders to think how they’d react to an interruption. Those who claim to have walked by describe the rattling of the walls and howling inside the house, culminating in a moment where all sound goes mute. Potential Outcomes:

Loot received: Ethereal Reagents.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
谣传有一家只有怪人会去的客栈。取决于讲故事的人，你会发现它或是在世界的边缘，或是在新月之下风向忽变的街角。无论哪种情况，都不是普通的地方。女房东为各式各样的怪人们打开房门，让他们在昏暗的烛光下得以荫蔽。一想到如果上门叨扰的话他们会作何反应，就会让人不寒而栗。那些声称路过的人描述了墙壁的嘎嘎声和屋内的嚎叫声，最终在达到高潮的时刻所有声音都一下子戛然而止。 潜在效果：

获得战利品：飘渺灵气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your representatives have returned safely from their journey to the Whisper’s Rest Inn. The landlady welcomed them with open arms; she knew what they were there for. Once pleasantries were exchanged, she led them down to the cellar. She conducted some ritual, and at one point your diplomats swore they were about to be sacrificed to the monsters of the abyss. Alas, they needn’t have worried. Once the ritual was complete, the lady of the Inn gave them Ethereal Reagents as an offering to the regent of Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的代表已经安全地从他们前往低语休憩旅店的旅程返回了。房东太太张开双臂欢迎他们，她知道他们过来是为了什么。寒暄一番，她就把他们领进地窖。她主持了一些仪式，有一次你的外交官们发誓他们差点就要被献祭给深渊的怪物。唉，他们没必要这么神经过敏。仪式一结束，客栈的女士就给了他们飘渺灵气，作为对风暴港摄政王的祭礼。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from Whisper’s Rest Inn with Ethereal Reagents.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官带着飘渺灵气从低语休憩旅店回来了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned from their mission. In the end, they were unable to make it to their destination. They did, however, come upon another wandering caravan while out on the roads, and were able to make a small trade, so the journey was not a complete waste.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官已经结束任务回来了。最后，他们没能到达目的地。然而，他们在路上遇到了另一个流浪的商队，他们能做点小买卖，所以这次旅行也不是完全的白费。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行了一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats were unable to reach their intended destination. After torrential rainfall, the wagons drove straight into a thick mire. Despite their best efforts, the wagons had to be left behind. They managed to recover a fraction of what they had taken with them, loaded onto the horses, and were able to make some smaller trades with the villages they passed through on the way home.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官无法到达他们预定的目的地。暴雨过后，货车直接驶入一片厚厚的泥沼。尽管他们尽了最大的努力，货车还是被甩在了后面。他们设法找回了随身携带的一小部分，装上了马，并且能够与回家路上经过的村庄进行一些小规模的交易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行了一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After reaching their destination and parking their wagons, the local leaders approached your diplomats, excessively apologetic. Apparently, even though they valued their ties with Stormfall dearly, they found themselves unable to give as much as they would have liked to your diplomats. Little could be done to change their minds, and so the diplomats returned, not with what they had hoped, but something to show nonetheless.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在到达目的地并停好货车后，当地领导人接近了你们的外交官，非常抱歉。显然，尽管他们非常重视与暴风港的关系，但他们发现自己无法向你的外交官提供他们所希望的那么多。几乎没什么办法改变他们的想法，所以外交官们回来了，不是带着他们所希望的东西，而是一些值得展示的东西。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行了一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While en route to their destination, your diplomats were chased off the beaten track by bandits. After finding a suitable spot to lay low, the Thunderblades escorting the caravan set up an ambush. They were swift and ruthless and managed to take a number of the bandits as hostages, including, they discerned, the son of a bandit chieftain. After being escorted to the bandit camp, your diplomats were able to trade the son for a hefty ransom.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在前往目的地的途中，你们的外交官被匪徒赶出预定的路线。在找到一个合适的低洼处后，护送商队的雷霆之刃设下伏击。他们动作迅速，心狠手辣，成功地把一些土匪劫为俘虏，据他们所知，其中包括一个土匪首领的儿子。在被护送到土匪营地后，你们的外交官得以用儿子换取巨额赎金。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats were buffeted off course by tempestuous winds and the wrathful waves of the open ocean. Despite their misfortune, they ran aground on an island, encountering a small commune. They were not quite used to visitors; and seeing the strange, alien objects owned by the diplomats, they were eager to trade some of their own belongings.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的外交官们被狂风暴雨和公海上的怒浪打得偏离了航线。尽管遭遇不幸，他们还是在一个小岛上搁浅，遇到了一个小部落。他们不习惯访客。但是看到外交官拥有奇怪的外来物体，他们渴望交易自己的一些物品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats have returned, but not from their intended destination. After sailing for a number of days, they were intercepted by a small fleet of Republic ships. Your diplomats were led to a nearby Republican outpost, where they were questioned on their cargo and their destination. After discerning the contents of the ships, the Republic demanded a trade, albeit at a reduced rate to what your diplomats were expecting.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官已返回，但未从预定目的地返回。经过几天的航行，他们被一小队共和国船拦截。您的外交官被带到附近的共和党前哨站，在那里他们被询问货物和目的地。在辨认了船上的物品之后，共和国要求进行贸易，尽管其汇率比您的外交官所期望的要低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While out on the open seas, your diplomats came across a small merchant convoy, traveling in the same direction. After signaling, your diplomats had their ship anchored alongside the merchants, and after a short discussion, realized that they were carrying valuable cargo. They proved willing to trade it to, leaving the diplomats happy enough to return to Stormfall without reaching their intended destination.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 出港抵达公海时，您的外交官遇到了一个小型商队与他们相伴而行。在发出信号之后，您的外交官下锚在商队旁边，经过短暂的讨论，他们意识到商队的船上正在运送有价值的货物。他们愿意进行交易，所以外交官们很高兴地返回了暴风城而没有前往预定的目的地。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Part-way to their destination, a pirate ship emerged from a cove to pursue your diplomats. Desperate to escape, they had to abandon their current course and turn around for Stormfall. They were followed into a storm, and when they emerged, they noticed the pirate ship sinking. Unable to believe their luck, your diplomats turned the ship around, allowing a couple of survivors to be brought on board as captives. In exchange for their lives, the pirates led the diplomats to their buried treasure.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在到达目的地的途中，一艘海盗船从海湾冲出追捕您的外交官。为了躲避，他们不得不放弃目前的路线，转身返航回暴风港。途中他们被卷入了一场暴风雨，当云开雾散时，他们注意到海盗船再暴风雨中沉没了。您的外交官们不敢相信自己的运气，调转船头并俘虏了几个幸存者。为了保命，海盗将外交官们带到了他们埋藏宝藏的地方。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not reach their destination, but still managed to conduct some trade.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的外交官没有到达目的地，但仍然设法进行一些贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The time has long passed for your diplomats’ return. They should have been back in Stormfall weeks ago. With no news from them at this point in time, it is safe to assume that they are never coming back
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 距离您的外交官应该返回的时间已经过去很久了。他们本应该在几周前回到暴风港。由于目前没有来自他们的消息，几乎可以肯定地认为他们永远回不来了

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your diplomats did not returned from their mission.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的外交使团未从探险中返回。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After arriving at their destination, feet weary and dust scratching at their lungs, your diplomats entered negotiations. Unfortunately for them, negotiations were long and protracted, and no consensus could be reached with the local leaders. In the end, your diplomats were forced to return to Stormfall with nothing to show for their troubles.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 到达目的地后，舟车劳顿风尘仆仆的外交官开始进行谈判。对他们而言不幸的是，谈判的时间极其漫长，而无论如何也无法与当地领导人达成共识。最后，您的外交官被迫返回暴风港，历尽艰险，颗粒无收。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Despite arriving at their destination in good time, negotiations with the local leaders did not go as well as your diplomats would have hoped. One of your diplomats, perhaps who had missed the briefing before departure, made some gesture or other that offended the sensibilities of the locals. Consequently, no trade was made, and your diplomats returned empty-handed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 尽管及时到达目的地，但与当地领导人的谈判进展不如您的外交官所希望的那样。您的一位外交官，也许是在出发前错过了简报会，他做出了某种举动或手势冒犯了当地人。因此，没法进行任何贸易，您的外交官空手而归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After mooring their ship at their intended destination, your diplomats met with the local leaders. Talks went on for hours, beginning in the morning and stretching to the early hours of the following morning. Realizing that no consensus could be reached, your diplomats made the return journey to Stormfall, their ship lighter than they would have liked.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在将船只停泊在预定的目的地之后，您的外交官会见了当地领导人。谈判持续了几个小时，从早上开始一直持续到第二天清晨。您的外交官意识到无法达成共识，因此返回了暴风港，他们的船比他们想要的要轻。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The sailing had been hard-going for your diplomats, meaning that they arrived at their destination much later than intended. The local leaders, offended by this tardiness, decided to not be forthcoming with the goods they could offer. Consequently, your diplomats were forced to sail home empty-handed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对于您的外交官来说，航行一直很艰难，这意味着他们到达目的地的时间比预期的要晚得多。地方领导人因这种迟到而感到恼怒，拒绝交易他们可以提供的商品。因此，您的外交官被迫空手返航。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Many of Stormfall’s land-based trade routes are little more than dirt paths. This slows down the progress of caravans looking to trade, especially during wet weather, as their wagons often get bogged down in the mud. If you were to invest in stone-cobbled roads, progress would be far easier, making trade partners more likely to invest more time and money exporting their goods to Stormfall. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港的许多陆路贸易路线只不过是一条土路。这减慢了商队的贸易往来，尤其是在潮湿的天气里，因为他们的货车经常在泥泞中陷入困境。如果您要投资在鹅卵石道路上，那么贸易进展会顺利得多，这使贸易伙伴能投入更多的时间和金钱来将其商品出口到暴风港。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Roadworks have been completed, making it easier and faster for caravans to reach Stormfall. This should encourage your trade partners to send caravans with increasing frequency from now on.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 道路工程已经完成，这使得商队能更便捷地到达暴风港。从现在开始，这会鼓励你的贸易伙伴越来越频繁地派来商队。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Roadworks have been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 道路工程已经完成，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Despite being surrounded by water, Stormfall struggles to supply its citizens with a reliable supply of clean drinking water. The city has relied on a local river that runs into the sea nearby, but years of pollution from the sewers have riddled the river’s water with disease. The river’s source lies quite a distance upstream, but if you were to build an aqueduct connecting its water to Stormfall, the risk of disease would be reduced tremendously. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
尽管临水而建，但暴风港仍难以为市民提供可靠的清洁饮用水。这座城市的饮水依赖一条流入附近海域的当地河流，但多年来下水道的污染已使这条河流的水质充满病菌。这条河的源头在上游相当长的一段距离，但是如果你要建造一条连接源流和暴风港的水渠，疾病的风险将大大降低. 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Construction work on the new Aqueduct has been completed, giving Stormfall access to a new, clean water source. With clean water flowing through the city, they are now less likely to contract water-borne diseases.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 新水渠的建造工作已经完成，这让暴风港有了一个新的清洁水源。有了流经千家万户的清洁水源，他们现在很难再感染通过水体传播的疾病。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Aqueduct has been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 水渠已经完成，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Sanitation in Stormfall has always been an issue that has plagued its citizens. The sewer system is a relic of another era, barely able to cope with the population within Stormfall’s walls, even despite the recent deaths incurred on its people. Sewage flows downward, making the spread of disease worse in the lower ring. If the sewers were expanded and made to re-direct the sewage off the streets, the risk of disease should fall and thus strengthen the city’s work-force. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港中的卫生设施一直是困扰其公民的问题。下水道系统是另一个时代的遗物，即使最近有人丧生，它也几乎无法应付风暴港城内的人口。污水向下流，使下环的疾病传播更加严重。如果扩大下水道并改道将污水引至街外，那么疾病的风险就应该会降低，从而增强城市的劳动力。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovation work on the sewers has finished. The flow of the city’s waste no longer goes through the city’s streets, where it is most likely to fester and spread disease among your citizens. With the streets cleaned up, your citizens are less likely to contract diseases.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 下水道的装修工作已经完成。城市废物的流动不再通过容易发生溃烂并在您的公民传播疾病的街道。清理街道后，您的公民感染疾病的可能性降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sewer Renovations have been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 下水道改造已经完成，从而提高了暴风港的生产率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall’s farmers rely heavily on persistent rains to irrigate their fields. However, the region does have its dry seasons, increasing the risk of crop failure and making it difficult to keep up with the demand of Stormfall’s population. If you were to build a network of canals connecting one of the rivers to the fields, this would make crop yields far more reliable, ensuring Stormfall’s citizens have enough food all year round. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港的农民严重依赖持续降雨来灌溉他们的田地。但是，该地区确实存在旱季，这增加了农作物歉收的风险，使其难以跟上暴风港人口的需求。如果您要建立一道将其中一条河流连接到田野的运河网络，这将使农作物的收成更加可靠，从而确保暴风城的居民全年都有足够的粮食。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: New Irrigation Networks have finished being developed in the Farmlands. With a steady and consistent flow of water irrigating their fields, farmers can be more certain of the yields that their fields will produce. The citizens of Stormfall shall be better fed as a result.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在农田中已经完成了新的灌溉网络的开发。有持续稳定的水灌溉田间，农民可以更好确定农田的产量。其结果是，他们能更好地喂饱暴风城的居民。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Irrigation Networks have been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 灌溉网络已经完成，从而提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
A recent innovation in agricultural practice has been brought to your attention. Currently, your farmers grow the same crop in the same field every year. In the Republic, however, they rotate which crops are grown on a field in any given year. This means that different nutrients from the soil are used during each rotation, allowing the soil to stay fertile for longer. If your farmers were to adopt this practice, yields were more consistent, providing a greater supply of food to the city. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
最近的一项农业实践创新引起了你们的注意。目前，你们的农民每年在同一块地里种植同样的作物。然而，在共和国，他们在任何一年里都轮流种植不同作物。这意味着在每次轮作过程中，土壤中的不同养分被利用，从而使土壤保持更长时间的肥沃。如果你的农民也采用这种做法，产量会更稳定，为城市提供更多的粮食供应。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your farmers have been trained in the agricultural practice of crop rotation. With different crops being grown in the same field every year, the nutrients required for each crop are able to replenish themselves in the soil when they are not being absorbed. This makes yields more reliable and the citizens feel more secure knowing they will be well fed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您的农民已接受轮作农业实践的培训。每年在同一田里种植不同的农作物，每一种农作物所需的养分在不被吸收时能够在土壤中补充。这使产量更加可靠，并且市民知道他们有充足的粮食储备，因此他们会感到更加安心。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your farmers have been taught Crop Rotation, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你们的农民已经学会了轮作，提高了暴风港的生产力

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Much of Stormfall’s poorer population rely on the steady flow of cheap staple foods into the city. One such staple is bread, which requires flour to produce. Currently, Stormfall does not have enough windmills to grind the amount of grain needed to make flour, meaning that providing enough bread for the population is difficult. If you were to invest in a new network of windmills, less of your citizens would go hungry. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港的许多贫困人口依靠源源不断流入城市的廉价主食生活。其中一种主食是面包，它需要面粉来制作。目前，暴风港没有足够的风车来研磨制作面粉所需的谷物，这意味着难以为民众提供足够的面包。如果你要投资一个新的风车网络，你的市民就会少挨饿。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A network of Windmills has finished construction, meaning that grain can be ground efficiently and in large quantities. With more grain available, more bread can be produced to feed the poorest workers of Stormfall's society, increasing the morale of the work-force.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一个风车网络已经完成建设，这意味着粮食可以被高效地大量研磨。有了更多的可用粮食，就可以生产更多的面包来养活暴风港社会最贫穷的工人，从而提高劳动力的士气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Windmills have been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 风车已经完工，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
On past occasions where Stormfall underwent a crisis, the city was unable to provide enough care for the wounded. Even during times of peace, raids in the surrounding countryside ensure that there is a steady supply of citizens coming to the city seeking aid, only to be turned away. If you were to invest in a trauma center to look after the sick and wounded, more of your citizens would be able to return to the work-force in good time. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在过去暴风港遭遇危机的时候，这个城市无法为伤员提供足够的护理。即使在和平时期，周边农村受到的突袭也使得总有市民前来城市寻求援助，但他们不得不遭到拒绝。如果你投资建立一个疗伤中心来照顾病人和伤员，那么你的更多公民将能够及时返回工作岗位。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A new Trauma Center has been established in Stormfall. Your citizens feel more secure in the knowledge that if disaster does strike Stormfall, the city now has the proper facilities to tend to their wounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在暴风港建立了一个新的疗伤中心。你的市民感到更加安全，因为他们知道如果灾难真的袭击了暴风港，这个城市现在有适当的设施来处理他们的伤势。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Trauma Center has been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 医疗中心已经完工，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Work-related deaths in Stormfall are incredibly high. The number of citizens in the work-force seems to be decreasing, and the citizens that do work are chronically exhausted, unable to function at full capacity. If you were to introduce new laws pertaining to working conditions, perhaps restricting the number of hours worked, with mandatory break periods and food supplied, your workers would be more productive. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港中死于工伤的人数高得令人难以置信。劳动力中的公民人数似乎在减少，工作的公民长期精疲力竭，无法充分发挥作用。如果你出台与工作条件有关的新法律，比如限制工作时间，强制规定休息时间和提供食物，你的工人会更有效率。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The new legislation regarding working conditions has been passed, ensuring that all workers have access to a safe and considerate work environment. Knowing that the city of Stormfall appreciates their work, the work-force continues to grow in its efficiency.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有关工作条件的新立法已经通过，确保所有工人都能获得安全和周到的工作环境。知道暴风港赞赏他们的工作，劳动力的效率继续提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Working Conditions have been improved, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 工作条件得到改善，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall once had some of the best training facilities on the continent, perfect for conditioning the city guards, Seekers, and the elite force of Thunderblades that protect the city’s interests. Recent events have left these facilities and their training equipment in a sorry state. If you were to invest in new, perhaps improved training facilities, more new recruits could be drafted into the ranks of Stormfall’s military organizations, increasing security in all corners of the city-state. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased. The Project "Renovate Seekers Garrison" will become available.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港曾经拥有一些欧洲大陆最好的培训设施，非常适合训练城市守卫、搜索者和保护城市利益的精英雷霆之刃部队。最近发生的事件使这些设施及其训练设备被废弃了。如果你要投资于新的，或是改进的训练设施，更多的新兵可能会被征召到暴风港的军事组织的行列中，从而提高城邦各个角落的安全性。 效果：

永久提高生产力。 开放项目“整编探索者驻军”。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Stormfall’s new training facilities were built successfully. These should increase the quality of new recruits exponentially in the future. As a further consequence, it is now feasible for Stormfall to invest in re-invigorating its Seeker initiative.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴风港的新培训设施建造成功。这将在未来成倍地提高新兵的素质。作为进一步的结果，现在风暴港可以通过投资重新激活其探索者的积极性。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Training Facilities completed, boosting Productivity and allowing Seekers Garrison renovations.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 培训设施完工，提高了生产力，并允许搜索者驻军整修。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
In the past Stormfall’s educational institutions produced some of the greatest minds on the continent. However, due to a steady decline in these services provided by the city, the brightest of Stormfall’s young have been sent abroad to pursue their passions and learn their trades. If you were to invest in reinvigorating Stormfall’s educational institutions, more of Stormfall’s young would stay to lend their talents to the city’s enterprises in the future. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在过去，暴风港的教育机构培养了一些全大陆最伟大的人才。然而，由于城市提供的这些服务不断减少，暴风港最聪明的年轻人被派到国外去追求他们的激情和进修他们的行业。如果你打算投资重振暴风港的教育机构，将来会有更多的年轻人留下来把他们的才能提供给城市的企业。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Work has been completed on improving Stormfall’s educational institutions. More apprenticeships are on offer, allowing more young people to learn their trades in the city. A new university has also been established, giving rise to a new breed of intellectuals that are pushing the boundaries of what can be achieved through all manner of innovations. This has given Stormfall’s industries a renewed vigor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 改善暴风港教育机构的工作已经完成。更多的学徒制提供，让更多的年轻人在城市学习他们的行业。一所新的大学也已经建立，产生了一批新的知识分子，他们正在努力通过各种创新突破可能的的界限。这使暴风港的工业焕发了新的活力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Educational Institutions have been improved, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 教育机构得到改善，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall relies on a consistent supply of wood for a number of its enterprises. Currently, the city does not have an efficient way of cutting logs into lumber for use in the construction of farmhouses, barns, and ships, just to name a few. If you were to invest in the construction of some new sawmills, Stormfall would be able to produce lumber at a much faster rate, making projects that require a lot of wood more feasible. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港的许多企业都依赖于持续的木材供应。目前，该市还没有一种有效的方法能将原木切割成木材，建造农舍、谷仓和制造船只，这些只是用到木材的很小一部分工业。如果你投资建造一些新的锯木厂，暴风港将能够以更快的速度生产木材，使需要大量木材的项目更加方便进行。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A new network of Sawmills has been established in the country around Stormfall. With this development, the city is now able to produce increasing quantities of lumber at greater efficiency, re-vitalizing Stormfall’s construction efforts wherever they may be.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一个新的锯木厂网络已在围绕风暴港的乡野中建成了。有了这样的发展，这个城市现在能够以更高的效率生产出更多的木材，在任何可能的地方都能辅助暴风港的建设。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sawmills have been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 锯木厂已经完工，提高了暴风港的生产率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Iron is a staple resource for any city. Stormfall relies on a steady supply of iron to forge new weapons, rivets for ship-building, and plates for the roofs of each of its buildings. There are some deposits of iron not far from Stormfall, located in the Highlands. If you were to construct some new equipment and hire some miners for the job, Stormfall would have to rely far less on foreign imports and would have easy access to iron for the city’s needs. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
铁是任何城市的主要资源。暴风港依靠稳定的铁供应来制造新的武器、造船用的铆钉以及每座建筑物屋顶的钢板。在离暴风港不远的高地上有一些铁矿。如果你要建造一些新的设备并雇佣一批矿工来进行这项工作，暴风港将可以很容易地获得满足城市需要的铁，大大减少对外国进口钢铁的依赖。 效果：

永久提高生产力

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The excavation of a new iron mine has been completed, bringing in a steady supply of iron into Stormfall. Now with this reliable source of iron, the city’s projects are no longer bottlenecked by having to wait for the appropriate import of materials.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一座新铁矿的挖掘工作已经完成，为暴雨带来了稳定的铁供应。现在，有了这种可靠的铁来源，城市的项目不再因必须等待适当的材料进口而受到限制。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Iron Mines have been excavated, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 铁矿被开采出来，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Rock is one of the most important resources for any city wishing to expand its territory and its reach. Cobble roads make for a better connection with trade partners, bricks make housing more robust against the fury of the elements. If you were to invest in the excavation of a new quarry, Stormfall’s expansion efforts could be increased several-fold. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
对于任何一个想扩大其领土和范围的城市来说，岩石是最重要的资源之一。鹅卵石路有助于与贸易伙伴建立更好的联系，砖头使房屋更坚固以抵御狂暴的天气。如果你投资建设一个新的采石场，暴风港的扩张力度可以增加几倍。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The stone quarry has now been excavated, allowing Stormfall to have quick and easy access to a supply of stone for all of its construction needs. Given how many of Stormfall’s construction plans rely on a steady supply of stone, this should make those projects more feasible going forward.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 采石场现在已经开工，使得暴风港能够快速方便地获得满足其所有施工需要的石料供应。为暴风港的大量建设计划提供稳定的石材供应，这些项目将会更加顺利进行。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Stone Quarry has been excavated, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 采石场被挖掘出来，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The poorest of Stormfall’s citizens, those in the lower ring, form the bulk of the city’s work-force. Many of them live in abject poverty, holes in their roofs and the spray from the sea seeping into their homes. As such, illness immobilizes and kills countless men and women who would otherwise be working to support their families. If you were to invest in a housing initiative that improved their living standards, your work-force would be significantly strengthened. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港最贫穷的居民，也就是下环的居民，构成了该市的大部分劳动力。他们中的许多人生活在赤贫之中，家徒四壁，海水的浪花直接能冲到家中。正因为如此，疾病使无数的男女失去了行动能力，而这些男人和女人养家糊口却需要工作。如果你投资于一项改善他们生活水平的住房计划，你的劳动力将会大大增强。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The new housing initiative was a success, with new, improved housing being built in the poorest areas of the city. This has given your citizens a new sense of security, as they no longer have to worry about the elements breaching their ramshackle homes, and can instead focus on their work and their lives.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 新的住房倡议取得了成功，在该市最贫穷地区建造了新的改善住房。这给了你的公民一种新的安全感，因为他们不再需要担心风雨海浪会摧垮他们摇摇欲坠的家，就可以专注于他们的工作和生活。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Housing Initiative has been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 住房计划已经完成，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The approach to Stormfall’s docks is a treacherous one. To aid trade ships with their approach, Stormfall’s lighthouse would serve as a beacon, warning ships of the difficult terrain that lay ahead. After being buffeted by storms for centuries, the lighthouse is now in a state of disrepair, meaning that trade with Stormfall is a risky affair by sea. If you were to renovate the lighthouse, it would go a long way in strengthening trade ties with other cities. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
通往风暴港码头的路是危险的。为了帮助贸易船只接近，风暴港的灯塔将作为一个信标，警告船只前方的危险海域。在经历了几个世纪的风暴袭击后，灯塔现在已经年久失修，这意味着与风暴港的海上贸易是一件危险的事情。如果你要修缮灯塔，它将大大加强与其他城市的贸易联系。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Renovation work on Stormfall’s lighthouse has been completed. It is once again a shining beacon to Stormfall’s trade partners, guiding them through the Coast of Wrecks and into the safety of Stormfall’s docks. Now that the lighthouse is complete, less inbound ships are likely to be destroyed when delivering their cargo, meaning that more wealth will flow through Stormfall.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴风港灯塔的翻修工作已经完成。它再次成为风暴港贸易伙伴的闪光信标，指引他们穿过残骸海岸，进入风暴港码头的安全地带。既然灯塔已经完工，那么在运送货物时，只有很少进港船可能被摧毁，这意味着更多的财富将通过暴风港流动。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Lighthouse has been renovated, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 灯塔已经过翻新，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
There has been very little to sing and dance about in Stormfall as of late. Very little in the way of entertainment has provided your citizens with an outlet for their troubles. If you were to invest in a new theater company and hire performers to put on a show every once in a while, the joy it would bring to your citizens could have a positive effect on their morale and happiness, improving their productivity in the long-term. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
到最近为止，在暴风港中几乎没有什么歌舞。几乎没有什么娱乐方式能为你的市民提供消磨时间的渠道。如果你投资一家新的剧院，每隔一段时间就雇佣表演者来演出一次，它给你的公民带来的快乐会对他们的士气和幸福产生积极的影响，从长远来看会提高他们的生产力。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The new theater has finished construction, with shows scheduled to occur on a weekly basis. With a new distraction to entertain them after a tough week of work, the citizens of Stormfall leave the shows re-energized for the week of work to come.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 新剧院已完成建设，预定每周演出一次。经过艰苦的一周工作后，他们开始全神贯注享受，风暴港的市民在接下来的一周工作中重新焕发了活力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Theater has been constructed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 剧院已建成，可提高暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
With the surge of energy beneath Stormfall in Anankis, numerous tremors cracked open the land surrounding Stormfall. From these cracks emerged all manner of monsters from below, harassing the local population and making the job of a farmer far more dangerous than it should ever need to be. If you were to invest in an initiative to close these rifts, the country surrounding Stormfall would be much safer, allowing your citizens to conduct their work without the fear of being eaten alive. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
随着阿南基斯暴风港下能量的涌动，无数的地震将暴雨港周围的土地震开。从这些裂缝中，从下面冒出各种各样的怪物，骚扰当地居民，使农民的工作比任何时候都要危险得多。如果你投资一项关闭这些裂缝的计划，那么围绕着暴风港的田野将会更加安全，让你的公民能够在不担心被活活吃掉的情况下开展工作。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Rift Initiative had some difficulties, but in the end, the rifts opened in Stormfall’s countryside were closed. Citizens living in the farmland are no longer fearful of the creatures that might be lurking in the undergrowth. With fewer casualties being suffered, your farmers can do their job in peace and toil the fields at a higher capacity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虽然“裂痕计划”遇到了一些困难，但最终，在暴风港乡村中打开的裂痕被关闭了。生活在农田中的公民不再担心潜伏在灌木丛中的生物。在减少人员伤亡的情况下，您的农民可以安心工作，并以更高的生产率耕种土地。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Rift Initiative has been completed, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “裂痕计划”已经完成，从而提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Stormfall is no stranger to disaster. The weather is temperamental, and the city’s namesake is a constant threat to its people. Farmland floods often enough for it to be a constant pressure, and citizens are often displaced by persistent Flayer raids on top of the flooding. If you were to invest in creating supply stockpiles around the city, this would offset to consequences of such upheavals, and allow the city to continue functioning during times of crisis. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
暴风港对灾难并不陌生。天气变化无常，这座城市的名字一直威胁着它的人民。农田洪水往往足以对农民施加持续的压力，而流离失所的市民在洪水无法触及的地方又要饱受剥皮者的威胁。如果你投资在城市周围建立供应储备，这将抵消这种剧变的后果，并允许城市在危机期间继续运作。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Supply stockpiles have been established all over Stormfall, ensuring that every one of its citizens has access to emergency supplies should disaster strike and they are displaced from their livelihoods. With this reassurance, your citizens feel better able to conduct their work without worrying about their futures.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在整个暴风港中都建立了供应库存，以确保其每位公民在发生灾害或者流离失所时都能获得应急物资。有了这种保障，您的公民就可以更好地开展工作，而不必担心自己的家产。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Supply Stockpiles have been established, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 供应库存已建立，从而提高了暴风港的生产率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The world of Wolcen is a dangerous place, making travel a risky endeavor for anyone wishing to reach other places and cities. Raiders, like wolves, stalk trade routes in the hopes of encountering easy prey. If you were to set up armed checkpoints along the routes leading into Stormfall, there would less chance of approaching caravans being torn apart before being able to share their goods. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
Wolcen世界是一个危险的地方，任何想去其他地方和城市的人都要冒险旅行。掠夺者像狼一样，纠缠在贸易路线左右，希望遇到容易被捕食的猎物。如果你在通往暴风港的路线上设置武装检查站，那么接近商队的商队在分享货物之前被袭击的可能性就更小了。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Military checkpoints have finished being set up along Stormfall’s most important trade routes. Reassured by Stormfall’s commitment to protecting their caravans, the city’s trade partners are more eager than ever to trade their goods with the Jewel of the Sea.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在暴风港最重要的贸易路线上，军事检查站已经建立完毕。得到保护商队的承诺，暴风港的贸易伙伴比以往任何时候都更渴望用他们的货物与海上明珠暴风港进行贸易。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Military Checkpoints have been established, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 军事检查站建成，提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
As the uses of energy from crystals becomes ever more apparent, the demand for it has been rising exponentially. From mechanizing processes to powering weaponry like Stormfall’s Radiant Turrets, energy crystals are the key to the future growth of any city and Stormfall should be at the forefront of this growth. If you were to invest in an increased effort to excavate energy crystals, Stormfall could lead the way in technological and industrial innovation. Outcomes:

Productivity will be permanently increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
随着晶体能量的用处越来越显著，对它的需求一直呈指数增长。从机械化生产到像暴风港的辐射炮塔这样的武器，能量晶体是任何城市未来发展的关键，暴风港正处于这一发展的前沿。如果你打算加大力度挖掘能源晶体，暴风港就能会引领技术发展和工业创新。 效果：

永久提高生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Excavation work has been completed and a new energy crystal mine has been established. With this new source of energy to take advantage of, Stormfall does not have to worry about the feasibility of creating new, energy-dependent equipment and weaponry, or worry about its existing equipment from becoming obsolete.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 开挖工作已经完成，新的能源水晶矿场也已建立。利用这种新的能源，暴风港不必为制造依赖能源的新设备和武器的可行性发愁，也不必担心其现有设备过时。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Energy Crystal mine has been excavated, boosting Stormfall’s Productivity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 能源水晶矿已被挖掘，从而提高了暴风港的生产力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Despite there being a variety of new initiatives being proposed throughout the city, such initiatives require careful planning before they can be feasibly undertaken. The Council has recommended that a 'Planning Comittee' be established to oversee the management of city projects. By doing so, they hope to ensure that resources are invested wisely and efficiently, thus allowing the city to have more projects ongoing at any one time. Outcomes:

The following Projects will become available: "Construct Enneract Lab", "Construct Bank". Your Maximum Active projects will be increased by 1.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
尽管在全市范围内提出了各种新的倡议，但这些倡议在切实可行之前需要仔细规划。理事会建议成立一个“规划委员会”，监督城市项目的管理。通过这种做法，他们希望确保资源得到明智和有效的规划，从而使城市在任何时候都有更多的项目在进行。 效果：

下列项目将解锁：“建造超维实验室”，“建造银行”。 可同时进行的项目数增加1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee was established, put together from a number of craftsmen, architects, and noble representatives throughout Stormfall. Should you wish, you can now construct the Diamond Bank and the Enneract Laboratory. What is more, resource allocation should now be more efficient, making it feasible to conduct more city projects than previously thought possible.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 规划委员会成立了，由许多工匠、建筑师和贵族代表组成。如果你愿意的话，你现在可以建造钻石银行和恩纳卡特实验室。更重要的是，现在的资源配置应该更有效，实施进行更多的城市项目将成为可能。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee has been established; new initiatives are awaiting your investment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 计划委员会已经成立；新的计划正在等待您的投资。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Planning Committee wishes to expand its capabilities even further to support new projects throughout the city. They believe they can improve on some of their processes, and want the work-force to undergo the necessary training to make this a reality. Outcomes:

The following Projects will become available: "Renovate Trade Assembly", "Construct Instillator", and "Construct Siphon Chamber". Your Maximum Active projects will be increased by 1.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
规划委员会希望进一步扩大其能力，以支持全市的新项目。他们相信，他们可以改进某些流程，并希望员工接受必要的培训以实现他们的目标。 效果：

开放以下项目：“重整商贸协会”、“建造虹吸室”和“建造充能舱”。 可同时进行的项目数增加1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee has completed its training, meaning that a number of new initiatives are now awaiting your investment. Should you wish, you can now renovate Stormfall’s Trade Assembly, and construct two of Demetra’s new devices: her Siphon Chamber and her Energy Instillator. What is more, resource allocation should now be more efficient, making it feasible to conduct more city projects than previously thought possible.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 计划委员会已完成其培训，这意味着许多新计划正在等待您的投资。如果您愿意，您现在可以开启商贸协议，迭梅塔的两个新设备也可以使用了：她的虹吸器和充能舱。而且，资源分配现在应该更加有效，从而可以进行比以前更多的城市项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee has completed its training; new initiatives are awaiting your investment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 计划委员会已完成其培训；新的计划正在等待您的投资。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Planning Comittee wishes to expand its capabilities even further to support new projects throughout the city. They believe they can improve on some of their processes, and want the work-force to undergo the necessary training to make this a reality. Outcomes:

The following Projects will become available: "Construct Transmutation Forge", "Renovate Shipyard", and the Dark Market Project "Establish Contact: 'The Curator'". Your Maximum Active projects will be increased by 1.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
规划委员会希望进一步扩大其能力，以支持整个城市的新项目。他们相信他们可以改进一些流程，并希望劳动力接受必要的培训，以便实施这一措施。 效果：

开放项目“建造转变熔炉”、“重建船坞”以及黑市项目“培植联系人：'监市'” 可同时进行的项目数增加1。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee has completed its training, meaning that a number of new initiatives are now awaiting your investment. Should you wish, you can now construct Demetra’s Transmutation Forge, renovate Stormfall’s Shipyard, and begin establishing contacts within the Dark Market. What is more, resource allocation should now be more efficient, making it feasible to conduct more city projects than previously thought possible.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 计划委员会已完成其培训，这意味着许多新计划正在等待您的投资。如果您愿意，您现在可以构建迭梅塔的转变熔炉，翻新暴风港的船厂，并开始在黑市场建立联系。而且，资源分配现在应该更加有效，从而可以进行比以前更多的城市项目。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Planning Committee has completed its training; new initiatives are awaiting your investment.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 计划委员会已完成其培训；新的计划正在等待您的投资。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
When an item is placed in the forge, not even Demetra knows what the forge will spit back out. All she knows is that it will take a different form, and its properties will change completely from what they once were. Outcomes:

Your chosen item will be transformed into another item
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
当一件物品被放置在熔炉里时，即使迭梅塔也不知道熔炉会吐出什么。她只知道它将以不同的形式出现，它的性质将完全改变。 效果：

你选择的物品将转变为另一个物品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a while, the item you placed within the Transmutation Forge became something completely different. Demetra was delighted with the results, and could not wait for you to receive the newly transmuted item.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 经过了一段时间，您放进“转变熔炉”中的东西变成了一件完全不同的物品。迭梅塔对结果很满意，迫不及待地想让您接收新鲜出炉的物品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
In order to extract magical energy from your body, Demetra first needs to calibrate the siphon chamber for you. Once calibrated, she will strap you in and draw out your energy, giving you gold in return. Outcomes:

Your selected amount of Primordial Affinity will be converted into Gold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
为了从你的身体中提取魔法能量，迭梅塔首先需要为你校准虹吸室。到了校准时，她会绑住你，抽出你的能量，当然作为回报，她会给你金币。 效果：

将你指定数量的原初亲和转换为金币。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Once the Siphon Chamber was calibrated, Demetra strapped you inside and began the siphoning process. When you emerged, you felt a little weakened, but the pouch of gold Demetra gave you more than made up for the whole ordeal.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一旦虹吸室校准完毕，德米特拉把你绑在里面，开始进行虹吸过程。当你从里面出来的时候，你感觉有点虚弱，但是德米特拉给你的整袋金子远远弥补了整个折磨的过程。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Demetra has siphoned Primordial Affinity from your body and given you gold in return.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 迭梅塔从你的身体中吸取了原初亲和，并给了你金币作为回报。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
In order to transfer magical energy from her stores into your body, Demetra will first need to calibrate the Energy Instillator’s seating unit. Once calibrated, she will strap you in to the seat and infuse your body with magical energy. Outcomes:

Your selected amount of Gold will be converted into Primordial Affinity.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
为了将魔法能量从她的储存中转移到你的身体，迭梅塔首先需要校准能量注入器的座位单元。一旦校准，她会把你固定在座位上，给你的身体注入神奇的能量。 效果：

将你指定数量的金币转换为原初亲和。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After calibrating the Energy Instillator, Demetra hooked you up to its seat and her stores of magical energy. You felt a surge of energy course through your arms and into your chest, filling you with a renewed vigor. You gave Demetra her gold, and went on your way.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 校准能量注入器后，迭梅塔将你引到了它的座位和她的魔法能量存储处。 你的手臂和胸腔感觉到能量的激增，充满了新的活力。你给了迭梅塔金币，然后继续前进。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Demetra instilled your body with Primordial Affinity in return for the gold you gave her.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 迭梅塔为你的身体注入了原初亲和，以换取你给她的黄金。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
The Curator has access to a large supply of Ethereal Reagents, but procuring them for you will have a cost, both in terms of time and resources. You will have to provide the appropriate offering for the Curator if they are to complete this undertaking. Outcomes:

Loot received: Ethereal Reagent
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
“监市”有渠道可以获得大量的飘渺灵气，但为你采购这些灵气难免要付出一定的时间和资源。你必须提供适当的支持，“监市”才能完成他的许诺。 效果：

获得战利品：飘渺灵气

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Mohabi enlisted the services of the Curator who, after a time, was able to procure the Ethereal Reagent you requested.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 莫哈比请求这位不知名的“监市”提供服务，一段时间后，“监市”就买来了你要的飘渺灵气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Curator procured a Ethereal Reagent for you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “监市”替你采购来了一份飘渺灵气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Stormfall’s representatives in foreign states have returned to report on current affairs. They have leads, and sometimes, offerings, to bring to your attention. They invite you to have a look at what they have.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 暴风港在国外的代表回报了近期报道。他们有线索，有时有些产品，想要引起您的注意。他们邀请您看看他们所拥有的各种资源。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The bow handle is engraved with an elegant symbol, a blazing phoenix with purple eyes. Closer inspection reveals thirteen small markings on the bow wings, as if the previous owner was keeping track of a grim score. Whoever it was, its legacy is not meant to end here: time to start big game hunting and keep the death toll rolling.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 弓柄上镌刻着一个优雅的符号，一只有着紫色眼睛的闪耀凤凰。仔细检视会发现弓翼上的十三个小标记，似乎是前任主人不断追寻着某种残忍的分数。不管那是谁，他留下的成绩不会到此终结：是时候开始一场盛大的猎杀游戏了，让死亡数字继续刷新吧。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The combat was fierce, but Brother Amren eventually met his end, crushed by the demon as his lifeless body was thrown across Greyharbour’s street. Yet, hope was not to die with the battle-priest. One of the four fishermen he was defending stepped forward and picked-up his shield to continue the fight. With him, the three other common-men charged the wounded demon while shouting their fear away. Neither the fishermen nor the demon survived the battle. An ode to these men’s sacrifice was engraved by the Brotherhood of Dawn on the edges of Amren’s aegis. This beacon of hope now awaits a new bearer worthy to keep up the fight against evil."
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “战斗无比激烈，但牧师阿姆伦的生命还是走到了终点，他被恶魔碾碎，了无生机的尸体被扔到灰港的街道上。然而，战斗牧师的死亡并不代表希望的断绝。 他所保护的四名渔夫之一上前拿起盾牌继续战斗。其他三个普通人也和他一起，一边冲向受伤的恶魔，一边用怒吼驱散恐惧。渔夫和恶魔在战斗中同归于尽。 黎明兄弟会在阿姆伦的盾牌边缘上为这些人的牺牲刻下了颂歌。现在，这面希望的信标正等待着一位有资格同它一起与邪恶作斗争的新持有者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: There is one city that makes the best steel in the four realms: Vulcaïn. This city-state is nested inside a Volcano which grants their deepest forge the temperature needed to melt, blend and purify the best metals. The resulting steel becomes pure, strong and extremely sharp. To defend the city, their elite infantry are given rough jagged versions which captured some of the lava they were forged in.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在四大王国中，有一座城市能制造出最好的钢铁：火神城。这个城邦坐落在一座火山内，这座火山为它们最深的锻造提供了熔化、混合和净化最好的金属所需的温度。由此产生的钢变得纯净、坚固和锋利。为了保卫这座城市，他们的精锐步兵得到了粗粝的锯齿版本钢剑，它们在被铸造时掺入了一些熔岩。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Those who made a pact with Anulaï-Taï, Fallen Duke of Infinity, may rise inside the cult’s hierarchy and become a dreaded Time Devourer. Those sorcerers phase through space motionlessly while using their Time Seal to harness and destroy the normal continuum around them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 那些与阿努莱-泰，堕落的无限公爵达成协议的人，可能会在邪教的等级体系中晋升，成为可怕的时间吞噬者。这些巫师们使用他们的时间之印来控制和破坏他们周围的时间连续性，在静止中穿行于空间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Goremaker, Shard of the Red Mountain
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 淤血制造者，红山的碎片

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: During the war of the Primordials, the eternal lovers Anathëa and Moros organized an assault on the Red Mountain, the throne of Ashtaroth, Lord of Flesh. Amidst the raging battle, the ground quaked as they realized the landscape itself was alive and about to engulf everything. They had no other choice than to obliterate the whole organic mountain to survive. This could very well be one of its shards that survived throughout the eons.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在原初神战中，永恒的恋人安娜蒂亚和摩洛斯组织了对红山的袭击，红山是阿什塔罗特，血肉之主的王座。在激烈的战斗中，地面震动了，他们意识到周围的环境本身是活的，即将吞没一切。他们别无选择，只能为了生存而把整座山夷为平地。这很可能是它的一个碎片，从上古留存至今。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Big Bill was a blacksmith's apprentice. But repairing horses’ irons bored him, he dreamed about being as an evil-slashing hero with the sharpest axe the world had ever known. The blacksmithing prodigy got to work, every night he would hammer hard at the anvil, shaping his lethal ambitions into an axe he would call ‘Edgy’.\n\nRumor has it that Big Bill accidentally beheaded himself at night while training in the backyard. Yet, Edgy remains as a deadly work of art.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 大比尔是一位铁匠的学徒，修理马蹄铁的工作使他感到沉闷，他梦想手持世界上已知最锋利的斧头，成为一位斩妖除魔的英雄。这位天才铁匠开始工作，每个夜晚都会认真地敲打铁砧，将他致命的野望塑造成一把被他唤作“躁刃”的斧子。\n\n据说，大比尔夜晚在后院训练的时候意外砍掉了自己的脑袋。当然，躁刃仍然是一件致命的杰作。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: One man absolutely dominated the Stormfall Arena Championship during its golden age: the legendary “Willbreaker”. Where most gladiators bought into the dogma that victory was about killing your competitors, he however simply chose to outlive them while putting on a good show. His strategy mostly consisted of wearing down his foes with blocks and deflects, before finishing them with lethal counterattacks.\n\nThe Willbreaker was undefeated for fifteen years and retired from the blood sport to die of old age. He outlived all of his foes, all of those that bet for or against him as well as those that hired him as a gladiator in the first place.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在暴风港角斗场的黄金时代，有一个人的冠军地位无可撼动：传奇的“摧心者”。在大多数角斗士信奉的教条中，胜利就是要杀死你的对手，然而，他只是选择活得比对手更久，同时上演一场精彩的表演。他的策略主要是用格挡和偏转来消耗敌人，然后用致命的反击来结束他们的进攻。\n\n摧心者十五年来未尝一败，后来他从这项血腥运动中退役，寿终正寝。他比所有的对手、打赌支持或反对他的人以及当初雇他当角斗士的人都活得久。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The battle for creation was raging. Old alliances showed great heroism but were losing the fight nonetheless. To avoid the end of times, Moros, the Primordial of Dusk, rode into battle on a gigantic shadow chimaera whose wings covered the entire battlefield.\n\nHe flew directly to his offspring to confront him: the Fallen conqueror leading this unstoppable army. Knowing he would not win the fight in time, Moros tethered himself to his foe and banished himself into the abyss. Both of them were trapped by the ritual, but his dreaded shadow-beast survived and flew away. A scale lost by the creature was then forged into this shield, and it might be the only evidence that the creature ever existed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 为了造物发起的战争如火如荼。古老同盟展现出伟大的英雄主义，但胜利的天平正向对方倾斜。为了避免时代的终结，暮色之源摩洛斯骑着巨大的阴影奇美拉参战，奇美拉的翅膀覆盖了整个战场。\n\n他直接飞到他的后代面前与他对峙：那个堕落的征服者领导着这支势不可挡的军队。摩洛斯知道自己无法及时赢得战斗，便把自己和敌人拴在一起，一同放逐到深渊。他们两个都被这个仪式困住了，但是他那可怕的影子野兽活了下来，飞走了。这只巨兽遗留的一枚鳞片被锻造成这面盾牌，这可能是它存在过的唯一证据。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: These are the symbols engraved on the blade. This type of dagger is known as a “Senate’s Imperatum”, a custom-made weapon that serves only one purpose: to terminate a specific target. These are forged alongside the paperwork when the Senate of the “United Republic of Mankind” decides that a certain target must be taken out.\n\nThis particular one, still coated with lethal poison, was carried by an expert assassin to take out an Eos, a general of the Brotherhood of Dawn, named Gernese. The operation ended with a failed assassination and the agent being obliterated by his target.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这是刻在刀刃上的标记。这种匕首被称为“参议院的皇权”，一种定制的武器，只有一个目的：终止一个特定的目标。当“人类联邦共和国”的参议院决定必须消灭某个目标的文件下发时，这种匕首也会被铸造出来。\n\n而这把很特殊，它上面仍然涂着致命的毒药，曾由一名专家刺客携带，用来刺杀一位黎明兄弟会的将军，曙光格内瑟。行动以一次失败的暗杀告终，刺客被他的目标消灭。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Anakan’s ingenuity was only matched by two things, his social anxiety and his laziness. As a farmboy, he crafted a metal stick crowned by an energy crystal that could discharge a tiny amount of electricity in order to force the unruly cattle into their boxes. One day, the boys in town plotted a prank against him and charged the energy crystal with an enneract they had luckily found in a field. The next day, Anakan used the staff to gently shock the rear of a reluctant cow. It created a massive lightning shockwave that fried him alive along with the cows, the farm and all the pranksters that were hidden nearby to watch the show. Only the Zapstick remained.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿纳坎的聪明才智只表现在两处地方：他的社交焦虑和懒惰。当他还是一个农家男孩时，制作了一根金属棍，上面镶着一块能释放少量电能的能量水晶，用来把不听话的牛赶进栏里。 有一天，城里的男孩们对他策划了一场恶作剧，用一块他们在田地里幸运发现的超维之石给能量水晶充能。 第二天，阿纳坎用棍子轻轻地敲打一头不听话母牛的臀部。它制造了一个巨大的闪电冲击波，把阿纳坎连同奶牛、农场和所有隐藏在附近观看节目的恶作剧者一起活活炸了。只留下了这根电光棍。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In the mountainous village of Rigard, there used to be a revered idol at the center of the small town. A maiden representing peace, fertility and the celebration of winter’s end. A work of art created generations ago by the village's stonemasons.\n\nWhen the hamlet got threatened by raiders, the town folks realized that they had no iron to create weapons. Hopeless, their stonemason took it upon himself to tear down the statue and reshape it into a weapon of war, a heavy stoneblade that he could wield to defend his home. While the place lost its symbol of peace, to this day its people still celebrate the coming of spring.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在一个叫做里加的山间村落里，小镇的中心曾经有一座受人尊崇的少女雕像。象征和平、生育和庆祝冬天的结束。它是几代以前由村里的石匠创作的一件艺术品。\n\n当时村庄受到掠夺者的威胁，镇上的乡亲们意识到他们没有铁来制造武器。绝望中，他们的石匠自己动手拆毁了雕像，并将其重塑成战争武器，一把沉重的石剑，他可以挥动它保卫自己的家园。虽然这个地方失去了和平的象征，但直到今天，它的人民仍能庆祝春天的到来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the Primordial of Change tore himself apart, the Trinity birthed from his end. Abanazaar, Beelmalik and Etheliel finally obtained the opportunity to be independent beings rather than afterthoughts stuck inside a divine psyche. But while Etheliel was the one that bolstered the ego of her brothers to stir their host from the inside, she was stung with remorse the moment she became tangible and free. Her cold embrace tried to convince Abanazar to merge back with her and Beelmalik, but his burning desire to make the world his own was too strong. At that moment, she shed her first frozen tear for him, which later was forged into this sword.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当变革之源自我分裂，三元从他的终结中诞生。阿巴纳扎、比马利克和耶特利尔终于不再困于一个神圣的灵魂中自我矛盾，皆获得了成为独立存在的机会。 虽然正是耶特利尔增强了她胞亲的自我，搅乱了主体的内在，但当她变得有形和自由的时候，她被悔恨刺痛了。 她试图说服阿巴纳扎与她和比马利克融合，但是阿巴纳扎灼热的占有全世界的欲望太过强烈了。就在那一刻，她为他流下了第一滴冰封之泪，后来被锻造成了这把剑。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Abanazaar considered his sister’s plea. As dawn peaked on the horizon, a complex emotion of wonderment and hunger led to his realization: her sins were not his own, and so he refused to let go of his existence. He wanted the sun for himself, his decision confirming the beginning of his descent into madness.\n\nHe did not speak to voice his refusal. Gazing deep into his sister’s eyes, the air itself started to catch fire from the intensity of his determination. As the immortal flames came in contact with her ice-cold skin, the sparks froze and fell to the ground. This sword was forged from one of those immortal embers.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 阿巴纳扎考虑了他姐姐的请求。当黎明降临在地平线上时，一种惊喜和饥渴交织的复杂情绪使他意识到：那是耶特利尔的罪孽，与自己无关，所以他拒绝放弃自己的存在。他想要太阳，为他自己，他的决定证明了坠向疯狂的开端。\n\n他用沉默来表达拒绝。他深深地凝视着姐姐的眼睛，由于他的决意，空气都开始自燃。当不朽的火焰接触到她冰冷的皮肤时，火花冰冻，坠落到地上。这把剑是用那不朽余烬中的一块锻造出来的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The bludgeon of this mace seems to be a prisoner's ball that got cut from the chain and the captive then added rough scraps of metal as spikes.\n\nThat’s when he got to work, smashing the heads of his slavers left and right until he was finally free. None of his captors survived him. The mace was eventually found, firmly held by the corpse of the self-freed slave, as if even in death he was fighting for his freedom.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这只锤子的锤头似乎是从囚犯脚链上割下来的链球，并且这名囚犯还把粗粝的碎铁添上去当做锤钉。\n\n他放手一搏，左右开弓，把奴役他的人的脑袋砸个稀烂，直到重获自由。抓捕他的人无一幸存。锤子最终被发现时，仍被这名奴隶牢牢握在手中，仿佛他即使死了还在为自由而战。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The handle of this axe looks like the spine of a human being, from which the blade has grown and mutated in a gruesome and disgusting way.\n\nThis axe used to have a name: Kelsir. A cultist that worshipped Ashtaroth, the Fallen Lord of Flesh, accepted the honor to mutate into a weapon in the name of his evil overseer. To be sure, lunatics find themselves at home within the cult of the Aberrant.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这把斧头的柄看上去像是一个人的脊骨，刀锋则是从脊骨上生长和变异出来的，令人作呕，更令人毛骨悚然。\n\n这把斧子曾有一个人类的名字：凯瑟尔，他是一个崇拜堕落血肉之主阿什塔罗特的邪教徒，接受了以邪恶督军之名畸变成一把武器的荣誉。可以肯定的是，在畸变者邪教中，疯子们肯定会觉得如鱼得水。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Beelmalik, Fallen Lord of Punishment, rules over the Upheaval Tribunal. This seat of power is sealed from all mortals except for the Entropic Judges, humans handpicked and groomed by the Fallen himself to be instruments of his will and leaders of his cult.\n\nEach of those mighty servants are given a key that grants them access to the Tribunal. Zephyron is one of those lethal artifacts.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 比马利克，堕落的惩罚之王，统治着剧变法庭。法庭权力的宝座只对熵之法官，堕落者自己精心挑选和培训的人类开放，他们作为贯彻他意志的工具和邪教的领袖。\n\n每个强大的仆人被赐予一把钥匙，允许他们进入法庭。泽弗壬就是那些致命器物之一。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The United Republic of Mankind has three armies. The Liberators are in charge of foreign campaigns against the three enemy crowns. They aim to destroy their witchcraft and beliefs and assimilate them as part of a modern, united republican state.\n\nElite tactical troops of the Liberators use the “Regicide Mark II” pistol model as their best ranged multi-purpose weapon. The powerful Mark III has only ever been a prototype that got discontinued by the Senate because of its insane per-unit cost and a recoil that too few men could handle.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 人类联邦共和国有三支军队。解放者负责对三冠联盟成员国的对外战争。他们的目标是摧毁他们的巫术和信仰，并将其同化为一个现代的、统一的共和国的一部分。\n\n解放者的轻型战术部队使用“弑君II号”型号的手枪作为他们最好的远程多功能武器。而强大的“弑君III号”只是一个原型，由于其疯狂的单位成本和几乎无人可以应付的后坐力被参议院中止生产。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Battle of Carrion Keep remains famous in the warfare history of the Purifiers, the Republican army in charge of dealing with the supernatural. Ambushed by evil forces in the Mudlands surrounding the nefarious keep, most men were slaughtered in a crushing defeat for the Republic. Justicar Heimlock, one of the men left behind, made his fame by resurfacing alone several months later in the Senate, with the heads of the two enemy leaders as an offering. Historians quickly praised his bravery and treated Carrion Keep as a victory of the Republic, quickly promoting Heimlock to an Inquisitor. Even to this day, there is still no explanation as to how he managed that extraordinary feat.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 腐肉堡之战是在净化者（负责对付超自然力量的共和国军队）的战争史上留名的一战。 共和国的军队在这座罪恶堡垒周围的泥泞地带遭到邪恶势力的伏击，大多数人都在这场惨败中被屠杀。几个月后，在撤退时被落下人之一，制裁者海姆洛克，因为带着两位敌方领导人的头颅重新出现而在参议院声名鹊起。 史学家迫不及待地赞扬起他的勇猛，并将腐肉堡之战视为共和国的胜利。海姆洛克也很快被提拔为审判官。即使到今天，对于他是如何做到这一非凡成就的，仍然没有任何解释。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Originally used by a Frost Tormentor, it was salvaged and researched by Vargian clan of occultists. Earl Tolna ordered them to repair it so that he could wield it in a final resort against an invading Republican regiment. Such a command was unheard of, and was guaranteed to get the Earl court-martialed.\n\nHowever, with his first blow hundreds of souls burst out of the weapon, flooding the battlefield. They wreaked havoc on both armies, killing and consuming the mortal soldiers indiscriminately. In the end, all that remained were corpses, cold to the touch, and this mace, a shining prison, daring someone more worthy to wield it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 最初被一个冰霜折磨者使用，它被法吉的神秘学氏族挽回和研究。托尔纳伯爵命令他们修复它，以便他可以把它当做对付入侵的共和国军队的底牌。这样的命令闻所未闻的，而且保证会让伯爵上军事法庭。\n\n但是，随着他用这把权杖挥出第一下，数百计的灵魂从武器中迸发出来，淹没了战场。他们肆无忌惮地给两军带去灾难，不分敌我地杀戮和吞噬将士。最后，剩下的都是尸体，摸上去冰冷的尸体，还有这根权杖。它如同一座散发着幽光的灵魂监狱，激将一个更有资格的人挥动它。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As it often does, the Sea of Torment summoned a flash storm, sending the Arman II ricocheting between the waves. Her crew sealed in the hold, sails down, one unlucky sailor was stranded in the crow’s nest, his trusty pistol his only company.\n\nA huge wave suddenly struck the ship, sending the gun flying. At the apex of its flight, it was struck by lightning, protecting the ship. It fell to the deck, slipping into the hull. On returning to port, the electrified pistol was insulated with diamonds and will forever channel the power of the sea.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 就像它经常做的那样，痛苦之海召唤了一场风暴，让阿曼二号在浪尖上跳跃。它的船员们把自己密封在船舱里，一个倒霉的水手为了下帆被滞留在桅杆上，他那把可靠的手枪是他唯一的同伴。\n\n一道巨浪突然袭击了船，枪脱手飞了出去。它在飞行的顶点，被闪电击中，保护了整艘船。它掉到甲板上，滑进了船体。回到港口后，通电的手枪被用钻石绝缘，它将永远传递海洋的力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A tsunami in the Baktoraï Archipelago unearthed a long-dormant cave network of shifting golden metal that was neither manmade nor natural. Oliver Macksfesten, the intrepid explorer, found this artifact on his first expedition, an enneract hundreds of times more powerful than any other.\n\nToo volatile to be converted into energy, it was sold to the Cabal of Illumination for research. An Ascended attempted to absorb its power, but the raw energy burst their body into fleshy chunks. Its aura of magic can empower any sorceror daring enough to wield it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一次席卷巴克托赖群岛的海啸让一个沉睡已久洞穴网重见天日，里面有流动金属物质，既不是人造的，也不是天然的。勇敢的探险家奥利弗·麦克斯芬在他的第一次探险中发现了这件物品，一块威力超过其他超维之石百倍的超维之石。\n\n但它太不稳定，无法转化成能量，它被卖给启示结社进行研究。一个学徒试图吸收它的能量，但是原始能量将他的身体爆裂成肉块。它的魔法光环可以赋予任何敢于持有它的巫师以力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: On the Kuei Empire coast, he headed the Republican Liberator fleet with his unit of shieldbearers against the city of Tourmica. Landing on the shores, his scythe led the Republic’s expansion. Dashing from skirmish to skirmish, he cut through soldiers like wheat as the shieldbearers absorbed counter-strikes. In the melee, his unit became surrounded by enemy cavalry. The scythe ignited with lightning as he swung in a wide circle, arcs of electricity paralysing the horses. The fallen riders were swiftly decapitated, the electrified blade cauterising their severed necks. A master of death, they called him The Reaper.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在库埃帝国的海岸，他率领共和国解放者舰队以及他的持盾小队对抗图米卡城邦。在登陆海岸的过程中，他的镰刀引领了共和国的扩张。他在战场上纵横捭阖，像割草一样掠过敌阵，持盾的士兵则替他挡下反击。在混战中，他的部队被敌军骑兵包围。当他抡圆镰刀时，闪电在刀刃上绽放，跳跃的电弧令战马瘫痪。当落马的骑士们被冷冽的刀锋斩首，断颈处却是被闪电灼焦的血肉。他是一位死亡大师，被他们称为收割者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Fairy tales speak of a woman bathed in shade who roams the world of Wolcen, dancing gracefully throughout the land. She appears and fades away on a whim, her fan cutting through the air, its movement summoning a mollifying breeze.\n\nOnce, she appeared often as many invited her soothing presence. But when a sorcerer stole her phylactery for his rituals, nightmares crept back into the dreams of those she’d been healing. She untethered herself from her captive phylactery at the cost of much of her power, and now passes unseen in the world.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 传说中，有位女士在Wolcen世界徘徊，她沐浴在阴影中，翾风回雪的舞姿掠过每一处土地。她惊鸿一现，挥扇破空，便引来和煦的微风。\n\n一次，她如往常一样回应邀请，现身抚慰伤痛。但一位巫师偷走了这位女士的命匣用于他的仪式，于是噩梦又重新席卷了那些她曾经治愈过的人。她付出了几乎所有力量作为代价才从囚禁她的命匣中挣脱出来，如今她已在世上销声匿迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Engraved along the staff:\n\n“An aching hunger drives me forward. Constant temptation, an interminable quest, craving for power.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 法杖上镌刻着：\n\n“一种刻骨铭心的饥渴驱使我前进。那是永恒的诱惑，是一份无休止渴望力量的追求。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ebba of Varg awoke swaddled in seaweed, two hundred feet away from her shipwreck. She found a wrought-iron joint in the debris: a miracle. With it, she fashioned a ramshackle bow stringed with plant fibres to hunt the beasts of the Baktorai islands.\n\nWhen Macksfesten found her and had her board his ship, she threw the bow overboard and announced: “Here’s a miracle for the next castaway.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 艾巴浑身缠着海草醒来，离她失事的船只有两百步远。这位法吉女孩在废墟中找到了一根锻铁连杆：一个奇迹。她用这玩意缠绕上植物根须制作了一把破烂不堪的弓，用它来捕猎巴克托赖群岛上的野兽。\n\n当麦克斯芬找到她并接她上船后，她把这把弓抛到海里，称:“这是给下一个漂流者准备的奇迹。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sopping wet. The fabric is starting to chafe. Still better than drowning in full plate.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 湿透了。布料磨得皮肤生疼。但总比淹死在盔甲里好。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Caked in mud and heavy with water.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黏着厚厚的泥土，而且因为浸了水很沉重。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Never very fashionable, which is why it was worn under armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 样式从来都没怎么时髦过，这就是为什么它被穿在盔甲里面。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Thin and fragile, but the armored boots were too heavy to stay afloat.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 薄而脆弱，但装甲靴太重，无法漂浮。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Bezeriel grew fond of observing a beautiful maiden from the tribes of the First Men, so exuberant was she. Taking the shape of a pale charming man, he offered her this ring to show his admiration.\n\nShe smiled as she put the ring to her finger, but it was not to last: Her skin started to wither, her lifeforce consumed and absorbed within the ring’s gem in a matter of seconds. Her body was never found, for all that remained of her was dust.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝泽瑞尔开始喜欢观察一位年轻美丽的少女，青春所有的美好都在她身上彰显。他变化成一个皮肤苍白、富有魅力的男子，赠与她这枚戒指，以表示对她的倾慕。\n\n当她把戒指戴在手指上时，露出了微笑，但笑容并没有持续多久：她的皮肤开始枯萎，她的生命力在几秒钟内就被戒指上的宝石消耗和吸收。她的尸体一直没有被找到，因为她的遗骸完全化作尘土。一首被许多吟游诗人传唱的歌“消失的少女”，是她厄运的唯一见证。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Isolated far east of the Four Realms of Men, the frontier city-state of Gomora is infamously known for being the only settlement that openly welcomes evil worshippers. The champions in charge of keeping them in check are known as Arbiters and receive a powerful onyx ring as a symbol of their absolute judgements.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在人类四大王国的远东地区，边境城邦哥摩拉臭名昭著，因为它是唯一公开欢迎邪恶崇拜者的定居点。负责控制他们的仲裁者会有一枚强大的玛瑙戒指作为他们绝对裁决的象征。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: It would be impossible to determine who or what this uncanny tooth belonged to. When you first picked it up, the ivory was of a pristine white. But now a faint coating of blood started to redden the canine by its base. Where is that blood coming from? Could it be yours? Only one thing is sure: it’s hungry, hungry for more.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 没法确认这颗奇异的牙齿属于谁或是什么生物。当你第一次捡起它的时候，这颗獠牙是洁白的。但现在一层隐隐约约的血迹让它从底部开始变红。那血是从哪里来的？可能是你的吗？只有一件事是可以肯定的：它饿了，渴望更多。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Belt of the Owl Mighty Tester
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 强力测试者的猫头鹰腰带

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Looks like Owlcen hid a little present for you!
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 看起来猫头鹰（谐音Wolcen）藏了一些给你的小礼物！

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: O’Maley had collected lucky charms his whole life, attaching them to his belt so that he could become the luckiest man alive. And he did. It’s only on his deathbed when his last servant slipped on a sock and broke his neck, that he realized that luck is always balanced.\n\nFor him to be so fortuitous, others around him had to be severely unlucky. All the people that he cherished eventually got hurt and died due to the vacuum of luck that this belt would create around him.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 奥马利一生都在收集幸运符，把它们系在腰带上，这样他就能成为世上最幸运的人。他做到了。直到他濒死卧床，他的最后一个仆人滑倒在袜子上，摔断了脖子，他才意识到幸运是守恒的。\n\n为了让他如此幸运，他周围的人一定得非常不幸。他所珍视的所有人最终都因为这条腰带在他周围制造的运气真空非死即伤。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When the kingdom of Alia crumbled on itself due to a political revolution, it led to its rebirth as the URM: the United Republic of Mankind. This new warmongering faction promptly pushed the frontiers of all its neighbors in an attempt to absorb them all in a single state.\n\nThey retaliated by creating the Three Crowns’ alliance, gathering Laibon, Varg and Kuei. These rare brooches were given to spies and messengers that had capital information to carry through Republican territory between the allies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当阿里亚王国由于一场政治革命自我毁灭之后，它以URM：人类联邦共和国之名重生。这一新的好战集团迅速吞并着邻国的疆土，试图将它们统一。\n\n邻国们为了抵抗共和国的扩张，建立了三冠联盟，汇聚莱邦、法吉和库埃。这些罕见的胸针被给予间谍和信使，作为他们借道盟国前往共和国领地的护照。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Long before the world’s great cataclysms, the elemental forces that sustained the Primordial of Change split from him. He ceased to exist and became three: one avatar of Fire, one of Ice and one of Lightning. Yet, some residual energy escaped and tried to find a host to stabilize itself. It journeyed among the first humans, creators of the Enneracts: wise and mighty humans sheltered by Primordials. One of them, a powerful psychic, accidentally absorbed that vanishing energy. His skull fried and crystalized instantly from the raw power he was consuming. Part of this skull was found and ornamented by successive dynasties, until people eventually forgot all about its mythical origin.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 早在世界大灾变发生之前，维持变革之源的元素力量从他身上分裂了。他再不存在并一分为三：一个火的化身，一个冰之化身和一个电之化身。然而，一些剩余的能量逃逸出来，试图找到一个宿主来稳定自己。它游历在第一批人类中，正是这群受到原初神庇护的，强大而智慧人类创造了超维之石。其中之一，一位强大的通灵者，意外地吸收了逃逸的能量。\n\n他所吸收的原始能量立刻将他的头骨烧灼得水晶化。这个头骨的一部分被发现并被历代王朝用作装饰，直到人们最终忘记了所有与它相关的神话。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The plate armor of Eos Hadrian, legendary leader of the Brotherhood of Dawn. He remained famous in history for being the only one daring enough to use the “Helion” centuries ago, an artefact given by Anathëa to be used as a last recourse should humans face absolute extinction.\n\nAt mankind’s darkest hour, he was left with no other choice than to use it and summon the Lady of Dawn in her full glory. Bathing in her sacred lights, his armor permanently absorbed part of her radiance, imbuing it with tremendous power.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明兄弟会的传奇领袖，曙光哈德仑的板甲。几百年前，他作为唯一敢使用“氦闪”的人而青史留名，“氦闪”是黎明女神安娜蒂亚赐予的，当人类面临灭顶之灾时使用的最后手段。\n\n在人类最黑暗的时刻，他别无选择，只能用来召唤黎明女神的普照荣光。他的盔甲沐浴在她的圣光中，永久地吸收了她的一部分光辉，庞大的力量灌注其中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Power. Destruction. Conquest. I am A-dra-ma-lech. I bring war. And from now on, so do you.” Something truly powerful and nefarious uses that spaulder as a relic: A demon sent by Baäpheth, the Fallen Archduke of War. Even if the entity wishes to assist you right now, no wise man would take his chances. The promise of power always has a dreadful cost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “力量。毁灭。征服。 我乃阿-德拉-玛-莱克。 我带来了战争。 从现在开始，你也一样。” 某种真正强大而邪恶的存在寄居其中：一个堕落的战争大公拜费特送到人间的恶魔。即使这个存在愿意提供协助，明智之人也不会冒险。力量的承诺总对应着可怕的代价。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Thirty-five years ago, the Vargian city of Argand chose to shelter a devious cult within its walls. The population celebrated the newfound prosperity while accepting the unspeakable horrors the authorities had to perform to sustain this unholy alliance. But the Primordial of Purity was on the hunt: the cult was fueling power to a Fallen he was tracking. Sarisel appeared at the gates of Argand and butchered the entire population to force the evil cult to reveal itself. Only children were spared during the cleansing, most of them sheltering themselves within the high temple’s sanctum around a revered energy crystal. The litany of cries mixed with the energy deployed by Sarisel empowered the gem with a magic that no mortal should possess.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 三十五年前，阿尔冈的法吉安城选择在城中庇护一伙邪教。市民接受了新兴的繁荣，同时也接受了当局为了维持这罪恶联盟所必须进行的难以言喻的恐怖。 但纯净之源当时正在进行猎杀：这伙邪教为他在追踪的一位堕落者提供力量。萨利塞尔出现在了阿尔冈的城门口，为了迫使邪教暴露而屠杀了全城居民。 大清洗中，只有儿童幸免于难，他们中的大部分躲在神庙的圣所中，围绕着一枚尊崇能量水晶。萨利塞尔用一种凡人无法使用的魔法赋能的宝石操控着的能量与泣不成声的祈祷在空气中交织。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The moral depravity of the inhabitants of the Baktoraï archipelago is no secret to any traveler. Yet, the empty halls of Summerwind Manor are an haunting testament to the depths of their cruelty. While priding themselves on their youth and beauty, the Summerwind sisters saw their mother’s elegance decay with age. Refusing to share her fate, they made a pact with dark forces to retain their youth forever. Nefarious rings with the ability to consume the lifeforce of other maidens soon appeared on their frail hands. Rumor has it that their evil is scattered throughout the four realms after their “resources” ran dry around Summerwind Manor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 巴克托赖群岛居民的道德败坏对任何旅行者来说都不是秘密。而夏风庄园空荡荡的大厅，则是她们残酷内心让人难以忘怀地明证。 夏风姐妹们在为自己的青春美貌而自豪的同时，也看到了母亲的优雅随着年龄的增长而衰退。她们拒绝接受和母亲一样的命运，她们与黑暗势力达成协议以图永葆青春。能够吞噬其他少女生命力的邪恶戒指很快就出现在她们纤弱的手指上。 据传，当夏风庄园周围的“资源”枯竭之后，她们的邪恶散播到了整个四大王国。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A hand-me-down from the Purple Phoenix, these boots are perfect for sprinting across the battlefield. The left boot has a pocket full of mints and the right one a hidden compartment for old sentimental letters. However, these cleats are one-of-a-kind: there’s a large ‘E’ stitched on the inside of each shoe.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 传承自紫凤凰佣兵团。这双靴子是战场冲锋的完美选择。左脚的这只有个装着薄荷糖的口袋，右边的这只则有藏着一封旧时伤感信件的夹层。无论如何，这双防滑靴都是独一无二的：左右两只靴子的内侧都缝了一个大写的“E”。
