Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As servants to the Primordials, it is said the First Men were offered gifts to help them carry out their work. A remnant from eons past, this bracer sends surging energy through your body, empowering your soul with the will of those that have gone before you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 据说，作为原初神的仆人，第一批人类被赐予礼物以便更好地完成工作。作为上古遗物，这只护腕能通过你的身体输送出澎湃的能量，用先人意志赋予你的灵魂以力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: In his weakened state, Moros has almost no presence within the mortal plain. His time in the Abyss drags on, living in a purgatory of ceaseless combat. However, when the moon covers the sun in an all-shrouding eclipse, he can look upon his followers for a brief moment and receive a fraction of their prayers.\n\nSo say the Sages of Twilight, the spiritual guardians of the Cult of Moros.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 处于虚弱状态下的摩洛斯几乎不在凡人位面现身。他长期待在深渊里，生活在不断战斗的炼狱里。然而，当月亮在日全食中遮住太阳，他可以短暂地注视他的追随者，并接受他们的一小部分祈祷。暮光圣贤，摩洛斯教派的心灵守护者如是说。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the Flayers raided a Stormfall caravan, a young noble was taken prisoner. Howling with pleasure, they cut the skin from his back and tied him to a bed of nails. To muffle his cries, they made a mask of cured skin and sewed it to his neck. The next day, Thunderblades stormed the camp, scattering the wildlings. The noble healed but kept the mask. He wore the hood while he trained his body, dedicating his life to vengeance.\n\nAfter years of intensive preparation, he returned to that camp. What were once Flayers had become settlers. Children played where their parents had once cured human flesh. But he hungered for vengeance, and his desire had to be sated.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当剥皮者突袭一辆暴风雪车队时，一位年轻的贵族被俘虏了。他们高兴地嚎叫，从他背上割下皮肤，把他绑在一张钉床上。为了掩盖他的哭声，他们用缝合的皮肤做了一个面具，缝在他的脖子上。第二天，雷霆之刃袭击了营地，驱散了蛮族。后来，这名贵族痊愈了，但并没有摘下那面具。他戴着兜帽训练身体，毕生致力于复仇。\n\n经过多年的精心准备，他回到了那个营地。曾经的剥皮者变成了定居者。孩子们在父母曾经缝合过人肉的地方玩耍。但他渴望复仇，他的愿望必须得到满足。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As Dusk and Dawn intertwined in impassioned dance, mortal life was inspired by their union. There was conflict amongst the Primordials about the place of humanity; their disagreements soon became a full-blown war. Legends say that Dusk and Dawn combined their powers to establish the mythic Army of Genesis.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当黄昏和黎明交织在激情的舞蹈中时，凡人的生活被他们的结合所鼓舞。原初神之间就人类的定位产生了冲突；他们的分歧很快就变成了一场全面的战争。传说黄昏和黎明联合他们的力量建立了神话中的天启军团。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The military commander of the Cult of Bezeriel, the Fallen Archduke of Doom, was known for her torture methods. Despite her skeletal, lanky frame, her great strength was fueled by cruelty. Dark magic, tainted fire and putrid instruments allowed her to outwit her foes, sapping their strength as her concoctions and incisions reduced their bodies to diseased husks.\n\nThose who survived would suffer a terrible fate; some were consumed alive by maggots, others force-fed their own organs, but she always got the information she desired.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 贝泽瑞尔教派的军事指挥官因她的酷刑手段而闻名。尽管她的身躯瘦骨嶙峋，但残忍激发了她巨大的力量。黑魔法、污染之火和腐臭的仪器让她凌驾于敌人，随着她用混合物和割口让敌人的身体变成残躯，他们的力量也随之衰竭。\n\n而那些幸存下来的人将遭受更可怕的命运；一些人被蛆活活吞噬，另一些人被强行喂食自己的器官。最后她总能得到她想要的信息。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Kardis, the Blackstaff of Gomora, was born into the Cult of Bezeriel. Her mother, a competent witch, dreamt of becoming Bezeriel’s champion and joined the ritual. As the rite began, she was soon overwhelmed, unable to control the power of death. Crying in pain, the witch suddenly collapsed on the bier, dead. Watching an Immortal Maw devour her mother’s corpse, Kardis had to flee. She escaped, taking only her mother’s amulet. She poured her rage into the necklace and swore to become a powerful sorceress to wipe her city of its sins. Her fervent desire to cleanse Gomora twisted the pendant into the symbol of the Jewel of the Pariahs. How she lost her treasured amulet is a mystery.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 卡迪斯，哥摩拉的黑杖，出生于贝泽瑞尔教派。她的母亲，一个称职的女巫，梦想成为贝泽瑞尔的卫士，并加入了仪式。仪式开始时，她很快就承受不住，无法控制死亡的力量。女巫在恸哭中突然倒下，在棺木上死去。卡迪斯眼睁睁看着一只不朽巨口吞噬她母亲的尸体，她能做的却只有逃跑。她成功逃脱时，唯一带出来的东西是她母亲的吊坠。她把愤怒灌注到这条项链中，并发誓要成为一个强大的巫师，以铲除这座城市的罪恶。她对净化哥摩拉的强烈渴望，将这吊坠扭曲成了弃民之珠的象征。至于她是如何失去这条珍贵的吊坠的，还是个谜。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: An original piece of Purifier armor, crafted by the late Lerin Erich. The design was created to impale leaping demonspawn but had the secondary function of looking imposing.\n\nA trend of increasingly large and flamboyant shoulder guards began, with other armorers plagiarising Lerin’s concept and stealing his business. Shoulder guard size became synonymous with rank, leaving the original design to be worn only by frontline infantry. Despite his stylistic influence Lerin Erich fell into anonymity, and died a pauper.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 净化者盔甲的原型，由已故的勒林·埃里奇制作。设计的初衷是为了刺穿跃起的恶魔兵，但也有次要的功能：看起来威武雄壮。\n\n随着其他军械制造商剽窃勒林的概念并窃取他的生意，越来越大、越来越华丽的护肩开始流行。肩甲尺寸成了军阶的象征，而只有前线步兵才会穿最初的设计。尽管设计风格对后世产生了影响，但勒林·埃里奇还是籍籍无名，死得一贫如洗。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Cult of Sarisel is an evangelical secret order with a strict hierarchical structure. Every stage of initiation involves sacred rites testing the ability to cleanse all forms of impurity. Initiates have to kill immoral people from their past lives, corrupted animals and even fellow recruits with perceived darkness in their hearts.\n\nCompleting the full initiation process grants you a cincture of sanctity, a magical object that allows you to detect evil in any creature, the first step in becoming an Untainted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨利塞尔教派是一个具有严格等级结构的福音式秘密教团。启蒙的每一个阶段都包括一种神圣仪式，这种仪式会对净化一切形式不洁的能力进行测试。新人必须杀死他们过去人生中邪恶的人、腐化的生物，甚至是被感知到内心黑暗的同伴新人。\n\n完成整个入会流程后会被授予一条神圣的束带，那是一个让你在任何生物身上察觉邪恶的魔法物品，这是成为无垢者的第一步。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The rituals of the Cult of Etheliel are cruel and superficial. Youths of indisputable elegance are kidnapped from their homes and frozen alive, preserving their beauty in ice forever.\n\nThey are sedated and dressed in fine clothing, before they are slowly, delicately frozen from head to toe. The men are depicted as handsome war heroes, with specially forged ceremonial armor. Incredibly heavy and cold to the touch, it maintains the ice’s integrity as well as overstating the strength of its wearer.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 耶特利尔的仪式是残酷和肤浅的。风度翩翩的年轻人被从家中绑架，活生生冰封，美貌被冰霜永远保存。\n\n他们被强行镇静，套上华美的服装，然后慢慢地，从头到脚，小心翼翼地冷冻起来。这些人身着特制的礼仪盔甲，被刻画成英俊的战争英雄。这副盔甲摸上去令人难以置信的沉重和寒冷，它在保持冰之完美的同时夸张地显示着其穿戴者的力量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Captain James and his crew were drinking rum, Purses empty, the atmosphere was glum. He schemed and he wondered, “Where is the gold?” Archion Treasury, that it did hold! He called his men and yelled “Anchors aweigh!” And started a heist in the light of day. His crew stormed the bank, and soon found the safe, Wielding sword and gun, James fought like a wraith. With drunk eyes aglow with glimmering gold, More archers arrived, and turned their sweat cold. The captain dashed and escaped drunkenly, Dodged ev’ry shot; his hat not so lucky.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 詹姆斯船长和他的船员们正在喝朗姆酒， 钱包空空，气氛阴郁。 他谋划着，他想知道，“金子在哪里？” 阿奇恩金库，藏在那里！ 他叫上他的人，喊道：“起锚！“ 在天亮的时候开始了一场抢劫。 他的船员们冲进了银行，很快就找到了保险箱，詹姆斯挥舞着剑和枪，像鬼魂一样战斗着。 发红的醉眼里闪烁着金子的光泽， 更多的弓箭手到场了，让他们冷汗直流。 船长冲出去，醉醺醺地逃掉了， 他躲开了每一枪；他的帽子没躲开。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The horns bellow. The banners are raised. The battle begins. The clansmen storm the hall, mighty roars fill the air. Roasted birds pulled to pieces in an instant, the cartilage snaps like dry wood. Tough bread is ripped apart, tension on both sides mounting until the loaf yields. Whole hogs impaled repeatedly, slabs of flesh and crystallized fat are torn from the bones and consumed greedily. Red wine is toasted and spilled in revelry, waves of viscous liquid bathing the battlefield in a burgundy haze. This is what it means to be a Blood Tear raider.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 喇叭响了。旗帜升起了。战斗开始了。部落成员们冲进大厅，轰鸣声响彻全场。烤鸡瞬间被撕成碎片，软骨像干柴一样折断。 随着两边的力道不断增加，坚硬的面包被撕开，变成两根长条面包。整头猪反复被刺穿，从骨头上剔下的肉块和晶莹的脂肪，被贪婪地吞食。红酒在狂欢中被烤熟分饮，粘稠的液体在暗红色的雾霭中淋洒在战场上。 这就是血裂掠夺者的含义。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The first leader of the Blood Tear Clan wore this armor as a sign of his leadership. When he fell in battle, the warrior who avenged him took the breastplate for herself. A cycle of death and promotion began, and soon devolved into treachery. For decades, ambitious raiders cut down their own leaders to claim the armor and its influence.\n\nHowever, when Einjar joined the clan he appointed himself as leader with charismatic authority; no-one protested. He took the historic brigandine and threw it onto the loot pile to be sold, solidifying his legacy to come.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 他是血裂部落的第一个首领，穿着这件盔甲以示他的领导地位。当他在战斗中倒下，为他报仇的勇士穿上了这副铠甲。一个死亡和晋升的循环开始了，很快就演变成了背叛。几十年来，野心勃勃的掠夺者砍掉了他们自己的首领，来夺取这副铠甲和它的影响力。\n\n然而，当暗鸦加入这个部落，他用超凡的权威任命自己为领袖；没有人异议。他把历史悠久的铠甲扔进了要出售的战利品堆，巩固了他作为初来者的地位。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As the Republic continues its campaign of conquest, the earth trembles at their might.This 'noble' crusade threatens the great Kingdom of Varg and its clans. Many clans, from established dynasties to reclusive sects, refuse to cooperate due to petty disputes.\n\nThe Bronze Wolves are a militia created by Countess Odelia, recruiting soldiers across Varg to face the Republican menace. She aims to unite the clans with political guile and bargaining to amass an unbeatable army, with burnished bronze armor so lustrous that its shine can be seen for miles.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当共和国继续着它的征服战争，大地为他们的力量而颤抖。这场“崇高”的圣战威胁着法吉王国及其部族。从称王的藩国到隐居的宗派，许多氏族都由于一些鸡毛蒜皮的纠纷而拒绝合作。\n\n青铜狼是奥黛莉亚伯爵夫人创建的民兵组织，她旨在通过政治手段合纵连横，团结氏族的力量，以聚集起一支不可战胜的军队。这支军队在法吉招募士兵，以面对共和国的威胁。他们的青铜盔甲光彩夺目，光芒在几里外都能看到。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: For centuries, every child in C’tul has taken the Hunter’s Oath as a rite of passage. Tracking an animal, killing and butchering it; the hunter’s life is determined by the animal they catch. Once, a boy walked into the forest unarmed, following the voices of spirits.\n\nFour days later, he returned unharmed with the head of a spiral-horned black antelope, a mythical beast of old legends. The skull was like nothing anyone had ever seen, a trophy unlike any other. He became C’tul’s first shaman, guiding lost spirits to their place of rest.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 几百年来，克'图尔的每个孩子都把猎人之誓当作成人礼。追踪一只动物，击杀并屠宰它；猎人的人生由他们捕获的动物决定。有一次，一个男孩手无寸铁地走进森林，跟随者灵魂的声音。\n\n几天后，他毫发无损地拎着一只三角黑羚羊的头颅回来了，这是一只古老传说中的神话野兽。这颗前所未见的头颅是个与众不同的奖杯。他成为了克'图尔的第一位萨满，指引迷失的灵魂到他们安息的地方。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Sani Skinslip, better known as the Sani the Seer, was an infamous drug-smuggler from Three-Peaks. The High Abbots of the city would create potent psychedelics and invigorating powders, which were forbidden amongst the general population, to push their soothsayers to their fullest potential.\n\nSani used his light fingers and the secret compartment in his ring to obtain small quantities of these substances, self-medicating with the fumes that emanated through the cap. That is, he did, until he was stabbed unceremoniously in a backstreet.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 萨尼·脱皮更常被称为“先知萨尼”，是一名来自三峰城的臭名昭著的毒品走私犯。这个城市的高僧们会制造强力的迷幻药和能使人精神振奋的药粉，以使他们的占卜者发挥最大的潜能，而这些药粉在普通人中是禁止的。\n\n萨尼用他轻巧的手指和他戒指上的暗格来窃取少量的这些物质，靠暗格顶端挥发出来的烟过瘾。他一直这样做，直到他在后街被粗暴地捅死。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: These boots are used by Archion’s Departed to manipulate gravity and slow their terminal velocity, allowing them to leap from the flying city and explore the frontier wilderness below. The previous owner of this pair was killed in the hostile wildlands, but her body was found by Blue, the most secluded known human.\n\nBlue recognised the ranger as a recruit he had instructed, once wide-eyed and brimming with enthusiasm. He returned the boots to Archion, offering them to the family of the deceased with his condolences.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这中靴子被阿奇恩的无间行者们用来操纵重力，减缓他们的落地速度，让他们从飞行的城市中跃下，探索下面的边疆荒野。这双靴子的前主人在充满敌意的荒野中被杀，但她的尸体被已知最隐秘的人类，蓝发现了。\n\n蓝认出了这名游骑兵是他指导过的新兵，曾经好奇地睁大眼睛，充满热情。他把靴子归还到阿奇恩，向死者家属表示哀悼。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: An incredible piece of technology taken from the subterranean laboratory of the Cult of Ezaneal, the Bio-Flow Symbiosis Armor converts chemical energy into electricity, turning its wearer into a living generator. The pipes transfer fluid directly into the body, harvesting electricity from the movement within the wearer’s circulatory system. Bursts of adrenaline can supercharge machinery, allowing the technology to unleash its full potential with a uniquely powerful hormone.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这是一项不可思议的技术，来自伊查内亚教派地下实验室，这种生物流共生盔甲可以将化学能转化为电能，让穿戴者成为一个活体发电机。这些管道将液体直接输送到体内，从穿戴者的循环系统中获取电流。肾上腺素的激增会使机器超负荷运转，让这项技术能利用异常强大的激素释放出全部潜能。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Our mutual friend”, they called her. Triss had a talent for being everyone’s friend, giving the right gossip in the right place and forcing a lord into abdication in the same breath. But people missed the unglamorous aspect of the job: crawling through waste to hide a piece of intel, surviving on military rations for months in Laibon’s deserts, hiding behind crusty goggles to take a shot at a twelve year old heiress.\n\nThe truth was that all those Republican bureaucrats had better hope they were her friend. One never knows who Triss’ binoculars will point at next.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我们共同的朋友”，他们这么称呼她。特莉丝有一种天赋：她能和每个人成为朋友，在正确的地方散播合适的八卦，甚至能迫使一位君主退位。但人们无从得知这份工作不那么浪漫的一面：为埋藏一份情报爬过荒野；靠着军粮在莱邦沙漠里生活数月；透过那幅破旧的护目镜，向一位12岁的女继承人开枪。\n\n事实上，那些共和国官僚最好还是希望自己是她的朋友。毕竟谁也不知道她的准星下一次会瞄准谁。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Though most servants of Etheliel embrace the cold, the champion Vidar stays wrapped in Whitefield seal skins. He externalizes the frost magic from his body, emanating such a chill that his arrowheads fragment on contact but his purpose in this action isn’t war. He’s trying to recall the warmth of his mortal days; how the fire comforted them as he gutted fish beside his father. Still now, he’ll wrap himself in his father’s coat, so the Whitefield natives might mistake him for one of them. Memories remain, but no matter how he searches, Vidar can’t find the emotions taken by the cold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虽然耶特利尔的大多数仆从都拥抱寒冷，但勇士维达尔仍然裹在白原海豹皮里。他将冰霜魔法从他的身体中外化，散发出一股刺骨寒意，以至于他的箭头接触到他变为碎片，但这种行为并非为了战网。他试着回忆他在世时的温暖; 当他在父亲身边切鱼的时候，火焰是如何慰藉他们的。直到如今，他还是会把自己裹在他父亲的大衣里，这样白原当地人就会把他当成他们中的一个。记忆如故，但无论他如何追寻，维达尔都无找回被寒冰带走的情感。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The nameless one awoke in the middle of smoking rubble, confused yet untouched by the fires. Bodies everywhere, dried and tangled. All ornaments had burned away, but for a glint of gold in a cadaver’s fist. It was a medallion, upon closer examination, pulsing with a furious energy. He felt his chest thrum with rage again, when the shadow spirit that had soothed him reappeared. This amulet, she told him, was a symbol of those he had hurt. So long as he carried it, he should remember not to do harm.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 无名者在冒着烟的废墟中醒来，虽然迷茫，却未被大火波及。尸体随处可见，干燥又杂乱。所有的一切都烧掉了，只剩下一具尸体的拳头里闪着金光。仔细一看，那是一枚勋章，一股狂暴的能量在其中涌动。他感到怒火又一次充满他的胸膛，这时曾抚慰过他的暗影精灵又出现了。她告诉他，这个护身符是他伤害过的人的象征。只要他带着它，他就应该谨记不要再去伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When Arran Brightgale drove off the Republican occupation in Lejre, he unknowingly rescued a delegation of blacksmiths from Vulkaïn. These skilled metalworkers thanked him with a full suit of armor made in their lava-forged style. The platelegs anchored Arran to the ground, and roused him with flashes of ancient victories in the midst of great horrors.\n\nThough he couldn’t charge as he once had, being so heavy, the material made him an immovable eye of the storm on the frontlines.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当布莱格·阿兰从莱尔的共和党占领区撤出时，他在不知不觉中从瓦肯救了一个铁匠代表团。这些熟练的金属工人感谢他以熔岩锻造风格制作的全套盔甲。板腿将阿兰锚在了地上，并在巨大的恐怖之中闪耀着古老的胜利。\n\n尽管他无法像以前那样充电，但如此沉重，但这种材料使他无法在前线看到风暴。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: As a boy, Kiraan the Plaguebringer visited the terminally ill in Prestwich. Under the guise of compassion, he would drape his overcoat over their plague-wracked bodies, and listen to their mundane stories as disease imbued the garment. He began his first experimentations on the nature of pestilence with those samples. Now, as a masterful necromancer, he wants to suspend the whole of humanity in that malady. Sustained with undead energy, the sick would live on in eternal torture as their bodies turn gangrenous. An endless source of desperation to feed Kiraan’s patron, the ever-hungering Bezeriel, Fallen Archduke of Doom.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 小时候，瘟疫使者基兰去普雷斯威奇看望病入膏肓的病人。在同情的幌子下，他会把大衣披在他们饱受瘟疫折磨的身体上，在倾听他们讲述那些俗事之时，疾病浸入了外套。他用这些样本开始了他对瘟疫性质的第一次实验。现在，作为一个熟练的死灵法师，他想让整个人类都陷入这种病态。在不死能量的支撑下，病人将在身体坏疽溃烂的永恒折磨中继续存活。他成为无尽的绝望之源，用这种绝望去供奉他那位永远饥饿的庇护者：堕落的末日公爵贝泽瑞尔。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A passage is engraved in the leather. Tenet CCLVII: "To keep the body clean from abyssal stigma, engraved on the skin should be the terms of banishment, or no exorcism be taken on." Tenet CCLVIII: "A peaceable demon is a lying demon. Do not concede kindness to deceivers: such kindness is corruption." Tenet CCLIX: "Recall the terms of banishment: “The earthly body shall be pestilent to your tongue. The water that sates us shall be a plague to your body. I commit you to the abyss: out, out, out."
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 皮革上刻有一段文字。 特奈特CCLVII： “要保持身体清洁，避免深渊烙印，应在皮肤上刻上字样，否则不得驱魔。” 特奈特CCLVIII： “和平的恶魔是撒谎的恶魔。不要对欺骗者友善：这种友善就是腐败。” 特奈特·克利克斯（ Tenet CCLIX）： “回顾驱逐条款：“尘世的肉体对你的舌头有害。使我们饱满的水将困扰着你的身体。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “I know how you kill, I know where you worship, I know who you are, Because you were me.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我知道你如何杀戮， 我知道你哪里参拜， 我知道你是谁， 因为你就是我。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Alastor #273 fixes his mind on his target. Everything beyond that is a grey fog, excepting the tools of war ready for his usage. The energy from Ezaneal’s device is magnetic, leading him from one impact to the next. He hasn’t rested in years; he doesn't need to. Every warm body he cuts down feeds him with an electric pulse.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: Alastor＃273将他的思想固定在目标上。除了准备使用他的战争工具外，除此之外的一切都是灰雾。Ezaneal的装置产生的能量具有磁性，使他从一次撞击中引向另一次撞击。他好几年没有休息了。他不需要。他砍下的每一个温暖的身体都会用电脉冲给他喂食。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: For a while, the greatest scourge that ever afflicted Abanazaar, Beelmalik, and Etheliel’s cults was a raggedy elder. “Prophet” Ashoret, who’d stalk their members and raze their meeting places with disastrous hurricanes. He took a sash from each cult’s high priest as a trophy. By tying all three together, Ashoret was able to conjure a glimpse of each Abbathus’ elemental power, while channeling his faith to the long-forgotten Primordial of Change. A frail man with the strength of storms.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 有一段时间，折磨阿巴纳扎、比马利克和耶特利尔的教派的最大灾祸是一个衣衫褴褛的长者。先知阿索雷特，他跟踪他们的成员，用灾难性的飓风摧毁他们的聚会场所。他从每个邪教的大祭司的身上拿走他们的腰带作为战利品。通过将这三种力量结合在一起，阿索雷特能够释放出每一位阿巴图斯领主的元素能力，同时将他的信仰引导到被遗忘已久的变革之源。一个拥有风暴之力的孱弱之人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Squires among the Brotherhood of Dawn are eager to fight on behalf of the Lady. But when they sit among their brethren at home to hear the Hierophant’s hymns resonating from their torcs, they form a true bond to her. They recall their lessons telling how her Song, amplified by Hephaaron’s neck rings, granted her togetherness with Moros and bolstered the first movement of life. When they set their swords aside awhile, they do the work of healing themselves.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 黎明兄弟会的扈从都渴望为这位女士而战。但是当他们坐在家里的同胞们中间，聆听到祭司的圣咏从他们的灵魂中发出的共鸣，他们与她形成了真正的纽带。他们回忆起他们的课程，讲述了她的歌是如何被赫法耶博铸造的颈圈放大，赋予她与暮色之源的摩洛斯的归属感，并支撑起生命的第一乐章。当他们把剑放在一边的时候，他们也治愈了自己。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Tissarine is a particular delight for visiting diplomats; workshops overflow with the highest grade of crafts, the streets bustle with friendly, well-fed citizens, and best of all, guests get to leave with a gorgeous armour piece and a humble request not to divulge the location. Curious? Not as much as the mistress of the domain herself. The tale tells that this town rose to meet her every need. Maids, cooks, blacksmiths, even bounty hunters bringing Black Aster flowers. Freed of common chores, she cloisters herself in her mansion, a mystery even to her subjects.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提萨林是一个能让所有来访外交官感到开心的地方，;车间里满是最高级的工艺品，街道上熙熙攘攘，有友好的、吃得很好的市民，最棒的是，客人们可以带着华丽的盔甲离开，并被谦逊地请求不要透露地点。好奇吗?这还不如这个地方的女主人。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Voidforging is a perilous gamble. A demonologist will draw ritual circles before creating a bridge to the Abyss and allowing a single demon to enter the mortal world. They’ll collect a small quantity of Abyssal residue from the entity’s bound body and swiftly cast the creature back into the Abyss. Voidforged items can be dangerous, especially with long-term use, but their unique magical properties make them invaluable.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 虚空伪造是一场危险的赌博。在建立通向深渊的桥梁并允许单个恶魔进入凡人世界之前，一名恶魔学家会绘制仪式圈。他们将从实体绑定的身体中收集少量的深渊残渣，然后迅速将生物放回深渊。空虚物品可能很危险，尤其是长期使用时，但其独特的神奇特性使其无价之宝。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: At adulthood, Zima began to hear spirits call out to her. She longed to help them, and followed their cries to a cursed tree, both living and dead: burgeoning offshoots grew from its branches while the roots rotted.\n\nShe carved a ring from the cracked wood, engraving it with a totemic symbol. Her thoughts echoed in response to the spirits for the first time. With her newfound ability, she would guide lost souls to Eriebe, realm of the dead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 兹玛成年后开始听到鬼魂对她的呼唤。她渴望帮助他们，便跟随他们的哭泣声来到一棵被诅咒的树前。这棵树介于生与死中间：树根已经腐烂，枝条上却抽出新芽。\n\n她用这截断木雕镂出一枚戒指，并镌刻了一些图腾符号。她的思想第一次与鬼魂产生了共鸣。从那之后，她便靠着她新发掘的能力指引那些迷失的灵魂前往死亡的国度：幽冥。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hold SHIFT to switch between left and right item comparison
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 按住SHIFT在对比左右侧装备间切换

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: %1 (on use, lasts %2, stackable up to %3 times)
This item comes from an old version of the game and may be unbalanced or malfunctioning.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 该物品来自游戏的旧版本，可能失衡或失灵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Drag this gem to an item with an empty socket. Can have powerful hidden effects when used with a Ethereal Reagent.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将此宝石拖动到有空孔的装备上。使用一个缥缈灵气后有强大的隐藏效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Once unlocked, allows you to customize you to dye your equipment with this color in the Cosmetic Inventory.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一旦解锁，就允许你在外观库中使用此颜色自定义装备。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Rerolls all magic effects when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item cannot be applied on legendary and unique items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，会重roll其所有魔法效果。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级，类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n只有卓越灵气可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The process of creating an Entropy Orb is a dangerous endeavour that most of the time leads to the death of its creator. First, one would have to obtain an Erieban Tear and an Abyssal Tear, then the daring artificer would have to engage in a merging ritual, encasing the creative force within the void. \n\nThe mistake that spells the doom of most ritualists is failing to encase the creative force, instead allowing the void to feed on it, which causes a chain reaction leading to an implosion from which no human can survive.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 制造一个熵球的过程危险重重，大部分时候都会导致其制造者死亡。想要制造它首先需要获得幽冥之泪和深渊之泪，然后由大胆的制造者进行一个融合仪式，将造物之力包裹在虚空之中。\n\n导致大多数举行仪式者灭亡的错误是，没能把造物之力包裹，而是让虚空以之为食，导致连锁反应，以至于产生没有人能够从中幸存的内爆。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Removes a random magic effect and adds another when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a new magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item cannot be applied on legendary and unique items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，会随机移除一条魔法效果并另添一条。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级，类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n只有卓越灵气可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Should one be rich, lucky, or powerful enough to gather an Abyssal Tear and an Erieban Tear, there are rumors of a new type of energy that can be generated from this pairing of opposites. An echo of a force that knows no parallel, something that powerful scholars and supernatural entities alike have no explanation for to this day.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 如果某个人足够富有、幸运、或是强大，可以同时集齐幽冥之泪和深渊之泪，传闻中会有一种新的能量从这对对立的组合中产生。这是一种无可比拟的力量的回响，是至今为止那些博学的学者和超自然的存在都无法解释的东西。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Adds a new random magic effect when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a new magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item cannot be applied on legendary and unique items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，新增一项随机魔法效果。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级，类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n只有卓越灵气可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: What happens after the end of a mortal life? While most compensate for their ignorance by finding refuge in spirituality, others become obsessed with what lies beyond the Veil of Death.\n\nSome shamans and necromancers even managed to interact with the inacessible land of the dead known as "Eriebe". Through ill-gotten knowledge, an even rarer few have learned to lure specters and souls through the Veil of Death, and harvest the residual energy those entities carry in from Eriebe./n/nThese cold energy orbs have unique properties, rumour telling they can be transformed into any kind of matter or energy in the proper hands.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 凡人死后会发生什么？虽然大多数人通过寻求精神上的庇护来弥补他们的无知，但另有一些人却沉浸于生死帷幕之外的存在。 一些萨满和亡灵巫师甚至设法与被称为“幽冥”的死亡之地互动。通过来路不正的知识，更加稀少的少数人学会了透过生死帷幕引诱幽灵和鬼魂，并收获这些魂体从“幽冥”带来的残留能量。 这些冰冷的能量球有着独特的性质，传言说它们可以在合适的人手中转化成任何物质或能量。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Removes a random magic effect when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee keeping a magic effect whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item. Greater gems power allow the keeping of higher level magic effects.
\n\nThis item cannot be applied on legendary and unique items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，随机移除物品的一个词条。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级、类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n只有卓越灵气可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Demonologists and scholars of the supernatural have theorized voidcrafting for generations. Only the most daring or powerful of them manage the extraordinary feat of summoning a demon from the abyss and harvesting the residual Abyssal energy that clings to it.\n\nBut for those that delve into that art, it can also become a very lucrative endeavour to sell those abyssal orbs to those that know how to use them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 鬼神学家和超自然的学者们经过世世代代把虚空理论化。只有最大胆或最强大的人才能完成从深渊召唤恶魔并获得附着在其上的地狱能量的非凡壮举。\n\n但对于那些钻研这门艺术的人来说，将这些深渊法球卖给那些知道如何使用它的人，也不失为一项非常有利可图的尝试。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Rerolls all magic effects when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item can only be applied on legendary items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，会重roll其所有魔法效果。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级、类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n此物品只可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Removes a random magic effect and adds another when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a new magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item can only be applied on legendary items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，会随机移除一条魔法效果并另添一条。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级、类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n此物品只可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Adds a new random magic effect when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee a new magic effect whose power depends on the gems' level, and whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item.

\n\nThis item can only be applied on legendary items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，新增一项随机魔法效果。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级、类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n此物品只可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
<Font Size="15">Removes a random magic effect when used on an item. It will consume all socketed gems to guarantee keeping a magic effect whose type is chosen randomly among all the types of gems on the item. Greater gems power allow the keeping of higher level magic effects.

\n\nThis item can only be applied on legendary items.</Font>
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
<Font Size="15">当用于物品时，随机移除物品的一个词条。这将会消耗所有镶嵌在上面的宝石以保证出现一种魔法效果——其数值取决于宝石的等级、类型则是在消耗的所有宝石中随机选择。

\n\n此物品只可以作用于传奇装备。</Font>

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Will generate an area of level: %1
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将生成一个 %1 级区域

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Drag and drop this item in the box of the Expedition Map interface near "Dashing Eugene"
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 将此物品拖放到“幻影尤金”旁远征地图界面的框中。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon with an higher amount of chests.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个有更多宝箱的副本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Wherever that map may lead you, the promise of riches is embedded into it.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 无论这张地图会把你带往何处，你信或不信，财富就在那里。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon with an higher population of Wealth Omens.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个有大量“发财”甲虫的副本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Many believe that sighting a golden scarab is an event that predates success and wealth. It comes with no surprise that greedy entrepreneurs nicknamed "Omen Hunters" decided to capitalize on that popular belief to track these mysterious creatures and sell their location for an hefty profit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 许多人认为，只要看到金甲虫，紧接着成功和财富就会到来。绰号为“预兆猎人”的贪婪的移民们决定利用这个流行的信念来追踪这些神秘的生物，并出售他们的位置以获取巨额利润，这并不令人惊讶。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon guarded by its boss.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个由BOSS守护的副本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The four realms have no shortage of creatures, otherwordly entities, and devious humans to fill bounty hunting boards. The way of the sellsword guarantees never being in need for coins: successful ones have no shortage of it while unsuccessful ones don't last long enough to have any need for wealth.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 四大王国中从来都不缺各种生物、异界存在、狡诈的人类来填补赏金猎人的空缺。雇佣兵的方式保证了永远不缺钱: 成功的那些不差钱，而不成功的嘛..... 不需要钱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon guarded by its boss and his powerful guards.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个由BOSS和它的强大护卫们守护的副本。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Lords and Kings themselves can be overwhelmed by surges of ominous forces on their territory. Call-to-arms exists for that reason, beaconing for heroes and elite sellswords to do the dirty work for them. It is also much cheaper than to mobilize an entire army.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 领主和国王自己也会被他们领土上的不祥之兆所淹没。战斗召唤的存在就是为了这个原因，让英雄和精英佣兵们做这些脏活累活。这也比动员整支军队要便宜得多。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a room full of cursed chests with a limited time to loot them all.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个装满被诅咒宝箱的房间，在有限的时间内把它们全部洗劫一空。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: These rare mystical mushrooms can only grow on the graves of ascended humans. Following specific rites and preparations, they make for a potent incense powder with unique properties.The reveries their fumes bring can be both lethal and wonderful. They are often used to test the mind and body.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这种罕见的神秘蘑菇只能生长在人类升格者的坟墓之上。按照特定的仪式和准备，炼金师得以做出一种具备独特性质的强大烟熏香粉。它们的烟雾带来的遐想可能是致命的，也可能是美妙的。它们经常被用来测试大脑和身体。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon full of chests with a limited time to loot them all.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个装满宝箱的房间，在有限的时间内把它们全部洗劫一空。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Greedleaf dust became very expensive and rare when psychic seers discovered a way to extract its mind enhancing property. Some say the reveries its Incense fumes bring can manifest the deepest desires to the inhaler.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当灵媒预言家发现了一种提取它精华以增强心智的方法后，贪婪叶尘就变得非常昂贵和罕见。有人说，它的熏香烟雾带来的遐想可以显现出吸入者最深的欲望。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a dungeon full of Wealth Omens with a limited time to track, kill and loot them all.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个充满“发财”甲虫的房间，在有限的时间内追杀和掠夺他们。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Popular belief is that the precious Goldroot is the favourite plant of creatures nicknamed "Wealth Omens". So much so that the two seem to have a mystical connection. Failed alchemists have for a long time tried to transform that plant into a powerful incense that could reveal the bond between the two. Goldroot dust have recently surfaced on blackmarkets indicating that at least one of them has succeeded...
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 人们普遍认为，珍贵的黄金根是绰号“发财”的生物最喜欢的植物。甚至于两者之间似乎有一种神秘的联系。长久以来，无数失败的炼金术士一直试图将这种植物变成一种强大的香，以揭示两者之间的关系。最近在黑市上出现了黄金根的粉末，这表明他们之中有人已经成功了...

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a room full of chests and loot their reward.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个满是宝箱的房间并夺取其中的战利品。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The existence of such maps is often a story of its own. An heirloom hidden away, a pirate's booty, a group of adventurers that murdered each other at the moment of sharing… for this peculiar one, its story was indeed lost, but its riches however are very much real.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 这种地图的存在本身就是一个故事。一件被藏起来的传家宝，一个海盗的战利品，一群分配不均自相残杀的冒险家...... 它的故事确实丢失了，但是其中的财富毫无疑问是十分真实的。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a room full of cursed chests and loot their reward.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个满是被诅咒宝箱的房间并夺取其中的战利品

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Even greed has limits. Adventurers and explorers finding the location of protected, cursed, or possessed treasures might not always dare to claim them. Yet, they always pinpoint its location, selling the map might be enough of a reward for those lacking ambition.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 即便是贪婪也有限度。冒险家和探险者们可能并不敢占有那些他们发现的被守护、被诅咒或被拥有的宝藏。然而，他们总能精确定位，对那些缺乏雄心壮志的人来说出售地图也不失为一个好主意。
幻想香：有杂质的记忆回响
幻想香：纯净的记忆回响

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Access a room to fight the empowered version of a familiar boss.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 进入一个区域去挑战一位增强后的熟悉BOSS。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: An incense concocted in the wilderness surrounding Three Peaks. If listened to closely, the echoes of forgotten memories can be felt crawling into your ears, wiggling their way into your head and making room for their cursed remembrance. You can hear the familiar sucking of flesh, the looming redness of an unfathomable creature, and a name that you thought would never be uttered again: Lambach.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在三峰城边的荒野中调制的香。仔细倾听，你会感到那些被遗忘记忆的回响爬进你的耳朵，在你的脑海中摆动，为那些被诅咒的回忆腾出空间。你可以听到熟悉的吸吮肉体的声音，一个深不可测的造物若隐若现的红光，还有一个你以为永远不会再被提起的名字: 兰巴赫。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You can't reach this skill yet
You have invested points pending confirmation. Would you like to confirm them?
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 您已投入点数等待确认。想要确认吗？

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Would you like to reset your progression in the Gate of Fates? You will get all you passive skills points and attribute points back.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你想重置命运之门的点数吗？将退回所有被动技能点和属性点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Passive Skills have been modified since the last time you played and we had to reset your points in the Gate of Fates.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 因被动技能改版，你的命运之门加点已被重置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: This Passive Skill has not been implemented yet. Taking it won't cost you any skill points.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 此被动技能尚未实装。学习它不会花费你任何技能点。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Need to select a ring before rotating.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在旋转前你需要选定一环。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Need to select a ring before rotating.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在旋转前你需要选定一环。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: You don't have enough skill points.
Rings can't be moved while nodes are pending.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 需要确认加点才能旋转轮盘。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Chop! Chop! It's time for some killing boys! Show me what your guts are made of!" Almarik, Shock Infantryman _________________________________________________________ Most armies create their own mythos, populated with larger-than-life heroes that give troops examples to look-up to. Detractors often dismiss them as artificial myths created to fuel the war propaganda that surrounds them. Yet, the one known as "Soldier Almarik" is very real. Despite his prowess, he made his name by willingly keeping the lowest rank in the Purifiers' army. Burdening himself with anything other than the art of killing would not fit his style. His home is the battlefield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我劈！我剁！是时候屠杀小崽子了！让我康康你们的肠子是什么做的！ 阿玛里克,突击步兵 _________________________________________________________ 大多数军队都创造了自己的神话，其中充满了比生命更伟大的英雄，这些英雄给军队提供了值得仰慕的模范。诋毁者常常将其视为人为编造的神话，是为了配合战争宣传.然而，那个被称为“士兵阿玛里克”的传说绝对真实。尽管他很厉害，但他还是心甘情愿地在净化者的军队里保持着最低的军衔。把杀人艺术以外的东西压在自己身上不符合他的风格。他的家就是战场。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attacks and Spells are more likely to be Critical Hits.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 攻击和法术更有可能造成暴击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "If you take a hit, you hit 'em back twice. One to take 'em out, and the other to fuck up their corpse." Almarik, Shock Infantryman _________________________________________________________ Most armies create their own mythos, populated with larger-than-life heroes that give troops examples to look-up to. Detractors often dismiss them as artificial myths created to fuel the war propaganda that surrounds them. Yet, the one known as "Soldier Almarik" is very real. Despite his prowess, he made his name by willingly keeping the lowest rank in the Purifiers' army. Burdening himself with anything other than the art of killing would not fit his style. His home is the battlefield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果你挨了一下，就该还手两下。一下干死，一下鞭尸。” 阿玛里克，突击步兵 _________________________________________________________ 大多数军队都创造了自己的神话，其中充满了比生命更伟大的英雄，这些英雄给军队提供了值得仰慕的模范。诋毁者常常将其视为人为编造的神话，是为了配合战争宣传.然而，那个被称为“士兵阿玛里克”的传说绝对真实。尽管他很厉害，但他还是心甘情愿地在净化者的军队里保持着最低的军衔。把杀人艺术以外的东西压在自己身上不符合他的风格。他的家就是战场。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Taking Damage gives you more Rage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 承受伤害会给予你更多怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Purifiers protect mankind from the supernatural evils of the world... tsk, bunch of pompous twats! I merely play along that rubbish as long as they let me slaugther stuff for them!" Almarik, Shock Infantryman _________________________________________________________ Most armies create their own mythos, populated with larger-than-life heroes that give troops examples to look-up to. Detractors often dismiss them as artificial myths created to fuel the war propaganda that surrounds them. Yet, the one known as "Soldier Almarik" is very real. Despite his prowess, he made his name by willingly keeping the lowest rank in the Purifiers' army. Burdening himself with anything other than the art of killing would not fit his style. His home is the battlefield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “净化者保护人类免受世界上超自然的邪恶...啧啧，一堆华而不实的废话！我只是在他们需要我给他们弄点东西的时候捣鼓些垃圾罢了！” 阿玛里克,突击步兵 _________________________________________________________ 大多数军队都创造了自己的神话，其中充满了比生命更伟大的英雄，这些英雄给军队提供了值得仰慕的模范。诋毁者常常将其视为人为编造的神话，是为了配合战争宣传.然而，那个被称为“士兵阿玛里克”的传说绝对真实。尽管他很厉害，但他还是心甘情愿地在净化者的军队里保持着最低的军衔。把杀人艺术以外的东西压在自己身上不符合他的风格。他的家就是战场。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When below a certain threshold of Health your Health Regeneration is triggered. This Effect has a Cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当生命值低于一定界限时，获得爆发性的生命回复。该效果有冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The strong dominate the weak. No negotiation, no compromise. The mightiest of warriors deserve the greatest wealth, and we will take it by force." Einjar, Thane of the Blood Tear Clan _________________________________________________________ Every civilization has horrendous tales of barbarian hordes murdering, pillaging and raiding innocent people. Most of the time these exaggerated stories are meant to give shivers during the long winter nights. But these nightmarish depictions of violence caught up with fiction when the Ravagers of the Blood Tear stormed the lands of Varg. A terrifying warrior depicted as a whirlwind of iron and gore has risen as their new warlord. In his aura they seem to have reached new depths of savagery: cannibalism, blood rituals, dismemberments... the madness knows no bounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “强者支配弱者。没有谈判，没有妥协。最强大的战士就应当得到最多的财富，我们会用武力夺取它。” 暗鸦，血裂部落族长 _________________________________________________________ 每个文明都有关于野蛮部落屠杀、掠夺和袭击无辜人民的可怕故事。大多数时候，这些夸张的故事只为了在漫长的冬夜里使人颤抖。但是血裂部落的劫掠者们冲进法吉的土地时，便是一场赶得上小说中暴力描写的梦魇。其中一个可怕的战士堪描绘成一阵血与铁的旋风，而他正是这群劫掠者的新统帅。在他的光环中，他们的野蛮似乎已经达到了全新的高度：食人、鲜血仪式、肢解……那是无边的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Physical, Toxic and Rend damage is increased. You cannot inflict other Damage Types.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 提高物理、毒素、撕裂伤害加成。但无法造成其他类型的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Mortal danger brings out the best in a warrior. Being surrounded by an overwhelming number of enemies will turn you into a creature of war, an unstoppable being of death. If you survive that is." Einjar, Thane of the Blood Tear Clan _________________________________________________________ Every civilization has horrendous tales of barbarian hordes murdering, pillaging and raiding innocent people. Most of the time these exaggerated stories are meant to give shivers during the long winter nights. But these nightmarish depictions of violence caught up with fiction when the Ravagers of the Blood Tear stormed the lands of Varg. A terrifying warrior depicted as a whirlwind of iron and gore has risen as their new warlord. In his aura they seem to have reached new depths of savagery: cannibalism, blood rituals, dismemberments... the madness knows no bounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “致命的危险造就了战士。被无数敌人包围会使你变为一只战争的野兽，一个不可阻挡的死亡存在。如果你活下来的话。” 暗鸦，血裂部落族长 _________________________________________________________ 每个文明都有关于野蛮部落屠杀、掠夺和袭击无辜人民的可怕故事。大多数时候，这些夸张的故事只为了在漫长的冬夜里使人颤抖。但是血裂部落的劫掠者们冲进法吉的土地时，便是一场赶得上小说中暴力描写的梦魇。其中一个可怕的战士堪描绘成一阵血与铁的旋风，而他正是这群劫掠者的新统帅。在他的光环中，他们的野蛮似乎已经达到了全新的高度：食人、鲜血仪式、肢解……那是无边的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increased Damage for each Enemy within Melee Range.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 近战范围内的每个敌人都会给予你伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "We do not sow but we harvest. We join the crows for a feast. Our table is the battlefield!" Einjar, Thane of the Blood Tear Clan _________________________________________________________ Every civilization has horrendous tales of barbarian hordes murdering, pillaging and raiding innocent people. Most of the time these exaggerated stories are meant to give shivers during the long winter nights. But these nightmarish depictions of violence caught up with fiction when the Ravagers of the Blood Tear stormed the lands of Varg. A terrifying warrior depicted as a whirlwind of iron and gore has risen as their new warlord. In his aura they seem to have reached new depths of savagery: cannibalism, blood rituals, dismemberments... the madness knows no bounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我们不播种，但我们收获。我们与食腐的乌鸦一起享受盛宴。战场就是我们的餐桌！” 暗鸦，血裂部落族长 _________________________________________________________ 每个文明都有关于野蛮部落屠杀、掠夺和袭击无辜人民的可怕故事。大多数时候，这些夸张的故事只为了在漫长的冬夜里使人颤抖。但是血裂部落的劫掠者们冲进法吉的土地时，便是一场赶得上小说中暴力描写的梦魇。其中一个可怕的战士堪描绘成一阵血与铁的旋风，而他正是这群劫掠者的新统帅。在他的光环中，他们的野蛮似乎已经达到了全新的高度：食人、鲜血仪式、肢解……那是无边的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Give all forms of damage Life Leech. Life Leech heals you on the next tick of Health Regeneration.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 赋予所有形式的伤害以吸血。吸血会在下一跳生命回复时治疗你。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "No more weapons from the Republic! No more bribes from Varg! Now they die, they all die in an endless requiem of gore and laments! My axe thirsts!" Einjar, Thane of the Blood Tear Clan _________________________________________________________ Every civilization has horrendous tales of barbarian hordes murdering, pillaging and raiding innocent people. Most of the time these exaggerated stories are meant to give shivers during the long winter nights. But these nightmarish depictions of violence caught up with fiction when the Ravagers of the Blood Tear stormed the lands of Varg. A terrifying warrior depicted as a whirlwind of iron and gore has risen as their new warlord. In his aura they seem to have reached new depths of savagery: cannibalism, blood rituals, dismemberments... the madness knows no bounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “不再有来自共和国的武器！不再有来自法吉的贿赂！现在他们死了，他们都死在无尽的血腥和哀歌的安魂曲中！我的斧子渴了！” 暗鸦，血裂部落族长 _________________________________________________________ 每个文明都有关于野蛮部落屠杀、掠夺和袭击无辜人民的可怕故事。大多数时候，这些夸张的故事只为了在漫长的冬夜里使人颤抖。但是血裂部落的劫掠者们冲进法吉的土地时，便是一场赶得上小说中暴力描写的梦魇。其中一个可怕的战士堪描绘成一阵血与铁的旋风，而他正是这群劫掠者的新统帅。在他的光环中，他们的野蛮似乎已经达到了全新的高度：食人、鲜血仪式、肢解……那是无边的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The more Rage you have, the more Damage you deal. This applies to all Damage Types.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你拥有的怒气越多，就获得越多伤害增幅。适用于所有类型的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Stop running, boy. Your blood goes to waste on the ground." Einjar, Thane of the Blood Tear Clan _________________________________________________________ Every civilization has horrendous tales of barbarian hordes murdering, pillaging and raiding innocent people. Most of the time these exaggerated stories are meant to give shivers during the long winter nights. But these nightmarish depictions of violence caught up with fiction when the Ravagers of the Blood Tear stormed the lands of Varg. A terrifying warrior depicted as a whirlwind of iron and gore has risen as their new warlord. In his aura they seem to have reached new depths of savagery: cannibalism, blood rituals, dismemberments... the madness knows no bounds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “别跑了，孩子。你的血都浪费在地上了。” 暗鸦，血裂部落族长 _________________________________________________________ 每个文明都有关于野蛮部落屠杀、掠夺和袭击无辜人民的可怕故事。大多数时候，这些夸张的故事只为了在漫长的冬夜里使人颤抖。但是血裂部落的劫掠者们冲进法吉的土地时，便是一场赶得上小说中暴力描写的梦魇。其中一个可怕的战士堪描绘成一阵血与铁的旋风，而他正是这群劫掠者的新统帅。在他的光环中，他们的野蛮似乎已经达到了全新的高度：食人、鲜血仪式、肢解……那是无边的疯狂。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A percentage of Physical Damage becomes Rend Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一定百分比的物理伤害变为撕裂伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The Kingless are supposed to protect Laibon. Yet, criminality runs amok throughout the kingdom, and the Kingless refuse to intervene. I would rather die searching for a dead man than waste my life following hollow principles." Mah'alam, fifth shield of the Kingless _________________________________________________________ The kingdom of Laibon has a strong history of assigning their best warriors to the protection of their ruler. Yet, a few decades ago their king disappeared following a series of tragic events. Since then, these warriors became "The Kingless", training day and night purposelessly but ever ready to fulfill their oath should the crown return. One of them however chose not to wait any longer: he left the realm to track down clues of his sovereign's whereabouts. Should there be nothing left to protect then he would avenge him, and bring back the crown for a new king to take the throne.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "无君者应当保卫莱邦。然而，王国之中犯罪行为猖獗，无君者却拒绝干预。我宁愿死在寻找生死不知的君主的道路上也不愿让我的生命被浪费在追随空洞的准则。" 玛拉姆，无君者的第五盾卫 _________________________________________________________ 莱邦王国有指定最强战士成为统治者近卫的悠久历史。然而，几十年前，他们的君主随着一系列悲惨事件失踪。从那时起，这些战士变成了“无君者”，无目的地延续着每天的训练，但只要皇冠回归，他们随时准备好履行他们的誓言。但是他们中的一位选择不再等待：他离开了王国，以追踪他的君主的行踪线索。如果他不剩什么可以保护的话，他就会为君主报仇，并为了新君的登基夺回王冠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Blocking a Hit provides you and your Allies with an increased All Resistances Score Buff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 格挡一次打击会赋予你和队友一个增加全抗值的Buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The first shield of the Kingless used to tell us: 'Should one of us fall, do not mourn. Do not offer that to your foe. Instead, pick up the shield of the fallen, and bash the skull of your enemy with it.' If my king died, I dare not think of the pain I will unleash on the murderer." Mah'alam, fifth shield of the Kingless _________________________________________________________ The kingdom of Laibon has a strong history of assigning their best warriors to the protection of their ruler. Yet, a few decades ago their king disappeared following a series of tragic events. Since then, these warriors became "The Kingless", training day and night purposelessly but ever ready to fulfill their oath should the crown return. One of them however chose not to wait any longer: he left the realm to track down clues of his sovereign's whereabouts. Should there be nothing left to protect then he would avenge him, and bring back the crown for a new king to take the throne.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "无君者的第一盾卫曾告诉我们：‘我们中间若有人倒下，不要哀悼。别让敌人捡起他的武器。应该做的是，拿起牺牲同胞的盾牌，用它猛击敌人的头颅。’而如果我的君主死了，我不敢想象我会给凶手带来什么痛苦。" 玛拉姆，无君者的第五盾卫 _________________________________________________________ 莱邦王国有指定最强战士成为统治者近卫的悠久历史。然而，几十年前，他们的君主随着一系列悲惨事件失踪。从那时起，这些战士变成了“无君者”，无目的地延续着每天的训练，但只要皇冠回归，他们随时准备好履行他们的誓言。但是他们中的一位选择不再等待：他离开了王国，以追踪他的君主的行踪线索。如果他不剩什么可以保护的话，他就会为君主报仇，并为了新君的登基夺回王冠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each point of Physical Resistance increases the Damage you deal with all Damage Types, but decreases your Critical Chance Score.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每个百分点的物理抗性都会为所有类型的伤害提供加成，但会降低你的暴击几率值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The heart of my king still beats, I can feel its drumming deep in my bones like a call to action. I cannot rest until he is safe, and thus, my journey begins." Mah'alam, fifth shield of the Kingless _________________________________________________________ The kingdom of Laibon has a strong history of assigning their best warriors to the protection of their ruler. Yet, a few decades ago their king disappeared following a series of tragic events. Since then, these warriors became "The Kingless", training day and night purposelessly but ever ready to fulfill their oath should the crown return. One of them however chose not to wait any longer: he left the realm to track down clues of his sovereign's whereabouts. Should there be nothing left to protect then he would avenge him, and bring back the crown for a new king to take the throne.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "我君主的心跳没有停止，我在骨髓深处还能感受到它在咚咚的跳动，仿佛是对行动的呼唤。在他安全之前，我不能休息，于是，我的旅途开始了。" 玛拉姆，无君者的第五盾卫 _________________________________________________________ 莱邦王国有指定最强战士成为统治者近卫的悠久历史。然而，几十年前，他们的君主随着一系列悲惨事件失踪。从那时起，这些战士变成了“无君者”，无目的地延续着每天的训练，但只要皇冠回归，他们随时准备好履行他们的誓言。但是他们中的一位选择不再等待：他离开了王国，以追踪他的君主的行踪线索。如果他不剩什么可以保护的话，他就会为君主报仇，并为了新君的登基夺回王冠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Benefit from Block Chance with any Weapon equipped
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 无论使用什么武器，都可以获得格挡几率。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Our ruler is a man-god, a beacon of light gifted with secrets of creation! His lineage kept our realm safe from the long night for centuries... but now that he disappeared with no descendants, we can only fear the worse for our lands." Mah'alam, fifth shield of the Kingless _________________________________________________________ The kingdom of Laibon has a strong history of assigning their best warriors to the protection of their ruler. Yet, a few decades ago their king disappeared following a series of tragic events. Since then, these warriors became "The Kingless", training day and night purposelessly but ever ready to fulfill their oath should the crown return. One of them however chose not to wait any longer: he left the realm to track down clues of his sovereign's whereabouts. Should there be nothing left to protect then he would avenge him, and bring back the crown for a new king to take the throne.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "我们的统治者是一位在世神明，是蕴含创世秘密的灯塔！他的血统使我们的王国在漫长的黑夜里保持了几个世纪的安全...但现在，他消失了，没有子嗣，我们能做的只有忧虑国土的未来。" 玛拉姆，无君者的第五盾卫 _________________________________________________________ 莱邦王国有指定最强战士成为统治者近卫的悠久历史。然而，几十年前，他们的君主随着一系列悲惨事件失踪。从那时起，这些战士变成了“无君者”，无目的地延续着每天的训练，但只要皇冠回归，他们随时准备好履行他们的誓言。但是他们中的一位选择不再等待：他离开了王国，以追踪他的君主的行踪线索。如果他不剩什么可以保护的话，他就会为君主报仇，并为了新君的登基夺回王冠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Blocking an Enemy's attack inflicts them with Weakness.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 格挡一次打击会对敌人施加虚弱。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "The bounty of our holy ruler was limitless. No-one went hungry and the silos were full. When his divine inspiration departed, so too did our resources. Now that we are at our most desperate, it's a small miracle that we survive at all." Mah'alam, fifth shield of the Kingless _________________________________________________________ The kingdom of Laibon has a strong history of assigning their best warriors to the protection of their ruler. Yet, a few decades ago their king disappeared following a series of tragic events. Since then, these warriors became "The Kingless", training day and night purposelessly but ever ready to fulfill their oath should the crown return. One of them however chose not to wait any longer: he left the realm to track down clues of his sovereign's whereabouts. Should there be nothing left to protect then he would avenge him, and bring back the crown for a new king to take the throne.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "我们神圣统治者的慷慨是无限的。仓廪实，衣食足。当他神圣的灵性消失时，我们的资源也消失了。现在我们已经到了最绝望的地步，能活下来就已经是个奇迹。" 玛拉姆，无君者的第五盾卫 _________________________________________________________ 莱邦王国有指定最强战士成为统治者近卫的悠久历史。然而，几十年前，他们的君主随着一系列悲惨事件失踪。从那时起，这些战士变成了“无君者”，无目的地延续着每天的训练，但只要皇冠回归，他们随时准备好履行他们的誓言。但是他们中的一位选择不再等待：他离开了王国，以追踪他的君主的行踪线索。如果他不剩什么可以保护的话，他就会为君主报仇，并为了新君的登基夺回王冠。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Health Globes will now provide a temporary Buff to your Resistances as well as Healing you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使生命球在治疗你的同时提供一个临时的抗性Buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "We move on horseback but we strike on foot. They should never hear us coming, for if they do we face certain death. By the time they realize they are getting flanked, we should already be back to our mounts and going. I don't want anyone playing hero on this squad." Triss, The Flying Dragoon _________________________________________________________ Intelligence gathering is the key to successful warfare. Such a pretty sentence is a staple taught in Republican military academies, yet those few words have very real implications on the field. There is an ever growing need for discrete and fast soldiers able to track opposing forces' positions, work behind enemy lines or even infiltrate them for sabotage. They are the backbone that allows Inquisitors to make sound strategic decisions. One of them made a name for herself among Republican troops: The Flying Dragoon, a scout from a squad of light cavalry dedicated to harassing the enemy's supply chain. Her reputation states that she is so effective that her sabotages alone are enough to shatter opposing troops' morale.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我们骑马前进，但下马进攻。不能让他们听出我们来了，否则我们必死无疑。当他们意识到他们被偷袭了，我们应该已经回到我们的坐骑上绝尘而去。我不希望任何人在这个队伍里扮演英雄。” 特莉丝，飞龙骑兵 _________________________________________________________ 情报搜集是成功战争的关键。这样一个漂亮的句子在共和国军事学院被奉若圭臬，但在实战中这些话几乎没有实际意义。对能够单兵作战的机动士兵的需求不断增长，他们需要能够跟踪地方位置，进行敌后工作甚至渗透破坏。他们是让审判官能够作出合理战略决策的骨干力量。在共和国的军队中，有这么一位，她给自己取了个别号：飞龙骑兵，她是一名斥候，来自一个专门骚扰敌人的后勤供给轻骑兵队。她的声誉表明，她是如此高效，她独自一人的骚扰就足以粉碎敌方军队的士气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Attack and Spell Casting Speed is increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的攻击速度和施放速度得到提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Many generals say that fear is the enemy. They sit comfortably, directing units miles away from the bloodshed. When you are discovered in enemy territory and you have to run for your life, fear may be the only thing that keeps you alive." Triss, The Flying Dragoon _________________________________________________________ Intelligence gathering is the key to successful warfare. Such a pretty sentence is a staple taught in Republican military academies, yet those few words have very real implications on the field. There is an ever growing need for discrete and fast soldiers able to track opposing forces' positions, work behind enemy lines or even infiltrate them for sabotage. They are the backbone that allows Inquisitors to make sound strategic decisions. One of them made a name for herself among Republican troops: The Flying Dragoon, a scout from a squad of light cavalry dedicated to harassing the enemy's supply chain. Her reputation states that she is so effective that her sabotages alone are enough to shatter opposing troops' morale.

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Gain additional Stamina Points while at low Health. This Effect has a Cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 低血量时获得额外耐力点。该效果有冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "If you want to get a feel of the enemy, join him. Standing armies or evil cults, it matters not. You have to think and move like one of them if you want to survive. The hardest part still, will always be to break character and slip out for a report." Triss, The Flying Dragoon _________________________________________________________ Intelligence gathering is the key to successful warfare. Such a pretty sentence is a staple taught in Republican military academies, yet those few words have very real implications on the field. There is an ever growing need for discrete and fast soldiers able to track opposing forces' positions, work behind enemy lines or even infiltrate them for sabotage. They are the backbone that allows Inquisitors to make sound strategic decisions. One of them made a name for herself among Republican troops: The Flying Dragoon, a scout from a squad of light cavalry dedicated to harassing the enemy's supply chain. Her reputation states that she is so effective that her sabotages alone are enough to shatter opposing troops' morale.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果你想了解敌人，就加入他。无论是常备军还是邪教，都无关紧要。如果你想生存，你必须像他们一样思考和行动。最困难的部分总是打破角色，溜出去报告。” 特莉丝，飞龙骑兵 _________________________________________________________ 情报搜集是成功战争的关键。这样一个漂亮的句子在共和国军事学院被奉若圭臬，但在实战中这些话几乎没有实际意义。对能够单兵作战的机动士兵的需求不断增长，他们需要能够跟踪地方位置，进行敌后工作甚至渗透破坏。他们是让审判官能够作出合理战略决策的骨干力量。在共和国的军队中，有这么一位，她给自己取了个别号：飞龙骑兵，她是一名斥候，来自一个专门骚扰敌人的后勤供给轻骑兵队。她的声誉表明，她是如此高效，她独自一人的骚扰就足以粉碎敌方军队的士气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases your Passive Dodge Chance Score
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你的被动闪避几率值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "A thousand poisons for a thousand purposes." Li-Wei, Master of the Jade Legion _________________________________________________________ Most of the Kuei Empire's territory is covered in jungle. Its cities are connected by a network of traderoads regularly patrolled by imperial troops. But for the past fifteen years, the Jade Legion has been harassing caravans with ambushes all over the empire. Their elusive nature has shrouded them in myths concerning their motives and habits. To this day, one of the best kept secrets of the emperor is that the current Jade Legion's leader is an imperial agent working for him. He infiltrated them, assassinated the previous leader and took his place. Now, the emperor puppets the Jade Legion to justify exuberant taxes over all the cities under his dominion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “千毒千用。” 李维，翡翠军团之主 _________________________________________________________ 库埃帝国的大部分领土都是丛林。它的城市通过一个由帝国军队巡逻的贸易网络连接起来。但在过去的十五年里，翡翠军团一直在帝国各地通过埋伏袭击车队。 他们难以捉摸的天性让他们的动机和习惯都笼罩在神秘之中。而现如今，帝国皇帝保守最严密的秘密之一就是，现任翡翠军团的领袖其实是一个为他效力的帝国特工。他渗透到他们之中，刺杀了前任领导人并取而代之。现在，翡翠军团作为皇帝的傀儡，让他对能够名正言顺地对治下的所有城市开征高额税收。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A percentage of Physical Damage is converted into Toxic Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 一定百分比的物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "No jade legionnary has ever been interrogated. Our evasive manoeuvers are unparalleled, as for those that do get caught, their will never falter when comes the time of their ultimate sacrifice. The toxin in their hidden tooth is very effective, for death is preferable to failure." Li-Wei, Master of the Jade Legion _________________________________________________________ Most of the Kuei Empire's territory is covered in jungle. Its cities are connected by a network of traderoads regularly patrolled by imperial troops. But for the past fifteen years, the Jade Legion has been harassing caravans with ambushes all over the empire. Their elusive nature has shrouded them in myths concerning their motives and habits. To this day, one of the best kept secrets of the emperor is that the current Jade Legion's leader is an imperial agent working for him. Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Active Dodges can go through Enemies.

"Assassination is a peculiar trade. A price for a life, it seems simple on the surface. But the preparation, the circumstances and the execution itself each have their own intricacies. And there can never be any witnesses." Li-Wei, Master of the Jade Legion _________________________________________________________ Most of the Kuei Empire's territory is covered in jungle. Its cities are connected by a network of traderoads regularly patrolled by imperial troops. But for the past fifteen years, the Jade Legion has been harassing caravans with ambushes all over the empire. Their elusive nature has shrouded them in myths concerning their motives and habits. To this day, one of the best kept secrets of the emperor is that the current Jade Legion's leader is an imperial agent working for him. He infiltrated them, assassinated the previous leader and took his place. Now, the emperor puppets the Jade Legion to justify exuberant taxes over all the cities under his dominion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “暗杀是一种特殊的交易。一条人命，一个价格，表面上似乎很简单。但是，准备、临场状况和执行本身都有各自的复杂性。并且永远不能有目击者。” 李维，翡翠军团之主 _________________________________________________________ 库埃帝国的大部分领土都是丛林。它的城市通过一个由帝国军队巡逻的贸易网络连接起来。但在过去的十五年里，翡翠军团一直在帝国各地通过埋伏袭击车队。 他们难以捉摸的天性让他们的动机和习惯都笼罩在神秘之中。而现如今，帝国皇帝保守最严密的秘密之一就是，现任翡翠军团的领袖其实是一个为他效力的帝国特工。他渗透到他们之中，刺杀了前任领导人并取而代之。现在，翡翠军团作为皇帝的傀儡，让他对能够名正言顺地对治下的所有城市开征高额税收。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deal increased Damage when only one Enemy is Nearby.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在附近只有一个敌人时获得伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Make your movement unpredictable, for the unseen strike is the deadliest." Li-Wei, Master of the Jade Legion _________________________________________________________ Most of the Kuei Empire's territory is covered in jungle. Its cities are connected by a network of traderoads regularly patrolled by imperial troops. But for the past fifteen years, the Jade Legion has been harassing caravans with ambushes all over the empire. Their elusive nature has shrouded them in myths concerning their motives and habits. To this day, one of the best kept secrets of the emperor is that the current Jade Legion's leader is an imperial agent working for him. He infiltrated them, assassinated the previous leader and took his place. Now, the emperor puppets the Jade Legion to justify exuberant taxes over all the cities under his dominion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “使你的行动不可预测，没有被发现的攻击才是最致命的。” 李维，翡翠军团之主 _________________________________________________________ 库埃帝国的大部分领土都是丛林。它的城市通过一个由帝国军队巡逻的贸易网络连接起来。但在过去的十五年里，翡翠军团一直在帝国各地通过埋伏袭击车队。 他们难以捉摸的天性让他们的动机和习惯都笼罩在神秘之中。而现如今，帝国皇帝保守最严密的秘密之一就是，现任翡翠军团的领袖其实是一个为他效力的帝国特工。他渗透到他们之中，刺杀了前任领导人并取而代之。现在，翡翠军团作为皇帝的傀儡，让他对能够名正言顺地对治下的所有城市开征高额税收。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dash Attacks have an increased Chance to be Critical Hits.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 冲刺造成暴击的几率增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "If you do not have the intent to kill, do not aim." Li-Wei, Master of the Jade Legion _________________________________________________________ Most of the Kuei Empire's territory is covered in jungle. Its cities are connected by a network of traderoads regularly patrolled by imperial troops. But for the past fifteen years, the Jade Legion has been harassing caravans with ambushes all over the empire. Their elusive nature has shrouded them in myths concerning their motives and habits. To this day, one of the best kept secrets of the emperor is that the current Jade Legion's leader is an imperial agent working for him. He infiltrated them, assassinated the previous leader and took his place. Now, the emperor puppets the Jade Legion to justify exuberant taxes over all the cities under his dominion.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果你没有杀人的意图，就不要瞄准。” 李维，翡翠军团之主 _________________________________________________________ 库埃帝国的大部分领土都是丛林。它的城市通过一个由帝国军队巡逻的贸易网络连接起来。但在过去的十五年里，翡翠军团一直在帝国各地通过埋伏袭击车队。 他们难以捉摸的天性让他们的动机和习惯都笼罩在神秘之中。而现如今，帝国皇帝保守最严密的秘密之一就是，现任翡翠军团的领袖其实是一个为他效力的帝国特工。他渗透到他们之中，刺杀了前任领导人并取而代之。现在，翡翠军团作为皇帝的傀儡，让他对能够名正言顺地对治下的所有城市开征高额税收。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Critical Damage is increased, but your Damage is decreased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加暴击伤害，减少伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "I've seen so many Departed die from the treachery of these lands. Warning them of the horrors they will face does not change their fate... you have to be there. You have to see for yourself. If you survive them once, you might survive them twice and eventually you might call yourself prepared for anything." Blue, Ranger of the Departed and most secluded known human _________________________________________________________ Like a migratory bird, the flying city of Archion follows a nomadic lifestyle. It has three anchorage points, its easternmost is above a lagoon on the coast of one of the two unexplored continents, making it the most exposed city to the exotic evils of the unknown. Once a year, the Departed, a troop made of brave rangers, are sent out to map these frontier lands. Few return, and those that do often come back with mental diseases festering in their mind. All know that they should never stay longer than a night out there... except for "Blue", a lone wolf which learned how to survive on his own for weeks. To this day, Blue hasn't shared his secret nor the wonders that he discovered out there.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我见过如此多无间行者死于这片土地的反噬。警告他们将会面对的怎样的恐怖不会改变他们的命运…你只能在那里。你只能亲眼看着。你可能可以帮他们活下来一次，也可能两次，但最终你会告诉自己，接受这一切。” 蓝，无间游侠，已知最隐秘的人类 _________________________________________________________ 飞行之城阿奇恩会像候鸟一样迁徙。它有三个锚点，其中最东端是在两个未被开发的大陆之一的海岸边的环礁湖上，使它成为在未知的异域邪恶面前最暴露的城市。一年一次，无间行者，一支由勇敢的游骑兵组成的部队被派去测绘这些边缘地区。很少有人能回来，而那些回来的人往往也会患上令他们心智溃烂的精神疾病。所有人都知道他们不应该在外面呆超过一个晚上…除了“蓝”，一只孤独的狼学会了如何独自生存数周。直到今天，蓝也没有分享他的秘密以及他在那里发现的奇迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Projectiles that Hit an Enemy at close range Pierce them, meaning that the Projectile can Hit other Enemies behind them.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 近距离击中敌人的投射物会穿透他们，并对他们身后的其他敌人造成伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Tracking an animal is like getting to know them. Beyond the curled teeth and barbed tail, you see where they eat, where they sleep, where they hunt. Pursuing them until they collapse, you finally take the life you know so well." Blue, Ranger of the Departed and most secluded known human _________________________________________________________ Like a migratory bird, the flying city of Archion follows a nomadic lifestyle. It has three anchorage points, its easternmost is above a lagoon on the coast of one of the two unexplored continents, making it the most exposed city to the exotic evils of the unknown. Once a year, the Departed, a troop made of brave rangers, are sent out to map these frontier lands. Few return, and those that do often come back with mental diseases festering in their mind. All know that they should never stay longer than a night out there... except for "Blue", a lone wolf which learned how to survive on his own for weeks. To this day, Blue hasn't shared his secret nor the wonders that he discovered out there.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “就像想和它交朋友一样追踪一只动物。除了卷曲的牙齿和带刺的尾巴，你还可以看到他们在哪里进食，在哪里睡觉，在哪里打猎。追踪它们直到它们崩溃，最后夺走这条你熟知的生命。” 蓝，无间游侠，已知最隐秘的人类 _________________________________________________________ 飞行之城阿奇恩会像候鸟一样迁徙。它有三个锚点，其中最东端是在两个未被开发的大陆之一的海岸边的环礁湖上，使它成为在未知的异域邪恶面前最暴露的城市。一年一次，无间行者，一支由勇敢的游骑兵组成的部队被派去测绘这些边缘地区。很少有人能回来，而那些回来的人往往也会患上令他们心智溃烂的精神疾病。所有人都知道他们不应该在外面呆超过一个晚上…除了“蓝”，一只孤独的狼学会了如何独自生存数周。直到今天，蓝也没有分享他的秘密以及他在那里发现的奇迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies that have Impaired Movement (Slowed, in Stasis, Stunned or Frozen) take increased Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 对移动能力受损的敌人（减速、停滞、眩晕、冻结）造成的伤害获得一定加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Whenever I'm home, younglings ask me what should they do to be like me... I simply tell them to listen to their militia instructor, after all, we have the best ranged warfare of the world. But the truth is: I don't want them to follow my path. These lands are best untouched, left alone. I just go there to find solace, not to conquer them." Blue, Ranger of the Departed and most secluded known human _________________________________________________________ Like a migratory bird, the flying city of Archion follows a nomadic lifestyle. It has three anchorage points, its easternmost is above a lagoon on the coast of one of the two unexplored continents, making it the most exposed city to the exotic evils of the unknown. Once a year, the Departed, a troop made of brave rangers, are sent out to map these frontier lands. Few return, and those that do often come back with mental diseases festering in their mind. All know that they should never stay longer than a night out there... except for "Blue", a lone wolf which learned how to survive on his own for weeks. To this day, Blue hasn't shared his secret nor the wonders that he discovered out there.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “每当我回家的时候，年轻人都会问我，他们应该怎么做才能像我一样…我只是告诉他们听他们的民兵指导员的话，毕竟阿奇恩在远程战争方面举世无双。但事实是：我不希望他们走上我的道路。那些地方最好不要被触及，遗世独立。我只是去那里寻求慰藉，而不是征服它们。” 蓝，无间游侠，已知最隐秘的人类 _________________________________________________________ 飞行之城阿奇恩会像候鸟一样迁徙。它有三个锚点，其中最东端是在两个未被开发的大陆之一的海岸边的环礁湖上，使它成为在未知的异域邪恶面前最暴露的城市。一年一次，无间行者，一支由勇敢的游骑兵组成的部队被派去测绘这些边缘地区。很少有人能回来，而那些回来的人往往也会患上令他们心智溃烂的精神疾病。所有人都知道他们不应该在外面呆超过一个晚上…除了“蓝”，一只孤独的狼学会了如何独自生存数周。直到今天，蓝也没有分享他的秘密以及他在那里发现的奇迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Attacks and Spells that launch Projectiles now launch an additional Projectile. The Damage of each Projectile is decreased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 发射投射物的攻击和法术会额外发射一枚投射物。每枚投射物的伤害将会降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Killing another living creature should never be done lightly. When possible, I take my time with each arrow, recognizing their deadly potential. If that potential is aligned with my intent, I can be certain that it will land true." Blue, Ranger of the Departed and most secluded known human _________________________________________________________ Like a migratory bird, the flying city of Archion follows a nomadic lifestyle. It has three anchorage points, its easternmost is above a lagoon on the coast of one of the two unexplored continents, making it the most exposed city to the exotic evils of the unknown. Once a year, the Departed, a troop made of brave rangers, are sent out to map these frontier lands. Few return, and those that do often come back with mental diseases festering in their mind. All know that they should never stay longer than a night out there... except for "Blue", a lone wolf which learned how to survive on his own for weeks. To this day, Blue hasn't shared his secret nor the wonders that he discovered out there.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “击杀其他生物永远不能轻举妄动。在可能的情况下，我会花费时间认清每一箭的致命潜能，如果其潜能与我的意图一致，那么我就能确定它会正中目标。” 蓝，无间游侠，已知最隐秘的人类 _________________________________________________________ 飞行之城阿奇恩会像候鸟一样迁徙。它有三个锚点，其中最东端是在两个未被开发的大陆之一的海岸边的环礁湖上，使它成为在未知的异域邪恶面前最暴露的城市。一年一次，无间行者，一支由勇敢的游骑兵组成的部队被派去测绘这些边缘地区。很少有人能回来，而那些回来的人往往也会患上令他们心智溃烂的精神疾病。所有人都知道他们不应该在外面呆超过一个晚上…除了“蓝”，一只孤独的狼学会了如何独自生存数周。直到今天，蓝也没有分享他的秘密以及他在那里发现的奇迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Deal increased Damage when Far-Away from Enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 远离敌人时获得伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "First rule of survival: Curiosity kills. If something comes your way and you are unsure of its intentions, shoot or run, but don't stand there wondering." Blue, Ranger of the Departed and most secluded known human _________________________________________________________ Like a migratory bird, the flying city of Archion follows a nomadic lifestyle. It has three anchorage points, its easternmost is above a lagoon on the coast of one of the two unexplored continents, making it the most exposed city to the exotic evils of the unknown. Once a year, the Departed, a troop made of brave rangers, are sent out to map these frontier lands. Few return, and those that do often come back with mental diseases festering in their mind. All know that they should never stay longer than a night out there... except for "Blue", a lone wolf which learned how to survive on his own for weeks. To this day, Blue hasn't shared his secret nor the wonders that he discovered out there.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “生存的第一法则：好奇心害死人。如果有什么东西来了，你不确定它的意图，要么开枪要么逃跑，但不要站在那里纳闷。” 蓝，无间游侠，已知最隐秘的人类 _________________________________________________________ 飞行之城阿奇恩会像候鸟一样迁徙。它有三个锚点，其中最东端是在两个未被开发的大陆之一的海岸边的环礁湖上，使它成为在未知的异域邪恶面前最暴露的城市。一年一次，无间行者，一支由勇敢的游骑兵组成的部队被派去测绘这些边缘地区。很少有人能回来，而那些回来的人往往也会患上令他们心智溃烂的精神疾病。所有人都知道他们不应该在外面呆超过一个晚上…除了“蓝”，一只孤独的狼学会了如何独自生存数周。直到今天，蓝也没有分享他的秘密以及他在那里发现的奇迹。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies take increased Damage from your Projectiles, the Damage scaling (up to a limit) with their distance away from where you launched the Projectile.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 随着敌人与你发射投射物位置的距离增加，投射物的伤害加成也会增加（直至达到上限）。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Patience, Inquisitor. Stay your hand. Our foes are cornered and not going anywhere. Our best move might be not to move at all... let them slowly wither. Force them into a desperate charge to break our lines. Only then, shall they be crushed." Jeremiah, Battle Counselor of the 4th Purifier Legion _________________________________________________________ One needs foresight, strategy and knowledge to efficiently lead a battalion. That's why Inquisitors and Justicars of the Republic surround themselves with specialists that know the terrain, culture and anatomy of their enemies. For the Purifiers, those enemies belong to the supernatural which forces their scholars to study witchcraft even though they are strictly forbidden from ever practicing it. A thin line that drove many to madness or even to the stake. Yet, Counselor Jeremiah successfully mastered those forbidden arts in secrecy, using them to become one of the best battle masterminds in history. Of course he has declined all opportunities of advancement, being more than happy to stay in the shadow of ambitious Inquisitors while he delves deeper into forbidden knowledge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “耐心，审判官。”别急着动手。我们的敌人已经被逼到墙角，哪儿也去不了。我们最好的动作就是按兵不动...让他们的希望慢慢破灭，逼迫他们向我们的阵线发起绝望的冲锋。只需要这样，就能轻松碾死他们。“ 耶利米，第四净化者军团的战斗顾问 _________________________________________________________ 一个人需要远见、战略和知识才能有效地领导一支队伍。这就是为什么共和国的审判官和制裁者让自己身边围着各种专家，他们了解敌人的地形、文化和结构。对于净化者来说，拥有超凡力量的敌人迫使他们让学者研究巫术，同时又严格禁止他们练习巫术。这条微妙的界限让很多人疯掉甚至被送上火刑架。然而，顾问耶利米成功地秘密掌握了这些被禁止的技艺，并利用它们成为史上最好的战斗策划人之一。当然，他已经拒绝了所有晋升的机会，他非常乐意待在雄心勃勃的审判官们的阴影下继续深入研究被禁止的知识。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increases your Ailment Chance Score with all Ailments
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你造成所有异常状态的几率值

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Soldiers are told to be willing to lay down their lives in the Republic. Not on my watch. A Purifier's life must be protected, so that they may uncover the cultists' mysteries. The more we know, the stronger we become." Jeremiah, Battle Counselor of the 4th Purifier Legion _________________________________________________________ One needs foresight, strategy and knowledge to efficiently lead a battalion. That's why Inquisitors and Justicars of the Republic surround themselves with specialists that know the terrain, culture and anatomy of their enemies. For the Purifiers, those enemies belong to the supernatural which forces their scholars to study witchcraft even though they are strictly forbidden from ever practicing it. A thin line that drove many to madness or even to the stake. Yet, Counselor Jeremiah successfully mastered those forbidden arts in secrecy, using them to become one of the best battle masterminds in history. Of course he has declined all opportunities of advancement, being more than happy to stay in the shadow of ambitious Inquisitors while he delves deeper into forbidden knowledge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “士兵们被告知要愿意为共和国献出生命。我对此持保留态度。一位净化者的生命必须被保护，这样他们才能揭开邪教徒的秘密。我们知道得越多，就变得越强大。“ 耶利米，第四净化者军团的战斗顾问 _________________________________________________________ 一个人需要远见、战略和知识才能有效地领导一支队伍。这就是为什么共和国的审判官和制裁者让自己身边围着各种专家，他们了解敌人的地形、文化和结构。对于净化者来说，拥有超凡力量的敌人迫使他们让学者研究巫术，同时又严格禁止他们练习巫术。这条微妙的界限让很多人疯掉甚至被送上火刑架。然而，顾问耶利米成功地秘密掌握了这些被禁止的技艺，并利用它们成为史上最好的战斗策划人之一。当然，他已经拒绝了所有晋升的机会，他非常乐意待在雄心勃勃的审判官们的阴影下继续深入研究被禁止的知识。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Health Globes now restore your Force Shield as well as your Health.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 使生命球回复生命的同时也回复护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "If they knew of my powers, I would be branded a traitor. Purifiers do not see the world in shades of grey: anything magical is considered witchcraft and consorting with demons. Sometimes I wish I could teach them of my findings, bring the republic to new heights of power by making the occult an ally rather than a foe. Yet, they are far from ready." Jeremiah, Battle Counselor of the 4th Purifier Legion _________________________________________________________ One needs foresight, strategy and knowledge to efficiently lead a battalion. That's why Inquisitors and Justicars of the Republic surround themselves with specialists that know the terrain, culture and anatomy of their enemies. For the Purifiers, those enemies belong to the supernatural which forces their scholars to study witchcraft even though they are strictly forbidden from ever practicing it. A thin line that drove many to madness or even to the stake. Yet, Counselor Jeremiah successfully mastered those forbidden arts in secrecy, using them to become one of the best battle masterminds in history. Of course he has declined all opportunities of advancement, being more than happy to stay in the shadow of ambitious Inquisitors while he delves deeper into forbidden knowledge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果他们知道我的能力，我会被打上叛徒的烙印。净化者眼睛里容不得沙子：任何魔法都被认为是巫术以及与恶魔同流合污的证据。有时我希望我能把我的发现传授给他们，通过接纳而非排斥巫术使共和国的力量达到新的高度。然而，他们还远远没有准备好。“ 耶利米，第四净化者军团的战斗顾问 _________________________________________________________ 一个人需要远见、战略和知识才能有效地领导一支队伍。这就是为什么共和国的审判官和制裁者让自己身边围着各种专家，他们了解敌人的地形、文化和结构。对于净化者来说，拥有超凡力量的敌人迫使他们让学者研究巫术，同时又严格禁止他们练习巫术。这条微妙的界限让很多人疯掉甚至被送上火刑架。然而，顾问耶利米成功地秘密掌握了这些被禁止的技艺，并利用它们成为史上最好的战斗策划人之一。当然，他已经拒绝了所有晋升的机会，他非常乐意待在雄心勃勃的审判官们的阴影下继续深入研究被禁止的知识。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When your Force Shield is full, you receive decreased Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 减少你满护盾时受到的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Since I was young, I have felt a constant pressing urgency. As I have grown older, I have realized that death itself is a consequence of inaction. When faced with enemies of great power, cripple them until their inaction finishes them." The Augur, Messiah of Illumination _________________________________________________________ The greatest collection of Enneracts known to date is hoarded by a single man: an augur leading the seclusive Cabal of Illumination. Deep into the subterranean city of Salander, he built an academy for his students to train into the manipulations of the precious ancient artefacts. However this augur is a cautious one; he keeps his most powerful Enneracts in a vault at the core of a labyrinth from which only he knows the exit. If his reputation is to be believed, he has learned to master all the spells and secrets that came in his possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “从我年轻时起，我就一直感到紧迫。随着年龄的增长，我意识到死亡本身是不作为的结果。当面对强大的敌人时，削弱他们，直到他们的不作为结束他们的生命。” 预言者，启示的弥赛亚 _________________________________________________________ 迄今为止已知的最多的超维之石都是由一个人收藏的：一个领导着隐秘启示结社的预言者。在地下城市莎兰德深处，他为他的学生建造了一所学院，以练习操纵这些珍贵的古代造物。然而，这位预言者是谨慎的，他把力量最强大的超维之石放在一个迷宫里的地窖里，只有他知道出口。如果他的名声是可信的，他已经学会了掌握他所拥有的所有超维之石的法术和秘密。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When inflicting Ailments, the number of Stacks inflicted on an Enemy is increased. The Damage you deal from sources other than those that deal damage-over-time is decreased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态时，施加的异常层数增加。非持续性伤害加成降低。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Most men have even forgotten the existence of Primordials. But I did not. They may have turned silent, but echoes of their lessons are everywhere for those that understand creation." The Augur, Messiah of Illumination _________________________________________________________ The greatest collection of Enneracts known to date is hoarded by a single man: an augur leading the seclusive Cabal of Illumination. Deep into the subterranean city of Salander, he built an academy for his students to train into the manipulations of the precious ancient artefacts. However this augur is a cautious one; he keeps his most powerful Enneracts in a vault at the core of a labyrinth from which only he knows the exit. If his reputation is to be believed, he has learned to master all the spells and secrets that came in his possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “大多数人甚至已经忘记了原初神的存在。但我没有。他们可能已经变得沉默，但是对于那些理解神之造物的人来说，他们经验的回响无处不在。” 预言者，启示的弥赛亚 _________________________________________________________ 迄今为止已知的最多的超维之石都是由一个人收藏的：一个领导着隐秘启示结社的预言者。在地下城市莎兰德深处，他为他的学生建造了一所学院，以练习操纵这些珍贵的古代造物。然而，这位预言者是谨慎的，他把力量最强大的超维之石放在一个迷宫里的地窖里，只有他知道出口。如果他的名声是可信的，他已经学会了掌握他所拥有的所有超维之石的法术和秘密。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Ailment Stacks inflicted with Critical Hits can deal Critical Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 由暴击造成的异常状态层数也会造成暴击伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "They used to be one. As much as they try to be different, they remain bonded by their shared origin. Rare are those who understand that Ice, Lightning and Fire ought to be mastered together." The Augur, Messiah of Illumination _________________________________________________________ The greatest collection of Enneracts known to date is hoarded by a single man: an augur leading the seclusive Cabal of Illumination. Deep into the subterranean city of Salander, he built an academy for his students to train into the manipulations of the precious ancient artefacts. However this augur is a cautious one; he keeps his most powerful Enneracts in a vault at the core of a labyrinth from which only he knows the exit.
