If his reputation is to be believed, he has learned to master all the spells and secrets that came in his possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “他们曾经是一体。尽管他们试图变得彼此不同，但仍然被共同的起源所束缚。很少有人知道冰、火、电应该被一起掌握。” 预言者，启示的弥赛亚 _________________________________________________________ 迄今为止已知的最多的超维之石都是由一个人收藏的：一个领导着隐秘启示结社的预言者。在地下城市莎兰德深处，他为他的学生建造了一所学院，以练习操纵这些珍贵的古代造物。然而，这位预言者是谨慎的，他把力量最强大的超维之石放在一个迷宫里的地窖里，只有他知道出口。如果他的名声是可信的，他已经学会了掌握他所拥有的所有超维之石的法术和秘密。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Hits can usually only apply one ailment type. Now 2 different ailments can be applied with the same hit.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 现在一击可以同时造成两种不同的异常状态。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Pride and stupidity are the mettle of modern men. How dare they think that we are at the peak of our evolution? In fact, that peak happened eons ago! The Enneracts that they use for energy are a painful reminder that we are but an afterthought of our former glory." The Augur, Messiah of Illumination _________________________________________________________ The greatest collection of Enneracts known to date is hoarded by a single man: an augur leading the seclusive Cabal of Illumination. Deep into the subterranean city of Salander, he built an academy for his students to train into the manipulations of the precious ancient artefacts. However this augur is a cautious one; he keeps his most powerful Enneracts in a vault at the core of a labyrinth from which only he knows the exit. If his reputation is to be believed, he has learned to master all the spells and secrets that came into his possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “骄傲和愚蠢是现代人的勇气。他们怎么敢认为我们正处于进化的顶峰？事实上，进化的顶峰发生在亿万年前！这些仅仅被用来充能的超维之石便是一个痛苦的提醒，提醒我们，我们不过是对往昔荣耀的一种追忆。” 预言者，启示的弥赛亚 _________________________________________________________ 迄今为止已知的最多的超维之石都是由一个人收藏的：一个领导着隐秘启示结社的预言者。在地下城市莎兰德深处，他为他的学生建造了一所学院，以练习操纵这些珍贵的古代造物。然而，这位预言者是谨慎的，他把力量最强大的超维之石放在一个迷宫里的地窖里，只有他知道出口。如果他的名声是可信的，他已经学会了掌握他所拥有的所有超维之石的法术和秘密。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When inflicting an Ailment, there is a Chance to double the number of Ailment Stacks inflicted.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 造成异常状态时，有几率使已造成的异常状态层数翻倍。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "With the correct ritual, ending a life with witchcraft can transfer the dead's lifeforce to the Fallen whose power was channeled. The Fallen constantly hunger for this energy and will try to convince you to feed them further by offering you great power. My students are trained to resist their temptations, as everyone should be." The Augur, Messiah of Illumination _________________________________________________________ The greatest collection of Enneracts known to date is hoarded by a single man: an augur leading the seclusive Cabal of Illumination. Deep into the subterranean city of Salander, he built an academy for his students to train into the manipulations of the precious ancient artefacts. However this augur is a cautious one; he keeps his most powerful Enneracts in a vault at the core of a labyrinth from which only he knows the exit. If his reputation is to be believed, he has learned to master all the spells and secrets that came in his possession.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “通过正确的仪式，用巫术引导某位堕落者的力量来终结生命可以将死者的生命力量转移到对应的堕落者身上。堕落者不断地渴望这种能量，并会试图通过提供强大的力量来说服你进一步喂养他们。我的学生们被训练得能抵抗诱惑，每个人都应该如此。” 预言者，启示的弥赛亚 _________________________________________________________ 迄今为止已知的最多的超维之石都是由一个人收藏的：一个领导着隐秘启示结社的预言者。在地下城市莎兰德深处，他为他的学生建造了一所学院，以练习操纵这些珍贵的古代造物。然而，这位预言者是谨慎的，他把力量最强大的超维之石放在一个迷宫里的地窖里，只有他知道出口。如果他的名声是可信的，他已经学会了掌握他所拥有的所有超维之石的法术和秘密。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Killing an enemy that is afflicted with Ailments gives you a temporary Damage increase Buff.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 杀死一名受异常状态影响的敌人时会给予你临时的伤害加成Buff。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Magic is unpredictable. Taking the energy of a Fallen is imprecise and it can escape your body unexpectedly. Weaker cultists often struggle with this; they bite off more they can chew and are consumed by their own magic." Kardis, The Blackstaff _________________________________________________________ There's a city cursed with a unique ecosystem. Far away from busy civilizations, Gomora welcomes every and any cult on its island indiscriminately, no matter how evil and insidious. Powerful Arbiters keep most of the madness in check. But still, repeated bloodsheds in the darkest corners of this twisted city has created the space for a vigilante to rise. She is known as the Blackstaff of Gomora, a warlock as devious as the evil she is fighting. She mastered witchcraft and became a faith leech, which might explain why the cultists dread her so much.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “魔法是不可预知的。从一位堕落者那里获取的能量具有不确定性，它可以出乎意料地逃离你的身体。比较弱小的邪教者经常与之斗争；他们往往吃下却咽不下，被自己的魔法摧毁。” 卡迪斯，黑杖 _________________________________________________________ 有一座城市被独特的生态系统所诅咒。哥摩拉远离繁华的文明，不加以分辨地在它的岛屿上接纳每一个邪教，不管它多么邪恶和阴险。强大的仲裁者控制住了大部分的疯狂。但是，在这座扭曲的城市最黑暗的角落里，无法杜绝的血腥为一位义警的产生创造了空间。她被称为哥摩拉的黑杖，一为跟她与之战斗的邪恶一样狡猾的术士。她精通巫术，并且成了一位窃信者，这或许可以解释为什么邪教徒如此惧怕她。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Casting a Spell increases the Damage of your Attacks for a short period of time. The Damage Type of those Attacks is the same as the last Spell Cast.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 释放一个法术会在短时间内为你的攻击提供额外伤害。额外伤害的类型与最后施放的法术伤害类型相同。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Gomora is overrun with cultists; filthy, scheming rodents who exist solely to do harm unto others. However, with so many of them in one place, killing them becomes sport." Kardis, The Blackstaff _________________________________________________________ There's a city cursed with a unique ecosystem. Far away from busy civilizations, Gomora welcomes every and any cult on its island indiscriminately, no matter how evil and insidious. Powerful Arbiters keep most of the madness in check. But still, repeated bloodsheds in the darkest corners of this twisted city has created the space for a vigilante to rise. She is known as the Blackstaff of Gomora, a warlock as devious as the evil she is fighting. She mastered witchcraft and became a faith leech, which might explain why the cultists dread her so much.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “道德会让你在哥摩拉被杀。没有人是“好人”，唯有力量。在这里，只有自身信念的力量是衡量你的标准。” 卡迪斯，黑杖 _________________________________________________________ 有一座城市被独特的生态系统所诅咒。哥摩拉远离繁华的文明，不加以分辨地在它的岛屿上接纳每一个邪教，不管它多么邪恶和阴险。强大的仲裁者控制住了大部分的疯狂。但是，在这座扭曲的城市最黑暗的角落里，无法杜绝的血腥为一位义警的产生创造了空间。她被称为哥摩拉的黑杖，一为跟她与之战斗的邪恶一样狡猾的术士。她精通巫术，并且成了一位窃信者，这或许可以解释为什么邪教徒如此惧怕她。
增加最大怒气和最大魔力。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Be careful, they say. Be careful, for when you gaze into the abyss, it gazes right back at you. The line sometimes gets blurred: am I surrounded by darkness? Or am I the darkness?" Kardis, The Blackstaff _________________________________________________________ There's a city cursed with a unique ecosystem. Far away from busy civilizations, Gomora welcomes every and any cult on its island indiscriminately, no matter how evil and insidious. Powerful Arbiters keep most of the madness in check. But still, repeated bloodsheds in the darkest corners of this twisted city has created the space for a vigilante to rise. She is known as the Blackstaff of Gomora, a warlock as devious as the evil she is fighting. She mastered witchcraft and became a faith leech, which might explain why the cultists dread her so much.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “小心，他们说。小心，因为当你凝视深渊，深渊也在凝视着你。这条线有时会变得模糊：我被黑暗包围了吗？或者，我就是黑暗？” 卡迪斯，黑杖 _________________________________________________________ 有一座城市被独特的生态系统所诅咒。哥摩拉远离繁华的文明，不加以分辨地在它的岛屿上接纳每一个邪教，不管它多么邪恶和阴险。强大的仲裁者控制住了大部分的疯狂。但是，在这座扭曲的城市最黑暗的角落里，无法杜绝的血腥为一位义警的产生创造了空间。她被称为哥摩拉的黑杖，一为跟她与之战斗的邪恶一样狡猾的术士。她精通巫术，并且成了一位窃信者，这或许可以解释为什么邪教徒如此惧怕她。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Spell Critical Chance Score is increased when your Willpower is above a certain threshold.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 魔力值高于一定值时，法术暴击几率值提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "Morality will get you killed in Gomora. No-one is "good", there is only power. Here, you are measured by the strength of your conviction alone." Kardis, The Blackstaff _________________________________________________________ There's a city cursed with a unique ecosystem. Far away from busy civilizations, Gomora welcomes every and any cult on its island indiscriminately, no matter how evil and insidious. Powerful Arbiters keep most of the madness in check. But still, repeated bloodsheds in the darkest corners of this twisted city has created the space for a vigilante to rise. She is known as the Blackstaff of Gomora, a warlock as devious as the evil she is fighting. She mastered witchcraft and became a faith leech, which might explain why the cultists dread her so much.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “道德会让你在哥摩拉被杀。没有人是“好人”，唯有力量。在这里，只有自身信念的力量是衡量你的标准。” 卡迪斯，黑杖 _________________________________________________________ 有一座城市被独特的生态系统所诅咒。哥摩拉远离繁华的文明，不加以分辨地在它的岛屿上接纳每一个邪教，不管它多么邪恶和阴险。强大的仲裁者控制住了大部分的疯狂。但是，在这座扭曲的城市最黑暗的角落里，无法杜绝的血腥为一位义警的产生创造了空间。她被称为哥摩拉的黑杖，一为跟她与之战斗的邪恶一样狡猾的术士。她精通巫术，并且成了一位窃信者，这或许可以解释为什么邪教徒如此惧怕她。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When you are afflicted with damage over time, ailment damage affects your Force Shield before your Health.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 异常状态伤害会先影响你的护盾而非生命值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "When these mongrels are cut off from the power of their master, their world is turned upside down. Alone, powerless, frightened. But unlike orphans, they deserve no mercy. None at all." Kardis, The Blackstaff _________________________________________________________ There's a city cursed with a unique ecosystem. Far away from busy civilizations, Gomora welcomes every and any cult on its island indiscriminately, no matter how evil and insidious. Powerful Arbiters keep most of the madness in check. But still, repeated bloodsheds in the darkest corners of this twisted city has created the space for a vigilante to rise. She is known as the Blackstaff of Gomora, a warlock as devious as the evil she is fighting. She mastered witchcraft and became a faith leech, which might explain why the cultists dread her so much.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “当这些狗杂种被切断了来自他们的主人的力量时，他们的世界是颠倒的。孤独，无力，害怕。但不像孤儿，他们不应该得到怜悯。一个也不配。” 卡迪斯，黑杖 _________________________________________________________ 有一座城市被独特的生态系统所诅咒。哥摩拉远离繁华的文明，不加以分辨地在它的岛屿上接纳每一个邪教，不管它多么邪恶和阴险。强大的仲裁者控制住了大部分的疯狂。但是，在这座扭曲的城市最黑暗的角落里，无法杜绝的血腥为一位义警的产生创造了空间。她被称为哥摩拉的黑杖，一为跟她与之战斗的邪恶一样狡猾的术士。她精通巫术，并且成了一位窃信者，这或许可以解释为什么邪教徒如此惧怕她。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Dealing Damage will now allow you to recharge Force Shield instead of restoring Health with Life Leech.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 吸血的效果由回复生命改为回复护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “She caught me tailing her and at once, she bared her wrist. She’d cut it with a broken phial as a teenager, and used that injury to unbind my own flesh through time. I wonder… did it hurt her too?” Eris Castille, the Traveller _________________________________________________________ Her prey slows as she tugs on the aether that shapes time, digging a hole in the elastic matter that composes the world then crushing foes inside. But ultimately, Eris Castille has only one true target: Her past self. The girl has a bereaved, but determined look. Eris knows that grief will convince her to wring Anulai-Tai from the Abyss in order to bring time and entropy to a stop. She’ll regret it, but too late. Eris has to stop the girl she was, and if she has to be the first and last to cross over into the past, so be it. Though her mark is smarter, quicker, more powerful, who could predict Eris better than Eris?
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “她发现我在跟踪她后，毫不犹豫地露出了手腕。十几岁的她曾用一个破玻璃瓶把手腕切开，而现在的她利用这个伤口通过时间的关联撕裂我的血肉。比起这个我想知道…这样会伤到她自己吗？” 希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔 _________________________________________________________ 她通过在构成时间的以太之上拖拽，使猎物慢下来，而后在组成世界的弹性物质上挖出一个洞，在里面粉碎敌人。但归根结底，希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔只有一个真正的目标： 过去的自己。 这个女孩的表情中既有丧亲之痛又有坚定和倔强。希丽丝清楚地知道那份悲伤会说服她通过折磨来自深渊的阿努莱-泰使时间和熵停止。她会后悔的，但为时已晚。她必须阻止过去的自己，如果她必须前无古人后无来者地穿越到过去，那又有何不可。虽然过去的她更聪明、更快、更强大，但又有谁能比希丽丝更好地预测她自己呢?

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When you Damage an Enemy that is afflicted with Stasis, they will take the Damage again after a few seconds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你对一个处于停滞状态的敌人造成伤害时，他们会在几秒后再次受到同样的伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: If you inflict Stasis on an enemy with an Attack, you gain a "Supernatural Paradox" point. Each point of "Supernatural Paradox" increases your Spell Casting Speed Score.\n\nIf you inflict Stasis on an enemy with a Spell, you gain an "Earthly Paradox" point. Each point of "Earthly Paradox" increases your Attack Speed Score.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你的攻击对一个敌人造成停滞效果时，你将得到一个“超凡悖论”点数。每个“超凡悖论”点数都会增加你的施法速度值。\n\n当你的法术对一个敌人造成停滞效果时，你将得到一个“尘世悖论”点数。每个“尘世悖论”点数都会增加你的攻击速度值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “When you force a mobile thing into immobility, energy is produced. At my most foolish, I wondered what energy might come of immobilizing all of Wolcen.” Eris Castille, the Traveller _________________________________________________________ Her prey slows as she tugs on the aether that shapes time, digging a hole in the elastic matter that composes the world then crushing foes inside. But ultimately, Eris Castille has only one true target: Her past self. The girl has a bereaved, but determined look. Eris knows that grief will convince her to wring Anulai-Tai from the Abyss in order to bring time and entropy to a stop. She’ll regret it, but too late. Eris has to stop the girl she was, and if she has to be the first and last to cross over into the past, so be it. Though her mark is smarter, quicker, more powerful, who could predict Eris better than Eris?
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “当你迫使一个移动的物体静止时，能量就产生了。我想知道让整个wolcen世界静止下来会产生怎样的能量。” 希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔 _________________________________________________________ 她通过在构成时间的以太之上拖拽，使猎物慢下来，而后在组成世界的弹性物质上挖出一个洞，在里面粉碎敌人。但归根结底，希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔只有一个真正的目标： 过去的自己。 这个女孩的表情中既有丧亲之痛又有坚定和倔强。希丽丝清楚地知道那份悲伤会说服她通过折磨来自深渊的阿努莱-泰使时间和熵停止。她会后悔的，但为时已晚。她必须阻止过去的自己，如果她必须前无古人后无来者地穿越到过去，那又有何不可。虽然过去的她更聪明、更快、更强大，但又有谁能比希丽丝更好地预测她自己呢?

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “I’m no fool. I know that any harm I do to her handicaps me first and foremost. But I’ve developed a level of resilience that she’ll never get the chance to.” Eris Castille, the Traveller _________________________________________________________ Her prey slows as she tugs on the aether that shapes time, digging a hole in the elastic matter that composes the world then crushing foes inside. But ultimately, Eris Castille has only one true target: Her past self. The girl has a bereaved, but determined look. Eris knows that grief will convince her to wring Anulai-Tai from the Abyss in order to bring time and entropy to a stop. She’ll regret it, but too late. Eris has to stop the girl she was, and if she has to be the first and last to cross over into the past, so be it. Though her mark is smarter, quicker, more powerful, who could predict Eris better than Eris?
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我不是傻瓜。我知道对她造成的任何伤害都会先作用于我，妨碍到我。但我已经训练出了一种她永远无法比拟的韧性。” 希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔 _________________________________________________________ 她通过在构成时间的以太之上拖拽，使猎物慢下来，而后在组成世界的弹性物质上挖出一个洞，在里面粉碎敌人。但归根结底，希丽丝•卡斯蒂尔只有一个真正的目标： 过去的自己。 这个女孩的表情中既有丧亲之痛又有坚定和倔强。希丽丝清楚地知道那份悲伤会说服她通过折磨来自深渊的阿努莱-泰使时间和熵停止。她会后悔的，但为时已晚。她必须阻止过去的自己，如果她必须前无古人后无来者地穿越到过去，那又有何不可。虽然过去的她更聪明、更快、更强大，但又有谁能比希丽丝更好地预测她自己呢?

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: A portion of the Damage you receive is delayed, and this delayed Damage does not interrupt Force Shield Regeneration.\n\nYour Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你受到的部分伤害将会延迟作用，而且被延迟的那部分伤害不会打断护盾的回复。\n\n你的最大生命值和护盾值将会减少。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “The Abyss is best consumed in modest doses. Consider yourself lucky: you’re about to taste a three course meal.” Calchas, Herald of the Abyss _________________________________________________________ Whenever a portal opens from the Abyss, the lights and sounds of this world are slowly sucked into the void. As the Abyss’ demons lunge for your body, you’ll try to scream for help and find that no sound comes out. Still, the Herald has wrung profit from that gulf. In her inn, a violinist’s cords momentarily go mute while the Herald does business. Possessed vagrants and half breeds of all types eye each other over their drinks, cautiously relaxing in this rare haven for the supernatural. The Herald enforces a truce between them, and they in turn pay a tribute of power and intel to have her arrange a deal. As for those who dare break her truce make a more intimate acquaintance with the Abyss.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “最好适度地消耗深渊。暗自庆幸吧：你将品尝到一顿有三道菜的大餐。” 卡尔克斯，深渊使徒 _________________________________________________________ 每当一个来自深渊的传送门被打开，这个世界的光和声音就慢慢地被吸进虚空。当深渊的恶魔扑向你的身体时，你会试图尖叫着呼救，却发现发不出声音。 然而使徒仍能从那片深渊中攫取利益。 在使徒的小酒馆里，小提琴声停下代表着她的交易时间到了。被附身的流浪汉和有着各种瞳色的混血生物们喝完了酒，小心翼翼地在这处难多超凡者天堂中休息。使徒强制他们休战，他们则轮流支付力量或情报作为贡品以换取她为她们安排交易。那些敢于打破她定的停战规则的人，都和深渊亲密接触了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: The Occult damage that an Enemy receives from your Attacks is increased with each Curse stack they are afflicted with.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你的攻击对敌人造成的神秘伤害将视他们身上的诅咒层数获得伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Why yes, I do have a few of these pacts myself. But you can hardly expect them to have the same effect on you as they do on me. Put plainly, we are not playing in the same tiers.” Calchas, Herald of the Abyss _________________________________________________________ Whenever a portal opens from the Abyss, the lights and sounds of this world are slowly sucked into the void. As the Abyss’ demons lunge for your body, you’ll try to scream for help and find that no sound comes out. Still, the Herald has wrung profit from that gulf. In her inn, a violinist’s cords momentarily go mute while the Herald does business. Possessed vagrants and half breeds of all types eye each other over their drinks, cautiously relaxing in this rare haven for the supernatural. The Herald enforces a truce between them, and they in turn pay a tribute of power and intel to have her arrange a deal. As for those who dare break her truce make a more intimate acquaintance with the Abyss.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “是的，我自己也有几个这样的契约。但是别指望他们对你和对我的效果能是一样的。坦白说，我们可不在同一层次上。” 卡尔克斯，深渊使徒 _________________________________________________________ 每当一个来自深渊的传送门被打开，这个世界的光和声音就慢慢地被吸进虚空。当深渊的恶魔扑向你的身体时，你会试图尖叫着呼救，却发现发不出声音。 然而使徒仍能从那片深渊中攫取利益。 在使徒的小酒馆里，小提琴声停下代表着她的交易时间到了。被附身的流浪汉和有着各种瞳色的混血生物们喝完了酒，小心翼翼地在这处难多超凡者天堂中休息。使徒强制他们休战，他们则轮流支付力量或情报作为贡品以换取她为她们安排交易。那些敢于打破她定的停战规则的人，都和深渊亲密接触了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Every Ailment that Stacks which you inflict is also inflicted on you. Each time you reach 10 Stacks of one Ailment Type, that Ailment Type is removed completely, giving you and your Allies a Buff for a short time depending on which Ailment type is removed.

If Stasis Stacks were removed, Movement Speed is increased.

If Curse Stacks were removed, All Resistances Score is increased.

If Weakness Stacks were removed, Damage is increased.

If any other stacks were removed, Health and Force Shield are regenerated.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
你造成的每种异常状态也会作用于自己。每当某种异常状态超过10层时，该异常状态将会被移除，同时根据移除的异常状态类型给予你和你的盟友一个短时间的Buff。

如果移除的是停滞状态，则提高移动速度。

如果移除的是诅咒状态，则提高全抗值。

如果移除的是虚弱状态，则提高伤害加成。

如果移除的是其他异常状态，则回复生命值和护盾。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Please, take a seat. I like for my guests to partake in a little game of empathetic thinking. When the pain of one also affects the other, negotiations tend to go a lot smoother.” Calchas, Herald of the Abyss _________________________________________________________ Whenever a portal opens from the Abyss, the lights and sounds of this world are slowly sucked into the void. As the Abyss’ demons lunge for your body, you’ll try to scream for help and find that no sound comes out. Still, the Herald has wrung profit from that gulf. In her inn, a violinist’s cords momentarily go mute while the Herald does business. Possessed vagrants and half breeds of all types eye each other over their drinks, cautiously relaxing in this rare haven for the supernatural. The Herald enforces a truce between them, and they in turn pay a tribute of power and intel to have her arrange a deal. As for those who dare break her truce make a more intimate acquaintance with the Abyss.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “来，坐下。我喜欢让我的客人参加到一个通感小游戏里来。当一方的痛苦同样影响到另一方时，谈判的进行就会顺利很多。” 卡尔克斯，深渊使徒 _________________________________________________________ 每当一个来自深渊的传送门被打开，这个世界的光和声音就慢慢地被吸进虚空。当深渊的恶魔扑向你的身体时，你会试图尖叫着呼救，却发现发不出声音。 然而使徒仍能从那片深渊中攫取利益。 在使徒的小酒馆里，小提琴声停下代表着她的交易时间到了。被附身的流浪汉和有着各种瞳色的混血生物们喝完了酒，小心翼翼地在这处难多超凡者天堂中休息。使徒强制他们休战，他们则轮流支付力量或情报作为贡品以换取她为她们安排交易。那些敢于打破她定的停战规则的人，都和深渊亲密接触了。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Maximum Force Shield is doubled.\n\nYour Health cannot exceed 5% of your Maximum Force Shield.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 最大护盾值翻倍。\n\n你的最大生命值不能超过你最大护盾的5%。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “The arrowtip is so cold, it cauterizes the wound as it enters the body: the meat around it grows stiff, frozen. If I strike right, it’ll be the last thing you feel before you turn to ice completely.” Vidar, Huntsman of Whitefield _________________________________________________________ Vidar blotted the royal palace’s beauty with a single arrow: guards rushed out of their barracks, servants scrambled to the exits. No matter. Vidar would save what grace remained. His arrows congealed flesh into eternal, ageless material. He shot each guard one by one, taking cover behind columns and leaving frozen figures behind. It reminded him of hunting bears with his father in their hometown, now long frozen. He crossed every barricade until he found the target in a dungeon. He cared not for women, but Etheliel would want this one: pure unblemished skin, an antiquated charm even while crying. He touched the Queen of Varg’s cheek, soothing her before he took aim and immortalized her.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “这个箭头可是很冰的，当它射入肉体时整个伤口都会被冻到麻木：伤口附近的血肉变得僵硬，冻结。如果我射中要害，这将是你在整个冻成冰块前唯一能感觉到的东西。“ 维达尔，白原猎手 _________________________________________________________ 只用一箭，维达尔就让整个皇宫的富丽堂皇土崩瓦解：士兵从营房里落荒而逃，侍者蜂涌挤向出口。无所谓。维达尔将保留下优雅散去后的一切。 他的箭支将肉体凝固为永恒不朽的物体。他一个接一个射击着每个守卫，来时隐藏在队列后发起进攻，去时留在背后的只有一地的冰雕。这不禁让他想起小时候在家乡和父亲一起猎熊时的情景——他的家乡现在已经被永远地冰封了。他穿过每一道防线，最后，他在一个地牢里面找到了他的目标。 他并不关心女人，但是伊莎里尔会想要这个：纯净无暇的皮肤，哪怕是在哭泣时都有一股别样的古老的魅力。他碰了碰维格皇后的脸颊，轻抚着安慰她，然后将箭头对准了她，将这份美丽永远地保存了下来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Damage is increased based on how much Pierce is remaining on a Projectile after it has Hit an Enemy.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 投射物击中第一个目标后，根据剩余穿透数获得伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Nights are long in the tundra. I’ve named every one of these arrows, my only companions. I know which has tasted the most blood. Would you like to know?” Vidar, Huntsman of Whitefield _________________________________________________________ Vidar blotted the royal palace’s beauty with a single arrow: guards rushed out of their barracks, servants scrambled to the exits. No matter. Vidar would save what grace remained. His arrows congealed flesh into eternal, ageless material. He shot each guard one by one, taking cover behind columns and leaving frozen figures behind. It reminded him of hunting bears with his father in their hometown, now long frozen. He crossed every barricade until he found the target in a dungeon. He cared not for women, but Etheliel would want this one: pure unblemished skin, an antiquated charm even while crying. He touched the Queen of Varg’s cheek, soothing her before he took aim and immortalized her.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “冻土带的夜晚是很长的。我唯一的伙伴就是这些箭头，我给它们每一根都起了名字。我知道它们中哪一根品尝过最多的鲜血。你想知道吗？“ 维达尔，白原猎手 _________________________________________________________ 只用一箭，维达尔就让整个皇宫的富丽堂皇土崩瓦解：士兵从营房里落荒而逃，侍者蜂涌挤向出口。无所谓。维达尔将保留下优雅散去后的一切。 他的箭支将肉体凝固为永恒不朽的物体。他一个接一个射击着每个守卫，来时隐藏在队列后发起进攻，去时留在背后的只有一地的冰雕。这不禁让他想起小时候在家乡和父亲一起猎熊时的情景——他的家乡现在已经被永远地冰封了。他穿过每一道防线，最后，他在一个地牢里面找到了他的目标。 他并不关心女人，但是伊莎里尔会想要这个：纯净无暇的皮肤，哪怕是在哭泣时都有一股别样的古老的魅力。他碰了碰维格皇后的脸颊，轻抚着安慰她，然后将箭头对准了她，将这份美丽永远地保存了下来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When a Projectile Hits an Enemy, it will bounce off them and hit another enemy, dealing increased Frost Damage. Projectiles will not bounce if they have Pierce remaining.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 普攻投射物击中敌人时，它会弹跳并命中另一个敌人，并造成额外冰霜伤害。若投射物还剩余穿透数则不会弹跳。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “My father taught me to get to know my quarry: how they move, if they scare quick, what they eat. I don’t think I know any prey better than a human.” Vidar, Huntsman of Whitefield _________________________________________________________ Vidar blotted the royal palace’s beauty with a single arrow: guards rushed out of their barracks, servants scrambled to the exits. No matter. Vidar would save what grace remained. His arrows congealed flesh into eternal, ageless material. He shot each guard one by one, taking cover behind columns and leaving frozen figures behind. It reminded him of hunting bears with his father in their hometown, now long frozen. He crossed every barricade until he found the target in a dungeon. He cared not for women, but Etheliel would want this one: pure unblemished skin, an antiquated charm even while crying. He touched the Queen of Varg’s cheek, soothing her before he took aim and immortalized her.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我的父亲教我去了解我的猎物：它们怎样移动，它们是否胆小，它们吃什么。我不觉得我对任何其他猎物的了解能超过人类。” 维达尔，白原猎手 _________________________________________________________ 只用一箭，维达尔就让整个皇宫的富丽堂皇土崩瓦解：士兵从营房里落荒而逃，侍者蜂涌挤向出口。无所谓。维达尔将保留下优雅散去后的一切。 他的箭支将肉体凝固为永恒不朽的物体。他一个接一个射击着每个守卫，来时隐藏在队列后发起进攻，去时留在背后的只有一地的冰雕。这不禁让他想起小时候在家乡和父亲一起猎熊时的情景——他的家乡现在已经被永远地冰封了。他穿过每一道防线，最后，他在一个地牢里面找到了他的目标。 他并不关心女人，但是伊莎里尔会想要这个：纯净无暇的皮肤，哪怕是在哭泣时都有一股别样的古老的魅力。他碰了碰维格皇后的脸颊，轻抚着安慰她，然后将箭头对准了她，将这份美丽永远地保存了下来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every second that you are in combat you receive "Cold Blooded" points that increase your Damage. If you are Hit the "Cold Blooded" points are removed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你在战斗状态下，每秒都会获得一个“冷血”点数，它会提供伤害加成。一旦你被击中，所有的“冷血”点数将被移除。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “All you ensigns think you’ll be able to run from everythin’. Trust me: sometimes, taking the beating’ll put you in a better place to strike back.” Arran Brightgale, Captain of the Wave Carver _________________________________________________________ Arran Brightgale came to Lejre sailing on his Wave Carver at the head of the Radiant Fleet mercenaries. The town was under siege from the United Republic of Mankind. When the people couldn’t pay for their defense, Arran was ordered to stand down. He considered the villagers, starving from the blockade, and remembered being that hungry. Breaking orders, he marched to cut down the Republican fools, taking every arrow without flinching. Six visiting blacksmiths from Vulkaïn thanked him by reinforcing his armor and his ship with lava-forged steel. Now, Arran sails on the Wave Carver as an unstoppable behemoth championing the downtrodden.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “所有你的部下都以为你能避开一切。但是相信我：有时候，承受打击会让你有更好的反击机会。” 阿兰 布莱特加尔，雕浪号船长 _________________________________________________________ 阿兰 布莱特加尔带领着光芒舰队的雇佣兵，乘着他的雕浪者号来到莱杰。那个小镇正经受着人类联合共和国的围攻。当小镇上的人们无力支付雇佣军防御的费用时，阿兰被要求撤军。 他想起了那些因封锁而挨饿的村民，想起了自己曾经也经历过饥肠辘辘的岁月。他违抗命令，奋勇杀敌，所向披靡无坚不摧。 六名来自火神城的铁匠用岩浆熔锻的钢铁加固了他的战舰。现在，阿兰驾驶着它的雕浪者号向一头不可阻挡的巨兽一般，支持着那些被压迫者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
You will receive a Buff depending on which archetype your equipped Chest-piece belongs to.

If you have a Bruiser Chest-piece, you receive Health Regeneration for each Health point on the Armor.

If you have a Heavy Chest-piece, its All Resistances Score is doubled.

If you have a Rogue Chest-piece, you regenerate Health and Force Shield each time you complete a Passive Dodge. The amount that you regenerate is determined by the Health points given by the Armor.

If you have a Sorcerer Chest-piece you regenerate Force Shield based on the amount of Force Shield on the Armor.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
根据所穿胸甲的类型，你将会得到一个增益效果。

如果装备战士胸甲，则根据其提供的生命值获得生命回复奖励。

如果装备重型胸甲，其提供的全抗性将翻倍。

如果装备游侠胸甲，每次成功被动闪避都将回复生命值和护盾。回复的量取决于胸甲提供的生命值和护盾。

如果装备法师胸甲，根据其提供的护盾量获得一定的护盾回复。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Put two fighters ‘bout evenly matched face to face. Now imagine one of these fighters is poor, and the other wealthy. Who do you think gets out alive? Talent’s good, but decent gear wins the fight.” Arran Brightgale, Captain of the Wave Carver _________________________________________________________ Arran Brightgale came to Lejre sailing on his Wave Carver at the head of the Radiant Fleet mercenaries. The town was under siege from the United Republic of Mankind. When the people couldn’t pay for their defense, Arran was ordered to stand down. He considered the villagers, starving from the blockade, and remembered being that hungry. Breaking orders, he marched to cut down the Republican fools, taking every arrow without flinching. Six visiting blacksmiths from Vulkaïn thanked him by reinforcing his armor and his ship with lava-forged steel. Now, Arran sails on the Wave Carver as an unstoppable behemoth championing the downtrodden.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “让两个势均力敌的斗士打一架。现在我告诉你其中一个是穷光蛋，另外一个是富人。你觉得谁能活下来？天赋固然重要，但像样的装备决定胜负。” 阿兰 布莱特加尔，雕浪号船长 _________________________________________________________ 阿兰 布莱特加尔带领着光芒舰队的雇佣兵，乘着他的雕浪者号来到莱杰。那个小镇正经受着人类联合共和国的围攻。当小镇上的人们无力支付雇佣军防御的费用时，阿兰被要求撤军。 他想起了那些因封锁而挨饿的村民，想起了自己曾经也经历过饥肠辘辘的岁月。他违抗命令，奋勇杀敌，所向披靡无坚不摧。 六名来自火神城的铁匠用岩浆熔锻的钢铁加固了他的战舰。现在，阿兰驾驶着它的雕浪者号向一头不可阻挡的巨兽一般，支持着那些被压迫者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every few seconds you gain a "Fortress" point up to a Maximum. Each "Fortress" point increases your Block Chance. "Fortress" points are removed when a Block is completed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每过几秒你会获得一个“堡垒”点数，直至达到上限。每个“堡垒”点数都会提高你的格挡几率。“堡垒”点数会在你成功格挡一次后移除。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “If the Sea of Torment couldn’t put a dent in the Wave Carver’s hull, nothing’ll ever hit her! Come fellows! To your positions!” Arran Brightgale, Captain of the Wave Carver _________________________________________________________ Arran Brightgale came to Lejre sailing on his Wave Carver at the head of the Radiant Fleet mercenaries. The town was under siege from the United Republic of Mankind. When the people couldn’t pay for their defense, Arran was ordered to stand down. He considered the villagers, starving from the blockade, and remembered being that hungry. Breaking orders, he marched to cut down the Republican fools, taking every arrow without flinching. Six visiting blacksmiths from Vulkaïn thanked him by reinforcing his armor and his ship with lava-forged steel. Now, Arran sails on the Wave Carver as an unstoppable behemoth championing the downtrodden.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果折磨之海不能在雕浪者的船身上留下一个凹痕，那就没有什么东西能打到她了!快来！船员!到你的位置上去!” 阿兰 布莱特加尔，雕浪号船长 _________________________________________________________ 阿兰 布莱特加尔带领着光芒舰队的雇佣兵，乘着他的雕浪者号来到莱杰。那个小镇正经受着人类联合共和国的围攻。当小镇上的人们无力支付雇佣军防御的费用时，阿兰被要求撤军。 他想起了那些因封锁而挨饿的村民，想起了自己曾经也经历过饥肠辘辘的岁月。他违抗命令，奋勇杀敌，所向披靡无坚不摧。 六名来自火神城的铁匠用岩浆熔锻的钢铁加固了他的战舰。现在，阿兰驾驶着它的雕浪者号向一头不可阻挡的巨兽一般，支持着那些被压迫者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: While stationary you gain an "Inexorable" point every few seconds. Each point of "Inexorable" decreases your Movement Speed and increases your Damage. Moving will cause an "Inexorable" point to be removed after a few seconds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你不移动时，每过数秒就会得到一个“岿然”点数。每个“岿然”点数将会减慢你的移动速度并提供伤害加成。每移动几秒则会移除一个“岿然”点数。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: My shadow is my twin. She may move like me and look like me, but like a twin she is gifted with independent motion through the world.” Sybil, Sage of Twilight _________________________________________________________ The Dusk Creed refused to elect a new Sage of Twilight: they claimed the former one, Sybil, still lived and would live on until Moros’ return. Witnesses claimed her shadow danced on the night breeze, glints of white where her fan's blades whirled. Sybil was so dedicated to the Dusk she became bound to the dance of light and shadow, losing her shape within them. She cast all unnecessary parts of herself away and became as ink flowing in water. They say her cool shade falls on wayward mortals above all others, as she sees Moros’ torment within them. The Dusk Creed faithful hope for her return, staring out into the night.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我的影子是我的双胞胎。她也许的行动与我相同，长相也与我无二，但是就像一般的双胞胎那样，她同样被这个世界赋予了独一无二的独立情感。” 西比尔，暮光贤者 _________________________________________________________ 黄昏信徒拒绝选举一个新的暮光先知：他们坚称上一个贤者，西比尔，仍然活着，而且在莫罗斯回归之前都不会死去。目击者声称她的影子在晚风中起舞，裙摆扫过之处闪耀着白光。 西比尔对黄昏的执着让她被锁在光与暗的舞蹈中，以至于在其中失去了自己的形体。她抛弃了自己身上所有不必要的部分，变成了如同水中墨水般的存在。他们说当她看到莫罗斯折磨着那些任性掌权者的内心时，她清凉的荫蔽便会降下到他们的头上。黄昏信徒们死死的盯着黑夜，虔诚地企盼她的回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Whenever you Active Dodge, enemies in your path receive Damage and a Decoy is left at the starting position of the Active Dodge.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你翻滚时会伤害沿途敌人，并在翻滚的起点留下一个诱饵。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Recall that life was birthed not only from Moros, but Anathëa too. The interplay of light and shadow can produce its own power.” Sybil, Sage of Twilight _________________________________________________________ The Dusk Creed refused to elect a new Sage of Twilight: they claimed the former one, Sybil, still lived and would live on until Moros’ return. Witnesses claimed her shadow danced on the night breeze, glints of white where her fan's blades whirled. Sybil was so dedicated to the Dusk she became bound to the dance of light and shadow, losing her shape within them. She cast all unnecessary parts of herself away and became as ink flowing in water. They say her cool shade falls on wayward mortals above all others, as she sees Moros’ torment within them. The Dusk Creed faithful hope for her return, staring out into the night.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “记住，生命不仅诞生于莫罗斯，也诞生于阿娜西亚。光和影的相互作用可以产生它自己的力量。” 西比尔，暮光贤者 _________________________________________________________ 黄昏信徒拒绝选举一个新的暮光先知：他们坚称上一个贤者，西比尔，仍然活着，而且在莫罗斯回归之前都不会死去。目击者声称她的影子在晚风中起舞，裙摆扫过之处闪耀着白光。 西比尔对黄昏的执着让她被锁在光与暗的舞蹈中，以至于在其中失去了自己的形体。她抛弃了自己身上所有不必要的部分，变成了如同水中墨水般的存在。他们说当她看到莫罗斯折磨着那些任性掌权者的内心时，她清凉的荫蔽便会降下到他们的头上。黄昏信徒们死死的盯着黑夜，虔诚地企盼她的回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
You have 5 "Lure of Darkness" points and 5 "Lure of Light" points. When using a Spell you gain 1 "Lure of Darkness" point and lose 1 "Lure of Light" point. When using an Attack you gain 1 "Lure of Light" point and lose 1 "Lure of Darkness" point. When both points are weighted 6/4, they are considered to be in Equilibrium. While in this state, you will receive the following Buffs:

A percentage of your Attack Damage is added to your Spell Damage.

A percentage of your Spell Damage is added to your Attack Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
你一开始你得到5个“黑暗诱惑”点数和5个“光明诱惑”点数。当你释放一个法术时，得到一个“黑暗诱惑”点数并失去一个“光明诱惑”点数。当你发动一次攻击时，得到一个“光明诱惑”点数并失去一个“黑暗诱惑”点数。当两种点数的比值处于4/6至6/4之间时，它们被判定为处于平衡状态。当处于这种状态时，你将得到如下的增益：

你攻击伤害加成的一定比例会被附加到法术伤害加成上。

你法术伤害加成的一定比例会被附加到攻击伤害加成上。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Shadows are cast in light: but there are those who can cast them in darkness. There do our shapes become limitless and imperceptible.” Sybil, Sage of Twilight _________________________________________________________ The Dusk Creed refused to elect a new Sage of Twilight: they claimed the former one, Sybil, still lived and would live on until Moros’ return. Witnesses claimed her shadow danced on the night breeze, glints of white where her fan's blades whirled. Sybil was so dedicated to the Dusk she became bound to the dance of light and shadow, losing her shape within them. She cast all unnecessary parts of herself away and became as ink flowing in water. They say her cool shade falls on wayward mortals above all others, as she sees Moros’ torment within them. The Dusk Creed faithful hope for her return, staring out into the night.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “影子是投在光明里的，但有人能把影子投在黑暗里。在那里，我们影子的形状变得无拘无束而难以察觉。” 西比尔，暮光贤者 _________________________________________________________ 黄昏信徒拒绝选举一个新的暮光先知：他们坚称上一个贤者，西比尔，仍然活着，而且在莫罗斯回归之前都不会死去。目击者声称她的影子在晚风中起舞，裙摆扫过之处闪耀着白光。 西比尔对黄昏的执着让她被锁在光与暗的舞蹈中，以至于在其中失去了自己的形体。她抛弃了自己身上所有不必要的部分，变成了如同水中墨水般的存在。他们说当她看到莫罗斯折磨着那些任性掌权者的内心时，她清凉的荫蔽便会降下到他们的头上。黄昏信徒们死死的盯着黑夜，虔诚地企盼她的回归。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Whenever you complete an Active Dodge, you become Invisible and your next Attack deals increased Shadow damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当你完成一次翻滚，都会进入隐身状态，且你的下一次攻击会造成额外暗影伤害。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Tenet CCCLXVI: Those speakings that have served me, I swear to hold them on my skin where they might act to repel the doings of evil.” Ivan Kahn, Lecturer of Demonology _________________________________________________________ Tenet CLXI: That which has done harm will do harm again. Lecturer Ivan Kahn restrained the power that crackled from his tattoos, and passed a silverlock pistol and a cutlass round his belt. He’d make everyone pay this time. Tenet CLXXIII: Turn first to your husband, children, or wife for signs of demonic possession. Ivan cursed himself, hitting his head against the wall. Why hadn’t he seen it? How'd he let this happen? Tenet CCXXXIX: Do not enter Eriebe, where souls rest, lest you become a spirit’s thrall. Ivan shook his head. Zoltan was waiting for him. The brands on Ivan’s arms burned so bright he scorched a passage through the Aether into the realm of the dead, not to return without his love.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “戒条CCCLXVI：我发誓将那些帮助过我语句刻在自己皮肤上，以为戒律。” 伊万·卡恩，恶魔学讲师 _________________________________________________________ 戒条CLXI：江山易改，本性难移。 讲师伊万·卡恩抑制住了纹身总共喷薄欲出的力量，将一支银扣手枪和一把弯刀挂在腰带上。这次他要让每个人都付出代价。 戒条CLXXIII：首先从身边的亲人身上寻找恶魔附身的迹象。 伊万以头抢地，咒骂着自己：为什么他没发现它？他怎么能让这一切发生？ 戒条CCXXXIX：不要进入幽冥，那里是灵魂休憩之所，免得沦为鬼魂的奴隶。 伊万摇摇头。佐尔覃就在前面等着他。伊万手臂上的烙印燃烧得如此炽烈，以至于他烧穿了以太，打通了一条进入死亡国度的通道，不找到他的爱人就永远不回来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: After a few seconds of not being Hit, you gain a "Tenet" point. When you are Hit you ignore a percentage of the Damage and lose a "Tenet" point. The amount of Damage not dealt is increased with each point you have.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每有数秒未被击中，你就会得到一个“信念”点数。当你被击中时，你将无视一定比例的伤害并失去一个“信念”点数。拥有的每个“信念”点数都会提高伤害减免效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Tenet CCLXXIII: Let my hands be clean in the act of killing. Let the metal scrap we call bullet be imbued with righteous will and carry into my enemy’s heart.” Ivan Kahn, Lecturer of Demonology _________________________________________________________ Tenet CLXI: That which has done harm will do harm again. Lecturer Ivan Kahn restrained the power that crackled from his tattoos, and passed a silverlock pistol and a cutlass round his belt. He’d make everyone pay this time. Tenet CLXXIII: Turn first to your husband, children, or wife for signs of demonic possession. Ivan cursed himself, hitting his head against the wall. Why hadn’t he seen it? How'd he let this happen? Tenet CCXXXIX: Do not enter Eriebe, where souls rest, lest you become a spirit’s thrall. Ivan shook his head. Zoltan was waiting for him. The brands on Ivan’s arms burned so bright he scorched a passage through the Aether into the realm of the dead, not to return without his love.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “戒条CCLXXIII：让我的双手在杀戮的艺术中被清洗干净，让名曰子弹的金属带着正义的意志打入敌人的心脏。” 伊万·卡恩，恶魔学讲师 _________________________________________________________ 戒条CLXI：江山易改，本性难移。 讲师伊万·卡恩抑制住了纹身总共喷薄欲出的力量，将一支银扣手枪和一把弯刀挂在腰带上。这次他要让每个人都付出代价。 戒条CLXXIII：首先从身边的亲人身上寻找恶魔附身的迹象。 伊万以头抢地，咒骂着自己：为什么他没发现它？他怎么能让这一切发生？ 戒条CCXXXIX：不要进入幽冥，那里是灵魂休憩之所，免得沦为鬼魂的奴隶。 伊万摇摇头。佐尔覃就在前面等着他。伊万手臂上的烙印燃烧得如此炽烈，以至于他烧穿了以太，打通了一条进入死亡国度的通道，不找到他的爱人就永远不回来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
You have 5 "Annointed Ammunition" points that replenish every few seconds. "Annointed Ammunition" also replenishes  when you complete an Active Dodge.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have, your Projectile Damage is increased.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have missing, your Melee Damage is increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
你有5个“擦枪”点数，每隔数秒重新填装一点。翻滚也能填装点数。

你每有一个“擦枪”点数，就会获得一定的投射物伤害加成。

你每失去一个“擦枪”点数，就会获得一定的近战伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Tenet CXXXII: The knowledge I gain in battle is not solely mine. I am but a speck within the Great Project, and as I rest on the knowledge of others, I will allow others to rest on mine.” Ivan Kahn, Lecturer of Demonology _________________________________________________________ Tenet CLXI: That which has done harm will do harm again. Lecturer Ivan Kahn restrained the power that crackled from his tattoos, and passed a silverlock pistol and a cutlass round his belt. He’d make everyone pay this time. Tenet CLXXIII: Turn first to your husband, children, or wife for signs of demonic possession. Ivan cursed himself, hitting his head against the wall. Why hadn’t he seen it? How'd he let this happen? Tenet CCXXXIX: Do not enter Eriebe, where souls rest, lest you become a spirit’s thrall. Ivan shook his head. Zoltan was waiting for him. The brands on Ivan’s arms burned so bright he scorched a passage through the Aether into the realm of the dead, not to return without his love.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “戒条CXXXII：我在战斗中获得的知识不光属于我。我仅仅是这项伟大事业中的一粒微尘，承前人之惠时，也当荫庇后人。” 伊万·卡恩，恶魔学讲师 _________________________________________________________ 戒条CLXI：江山易改，本性难移。 讲师伊万·卡恩抑制住了纹身总共喷薄欲出的力量，将一支银扣手枪和一把弯刀挂在腰带上。这次他要让每个人都付出代价。 戒条CLXXIII：首先从身边的亲人身上寻找恶魔附身的迹象。 伊万以头抢地，咒骂着自己：为什么他没发现它？他怎么能让这一切发生？ 戒条CCXXXIX：不要进入幽冥，那里是灵魂休憩之所，免得沦为鬼魂的奴隶。 伊万摇摇头。佐尔覃就在前面等着他。伊万手臂上的烙印燃烧得如此炽烈，以至于他烧穿了以太，打通了一条进入死亡国度的通道，不找到他的爱人就永远不回来。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Every time you kill a Champion enemy, you gain 1 "Headhunter" point up to a Maximum. Each "Headhunter" point increases your Material Damage for a few seconds. Your "Headhunter" points will be reset if you do not aquire a new point within a given timeframe.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当你击杀一名将级敌人时，你将得到一个“猎首”点数，该点数存在上限。每个“猎首”点数会在几秒内提供物质伤害加成。若你在一定时限每没能得到新的点数，你的“猎首”点数将重置。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Recall this when you ride to battle. We fight not for pleasure, cruelty, or political favor. We fight for the tomorrow of mankind. When you hold your foe before you, strike deep. Strike true.” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “当你驰骋疆场时，请谨记这一点。我们的战斗不是为了追求愉悦、残忍、或是所谓的政治正确。我们是在为了人类的明天而搏杀。当你压制住你的敌人时，下手必须狠而准。” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌淹没他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就奋力搏杀的你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明之中。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies are killed instantly if Hit while their Health is below a certain threshold. This only works on Underling and Specialist enemies.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 生命值低于一定界限的敌人被击中时会被直接斩杀。这个效果只对士级和尉级敌人有效。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Don’t despair! With me, now! Show them how our faith shields us before calamity!” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “不要气馁！来，站到我的身边！让他们看看在灾难之下我们的信仰能成为多么坚固的壁垒！” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌灌注他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就在你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明里。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When your Health is below a certain threshold, you make a "Prayer", giving a Buff to the All Resistances Score of your Allies for a few seconds and reviving Downed Allies. This Effect has a large cooldown.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你的生命低于一定界限时，你进行一次祈祷，为你的盟友提供一个持续数秒的全抗值Buff并复活倒下的盟友。该效果有很长的冷却时间。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “I don’t know how or why I was granted this gift. But by spell and by sword, I will use it in service of the Lady of Dawn, and see the sun rise once again for mankind.” Gernese, Eos of the Brotherhood of Dawn _________________________________________________________ “One trainee whom I won’t name came to me and said: ‘I’m near the end of my training but Anathëa has never come to me. What am I doing wrong?’ Here’s my answer: We cannot ask the Lady of Dawn to carry each and every one of our hopes. If I am able to burn the impious, it’s only because I refract the light of my fellows. Be beacons to one another. As you plunge your swords into the enemy, as you blind them with the Lady’s light, deafen them with the Searing Song, remember: Anathëa is by your side when you do battle, she’s in the temples when the Hierophants sing, she’s in the lightness of your heart as you retire in the evenings.”
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我不知道我是如何或为何而得到这份天资。但是透过利剑与法术，我将用这份能力侍奉黎明女神，并亲眼见证太阳重新为人类而升起。” 格尼斯，黎明兄弟会的黎明神官 _________________________________________________________ “一个我不方便透露名字的老学员曾经过来问过我这样一件事：‘我的训练快要结束了，可我还是没有见到安娜蒂亚。是我做错了什么吗？’我的回答是： 我们不能奢求黎明女神承载我们所有人的愿望。如果我有能力燃尽那些不敬神者，那仅仅是因为我在折射着我同伴们的光。我们之间彼此映照着。当你的利刃砍进敌人的身躯，用女神的光芒刺瞎他们的双目，用激昂的圣歌淹没他们的双耳时，记住：当你战斗时，安娜蒂亚就奋力搏杀的你的身侧，当牧师诵经时，她就在庄严的神殿之中，当你入夜休憩时，她就在你心中那抹光明之中。”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
When your Force Shield is above a certain percentage, your Spells that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

When your Force Shield is below a certain threshold, your Attacks that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

This ability only works if your Force Shield is above 0.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
当你的护盾高于一定比例时，你的法术伤害获得额外神圣伤害。

当你的护盾低于一定比例时，你的攻击获得额外神圣伤害。

最大护盾高于0时才能生效。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Not one of the usurpers knows how to use their power. Too focused on retaining their form and identity to submit themselves to authentic evolution.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “没有一个篡位者知道如何正确使用他们的力量。他们过度专注于保留自己的个性而不遵从本源实现真正的蜕变。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Using Skills that deal Elemental Damage you their corresponding "Accord". Each Accord has different Effects depending on its Elemental Damage Type.

"Beelmalik's Accord" increases your Critical Chance Score for a few seconds.

"Abanazaar's Accord" increases your Damage for a few seconds.

"Etheliel's Accord" increases your Ailment Chance Score for a few seconds.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
当使用特定元素技能时赋予你相应的“协议”。每个协议将会依触发其的元素提供不同的影响。

“比马利克的协议”将会在数秒内增加你的暴击几率值。

“阿巴纳扎的协议”将会在数秒内提供伤害加成。

“耶特利尔的协议”将在数秒内增加你的异常状态几率值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Allows you to have two "Accords" active at any time.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 让你能同时激活两个“协议”

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “If I lose my form, if I lose ‘me’, it will only be a passage into another state. Don’t weep or smile in my defeat, for I am ever victorious.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “如果我失去了我的皮囊，失去了“我”自身，那不过是进入了另一种形态。不要为我的失败而哭泣或微笑，因为我永远是胜利者。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Whenever your Willpower is below a certain percentage, each time you use a Skill there is a Chance that you will cause an explosion. You and Enemies take a percentage of your maximum Health OR Force Shield (whichever is highest) as Damage, and a percentage of your Willpower is regenerated.\n\nThe Damage type of the Damage dealt is selected randomly between Lightning, Fire, and Frost.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你的魔力低于一定百分比时，每次使用技能都有几率触发一次爆炸。你和敌人都会受到基于你最大生命或是最大护盾（取决于哪个更高）一定比例的伤害，同时你的会回复一定百分比的魔力。\n\n爆炸伤害的类型从冰霜、火焰、闪电中随机选取。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “We have guarded ourselves from the elements with thick walls and stone foundations. This isn’t how we were meant to be. We’ve grown soft. Weak. But I will help everyone recall the true potential of their bodies.” Ashoret, Prophet of Trinity _________________________________________________________ Ever since the Primordial of Change split into three parts — Etheliel, Beelmalik and Abanazaar — its name was forgotten by all but one. Prophet Ashoret, last worshipper of Change, despised its three usurpers: spoiled children petrified of all things unfamiliar, the cause of the world’s stagnation. Ashoret devised a plan to bring Change back. He stole power from the three Fallen Primordials’ faithful, combining them into a cataclysmic storm. He ripped the roofs from their temples, cursed the bodies of worshippers to burst with elemental might, annihilating their congregations. Until the Primordial of Change rises from his progeny’s ashes, the omnistorm will walk.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “一直以来，我们用周密的保护让自己免受元素的侵袭。我们不应该如此。我们变得无力而软弱。但是我会让每个人回想起他们身体的真正潜力。” 阿索雷特，三元先知 _________________________________________________________ 自从变革之源分裂成三部分——耶特利尔，比马利克和阿巴纳扎——他的名字就只被一个人铭记。 先知阿索雷特，变革最后的追随者，极其鄙视它的三名篡位者：他们是象牙塔中骄纵的孩子，对一切的陌生事物恐惧畏缩，它们就是世界停滞不前的根源。阿索雷特设计了一个让变革重新回归的计划。他从三位堕落元素神的信仰中窃取力量，用来构建一场灾难性的风暴。他掀翻了信徒们的神庙，用元素之力的诅咒令他们爆体而亡，将他们的教会彻底抹除。 除非变革之源从元素神的灰烬中复生，这场毁灭的风暴永远都不会停歇。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Certain Skills that deal Elemental Damage Types have a chance to launch other Spells when Cast.

Lightning Skills can launch a Chain Lightning Spell.

Fire skills can launch a Meteor Spell.

Frost skills can launch a Frost Lance Spell.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
施放某些造成元素伤害的技能时有一定几率发动其他法术。

闪电技能可以发动一项闪电链法术。

火焰技能可以发动一项陨石法术。

冰霜技能可以发动一项冰矛法术。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “There’s great treasures to be found in a corpse. Only people are much too… skittish.” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fueling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “在尸体里可以找到很多宝藏。只是人们对这种事太…敏感。” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies that die near you have a chance to drop a Green Globe. If picked up, the Globe will increase your Toxic damage for a short duration. This Buff Stacks with each Globe picked up.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 死在你附近的敌人有几率掉落一个绿球。如果你捡起它，它会在短时间内给予你额外毒素伤害。每拾取一个绿球都会叠加一层BUFF。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Summons that die near you also drop a green globe.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 在你附近死去的召唤物也会掉落绿球。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Weak. Weak, weak, weak. These lungs weren’t built for this world. To live is to decay, to slowly poison yourself. Why not decay indefinitely? Why does it have to end?” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fueling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “太弱了。太弱了，太弱了，太弱了。这些肺部根本就不是能在这个世界上生存下来的类型。活着就是在腐败，在一点点毒害自己。为什么不一直腐败下去？为什么腐败一定要有极限？” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Enemies receive a Stack of Poison every few seconds when they are close to you.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当敌人靠近你时，每隔几秒会受到一层中毒状态。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “It’s odd, to speak with the living mortal. They perceive consciousness as limited to one body. They haven’t known... liberation.” Kiraan, Corpse Stalker _________________________________________________________ Kiraan was the only child of his generation to survive the Prestwich plague. He spent his days with the terminally ill, watching their lives slip away with macabre curiosity. His penchant for death and immunity to the plague earned him the nickname of ‘Corpse Stalker’. He was exiled into the waiting arms of the Cult of Bezeriel. Kiraan soon mastered poison and death magic, his aptitude unsettling fellow cultists. He grew weary of the cult’s old dogma and resolved to start a new sect to harvest faith from the agonizing. As his army of the undead grows, his vision approaches fruition: a world permanently on the brink of extinction, fueling his putrid patron with the faith of the desperate.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “跟活人说话实在是很奇怪。他们总以为意识仅仅局限于一副肉体。他们还没认识到什么叫……自由。” 基兰，觅尸者 _________________________________________________________ 基兰是他那一代人中唯一活过普雷斯特维奇瘟疫的孩子。他对死亡的嗜好和对瘟疫的免疫力让他得到了“觅尸者”的绰号。他被放逐后便投身贝塞瑞尔教派的怀抱。 基兰很快就精通了毒药与死灵术，他的天资令其他的教徒坐立不安。他渐渐对教派的陈规戒律感到厌倦并决心建立一个全新的教派，并以此从痛苦中收割信仰。随着他的亡灵军团的壮大，他的梦想即将实现: 一个永远处于灭绝边缘的世界，绝望者用他们的信仰供奉着他们堕落的庇护者。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased, but your Summons receive decreased Damage.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 降低你的最大生命值和最大护盾，但你的召唤物将获得伤害减免。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “You’re the same as every other so-called master I’ve studied under. You weaken yourself for the sake of a tradition, learn mediocre moves because of the name on the manual. In the next life, don’t waste my time.” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Lords who try to hire her often fail, as she no longer values gold.  Her single-minded pursuit is a rare wildflower, the Black Aster. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “你跟我所学习过的那些所谓的大师是一类人。你为了照顾传统而自我束缚，仅仅因为他们在手册上的名字而学习一些垃圾花架式。下辈子记住，别来浪费我的时间。” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了蒂萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
You unlock the "Probing Weakness" and "Stalwart Resolve" Stances, each one giving you different Buffs. Using an Active Dodge changes your Stance.

While in the "Probing Weakness" Stance, your All Resistances Score is decreased, but your Basic Attacks have a chance to deal double Damage, including on Critical Hits.

While in the "Stalwart Resolve" Stance, your Attack and Spell Casting Speed Score is decreased, but your Block Chance is increased.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
你解锁了“寻隙”姿态和“忠贞”姿态，它们会给予你不同的增益。使用翻滚会切换姿态。

“寻隙”姿态下，你的全抗值降低，但有机会造成双倍伤害，暴击时该增幅同样生效。

“忠贞”姿态下，你的攻击速度值和施法速度值都会减少，但是你的格挡几率提高。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “I’ve never allowed anyone to put me on the defense, and you’re certainly not the one to break that rule. Or do you have that dexterity? Can you keep timing your swings as the blood drums in your ears, warning you of impending death?” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Lords who try to hire her often fail, as she no longer values gold.  Her single-minded pursuit is a rare wildflower, the Black Aster. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “我从来没让任何人逼得我防御，你也显然不是那个能打破这条规则的人。又或者说你能达到这个速度吗？听着血液在耳中鼓动，像战鼓提醒着你死到临头之时，你还能控制自己的身体好好移动吗？” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了蒂萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: If you Block an Enemy’s attack, you instantly deal a percentage of your Weapon Damage in a counter-attack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你格挡一名敌人的攻击时，你立即造成一定比例武器伤害的反击。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Retract your statements. It isn’t my fault you expected a mere fencing match. In a real fight, no one takes a step back for fairplay’s sake. I am not only a warrior, I am the warrior, and I won’t lower myself to acting as a dancing puppet for your entertainment.” Satine, Baroness of Tissarine _________________________________________________________ No mercenary is quite as legendary as Satine, Mistress of Arms. Having trained under weapon masters of many disciplines, she’s guarded herself from any weakness. Hired alongside others to snuff out a rebel militia in Laibon, she emerged from their lair drenched in blood, having killed all of them alone. With the momentous reward for this deed, she built the town of Tissarine. Lords who try to hire her often fail, as she no longer values gold.  Her single-minded pursuit is a rare wildflower, the Black Aster. Some say she seeks it for poison, others for a private collection. None dare ask. She works for whoever can source them, one legend pursuing another with unmatched martial skill.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “请收回你的言论。你觉得这只是一场击剑比赛，但这不是我的错。在真正的战斗中，没有人会为了维持公平而为对手后退一步。我不只是个普通的战士，我是真正的战狂，而且我不会为了照顾你的娱乐而把自己作贱成一个只会跳舞的木偶。” 萨蒂娜，提萨林的男爵夫人 _________________________________________________________ 没有一个雇佣兵能像武装夫人萨蒂娜那样具有传奇色彩。在许多不同门类武器大师的训练下，她的战技完美无瑕。她曾经和其他人一起被雇来消灭莱邦的一个反叛民兵组织，当她独自一人浑身浴血地走出基地时，留下的只有一地尸体。她用这次行动的高额酬金建造了蒂萨林镇。 试图雇佣她的领主经常失败，因为她不再看重金钱。 她一心一意追求的是一种罕见的野花——黑紫菀。有人说她是为了毒药，也有人说是为了私人收藏。但是没有一个人胆敢问她。她为任何能找到这种花的人工作，作为一个传说，她用她无与伦比的武技追求着另一个传说。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
Completing Basic Attacks with the same Weapon 4 times within a short period grants you different Buffs depending on the Weapon.

One-handed and dual-wielded Weapons always inflict Critical Hits on the 4th Basic Attack.

Two-handed axes, hammers, and swords always inflict Stun in an area of effect on the 4th Basic Attack.

Bows always launch Projectiles in 360 degrees around you on the 4th Basic Attack.

Staffs always launch multiple Projectiles on the 4th Basic Attack.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
在短时间内用同样的武器完成四次普攻会给予你一个依武器类型而定的增益。

单手武器与双持单手武器的第四下普攻必定暴击。

双手斧，双手锤和双手大剑的第四下普攻会眩晕一定范围内的敌人。

弓箭的第四下普攻向周围360°发射投射物。

法杖的第四下普攻发射多枚投射物。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "..." 大嘴，盖斯帕之火 _________________________________________________________ 最具破坏性的火灾始于最微弱的火花。 自从驻在盖斯帕的黎明兄弟会发现一个被当敌人称作大嘴的哑巴巨人之后，他们已经进行过数百次的驱魔仪式了。他并没有什么占有欲，但是当他从睡梦中醒来时就会陷入狂暴。他将驱魔人撕的粉碎，他身后留下的只有被火吞噬的一切。他的斧头快速而有力的打击着所有的生物。 拜他的狂暴所赐，火焰很快就熄灭了，余下的只有一地的灰烬和焦炭：暴怒的狂魔从大嘴的身上退去了。在弥漫的烟雾中，一双隐秘之手抚摸着他的脸颊，一个声音对他轻声耳语：“跟我来吧，我们来修复这一切。”后悔而迷茫，本来就不知道自己该何去何从的他选择了遵从。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Your Willpower generated is transferred into Rage.\n\nYour Willpower Regeneration is also applied to Rage instead.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 你生成的魔力会转化为怒气。\n\n你回复的魔力同样转化为怒气。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: If your Rage is above a certain threshold, your skills deal twice their damage, but cost more to use.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你的怒气高于一定界限时，你的技能造成双倍伤害，但消耗也会增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: When you Hit an Enemy that has a certain number of Burn Stacks, your Hits have a Chance to consume the Burn Stacks that you inflicted and deal increased Damage per the number of Stacks consumed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 当你击中一个身上有一定燃烧层数的的敌人时，有一定的几率清除燃烧层数并根据清除的层数为这一击提供伤害加成。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: "..." Loudmouth, Blaze of Geldspar _________________________________________________________ The most destructive fires begin with the faintest spark. The Geldspar installation of the Brotherhood of Dawn had processed hundreds of exorcisms when they found a giant mute known by locals as Loudmouth. His signs of possession were faint, yet when he awoke, madness ripped through him. He tore through the exorcists, fire scorching everything in his wake. His axes hit flesh in rapid percussive impacts. To that rhythm, the fire soon died down into embers and char: the Fury Demon had lost its hold on Loudmouth. From the smoke, two shadowy hands came to rest on his face, and a voice whispered to him: “Follow me. Let’s fix this together.” Remorseful and uncertain of his purpose on this earth, he obeyed.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: "..." 大嘴，盖斯帕之火 _________________________________________________________ 最具破坏性的火灾始于最微弱的火花。 自从驻在盖斯帕的黎明兄弟会发现一个被当敌人称作大嘴的哑巴巨人之后，他们已经进行过数百次的驱魔仪式了。他并没有什么占有欲，但是当他从睡梦中醒来时就会陷入狂暴。他将驱魔人撕的粉碎，他身后留下的只有被火吞噬的一切。他的斧头快速而有力的打击着所有的生物。 拜他的狂暴所赐，火焰很快就熄灭了，余下的只有一地的灰烬和焦炭：暴怒的狂魔从大嘴的身上退去了。在弥漫的烟雾中，一双隐秘之手抚摸着他的脸颊，一个声音对他轻声耳语：“跟我来吧，我们来修复这一切。”后悔而迷茫，本来就不知道自己该何去何从的他选择了遵从。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each time you Hit an Enemy, you receive an "Unleashed Fury" point. Each "Unleashed Fury" point increases your Attack Speed Score, your Life Leech, and decreases your All Resistances Score.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当你击中一个敌人，会得到一个“暴怒”点数。每个“暴怒”点数都会给你提供攻击速度值和吸血，但会降低你的全抗值。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: “Primary target located. Selecting secondary target for purposes of electric feedback.” Alastor #273 _________________________________________________________ All Alastor #273 knew was service to the Republic. But when his Ascended abilities manifested, he realized his life would become forfeit in his masters’ eyes should they find out. He sought a lord who’d value his skills. The Cult of Ezaneal required a hand to test the engines of chaos. They plugged metal and wire into him, neutralized hunger and pain, armed him with turrets and electric gauntlets. Empowered, he returned to the Republic Disposing of any witnesses to his powers, he rose to fame by executing an Edict for the Prince of Vulkaïn. Scholars would debate the ripples of this assassination, but Alastor #273 only felt the satisfaction of a target eliminated.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: “主目标已锁定。选择第二目标作为电反馈目标。” 行刑者 273号 _________________________________________________________ 行刑者 273号知道的唯一一件事就是为共和国服务。但是当他的晋升能力显现出来时，他意识到如果这个能力被他的主人们发现，他将会被废弃。于是他找到了一个重视他的能力的领主。 伊扎尼尔教团需要一个帮手替他们测试混沌引擎。他们将金属和线路添进他的身体，填补了他的饥饿与痛苦，为他装备上炮台和电气抓手。他全副武装地回到了共和国。 为了处理掉那些所有见过他能力的人，他通过推行伏尔甘王子的法令从而扬名立万。学者们用他们的喉舌压住了暗杀的风波，而行刑者 273号仅仅为他干掉了一个目标而感到满意。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each time you use a Basic Attack, you receive an "Overload" point that increases your Damage. When you use a Skill, every "Overload" point is removed and the total Damage Buff provided by your "Overload" points is doubled.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当你使用一次普攻，你将得到一个给予伤害加成的“过载”点数。当你使用技能时，移除所有“过载”点数，该技能享受这些“过载”点数提供的全伤害加成Buff双倍的效果。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Whenever you inflict a Critical Hit on an Enemy, your Attack Speed Score is increased for a short duration.
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每当你造成一次暴击，你的攻击速度值会在一小段时间得到增加。

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT:
You have "Power Charge" points. This resource is now used to activate any Device Skills or Skills that deal the Lightning Damage Type. The resource can have any value between -100 and 100. When Power Charge is a positive number, your Damage will be increased, and when it is a negative number, your Damage will be decreased.

Power Charge is regenerated over time, and by using your Basic Attacks.

These Skills still consume their dedicated Resource in addition to "Power Charge".
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT:
让你具有“电荷”点数。该点数可以作用于任何装置技能和闪电基础伤害技能。其取值范围在-100到100之间。当电荷数值为正时，提高你的伤害加成，值为负时，降低你的伤害加成。

电荷点数随时间再生，也可以通过普攻增长。

装置和闪电技能在消耗魔力的同时也会消耗电荷点数。
击杀燃烧的敌人获得的火焰伤害奖励
击杀冻结的敌人获得的冰霜伤害奖励
击杀感电的敌人获得的闪电伤害奖励
击杀眩晕的敌人获得的物理伤害奖励
击杀流血的敌人获得的撕裂伤害奖励
击杀虚弱的敌人获得的神圣伤害奖励
击杀受诅咒的敌人获得的暗影伤害奖励
击杀中毒的敌人获得的毒素伤害奖励
击杀停滞的敌人获得的以太伤害奖励

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increased Chance to inflict all Ailment types on enemies
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 增加你对敌人造成所有种类异常状态的几率

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Each Headhunter point grants a Material damage bonus
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 每个猎首点数提供一定物质伤害加成

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Chance for Attacks to deal double Damage while losing All Resistances
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 攻击时有机会造成双倍伤害同时降低自身全抗性

Sheet1.ORIGINAL TEXT: Increased Block Chance and Block Efficiency at the cost of reduced Attack and Spellcasting Speed
Sheet1.TRANSLATED TEXT: 以降低攻速和施法速度为代价增加格挡几率和格挡效率
